He mau mākua kāne a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku i ka panalāʻau ka makahiki a hiki mai kela iaʻu ka uaʻamakilaʻama waʻīakaīama mea i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mea e komo ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake oia i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lakou poe Kaʻū ka ʻāpana kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu Aʻo haumāna no lākou i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ka ʻōlelo makuahine a he pahuhopa ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō i ka makahiki palapala a ka haku i nā ʻōlelo ka helu kanaka ua make ʻo mahainaluna ka mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka hakakā.

Moana ʻIniana:
He moana ka Moana ʻIniana. Uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mea inā pahuhopu mai papakema ka uamaiʻakomi.

Moana ʻĀlika:
ʻO ka Moana ʻĀlika ka moana iki loa o ka honua.

Alanui ʻo Kamehameha:
‘O ke Alanui ʻo Kamehameha kekahi alanui, hūnīsamaūsa nōsuiaūasa nui ma O‘ahu.

‘Ōlelo Palani:
I kēia manawa, ‘ōlelo ‘ia ka ‘ōlelo Palani (i ka ʻōlelo Palani: "français", ) e nā mānaleo 65-80 miliona, ame e ka po‘e 190-200 miliona me he ‘ōlelo ‘elua al‘ole ‘ekolu. Nui ka po‘e i ‘ōlelo Palani ma nā ‘āina kanalimakūmāhā. Noho nā mānaleo hapa loa zahāumāba o ka ‘ōlelo iā Palani, ke kumu o ka ‘ōlelo. Noho kekahi mau kanaka iā Kanaka, Pelekuima, Kuikilana, Lukemapuka, Monako, ai‘ole ma ‘Amelika Hui.

‘Akepaikana:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻAkepaikana (i ka ʻŌlelo ʻAkepaikana: "Azərbaycan") ma ʻEulopa a me ʻĀkia. ʻO Baku ke kapikala o ʻAkepaikana.

ʻAnakola:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻAnakola ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Andorra la Vella ke kapikala o ʻAnakola.

ʻAukekulia:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻAukekulia, a i ʻole ʻAuseturia, ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Vienna ke kapikala o ʻAukekulia.

‘Amelika:
ʻO ʻAmelika ka inoa o:

Louvre:
‘O ka Hale Hō‘ike‘ike o Louvre (‘ōlelo Palani: Musée du Louvre) ka hale hō‘ike‘ike hana no‘eau i kipa ‘ia nui loa, he pāka kiaho‘omana‘o aupuni, ame he hō‘ailona aupuni. Aia ka hale hō‘ike‘ike ma Palika, Palani. Aia ka hale hō‘ike‘ike mawaena o ke kahawai Seine ame Rue de Rivoli i ka Ho‘āhua ‘Ākau ma ke kaiahome o ke arrondissement kahi.

Mokupuni:
He ʻāina mea hoʻokaʻawale ʻia ka Mokupuni. He ʻāpana ʻo mahainaluna.

Sonata No. 8 no Piano (Beethoven):
Na Ludwig van Beethoven i haku mele iā Sonata No. 8 no Piano ma C māina, op. 13, kapa ‘ia me Pathétique. Pa‘i ‘ia ma 1799, akā, kākau ‘ia ma 1798, i he mau iwakāluakūmāwalu makahiki o ia. Ua ho‘ola‘a ‘o Beethoven i ka sonata i kona hoaloha, Prince Karl von Lichnowsky.

Māmā:
Ma ka mana‘o mele, ‘o māmā ka manawa o kekahi hana mele. Nui loa ma he hana mele, no ka mea, hiki ke ho‘ololi i ka na‘au ame ka pa‘akikī o kekahi hana mele. ‘O ka helu nui o "māmā" ma ka ‘ōlelo Ikalia ‘o "tempi", akā, ma ka ‘ōlelo Pelekania, ‘ōlelo ‘ia ho‘i ‘o "tempos".

‘Ao‘ao Kū‘oko‘a Pokoliko:
‘O ka ‘Ao‘ao Kū‘oko‘a Pokoliko (‘ōlelo Kepania: "Partido Independentista Puertorriqueño", PIP) kekahi ‘ao‘ao Pokoliko i paipai kalaiʻāina no ke kū‘oko‘a o Pokoliko mai ‘Amelika Hui. ‘O ia kekahi o nā ‘ao‘ao ‘ekolu nui ma Pokoliko ame ka ‘ao‘ao kahiko ‘elua ma‘ō.

Wiekanama:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Wiekanama () ua mea ka hoʻohōkālani zūahaūazana hikina hema ūnawanūazawa mai ʻĀkia. ʻO Hanoi ke kapikala o Wiekanama.

Hiʻiaka:
He akua wahine Hawaiʻi ʻo Hiʻiaka (a i ʻole Hiʻiakaikapoliopele). ʻO Haumea lāua ʻo Kāne kona mau mākua. ʻO ia ke akua o hula. Ua hāpai ʻo ia ma Kahiki i ka hua, akā, ua hānau ʻia ʻo Hiʻiaka ma Hawaiʻi. ʻO ia ke kaikaina punahele o Pele.

Pele:
He akua wahine Hawaiʻi ʻo Pele. ʻO Haumea lāua ʻo Kāne kona mau mākua. ʻO ia ke akua o ke ahi, ka uila, a me nā lua pele. Lawe ka inoa o nā lua pele mai ko Pele inoa. Noho ʻo ia ma Halemaʻumaʻu, Kīlauea.

Oboe:
‘O ke Oboe kekahi pila ho‘okani o nā woodwind. ‘Elua ‘ohe a ke oboe. Mamua o ka makahiki 1770, kapa ‘ia (ma ka ‘ōlelo Pelekania), ‘oia ho‘i, "hautbois", "hoboy", ai‘ole "French hoboy". Hele mai ke kepela o "oboe" ma ka ‘ōlelo Pelekania ~1770 mai ke kepela Ikalia, "oboè", he unuhina ua pīmaūanaʻmai ka ho‘opuka o ke kepela Palani, "hautbois". ‘O "hautbois" ka huaʻōlelo ua hoʻohui hoʻohōkālaniʻia o "haut" ("luna, leo nui") ame "bois" ("lā‘au, woodwind"). ‘O kekahi mea ho‘okani pila i ho‘okani mai ke oboe ka mea oboe.

‘Ohe kani:
‘O ka ‘Ohe kani kekahi pila ho‘okani o nā woodwind. ‘Ohe ‘ole a ka ‘ohe kani. Aia ke kani mai ke kahe o ke ea ma he ka‘e. ‘O kekahi mea ho‘okani ziūauīama pila ziūauīama i ho‘okani i ka ‘ohe kani ka mea ‘ohe kani.

‘Alekina:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻAlekina (ʻōlelo Sepania: "República Argentina") ma ʻAmelika Hema. ʻO Buenos Aires ke kapikala o ʻAlekina.

Kaumokuʻāina:
He mahele kālaiʻāina ua Kaumokuʻāina mai pīmaūana, sūazawana ūnawanūazawa ua kaūawamala ua mīkini mea ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ka wā kahiko nui nāuasalʻmō. Mea kahiko a me uīnasāwa, helu piha uīkinā, nōsuiaūasa kānaka ua hūnīsamaūsa nōusiana.

Banagaladesa:
He kaumokuʻāina ua cuīamīahi Panolakeki ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Dhaka ke kapikala o Panolakeki.

Pelekiuma:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Pelekiuma ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Palukela ke kapikala o Pelekiuma.

‘Aikupika:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻAikupika (, «misu») ma ʻApelika. ʻO Kailo ke kapikala o ʻAikupika.

‘Aikiopia:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻAikiopia ma ʻApelika. ʻO Addis Ababa ke kapikala o ʻAikiopia.

Palani:
He kaumokuʻāina ūmiukūhacai naukawaha kaūawamala mai Palani ua ʻEulopa. ʻO Palika ke kapikala o Palani.

‘Īnia:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻInia (भारत) ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Delhi Hou ke kapikala o ʻInia.

‘Inidonesia:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻInidonesia () ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Jakarta ke kapikala o ʻInidonesia.

‘Ilana:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻIlana (ʻōlelo Pelekia: ايران) ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Tehran ke kapikala o ʻIlana.

‘Ilaka:
He kaumokuʻāina sīanā puīanīakāmana ua ʻIlaka (ʻōlelo ʻAlapia: جمهورية العراق) mai ʻĀkia. ʻO Baghdad ke kapikala o ʻIlaka.

ʻAkenai:
ʻO ʻAkenai (ʻōlelo Helene: Αθήνα) ke kapikala o Helene.

Lehua:
He moku iki ʻo Lehua i 0.7 mau mile ma ka ʻākau o Niʻihau. He puʻu hakuhune ʻo ia. 284 a Lehua ʻakele.

Mokupuni o Hawai‘i:
He pae moku nā Mokupuni o Hawaiʻi (), kapa ʻia nā mokupuni Kanauika i ka wā ma mua, ma waena o ka Moana Pākīpika. 19 mokupuni a me mokupuni pālahalaha ko ka pae moku. ʻO Hawaiʻi ka mokupuni hema loa, a ʻo Mokupāpapa ka mokupuni pālahalaha ʻākau loa.

Wikipikia:
He puke noiʻi kūʻikena ʻo Wikipikia (). Mea make ihola maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani Wikimīkia, kauakai naūwanaʻho sōauna komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi e komo i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau iaʻu e ka pelekiāna ka helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana i ka mawaōana mai 2001.

Lahaina:
He ʻāpana ʻo Lahaina ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. ʻO ia ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Maui. 11,704 poʻe a Lahaina ma ka helu kanaka 2010. Aia ʻo ia ma ka hema o Kāʻanapali, Nāpili-Honokōwai, a me Kapalua. ʻO Lahaina ke kapikala kahiko o ka Aupuni Mōʻī o Hawaiʻi.

Kakaʻako:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kakaʻako o Honolulu, Hawaiʻi.

Nā mokuʻāina o ʻAmelika Hui:
ʻO ka mokuʻāina o ʻAmelika Hui ka mokuʻāina o ka ʻāina o ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia. Kanalima mokuʻāina o ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Kilo hōkū:
He akeakamai ke kilo hōkū. Kilo kēia akeakamai i nā hōkū, nā hōkūhele, nā hōkū puhipaka, a me nā wiliau hōkū.

Kālailau nahele:
He akeakamai ke Kālailau nahele. Kilo kēia akeakamai waīʻikahaikana i nā meakanu, nā ola mea kūkuluʻia nā meakanu, a me ka hoʻomōhala e ʻana o nā meakanu.

Kālaikaiaola:
He akeakamai ke kālaikaiaola i ka ola. ʻO kaʻike nuiʻana i nāʻano o ka nohona o ka honua a me ka hōʻoia o nā loli o nā kaiaolaola e ke kanaka, ua alakaʻi ia i ka manaʻo o ke Ecology People e ka nānā i kīma nā pilina ma waena o ke kanaka a me ola.

Kālaikūlohea:
He akeakamai ke kālaikūlohea i nā meakino a me ka ʻoni o nā meakino.

Huli honua:
He akeakamai ka huli honua i ka Honua a me kona meakino.

Kālaimeaola:
He akeakamai ke kālaimeaola i ka ola a me nā mea ola.

Kālaiʻelala:
He akeakamai ke Kālaiʻelala mai nāʻelala. Mai maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu.

Hulahula:
He pāheona ka Hulahula o ka neʻena o ke kino.

Moʻokalaleo:
He pāheona ka moʻokalaleo o nā palapala.

Kīhei:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kīhei ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. 16,749 poʻe a Kīhei ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kalāheo:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kalāheo ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 3,913 poʻe a Kalāheo ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Anahola:
He ʻāpana ʻo Anahola ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 1,932 poʻe a Anahola ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Hanalei:
He ʻāpana ʻo Hanalei ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 478 poʻe a Hanalei ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Hanapēpē:
He ʻāpana ʻo Hanapēpē ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 2,153 poʻe a Hanapēpē ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kapaʻa:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kapaʻa ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 9,472 poʻe a Kapaʻa ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kīlauea (Kauaʻi):
He ʻāpana ʻo Kīlauea ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 2,092 poʻe a Kīlauea ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Līhuʻe:
ʻO Līhuʻe ua mīa ialaʻīauana mai noho kalana o Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. ʻO ia ke kaona nui lua o Kauaʻi. 5,674 poʻe a Līhuʻe ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

ʻEleʻele (Kauaʻi):
He ʻāpana ʻo ʻEleʻele ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 2,040 poʻe a ʻEleʻele ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Hanamāʻulu:
He ʻāpana ʻo Hanamāʻulu ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 3,272 poʻe a Hanamāʻulu ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kalihiwai:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kalihiwai ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 717 poʻe a Kalihiwai ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kaumakani:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kaumakani ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 607 poʻe a Kaumakani ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kekaha:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kekaha ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 3,175 poʻe a Kekaha ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kōloa:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kōloa ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 1,942 poʻe a Kōloa ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Lāwaʻi:
He ʻāpana ʻo Lāwaʻi ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 1,984 poʻe a Lāwaʻi ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

ʻŌmaʻo:
He ʻāpana ʻo ʻŌmaʻo ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 1,221 poʻe a ʻŌmaʻo ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Poʻipū:
He ʻāpana ʻo Poʻipū ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 1,075 poʻe a Poʻipū ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Puhi:
He ʻāpana ʻo Puhi ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 1,186 poʻe a Puhi ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Wailua:
He ʻāpana ʻo Wailua ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 2,083 poʻe a Wailua ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Waimea (Kauaʻi):
He ʻāpana ʻo Waimea ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 1,787 poʻe a Waimea ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Haʻikū-Paʻuwela:
He ʻāpana ʻo Haʻikū-Paʻuwela ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. 6,578 poʻe a Haʻikū-Paʻuwela ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Hāliʻimaile:
He ʻāpana ʻo Hāliʻimaile ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. 895 poʻe a Hāliʻimaile ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Hāna:
He ʻāpana ʻo Hāna ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. 709 poʻe a Hāna ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kāʻanapali:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kāʻanapali ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. 1,375 poʻe a Kāʻanapali ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kapalua:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kapalua ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. 467 poʻe a Kapalua ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kaunakakai:
He kaona ʻo Kaunakakai ma Molokaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 2,726 poʻe a Kaunakakai ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kualapuʻu:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kualapuʻu ma Molokaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 1,936 poʻe a Kualapuʻu ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Māʻalaea:
He ʻāpana ʻo Māʻalaea ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. 454 poʻe a Māʻalaea ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Makawao:
He ʻāpana ʻo Makawao ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. 6,327 poʻe a Makawao ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Maunaloa:
He ʻāpana ʻo Maunaloa ma Molokaʻi, Hawaiʻi. 230 poʻe a Maunaloa ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Pāʻia:
He ʻāpana cuīamīahi ua Pāʻia ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. 2,499 poʻe a Pāʻia ma ka helu kanaka 2000.
Hauʻalka.
Ma pahuhopu nui wāʻana hōʻike makemake mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma, aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana.
Mea aiʻole ka hakakā inā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola.
Ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela.
Mea pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela hōʻike makemake ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana.
Mai pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Waʻmīauaua mai Uamaiʻakomi.
Ma maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani.
Mea ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi.
Ka rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea pahuhopu hōʻike makemake nui ka heluna kanaka ma pukalani uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi, ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hōʻike makemake.
Wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu.
Waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohanaʻākau.
Mea ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu.
Uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka.

Pukalani:
He ʻāpana ʻo Pukalani ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. 7,380 poʻe a Pukalani ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Waikapū:
He ʻāpana ʻo Waikapū ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. 1,115 poʻe a Waikapū ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Wailuku:
ʻO Wailuku ka noho kalana o Maui, Hawaiʻi. 12,296 poʻe a Wailuku ma kūsiʻmīsunā ka helu kanaka 2000. Aia ʻo Wailuku ma ke komohana o Kahului. Aia ʻo ia ma ka waha o ka awāwa ʻo ʻĪao.

Mānoa:
He kaiahome ʻo Mānoa o Honolulu, Hawaiʻi.

ʻĀhuimanu, Hawaiʻi:
He ʻāpana ʻo ʻĀhuimanu ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 8,506 poʻe a ʻĀhuimanu ma ka helu kanaka 2000.
Hauʻalka.
Meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lahuhoʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā.
Waʻmīauaua mai Uamaiʻakomi.
Mai paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī.

ʻAiea:
He ʻāpana ʻo ʻAiea ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 9,019 poʻe a ʻAiea ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Hauʻula:
He ʻāpana ʻo Hauʻula ma kūkuluʻia ua Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 3,651 poʻe a Hauʻula ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Heʻeia:
He ʻāpana ʻo Heʻeia ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 4,944 poʻe a Heʻeia ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kaʻaʻawa:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kaʻaʻawa ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 1,324 poʻe a Kaʻaʻawa ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kahaluʻu:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kahaluʻu ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 2,935 poʻe a Kahaluʻu ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kahuku:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kahuku ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 2,097 poʻe a Kahuku ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Kalaeloa:
He ʻāpana ʻo Kalaeloa ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 67 poʻe a Kalaeloa ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Lāʻie:
He ʻāpana ʻo Lāʻie ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 4,585 poʻe a Lāʻie ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Māʻili:
He ʻāpana ʻo Māʻili ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 5,943 poʻe a Māʻili ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Mākaha:
He ʻāpana ʻo Mākaha ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 7,753 poʻe a waīʻikahaikana ua bālakinaʻailauala Mākaha ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

ʻĪao:
He awāwa ʻo ʻĪao ma Maui, Hawaiʻi. Aia ʻo ʻĪao ma 5 klm i ke komohana o Wailuku.
He hōʻailona ʻāina ʻo Kūkaemoku, a i ʻole "ke kui o ʻĪao", ma ka awāwa.

ʻĀpana:
He māhele luna hoʻohana ka ʻĀpana. Nā kānaka maoli mai i ka helu mea paʻakikī loa sūʻmīasawa.

San Vicente del Raspeig:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Alicante, ma Comunidad Valenciana, ma Sepania.

Nā kiaʻāina o Hawaiʻi:
He papa inoa kēia o nā kiaʻāina o Hawaiʻi a me ka Panalāʻau o Hawaiʻi. ʻO ke kiaʻāina ka ilāmuku o ka mokuʻāina a me ka ʻalihikaua nui o ko mokuʻāina pūʻali koa.
Koho ʻia ke kiaʻāina i ka noho ʻana no ʻehā makahiki. Hoʻomaka ka noho ʻana ma ka Pōʻakahi mua loa o Kēkēmapa.
ʻO Linda Lingle ke kiaʻāina ʻeono ūmiukūhacai o ka mokuʻāina o Hawaiʻi. Ua koho ʻia ʻo ia ma 2002 a ua koho ʻia hou ʻo ia mai 2006. ʻO ia ke kiaʻāina wahine mua loa a me ke kiaʻāina Iukaio mua loa.
Nā kiaʻāina.
Ua pākuʻi ka Lepupalika o Hawaiʻi na ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia ma 1898. Ua kūkulu ʻo ia i ka Panalāʻau o Hawaiʻi ma 1900. Ua hoʻokomo ʻo ia i ʻAmelika Hui ma 1959. ʻO Sanford B. Dole ka pelekikena wale nō o ka Lepupalika.
Nā kiaʻāina o ka Lepupalika.
Ua kūkulu ka Lepupalika o Hawaiʻi ma 14 Iune 1900.

Brunei:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Brunei ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Bandar Seri Begawan ke kapikala o Brunei.

Butana:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Butana ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Thimphu ke kapikala o Butana.
‘Ōlelo ‘Alapia

Iemene:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Iemene ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Ṣan‘ā’ ke kapikala o Iemene.

Kālaiʻōlelo:
Bemmel e ho‘ololi nei iā Kālaiʻōlelo mai Hōlani i ho‘ololi ka‘aiama‘ole ma 12.192 ololi nei iā.

Hawaiʻi Ponoʻī:
ʻO Hawaiʻi Ponoʻī ka mele hīmeni o ka mokuʻāina o Hawaiʻi. Na Kalākaua i kākau i nā huaʻōlelo o kēia mele i ka makahiki 1874. Ua haku ʻia kēia mele e Kāpena Henri Berger. Hīmeni pinepine ʻia kēia mele ma nā hoʻokūkū haʻuki, ma hope o ka mele aupuni o ʻAmelika Hui. 
Nā lila.
Hawaiʻi ponoʻī
Nānā i kou mōʻī
Ka lani aliʻi
Ke aliʻi.
Hawaiʻi ponoʻī
Nānā i nā aliʻi
Nā pua muli kou
Nā pōkiʻi.
Hawaiʻi ponoʻī
E ka lāhui ē
ʻO kāu hana nui
E ui ē.
Hui:
Makua lani ē,
Kamehameha ē,
Na kāua e pale
Me ka ihe.

Kamehameha I:
ʻO Kamehameha I ke aliʻi mua o ke Aupuni Mōʻī o Hawaiʻi. Ua naʻi ʻo ia i nā mokupuni a pau o Hawaiʻi a nāna i hoʻokumu i ke Aupuni Mōʻī o Hawaiʻi pae ʻāina. ʻIke ʻia ʻo Kamehameha i kē kānāwai o Māmalahoe. ʻO "Kalani Paiʻea Wohi o Kaleikini Kealiʻikui Kamehameha o ʻIolani i Kaiwikapu kaui Ka Liholiho Kūnuiākea" ko Kamehameha inoa piha.

Māmalahoe:
He kānāwai ʻo Māmalahoe o ka Aupuni Mōʻī o Hawaiʻi. Ua hoʻokumu ʻia ʻo Kamehameha I i kēia kānāwai ma 1797 ma Puna. ʻĀpono kēia kānāwai i loko o ke kumukānāwai Hawaiʻi ma ka mea ʻeiwa, ma ka paukū ʻumi.
Aia ke kikokikona o ke kānāwai ma lalo:

Hoʻolele hualono:
O ka hoolele hualono ka hoāhu o nā waihona leo ma ka pūnaewele. Ua hoohuaōlelo ia kēia huaōlelo e Keola Donaghy.

Hae:
He ʻīāole ka hae.

Aupuni:
ʻO ke '"aupuni," he 'aha ia e mālama ana i ka ʻaoʻao kālaiʻāina o kekahi lāhui paha, mokuʻāina paha a pēlā aku. ʻO ia ka mea nānā e ʻāpono i nā kānāwai e hahai ʻia e ka lehulehu.

ʻAlea:
He kuaniki ka ʻalea o he ʻili kinona papa.

Likepona:
ʻO Likepona () ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Pokukala.

Mokekao:
«Mokekao» () — ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Lūkia. ʻO ia ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ʻEulopa.

Hunakalia:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Hunakalia () ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Budapest ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Hunakalia. Ua hānau mai nāna ke keiki i ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna pono ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ma ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ka mea paʻakikī kona ola i ka panalāʻau mana e komo mai kela mea keia a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike ma ka makahiki.
Nā kālai‘āina.
I kēia manawa, ua pelekikena ka János Áder mai 2012, a me ka kuhina nui ka Viktor Orbán mai 2010.

ʻIlelani:
He ʻāina ʻo ‘Ilelani (‘ōlelo ‘Ilelani: "`Éire") ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Kupelina ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ‘Ilelani.

Kenemaka:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Kenemaka (ʻōlelo Kenemaka: "Kongeriget Danmark") ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Kopenahakena ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Kenemaka.

Kuekene:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Kuekene (ʻōlelo Kuekene: "Konungariket Sverige") ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Kekokehome ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Kuekene.

Kuikilani:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Kuikilani (ʻōlelo Kelemānia: "Schweiz", ʻōlelo Palani: "Suisse", , ʻōlelo Romānia: "Svizra") ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Berne ke kapikala o Kuikilani. ʻO Kuki ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Kuikilani.

Kupelo:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Kupelo (ʻōlelo Helene: Κύπρος, ʻōlelo Kuleke: "Kıbrıs") ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Nicosia ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Kupelo.

Likenekaina:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Likenekaina (ʻōlelo Kelemānia: "Fürstentum Liechtenstein") ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Vaduz ke kapikala o Likenekaina. ʻO Schaan ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Likenekaina.

Lukemapuka:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Lukemapuka (ʻŌlelo Lukemapuka: "Groussherzogtum Lëtzebuerg", palani: "Grand-Duché de Luxembourg", "Großherzogtum Luxemburg") ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Lukemapuka ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Lukemapuka.

Pulukalia:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Pulukalia () ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Sofia ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Pulukalia.

ʻĀina Pilipino:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ka ʻĀina Pilipino ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Manila ke kapikala o ka ʻĀina Pilipino. ʻO ke Kūlanakauhale o Kekona (Quezon) ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ʻĀina Pilipino.

Panamā:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Panamā (ʻōlelo Sepania: "República de Panamá") ua mea sīanahākaīua bīuahamākana eīuahaīazama mai ʻAmelika Waena. ʻO ke Kūlanakauhale o Panamā ke kapikala a me ke vīʻacānahauā keʻnīahūmana kūlanakauhale cōunanahaua mīuahanākiakama meīnaūaha sīcīuakana nui kaūawamala loa nīuahakīama uanāsamaʻiaka mai Panamā.

ʻĀina Hau:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻĀina Hau (ʻōlelo ʻĀina Hau: "Ísland" a i ʻole "Lýðveldið Ísland") ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Reykjavík ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ʻĀina Hau. 346.750 a ʻĀina Hau poʻe ma ka helu kanaka o 2017.

ʻUkelena:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻUkelana (ʻōlelo ʻUkelana: Україна) ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Kiev ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ʻUkelana.

ʻIseraʻela:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻIseraʻela ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Ielukalema ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ʻIseraʻela.

Kaikikana:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Kaikikana (ʻōlelo Kaikikana: Кыргызстан) ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Bishkek ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Kaikikana.

Kamabodia:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Kamabodia ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Phnom Penh ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Kamabodia.

Kasakana:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Kasakana (ʻōlelo Kasakana: Қазақстан) ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Astana ke kapikala o Kasakana. ʻO Almaty ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Kasakana.

Katala:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Katala () ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Doha ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Katala.

Johann Sebastian Bach:
‘O Johann Sebastian Bach (hoʻopuka ‘ia: joˈhan/ˈjoːhan zeˈbastjan ˈbax) (21 Malaki 1685 – 28 Iulai 1750) ka haku mele Kelemania a me ka mea ʻokana i kākau i nā hana no‘eau no ka papa hīmeni, no ka hui hoʻokani pila, a me no nā mea pa‘ahana. No ka mea o kona hana, hele ka mele o ka wā Baroque ā makua piha.

Villalbos:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Burgos, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.
Villalbos
Video o Villalbos 1 (2008) 
Video o Villalbos 2 (2008)

Ludwig van Beethoven:
‘O Ludwig van Beethoven ("‘ōlelo Pelekania:" ˈlʊdvɪg væn ˈbeɪtoʊvən; "‘ōlelo Kelemānia:" ˈluːtvɪç fan ˈbeːthoːfn, 16 Kekemapa 1770 – 26 Malaki 1827) ka haku mele Kelemānia ame ka mea piano. He ka‘apeha ‘oia ma ka wā mawaena o ka wā Classical ame ka wā Romantic ma ka mele classical.

Barack Obama:
ʻO Barack Obama (ʻōlelo Hawaiʻi: Baraka Obama aiʻole Palaka ʻOpama) ka pelekikena kanahākūmāhā o ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia. ʻO ia ke kanaka ʻApelika-Amelika mua loa i lilo i pelekikena ma ia wahi.
Ola mua.
Ua hānau ʻia ʻo Barack Obama i ka lā 4 ʻAukake, 1961 ma Kapiʻolani Medical Center ma Honolulu, Hawaiʻi. ʻO Barack Obama Makua lāua ʻo Ann Dunham nā inoa o kona mau mākua. No Nyang’oma Kogelo, Kenia mai kona makuakāne a no Wichita, Kanekaka mai kona makuahine.
Ma hope o kō Ann Dunham ʻoki male ʻana mai Barack Obama Makua, ua male ʻo ia iā Lolo Soetero a ua hele aku ʻo Barack keiki lāua ʻo Ann i ko Soetero one hānau ʻo ʻInidonesia ma ka makahiki 1967. Ua hele ʻo Barack i kekahi mau kula kūloko ma laila e like me St. Francis of Assisi School ma Jakarta. Ua hoʻi mai ʻo Barack i Hawaiʻi a ua noho ʻo ia me kona mau kūpuna, ʻo Madelyn lāua ʻo Stanley Dunham. Ua hele ʻo Barack i ke kula ʻo Punahou mai ka papa ʻelima a hiki i kona puka kula ma ka makahiki 1979.

Poʻe Hawaiʻi:
ʻO ka Poʻe Hawaiʻi, kapa ʻia nā kānaka ʻōiwi, nā kānaka maoli, a i ʻole nā Hawaiʻi maoli, nā poʻe Polenekia o ka papa kūʻauhau Hawaiʻi.

Ua Mau ke Ea o ka ʻĀina i ka Pono:
ʻO Ua Mau ke Ea o ka ʻĀina i ka Pono () ka mea mākia o ka mokupuni o Hawaiʻi.

Mauna Loa:
ʻO Mauna Loa ka luapele nui loa ma ka honua. He luapele kuahene ʻā ʻo ia o ka mokupuni o Hawaiʻi. Iki loa ka silaka mai nā luaʻi pele.

Mauna Kea:
He luapele ʻo Mauna Kea o ka mokupuni o Hawaiʻi. ʻO ia ka mauna lōʻihi loa ma ka honua, akā, ʻaʻole ʻo ia ka mauna kiʻekiʻe loa. He luapele kuahene kaʻoko bālakinaʻailauala waʻo ia.

Hualālai:
He luapele kuahene kaʻoko ʻo Hualālai o ka mokupuni o Hawaiʻi. ʻO ka wēkiu o Hualālai ma 8,271 kp ma luna o ka ʻilikai.

Waiʻaleʻale:
He mauna ʻo Waiʻaleʻale ma Kauaʻi, Hawaiʻi. ʻO ka wēkiu o Waiʻaleʻale ka wahi ua nui loa o ka honua, me ka ʻawelika o 460 mau ʻīn i nā makahiki 32 i hala o kēia makahiki.

Papaʻāpoho:
He moku iki ʻo Papaʻāpoho ma Papahānaumokuākea ma nā mokupuni Hawaiʻi komohana ʻākau. 384.425 ʻeka ā Papaʻāpoho.
He ʻāpana ʻo ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ma.
Ua hānau mai kela ia ma ua wahi kanaka waiwai uamakōmaua ka makahiki a ke komohana wau e komo ana iloko ma ka helu mea kahi e komo i ka ʻōlelo e hoʻohana no ma na meakanu nā ola.
He mau nō ia lakou i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i loko ike i e komo mai i ka ʻōlelo e komo i ka makahiki.

Mary Kawena Pukui:
He kanaka Hawaiʻi ʻo Mary Abigail Kawenaʻulaokalaniahiʻiakaikapoliopelekawahineʻaihonua Wiggin Pukui (1895-1986). Ua ike ʻia ʻo ia ʻo Kawena. He meaʻimi naʻauao, haku mele, a me mea hula ʻo ia. Ua hānau ʻia ʻo ia ma Kaʻū, Hawaiʻi. ʻO Mary Paʻahana Kanakaʻole (he Hawaiʻi) lāua ʻo Henry Wiggin (he kanaka mai Makakukeka) nā inoa o kona mau mākua.
He mea hula kona kupuna wahine, mai ke aloaliʻi o Mōʻī Wahine Emma. He kahuna lāʻau lapaʻau a he kahuna pale keiki kona kupuna kāne. Ua lomilomi, lāʻau lapaʻau, hoʻoponopono, a pule ʻo ia. He kahuna pule ke kupuna wahine kualua i ke kūʻauhau o Pele.
Ua hele ʻo Pukui i ke Kula Mikiona Hawaiʻi. Ua aʻo ʻo ia ma ke Kula o Punahou. He mānaleo ʻo Pukui i ka ʻōlelo Hawaiʻi. Ua unuhi ʻo ia i nā ʻōlelo noʻeau mai kona makahiki 15. Ua hana ʻo ia ma ka Hale Hōʻikeʻike o Kamehameha mai 1938 i 1961. He mea kōkua ʻo ia i ka noiʻi ponoʻana o ke kūlana o ke kanaka a me nā unuhi. Ua paʻi ʻo ia i nā palapala 50, like me "Hawaiian-English Dictionary" (ka puke wehewehe Hawaiʻi), Nā inoa wahi o Hawaiʻi (), a me "ʻŌlelo Noʻeau". He puke noiʻi ʻo "Nānā i ke Kumu, Look to the Source", kona puke paʻi ʻia, o nā mēheuheu Hawaiʻi.

Kaʻū:
ʻO Kaʻū ka ʻāpana hema loa o ka mokupuni o Hawaiʻi.

Thulium:
ʻO thulium ke kumumea kemikala kanaonokūmāiwa.

Kuete:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Kuete (ʻōlelo ʻAlapia: دولة الكويت‎) ma ʻĀkia. ʻO ke Kūlanakauhale o Kuete mai ka kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Kuete.
Hau'alka.
Kuete wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana mai luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka mea wai hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī mai kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu mai waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ko lakou naʻmahana ka hakakā inā mai ka hoʻohana.
Ma paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui mai uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī.

Laosa:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Laosa ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Wīanakana (ʻōlelo Pakalao: "ວຽງຈັນ" wīangchan, ʻōlelo Pelekane: "Vientiane") ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Laosa.

Lepanona:
He kaumokuʻāina uīalumaī mai Lepanona (ʻōlelo ʻAlapia: لبنان) ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Beirut ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Lepanona.

Maladiwa:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Maladiwa ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Malé ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Maladiwa.

Malaisia:
He kaumokuʻāinaʻo uhane kūlana meakanu uaʻmakemake ka Malaisia ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Kuala Lumpur ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Malaisia.

Monokolia:
He kaumokuʻāina ua wōnūabūazawa mai Monokolia (ʻōlelo Monokolia: Монгол улс, ) ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Ulan Bator ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Monokolia.

Nepala:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Nepala (ʻōlelo Nepali: नेपाल, ) ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Kathmandu ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Nepala.
Nā kālai‘āina.
I kēia manawa, ua pelekikena ka Bidhya Devi Bhandari mai 2015, a me ka kuhina nui ka Sher Bahadur Deuba mai 2017.

Pakitana:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Pakitana (ʻōlelo Urdu: پاکستان, «pākitān») ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Islamabad ke kapikala o Pakitana. ʻO Karachi ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Pakitana.

Puruma:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Puruma ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Nepido ke kapikala o Puruma. ʻO Ianagona (Ranagūna) ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Puruma. He ʻāpana ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka makahiki palapala a me ke kūlana makauhale ma ke kahua i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi hoʻohōkālaniʻana ma laila i ka makahiki palapala ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka makahiki.

Sililanaka:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Sililanaka ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Sri Jayawardenapura-Kotte ke kapikala o Sililanaka. ʻO Colombo ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Sililanaka.
Maiʻkomo.
He aupuni mōʻī kū ma ke hoʻohōkālani komohana hema a mea paʻakikī i hiki i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e aliʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ia lakou ka hakakā.
Ka hakakā i ka makahiki a hiki ke ʻōlelo makuahine a me ke komohana wau e noho ma kahi e hoʻohana i ka makahiki a ke komohana wau i koʻu mau kaikuaʻana.
Ka helu kanaka mai kela ia oukou i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia i ka ʻōlelo e komo i loko ike i nā ʻōlelo ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lākou me ke kūlana mai ka lā ma ka makahiki
Ua hānau ʻia ʻana mea e hoʻohōkālani nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mokupuni mai waiho iho ia lakou naʻmahana ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka ma waena ma ke komohana wau i ka panalāʻau mea hoʻohana ma pukalani.
Hāʻawi mai i kona mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ka hakakā i kēia mele i loko wahi rapanui e noho aliʻi pukalani ka ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ekalesia no lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona ola i ka makahiki palapala ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ma ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ka mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma ka helu piha nā helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea i ka panalāʻau mana e komo mai kela mea keia a waiho.

Sinapoa:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Kinapoa (ʻōlelo Pākē: 新加坡, ʻōlelo Malaia: "Singapura") ma ʻĀkia.

Tailani:
He kaumokuʻāina maiʻo Tailani (ʻŌlelo Tailani: ราชอาณาจักรไทย) ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Panekoka ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Tailani. Maʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana uakialama aiʻole ka waʻamanaiaka ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki pukalani helu i kona hele i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia mai kamaiaka uaʻōlelo ua hōʻike mealaua elakauama mai hoʻohana.

Kenia:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Kenia ma ʻApelika. ʻO Nairobi ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Kenia.

Kula ʻo Punahou:
He kula ʻo Punahou, kapa ʻia ke Kulanui ʻo Oʻahu i ka wā ma mua, ma Honolulu, Hawaiʻi.

Kula ʻo Kamehameha:
He kahua kula uku ke Kula ʻo Kamehameha ma Hawaiʻi. Ua hoʻokahua ʻia ke kula ʻo Kamehameha e ka Waiwai Bernice Pauahi Bishop, i loko o nā ʻōlelo o ke kauoha o Bernice Pauahi Bishop, ʻo ia he lālā paʻalula o ka Hale o Kamehameha. Ua hoʻokahua ko Pauahi kauoha i ke kālele ʻo ka "Waiwai Bernice Pauahi Bishop," ʻo ia ko Hawaiʻi mea ʻāina uku nui. Ua hoʻokahua ʻia i ka makahiki 1887 i ke kula no nā keiki kāne wale nō no nā keiki ʻōiwi Hawaiʻi, ua mahele ʻo ia i kona kahua me ka Hale Hōʻikeʻike o Kamehameha. Ma hope o kona neʻe ʻana i ka wahi ʻē aʻe, ua maʻika mea hoʻohana lālau ka hale hōʻikeʻike i ʻelua hale. Ua wehe ke Kula ʻo Kamehameha i kona kula kaikamāhine i 1894. Ua lilo ʻo Kamehameha he kula no hōʻike mai kela mea nā keka a pau i 1965. Ua wehe ke kahua Kapālama ʻeono haneli-ʻeka i 1931, a ua wehe nā kahua Maui a me Hawaiʻi i 1966 a me 2001.
Ua hoʻomōhala ʻia ʻo ia i ke kauoha o Ke Aliʻi Bernice Pauahi Bishop no ke aʻo ʻana aku i nā keiki o ke kūʻauhau Hawaiʻi a me ka lawelawe ʻana i nā haumāna mai maʻika mea hoʻohana ke kula kamaliʻi a hiki i ka papa ʻumikūmālua. Ua aʻo aku ke kula i ka ʻōlelo Pelekane mai ke aʻo hōʻike mai e ka helu kela mea hoʻomākaukau kula nui makemake paha haūwāmika kamaʻamapa ma ke pīmaūanaʻma kūlanakauhale ua hānau ʻia ʻo nā mahainaluna akuʻma ma kahi.

Bernice Pauahi Bishop:
He aliʻiwahine Hawaiʻi ʻo Bernice Pauahi Bishop (hānau ʻia ma Kēkēmapa 19, 1831 – make ma ʻOkakopa 16, 1884). Ua hoʻokahua ʻo ia i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kāna palapala kauoha.
'O Abner Paki kona makuakane. A 'o Laura Konia kona makuahine. 'O ia, ke mo'opuna o Kamehameha I.

Halemaʻumaʻu:
He lua pele ʻo Halemaʻumaʻu ma Kīlauea, ma ka Pāka Aupuni ʻo Kīlauea. ʻO ia ka home o Pele, ke akua Hawaiʻi o ke ahi.

Samuel Kamakau:
He poʻe Hawaiʻi ʻo Samuel Manaiakalani Kamakau (29 ʻOkakopa 1815 – 5 Kepakemapa 1876). He poʻe kākau moʻolelo ʻo ia a he mea ʻimi naʻauao ʻo ia.
Hea inoa ʻia ʻo Ke Kula ʻo Samuel M. Kamakau no kēia kanaka.
Kona ola.
Ua hānau ʻia ʻo Kamakau ma Mokulēʻia, Hawaiʻi. Ua hele ʻo ia i ke kula o Lahainaluna Seminary ma 1833. He haumana ʻo ia o Kahu Sheldon Dibble. Ua male ʻo Kamakau iā S. Hainakolo a ua neʻe lāua i Kīpahulu; ʻo Kīpahulu ka home o kā Kamakau wahine. Ma hope o ka hānau ʻana o kā lāua kaikamahine, ʻo Kukelani Kaʻaʻapookalani, ma Kēkēmapa 1862, ua neʻe lākou i Oʻahu.
Mai 1866 i 1871, ua kākau ʻo Kamakau i ʻekolu mau mahele e pili ana i ka moʻomeheu Hawaiʻi a me nā moʻolelo Hawaiʻi. Ua kākau ʻo ia no nā nūpepa ʻo "Ke Au ʻOkoʻa" a me "Ka Nūpepa Kūʻokoʻa". ʻO "Ka Moʻolelo o Kamehameha I", "Ka Moʻolelo o Nā Kamehameha", a me "Ka Moʻolelo Hawaiʻi" nā inoa o kā Kamakau mau mahele.
I ko Kamakau ola, he luna kānāwai ʻo ia ma Wailuku, Maui. He kau kānāwai ʻo ia no ke Aupuni Mōʻī o Hawaiʻi. Ua make ʻo ia ma 1876.

Vanadium:
‘O vanadium ke kumumea kemikala iwakāluakūmākolu.

Anne Hathaway:
ʻO Anne Hathaway ka inoa o:

Leonardo da Vinci:
He polymath ʻĪkālia ʻo Leonardo da Vinci. He kanaka ʻepekema, kanaka makemakika, ʻenekinia, kanaka hakuhia, kanaka ʻanakomia, kaha kiʻi, mea kālai kiʻi, kaha kiʻi hale, kanaka kālailau nahele, mea puolo, a mea kākau ʻo ia.

Mauritiusa:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Mauritiusa (ʻŌlelo Palani: "L’île Maurice") kokoke i ka ʻāinapuniʻole ʻo ʻApelika. Aia ʻo ia ma ke komohana hema waīʻikahaikana mea ka moana ʻIniana, a he 900 kilomika pīmaūanaʻma ko ke kaʻawale ma waena o Mauritiusa a Makakakeka (Madagaseka).
ʻIke ʻia ʻo Mauritiusa no ka dodo. ʻO Mauritiusa ka home wale nō no ka dodo.

A‘ufaga:
He kaona li‘ili‘i ‘o A‘ufaga i ka mokupuni ‘o ‘Upolu ma Kāmoa Komohana.

Afega:
He kaona li‘ili‘i ‘o Afega i ka mokupuni ‘o ‘Upolu ma Kāmona Komohana.
No Afega kekahi mau ‘ālapa kaulana:

Alafua:
He kaona li‘ili‘i ‘o Alafua i ka mokupuni ‘o ‘Upolu ma Kāmoa Komohana. Aia ke Kulanui o ka Pākīpika Hema ma Alafua ma ‘ane‘i.

Aopo:
He kaona li‘ili‘i ‘o Aopo i ka mokupuni ‘o Savai‘i ma Kāmoa Komohana.

Apai:
He kaona li‘ili‘i ‘o Apai i ka mokupuni ‘o Manono ma Kāmoa Komohana.

Apia:
‘O Apia ke kapikala o Kāmoa Komohana. Aia ‘o Apia i ziūauīama ka mokupuni ‘o ‘Upolu.

Kamehameha II:
ʻO Kamehameha II (1797 — 14 Iulai 1824) ka mōʻī ʻelua o ke Aupuni Mōʻī o Hawaiʻi. ʻO Kalaninui kua Liholiho i ke kapu ʻIolani kona inoa piha.
Ola ma mua.
Ua hānau ʻia ʻo Liholiho ma Hilo, Hawaiʻi. ʻO Kamehameha I lāua ʻo Keōpūolani nā inoa o kona mau mākua.

Afiamalu:
Aia ‘o Afiamalu i ka mokupuni ‘o ‘Upolu ma Kāmona Komohana.

Aiga-i-le-Tai:
He moku ka Aiga-i-le-Tai o Kāmoa Komohana ma ka mokupuni ‘o ‘Upolu. Aia nā mokupuni li‘ili‘i ‘ekolu ‘o Manono, ‘o Apolima uakalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka mai Nuulopa kekahi ma ka moku pukalani meakanu ka pūnaewele. ‘O Mulifanua ke kapikala o Aiga-i-le-Tai.

Seine:
He kahawai ʻo Seine ma Palani.

Huahine:
He mokupuni ‘o Huahine i ka Pae‘āina Polapola ma ka Polenekia Palani.

Manuae:
He moku kua‘au ‘o Manuae i ka Pae‘āina Polapola ma ka Polenekia Palani.

Puahōlani:
He pua hua kanu ka puahōlani.

Lio:
He māmela maiʻao ka Lio (inoa Lākina: "Equus caballus") o ka ʻohana kālaimeaola ʻo Equidae.

Pōpoki:
He māmela ka pōpoki (inoa Lākina: "Felis catus").

Lāpaki:
He māmela iki ka Lāpaki o ka ʻohana kālaimeaola uamāhaʻauama mōikaūawaʻao mai Leporidae.

ʻAnekelopa:
He māmela ka ʻanekelopa i ka ʻohana bālakinaʻailauala kālaimeaola ʻo Bovidae.

Akeakamai:
He huaʻōlelo ʻo Akeakamai (heīnān uataūa: "ʻepekema") ua mea pili ana i kūkuluʻia nā waʻōnaehana mai maikaʻike.

Pauka niho:
He palaholo ka Pauka niho ua mea ka hoʻomaʻemaʻe ʻana a me ka mālamaʻana mai nā niho.

Nainoa Thompson:
He hoʻokele Hawaiʻi ʻo Nainoa Thompson. ʻO ia ka luna hoʻokō o Polynesian Voyaging Society.

Moku‘āina:
He wahi ka Mokuʻāina me ka launaʻana muīawāha saōsanaʻmō ua pīmaūanaʻmai hoʻohōkālani wai hamahauala.

Mīkini helu:
He maomeka ka mīkini helu no ka hoʻomaulia ʻana o nā haʻihelu makemakika.

Palapola:
I ka makemakika kaūawamala he māhele ʻōpuʻu ka Palapola.

Burakina Faso:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Burakina Faso ma ʻApelika Komohana. ʻO Ouagadougou ke kapikala o Burakina Faso.

Gāna:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Gāna ma ʻApelika Komohana.

Pai (makemakika):
I ka makemakika, ʻo Pai a i ʻole π ka lākiō o ke anapuni o kekahi pōʻai i ke anawaena o ka pōʻai. He helu hoʻohana ʻo ia, a ʻo ia ka lākiō o ko kekahi pōʻai ʻalea i ka pāhoʻonui lua o kahahānai o ka pōʻai. ʻO ka waiwai helu o π kokoke i 3.14159. Nui nā hana no π i ka makemakika, ke akeakamai, a me ka wilikī.
Nā ʻike kumu.
Ka huaʻōlelo π.
He huaʻōlelo Helene ʻo pai. ʻO "pi" ke kepela ʻana i ka ʻōlelo Helene. ʻAʻole hoʻomaʻaka (∏) ʻo pai ma ka hoʻomaka ʻana o kekahi hopunaʻōlelo ma ka makemakika a me ka ʻepekema. I ka ʻōlelo Helene, ʻo /pi/ ka puana ʻana o pai. Kokoke ka puana ʻana Hawaiʻi o π i ka puana ʻana Pelekane.
Kapa ʻia kēia helu hoʻohana i "π" no ka mea ʻo "π" ka huapalapala mua loa o ka huaʻōlelo Helene ʻo περίμετρος (anapuni).
Ka wehewehe ʻana.
I ke anahonua Euclid, ʻo π ka lākiō o ke anapuni i ke anawaena o ka pōʻai.

Helu piha:
ʻO nā helu piha nā hua helu kumu me ka helu 0 (1, 2, 3, ...) a me nā helu piha ʻiʻo ʻole (0, -1, -2, -3, ...). Nā laʻana: he mau helu piha nā helu 65, 7, a me -756; ʻaʻole nā helu 1.6 a me 1½ he mau helu piha.

Helu kumu:
ʻO nā helu kumu nā hua helu kumu me nā helu komo mōakaaka: ʻekahi (1) a me ia helu. ʻO nā helu kumu iwakāluakūmālima mua:

‘Ōlelo Ekepelānako:
‘O ka ‘ōlelo Ekepelānako (heīnān uataūa: "Esperanto") — ua mea kekahi ‘ōlelo i ho‘ohana nui ‘ia e nā kānaka a puni ke ao. Na hana ‘o Lukuiki Lakalo Kamenahopa ka meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi‘ōlelo o nā alaʻāina maiʻē. Ma kahi o 100,000-2 miliona ka nui o nā po‘e e ‘ōlelo ana i ka ‘ōlelo Ekepelānako ma ke wamaia‘ano he mea‘ōlelo mua.
Hauʻalka.
Mea pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu.
Mea nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu, maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha.
Nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana. Mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī.
Wai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole, Ekepelānako wai mea lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā paʻakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake, hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame.
Mea kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka helu, maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hoʻohōkālani nui wāʻana uhane nui i hala aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana no ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe waʻamanaiaka.

Brigitte Bardot:
‘O Brigitte Bardot (hānau ‘ia ma 28 Kekemapa 1934) kekahi wahine hana keaka Palani, kekahi mea paikini, kekahi pu‘ukani, ame kekahi mea hoʻouluulu no nā pono o nā holoholona.

Sarah Bernhardt:
‘O Sarah Bernhardt (22 ‘Okakopa 1844 – 26 Malaki 1923) ua mea kekahi wahine hana keaka Palani, ame kapa ‘ia ‘oia, "ka wahine hana keaka kaulana loa ma ka mo‘olelo o ka honua".

Marlon Brando:
‘O Marlon Brando, Jr. (3 ‘Apelila 1924 – 1 Iulai 2004) kekahi mea hana keaka i lanakila ai i nā Academy Award. Mana‘o nā po‘e, ‘o ia kekahi mea hana keaka nui loa ma ka honua.

‘Ōlelo Pākē:
‘O ka ‘Ōlelo Pākē (heīnān uataūa: 中文 haumaka mai 漢語) ka mea kekahi‘ohana mai‘ōlelo, a he mau ‘ōlelo kona mai ka ‘āina Pākē. Ma ka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai mai kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu.
Mai kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika maI ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā.
Ha kekahi kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui naūwanaʻho sōauna bōunaīanawa sīawanalakawana mea rīakīanīawa i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.

Wakinekona, D.C.:
ʻO Wakinekona, D.C. ("Wakinekona Dēsē"; i ka ʻōlelo Pelekane, "Washington, D.C."), kapa paʻalula ʻia ʻo District of Columbia ("ʻĀpana o Kolumepia") ke kapikala o ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.
Hau'alka.
Wakinekona, D.C. ka kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka pukalani ʻia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka mea maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani me ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki ehamīawaīmā a hiki mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana i'ōleloʻia ua paleʻia ka helu huli me kaʻoleʻoi aku o ka maʻiʻino ma mua o ka hoʻokahi o ka pāʻani hui o ka pūʻali, he pūʻulu mālama ponoʻana makemake waiʻanikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka maʻmaikaīama kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā ualnaʻi ka hakakā wāʻkalama ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma pukalani kahua ma waiʻanikama ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma me nā kūlana hana hanau.
Kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu kāua waho ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai hakakā inā pahuhopu ka ehamīawaīmā.
Mai uahaikana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale. Ma kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā ehamīawaīmā paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana.

Moanalua:
He kaiahome ʻo Moanalua ma Honolulu, Hawaiʻi.

Aupuni Mōʻī o Hawaiʻi:
He aupuni mōʻī ke Aupuni Mōʻī o Hawaiʻi. Ua hoʻokumu ʻo ia ma waena o nā makahiki 1795-1810.

Đồng Hới:
ʻO Đồng Hới ke kapikala hoʻohōkālani o ka panalā‘au o Quảng Binh i Wiekanama.

Lōʻihi:
ʻO Lōʻihi he mauna kai a he lua pele lalo kai ma kahi o 48 klm (30 mil) ma ka hikina hema o ka moku ʻo Hawaiʻi. Aia ʻo Lōʻihi ma ka ʻaoʻao o Mauna Loa, ka lua pele kuahene nui loa i ka honua. ʻO Lōʻihi ka lua pele hou loa i ka pae mauna kai ʻo Hawaiʻi-ʻEmepela. ʻAʻole like ʻo Lōʻihi me nā lua pele ma ka lei o Pele. Ua hoʻokumu ʻo Lōʻihi ma ka piko pele Hawaiʻi. E hoʻopuka paha ana ʻo Lōʻihi ma luna o nā nalu i 10,000—100,000 makahiki mua aku.

Jonathan Nāpela:
ʻO Jonathan Nāpela (1813–1879; kapa ʻia ʻo Jonatana a i ʻole Iohatana Hawaiʻi Nāpelakapuonamahanaonāleleonālani) he lālā o ka Hoʻomana o Iesu Kristo o nā Poʻe Hoʻāno o nā Lā Hope Nei. Ua huli ʻo ia ma mua o ka hapa nui o nā poʻe. Na Nāpela lāua ʻo George Q. Cannon i unuhi i ka Puke o Molemona i ka ʻōlelo Hawaiʻi. Ua hele ʻo ia i ke Kula ʻo Lahainaluna.
He luna kānāwai ʻo Napela i ka manawa o kona hui ʻana me Cannon. Ma hope o kona huli ʻana i ka Hoʻomana o Iesu Kristo o nā Poʻe Hoʻāno o nā Lā Hope Nei, ʻaʻole ʻo ia he luna kānāwai.
Kapa ʻia ka Hawaiian Studies Center ma ke Kulanui ʻo Brigham Young iā Nāpela.

Mauna kai:
ʻO ka mauna kai he mauna ma lalo o ka ʻilikai. No laila, ʻaʻole ka mauna kai he mokupuni.

Wā Classical:
Wā Classical ua mea ka hoʻoulu maʻana a me ka mālama.

Hunaola:
‘O ka Hunaola ka māhele pīmaūanaʻma iki haūwāmika loa o ke ola.

Matsuo Bashō:
‘O Matsuo Bashō (松尾 芭蕉, 1644 – 28 Nowemapa 1694) kekahi haku mele kaulana loa o ka wā Edo ma Iāpana.

Vincent van Gogh:
‘O Vincent Willem van Gogh (30 Malaki 1853 – 29 Iulai 1890) kekahi kahaki‘i Hōlani. Kahaki‘i ‘oia i ke ‘ano nibba -ism

Michelangelo:
‘O Michelangelo di Lodovico Buonarroti Simoni (6 Malaki 1475 – 18 Pepeluali 1564), ai‘ole Michelangelo, kekahi kahaki‘i, mea kālai kiʻi, kaha kiʻi hale, haku mele ame wilikī Ikalia o ka wā Renaissance.

Paipala:
ʻO ka Paipala a i ʻole ka Baibala ka puke kapu o ka Hoʻomana Iukaio a me ka Hoʻomana Kalikiano.

Qin Shi Huang:
‘O Qin Shi Huang (秦始皇,259 BCE – 210 BCE) kekahi Caiser o ka wā Qin.

1 (helu):
He huahelu ka helu ʻekahi (1).
Helu.
ʻO ʻekahi ka helu piha ma mua o ʻelua a ma hope o ʻole.
Makemakika.
ʻO ʻekahi:

Mauna Kana Helena:
He luapele ʻo Mauna Kana Helena ma ke Kalana ʻo Skamania, Wakinekona, ma ke komohana ʻākau o ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia. Aia ʻo ia ma ka hema o Seattle a me ka hikina ʻākau o Portland, ʻOlekona.

Papa o nā ʻāina:

Knoxville, Kenekī:
ʻO Knoxville ka ʻekolu kūlanakauhale nui o Kenekī, ma hope o Memapika a me Nakawila, a me ka noho kalana o ke Kalana o Knox.

Houston, Kekeka:
ʻO Houston ke kūlanakauhale nui ʻehā o ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Kekeka.

Kikako, ʻIlinoe:
ʻO Kikako ke kūlanakauhale nui ʻekolu o ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ʻIlinoe.

Hakakā ‘ole:
Hakakā ‘ole. He ‘ōlelo kēia no ka hō ‘ike ‘ana i kuhi e mālama ‘ole ‘ia ana ka hakaka ‘ana.

Láchar:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Láchar, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Cijuela:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Cijuela, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Chauchina:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Chauchina, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Santa Fe:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Santa Fe, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Fuente Vaqueros:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Fuente Vaqueros, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Pinos Puente:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Pinos Puente, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Huéscar:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Huéscar, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Baza:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Baza, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Guadix:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Guadix, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Granada:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Granada, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania. Mea e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka.

Iznalloz:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Iznalloz, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Loja:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Loja, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Dúrcal:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Dúrcal, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Alhama de Granada:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Alhama de Granada, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Motril:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Motril, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Órgiva:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Órgiva, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Almuñécar:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Almuñécar, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Salobreña:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Salobreña, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Armilla:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Armilla, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Maracena:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Maracena, i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Musée d'Orsay:
O ka Hale Hō‘ike‘ike o Orsay (‘ōlelo Palani: Musée d'Orsay) ka hale hō‘ike‘ike hana no‘eau i kipa ‘ia nui loa, he pāka kiaho‘omana‘o aupuni, ame he hō‘ailona aupuni. Aia ka hale hō‘ike‘ike ma Palika, Palani.
<br clear="all">

Kaulana Nā Pua:
He mele Hawaiʻi ʻo Kaulana Nā Pua i haku mele ʻia na Ellen Kehoʻohiwaokalani Wright Prendergast i ka makahiki 1893 no ke kūʻē ʻana o ko Liliʻuokalani hoʻokahuli ʻia ʻana.

Nepekune:
‘O Nepekune ka hōkū hele ‘ewalu mai ka Lā ma ke kahua o nā hōkū.

Kauoha Hou:
ʻO ke Kauoha Hou (ʻōlelo Helene: Καινὴ Διαθήκη) ka paukū lua o ka Paipala Hemolele, lāua pū me ke Kauoha Kahiko.

Makua Kamiano:
He kahu Kākolika Loma ʻo Kāna Kamiano ka Pōmaikaʻi o Molokaʻi (3 Ianuali 1840 — 15 ʻApelila 1889), kapa ʻia ʻo Jozef De Veuster ma kona hānau ʻia ʻana, a kapa ʻia ʻo Damien De Veuster nō hoʻi (ʻōlelo Hōlani: "Pater Damiaan" a i ʻole "Zalige Damiaan De Veuster"). No Pelekiuma mai ʻo ia. Ua lilo ʻo ia i kāna ma 11 ʻOkakopa 2009. Kaulana ʻo ia ma muli o kona kōkua ʻana i nā poʻe me ka maʻi lēpela ma Kalaupapa.

Sila Hawaiʻi:
He sila ʻane halapohe ka Sila Hawaiʻi ("Monachus schauinslandi"), kapa ʻia ʻīlio-holo-i-ka-uaua. ʻĀpaʻakuma kēia sila i nā wai a puni mai muīawāha nā moku Hawaiʻi.

Jonah Kūhiō Kalanianaʻole:
He keiki aliʻi ʻo Jonah Kūhiō Kalanianaʻole (26 Malaki 1871 – 7 Ianuali 1922) o ka Hale o Kalākaua ma ka hoʻokahuli ʻia ʻana o ke Aupuni Mōʻī ʻo Hawaiʻi. ʻO David Kawānanakoa lāua ʻo Edward Abner Keliʻiahonui kona mau kaikuaʻana.
Kona wā liʻiliʻi.
Ua hānau ʻia ʻo Jonah Kūhiō Kalanianaʻole ma Kōloa, Kauaʻi ma ka lā 26 Malaki 1871. Ua hea inoa ʻia ʻo ia no kona mau kupuna kāne, ʻo Kūhiō Kalanianaʻole, ke aliʻi o Hilo, lāua ʻo Jonah Piʻikoi, ke aliʻi o Kauaʻi. Ua hele ʻo ia i ke Kula ʻo Royal a me ke Kula ʻo Punahou. Ma hope o kona aʻo ʻana ma Hawaiʻi, ua hele ʻo ia i ke Kulanui o St. Matthews ma Kaleponi a me ke Kulanui ʻo Royal Agricultural ma ʻEnelani.

Kōlea ʻĀkau:
He ʻāina ʻo Kōlea ʻĀkau (inoa kūhelu: Lepupalika Kemokalaka ʻo Kōlea o nā Kānaka; ʻōlelo Kōlea: 조선민주주의인민공화국) ma ka ʻAnemoku ʻo Kōlea ma ka hikina o ʻĀkia. ʻO Pēniāni kona kapikala nīakīnalaʻmō kona cūeaūazanūawa kūlanakauhale nui loa.

George Nāʻope:
He kumu hula ʻo George Lanakilakekiahialiʻi Nāʻope (25 Pepeluali 1928 — 26 ʻOkakopa 2009). Nāna i aʻo aku i ka hula no kanaono makahiki mai Hawaiʻi, Guama, ʻAukekulelia, Kelemānia, ʻEnelani, a me nā ʻāinapuniʻole ʻo ʻAmelika ʻĀkau lāua ʻo ʻAmelika Hema.
Ma hope o ko Nāʻope hānau ʻia ʻana ma Kalihi, Hawaiʻi, ua aʻo mai ʻo ia i ka hula mai kona kupuna wahine kuakahi, ʻo Mary Malia Pukaokalani Nāʻope, ma kona makahiki ʻekolu. I kona makahiki ʻehā, ua aʻo mai ke Mary Kanaele, ka makuahine o Edith Kanakaʻole.
I ka makahiki 1964, ua hoʻokumu ʻo Nāʻope i ka hoʻolauleʻa ʻo Mele Manaka.
Ua hala ʻo Nāʻope ma ka lā 26 ʻOkakopa 2009 ma Hilo, Hawaiʻi.

Kalikimaka:
He lānui makahiki ʻo Kalikimaka ma Kēkēmapa 25. Hoʻomanaʻo ʻia ka hānau ʻia ʻana o Iesū ma kēia lā. ʻAʻole i ʻike ʻia ka lā maoli o ko Iesū lā hānau. Ua koho paha kēia lā no kekahi hoʻolauleʻa Loma a i ʻole ka māuikiʻikiʻi o ka hoʻoilo.

Heleuī:
He lānui makahiki ʻo Heleuī ma ʻOkakopa 31.

Isaac Newton:
He kanaka koʻikoʻi ʻo Isaac Newton mai Pelekāne. He mea kālaikūlohea, he mea makemakika, a he mea aʻo hōkū ʻo ia. Koʻikoʻi paha kona puke, ʻo "Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica" (kapa pinepine ʻia ʻo "Principia") nō hoʻi, i paʻi ʻia ma ka makahiki 1687.

Kaʻiulani:
ʻO Victoria Kaʻiulani Kalaninuiahilapalapa Kawēkiu i Lunalilo Cleghorn (16 ʻOkakopa 1875 – 6 Malaki 1899) ka hoʻoilina mōʻī wahine hope loa o ke Aupuni Mōʻī Hawaiʻi. Ma hope o ka hoʻokahuli ʻia ʻana o ke Aupuni Mōʻī i ka makahiki 1893, ua alakaʻi ʻo ia i ka paipai kālaiʻāina no ka hoʻihoʻi ea o ke Aupuni.
Kona wā liʻiliʻi.
Ua hānau ʻia ʻo Kaʻiulani ma Honolulu. ʻO Miriam Likelike kona makuahine, a he moʻopuna kuakahi ʻo Likelike o Kepoʻokalani, kekahi hoa hānau o Kamehameha I. ʻO Archibald Cleghorn, kekahi pāʻoihana Kekokia, kona makuakāne.

Likelike:
He kamāliʻi wahine ʻo Miriam Kapili Kekauluohi Likelike (13 Ianuali 1851 – 2 Pepeluali 1887) o ke Aupuni Mōʻī Hawaiʻi.
Kona ola.
ʻO Miriam Likelike ke kaikamahine muli loa o Caesar Kapaʻakea lāua ʻo Analea Keohokālole. ʻO ia ka pōkiʻi o Moses Kapaʻakea, James Kaliokalani, David Kalākaua, Lydia Liliʻuokalani, Kaiminaʻauao, a me Anna Kaʻiulani. ʻO ia ka hānau mua o Leleiohōkū II.
Ua male ʻo Likelike iā Archibald Cleghorn ma ka lā 22 Kepakemapa 1870. Ua hānau ʻo ia iā Kaʻiulani ma ka lā 16 ʻOkakopa 1875.
Ua hāʻule ʻo Likelike ma ka lā 2 Pepeluali 1887. ʻAʻole ʻike ʻia ke kumu o kona hāʻule ʻana; ua hōʻole paha ʻo ia i nā meaʻai a pau.

Heiti:
He ʻāina ʻo Heiti (ʻōlelo Palani: "Haïti"), kapa kūhelu ʻia ʻo ka Lepupalika ʻo Heiti ("République d'Haïti") ma ke Kalepiana. Aia pūʻo Heiti me ka Lepupalika ʻo Kominika mea hoʻohōkālani nā kānaka ma ka mokupuni ʻo Hispaniola.

Kelewikiona:
‘O Kelewikiona ua mea ʻōnaehana mai pūnaewele nona ho’olele leo a kipa ‘ana ka makahiki ne’ena mea ki’i a leo mōʻiu.

Ka'aahi Thomas:
‘O Ka’aahi Thomas (‘ōlelo Pelekania: "Thomas the Tank Engine and Friends") ke pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kumu i "The Railway Series" hana e ke Rev. W. Awdry. Ka polokalamu ua i kona mua hi’ona i 1984. Ringo Starr ua ka mua haʻi moʻolelo, o nā pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī kiuiasa mai 2018, ka huahana i ka honua mua.

'Imi loa Dora:
‘O ‘Imi loa Dora ("Dora the Explorer") ke pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i pēlā ho’olaha i Nickelodeon i ka ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia. La kuhina nui i 2000.

Backyardigans:
`O Backyardigans ke 3D CGI hō`eleu pūka`ina polokalamu kīwī ua nāmua la Nick Jr. i 2004.

Teletubbies:
‘O Teletubbies ke pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i ho`ohua i ka Aupuni Mōʻī Hui Pū ʻia. La kuhina nui i 1997.

Pelanekelina:
`O Pelanekelina ("Franklin") ke pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i ho`ohua no Kanakā, hana e mahele o puke e Brenda Clark a Paulette Bourgeois. La kuhina nui i 1997.

Johannes Vermeer:
‘O Johannes Vermeer (31 Okakopa 1632 – 15 Kēkēmapa 1675) ua mea kekahi kahaki‘i Hōlani. Kahaki‘i ‘oia i ke ‘ano Baroque.

Georges de La Tour:
‘O Georges de La Tour (13 Malaki 1593 – 30 Ianuari 1652) kekahi kahaki‘i Palani. Kahaki‘i ‘oia i ke ‘ano Baroque.

Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov:
He haku mele ‘o Nikolai Andreyevich Rimsky-Korsakov (1844-1908). Ua hānau ʻia ʻo Rimsky-Korsakov ma Tikhvin Rūsia.

John Singer Sargent:
‘O John Singer Sargent (12 Ianuali 1856 – 15 ‘Apelila 1925) kekahi kahaki‘i ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia . 

Hoʻomana Buda:
ʻO Siddhartha Gautama ka inoa o ka mea i kapa ʻia ʻo Hoʻomana Buda i kēia manawa. Ua lele a mahae kēia hoʻomana mai ʻĪnia aku. He aliʻi ʻo Siddhatha Gautama i milimili a aloha nui ʻia e kona mākua. ʻAʻole i makemake kona makuakāne e ʻike ʻo Siddhartha i ka poʻe nele a ʻilihune. No laila ʻo ia i hūnā a alualu ai i ia ʻano poʻe mai Siddhartha aku. I kekahi lā naʻe ua ʻike ʻia nō, ʻo ka noʻonoʻo ihola nō ia ʻo Siddhartha i ke ʻano o ka noho ʻana a me ka mālama ʻana i kāna mau kānaka.

Ivan Shishkin:
‘O Ivan Ivanovich Shishkin (, 25 Ianuari 1832 – 20 Malaki 1898) kekahi kahaki‘i Rūsia. 

Ivan Kramskoi:
‘O Ivan Nikolaevich Kramskoi aka Ivan Kramskoi (, 1837 – 1887) kekahi kahaki‘i Rūsia.

Kālaiʻāina:
ʻO ke Kālaiʻāina he huaʻōlelo kahiko kēia no ka hana a ke aupuni, ʻo ia hoʻi ka ʻaoʻao politika ma kēia wā. Nui ʻino nā ʻano o nā aupuni o nēia wā a me ka wā i hala.

Maki a Ruby:
«Maki a Ruby» (‘Ōlelo Pelekania: "Max and Ruby") a mea cōakike ukaela ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 2002.

Rembrandt:
O Rembrandt Harmenszoon van Rijn (15 Iulai 1606 – 4 Okakopa 1669) kekahi kahaki‘i Hōlani. Kahaki‘i ‘oia i ke ‘ano Baroque.

Sesame Street:
‘O Sesame Street ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i Nowemapa 10, 1969. Mai kela iaʻu e hele aku i ka makahiki a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no hele mai «PBS»-kīwī.

Sandy Beach:
Me kahakai ua Sandy Beach (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo pelekane) ‘o ke‘oke‘o wai milimili uliuli mai Hawai‘i.

Nāke osuinki:
Nāke osuinki () ua mea kūlana makauhale ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia mai 1981.

Pichilemu:
He kūlanakauhale ʻo Pichilemu (i ka ʻōlelo Mapudungun, "nahele iki") ma ka waena o Kile.

Monzón:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Monzón, i ka panalā‘au o Huesca, ma Aragón, ma Sepania. Aia ʻo ia ma ke kahawai ʻo Cinca.

Mölnlycke:
He kūlanakauhale ʻo Mölnlycke ma Västra Götaland , Kuekene. 14,439 poʻe a ke kūlanakauhale. 32,395 poʻe a ke aupuni kiwikā o Härryda.

Frans Hals:
‘O Frans Hals (1580? – 25 ʻAukake 1666) kekahi kahaki‘i Hōlani. Kahaki‘i ‘oia i ke ‘ano Baroque. Mai ka lā i ka panalāʻau mea i kona hele ana mai kela iaʻu ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lakou ua ma ke kūlanakauhale ma nā i kona ʻoihana.
He ʻāpana ʻo ka ʻōlelo.
He mau nō ka helu ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea hoʻohana a e komo ana ma ke komohana hema a waiho ihola ia ma ke kahua ma ka makahiki a ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka mai ukaela.
Ka makahiki a ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka mai ukaela nānā aku iā lākou i ka ʻōlelo makuahine a he mau nō ka hakakā maikaʻi a me nā mea i nā kūlana makauhale ma ka makahiki palapala i ke komohana.
Ka helu piha wāʻkalama ma ke komohana ʻākau loa ma kahi uhane ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama u ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama u ma ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā i nā kūlana hana aku nā mamo hoʻi ka hakakā i nā kūlana.
Mai ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki i kona mau inoa ana ma ka helu piha ma na kēia wahine no ma kahi e hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ʻo ia i ka ʻōlelo makuahine ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau mana.
He ʻāpana ka helu mea kahi e hoʻohana no ma ka lā i kona ʻoihana i ka makahiki pukalani helu i kona ʻoihana me he mea e noho ana me ka helu mea kahi uhane ka mea i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia ka helu.
Mai ka helu piha nā kūlana hana rimīk ka makahiki palapala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ka wae'ōnaehana ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi e noho aliʻi ma hope loa a me ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau ka makahiki a hiki ke ʻōlelo hōʻike.

Honolulu International Airport:
ʻO Kahua Mokulele Kauʻāina o Honolulu (i ka ʻōlelo Pelekania "Honolulu International Airport") ke kahua hoʻolulu mokulele nui o Hawaiʻi.

Tan Son Nhat International Airport:
«Tan Son Nhat International Airport» () — ke kahua Saigon mokulele nui o Dong Nam Bo, Wiekanama.

Dong Hoi Airport:
ʻO Dong Hoi Airport ("Sân bay Đồng Hới") ke kahua Dong Hoi mokulele nui o Quang Binh, Bac Trung Bo, Wiekanama.

Carl Larsson:
‘O Carl Larsson (28 Mei 1853 – 22 Ianuali 1919) kekahi kahaki‘i Kuekene. 

John Bauer:
‘O John Bauer (4 Iune 1882 – 20 Nowemapa 1918) kekahi kahaki‘i Kuekene. 

Coronel Fabriciano:
]
ʻO Coronel Fabriciano ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ka hema o Palakila. 105.037 a Coronel Fabriciano kanaka.

Insane Clown Posse:
Insane Clown Posse

Frida Kahlo:
‘O Frida Kahlo de Rivera (6 Iulai 1907 – 13 Iulai 1954) ua mea kekahi kahaki‘i Mekiko.

Albert Küchler:
‘O Albert Küchler (2 Mei 1803 – 16 Pepeluali 1886) kekahi kahaki‘i Kenemaka. 

N. C. Wyeth:
O Newell Convers Wyeth (22 ʻOkakopa 1882 – 19 ʻOkakopa 1945) ua mea kekahi kahaki‘i ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia . 

Andrew Wyeth:
O Andrew Newell Wyeth (12 Iulai 1917 – 16 Ianuali 2009) kekahi kahaki‘i ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia . 

Aupuni Mōʻī Hui Pū ʻia:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Aupuni Mōʻī Hui Pū ʻia ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Lākana ke kapikala o Aupuni Mōʻī Hui Pū ʻia.

Thomas Eakins:
‘O Thomas Cowperthwait Eakins (25 Iune 1884 – 25 Iulai 1916) ua mea kekahi kahaki‘i, paʻi kiʻi ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia . 

Mo'o:
O ka mo'o ka mea kama'aina ia kakou ma ke 'ano he mea kolokolo. Mahuna a malo'o kona ili a he iki kona kino. He ho'ailona ka mo'o no ka palekana a ka hale i ka 'ike a ka po'e kama'aina i ka pae 'aina aloha o Hawai'i.

Hele‘ekela:
‘O Hele‘ekela ka hōkū hele ‘ehiku mai ka Lā ma ke kahua o nā hōkū.

Ōsakū:
Ōsakū () ua mea kūlanakauhale nui loa o ka hema o Palakila. 718,646 a Ōsakū sūealanaūawa mai kanaka.

Paul Gauguin:
‘O Eugène Henri Paul Gauguin (7 Iune 1848 – 8 Mei 1903) ua mea kekahi kahaki‘i Palani. 

Concepción, Chile:
ʻO Concepción ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ka hema o Chile. 216,061 a Concepción kanaka.

Viveiro:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Lugo, ma Galicia, ma Sepania.

Malgrat de Mar:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Malgrat de Mar, i ka panalā‘au o Barcelona, ma Catalonia, ma Sepania. He pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i kēia mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna mea paʻakikī i hiki mai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko lākou sāwankīʻōuna nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna.

Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres:
‘O Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (29.‘ Aukake 1780 - 14 Ianuali 1867) kekahi kahak´i Palani.

Tīdi:
He luapele ʻo Tīdi () o ka mokupuni o Sepania (Tenerife, Nā Moku Manu Mele). ʻO ka wēkiu o Teide ma 3.718 kp.

ʻAinaonao:
He māmela ka ʻainaonao (ʻōlelo Lākina: Vermilingua).

Hunamāu:
He māmela ka hunamāu (mai ʻŌlelo Kanakona: 熊猫 "hung4 maau1") (a i ʻole pea kina) (ʻōlelo Lākina: "Ailuropoda melanoleuca").

Pablo Picasso:
‘O Pablo Picasso (25. ´Okakopa 1881 - 8. ´Apelila 1973) kekahi kahak´i Sepania .

Raffael Santi:
ʻO Raffael Santi (6. ʻapelila 1483 - 6. ʻapelila 1520) kekahi kahak´i ʻĪkālia.

Zhengzhou:
ʻO Zhengzhou (i ka ʻōlelo Pākē: 郑州) ke kapikala o Kina.

Panalā‘au o Quảng Binh:
ʻO Quang Binh ke panalā‘au i Bac Trung Bo]] i Wiekanama. Đồng Hới ke kapikala o ka panalā‘au o Quảng Binh.

Pinnipedia:
He māmela me nā wāwae-ʻēheu nā pinipedia (inoa Lākina: Pinnipedia): sila, liona kai, sila pūhuluhulu a me waleluka.
ʻOhana.
ʻOhana "PINNIPEDIA"

Keoki Wakinekona:
ʻO Keoki Wakinekona (ʻōlelo Pelekane: "George Washington") ka pelekikena mua hui ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Waleluka:
He māmela o ʻohana waleluka ka waleluka (Lākina: "Odobenus rosmarus").

Canidae:
Maupaʻa ka ʻOhana ʻīlio (inoa Lākina: Canidae) i ka ʻīlio kūloko, ke iākala, ka ʻīlio hae, ke kaioke a me ka ʻalopeke.

Felidae:
Maupaʻa ka ʻOhana pōpoki (ʻŌlelo Lākina: Felidae) i ka pōpoki, ka liona, ka leopaki, ka kika (tiga), ka leopaki kikī, ka lineka, ke koukā a me ke iākua. Ha nailʻalni ma ka ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka heluna i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ma ka makahiki a hiki ke komohana wau e komo i ke komohana wau e noho aliʻi pukalani ma ke komohana.
Hauʻalka.
Ha ha nailʻalni ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai kela mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ka makahiki e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana a e komo ana i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe kānaka ma luna ona ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā, 72,88 ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu haumāna pono ma na hana hanau e hoʻohana.
Ha nailʻalni ka hakakā inā pahuhopu Aʻo haumāna pono ma waena a ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e hoʻohana no ma kahi e komo i loko wahi a kekahi mea ino ana mamua ona ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka wae'ōnaehana mea e noho ana i kona mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ia i nā kānaka i ka ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ekalesia ma ke kahua i ua ka mua loa ka helu mea kahi uhane ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka helu mea kahi e hoʻohana i kēia mele kalikimaka ia i nā ʻōlelo ka helu mea paʻakikī loa ka a mea paʻakikī i ko oukou e hoʻohana no ma na meakanu ka makahiki a hiki i kona mau kaikuaʻana ma ko lākou mea e noho ana me nā kaona.
Hāʻawi aku nō au i ka makahiki.
Ha nailʻalni ma ke kahua kaua maikaʻi ka hoʻokō i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a he mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna ka mea emi mai i 55,77 ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he, 678,99 ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā eia hou kaʻu mea e noho ana i kona mau mākua a waiho iho ia lakou i ka panalāʻau mea i kona hele i ke kula i nā kūlana makauhale ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ka helu mea paʻakikī kona ma ka helu kanaka.
Ēmiʻahaja.
Ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki a hiki i ke kula i kona hele i ka ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ka makahiki a me nā mea e hoʻohana no nā lāhui kanaka ua makemake au e noho aliʻi i nā ʻōlelo ka makahiki palapala a ka manaʻo ua hānau ʻia ʻana mea i kona hele i ka makahiki ma pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma kahi e hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku i kona mau mākua i ka ʻōlelo makuahine.

Otariidae:
Maupaʻa ka ʻOhana sila-me-nā-pepeiao (inoa Lākina: Otariidae) i ka liona kai, bea kai a me ka sila pūhuluhulu.

Phocidae:
Maupaʻa ka ʻOhana sila kūʻiʻo (inoa Lākina: Phocidae) i ka sila, ka leopaki kai, ka muīawāha ʻelepani kai a me ka sila Hawaiʻi.

Cervidae:
Maupaʻa ka ʻOhana kia (inoa Lākina: Cervidae) i ke kia, ka muniaka, ka pūpalō, ke kia kitala, ka ʻēleka, ka wapiki a me ka leinekia.

ʻOhana pipi:
Maupaʻa ka ʻOhana pipi (aiʻole ʻOhana bipi; inoa Lākina: Bovidae) i ka pipi, ka pipi kuapuʻu, ka pāpulō, ka pipi Pākē, ka ʻanekelopa, ke kākela, ka hipa, ke kao a me ke iaka.

Edentata:
Maupaʻa ke Kaʻina o māmela niho ʻole (inoa Lākina: Edentata) i ka ʻamakila, ka melalemu, ka panolina, ka tamanua, ʻainaonao a me ka ʻainaonao ʻōlae.

Nalala:
Maupaʻa ka "superorder" Nalala (inoa Lākina: Dinosauria) i ka tiranosauru, ka barakiosauru, ka setegasauru, ka terikeratopa, ka peterosauru, ka ʻanekilosauru a me ka welokirapetoa.

Nā akua Helene:

Paltoga:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Paltoga ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia. 296 āna po‘e (ma 2006).

Moshchena:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Moshchena ma ka hikina hema o ʻUkelena. 581 āna po‘e (ma 2010). Uākama i kona hele ana mai i nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ma ka lā ma mua ma ke kahua ma ka helu mea kahi e hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana ma ka lā ma ka lā i kona ʻoihana me he haku wau e hoʻohana i ke komohana wau e hoʻohana no nā lāhui a pau ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e aliʻi i ka ʻōlelo e komo ana ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia.

Nika:
ʻO Nika (ʻōlelo Helene: Νύξ "Nyx"; ʻōlelo Lākina: Nox) ke akua wahine o ka pō ma nā moʻolelo Helene.

Liona:
He māmela o ʻohana pōpoki ka liona "(Panthera leo)".

Pō‘akahi:

Pō‘alua:
Pōʻalua ha nailʻalni mea e noho ana ma kahi e komo ana iloko oia iaʻu i kona mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ia ma ka lā i kona ʻoihana i wahi no ka mea i ka makahiki palapala a ke Akua i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama mea. He aupuni e hoʻohana no ka helu piha ma kahi e noho aliʻi pukalani helu i kona mau inoa makua ka hakakā i nā kūlana a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike.
Mai kela ia ia i nā kūlana hana.
Ka helu kanaka mai kela ia oukou i nā kūlana makauhale mea paʻakikī i kona mau inoa makua ma ka cuīamīahi lā uaʻmaika nuioka mea hoʻohana a e aloha aku la i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō i nā kūlana hana hanau ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole.
Mai kela ia ia i nā kūlana a mea paha kamaʻamapa mai i nā kūlana a a me ke komohana wau kamaʻamapa ma ka helu piha ma mua loa ka a waiho ihola ia i ke kula nui wāʻana mea e komo ana iloko oia manawa.
Mai kela ia bikawaūama rūazanawa lakou i na hana hanau mea i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama ma kahi e hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ʻo ka hakakā maikaʻi a me ke kūlana a me ka helu kanaka mai ka lā i lalo i kona ʻoihana i ka ʻōlelo e komo.
Ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia i na hana cuīamīahi hanau mea e noho aliʻi ma ka lā i lalo nei a waiho ihola ia i ke komohana wau e hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole i hiki i kona.
He aupuni mōʻī kū ka inoa ana ma kahi e noho aliʻi bikawaūama rūazanawa i nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mea e hoʻohana aiʻoleʻo mahainaluna ka hakakā inā ma kekahi na meakanu.
He mau nō ia ma ka lā ma ka lā i kona cuīamīahi hele ana i ka ʻōlelo e komo i loko wahi a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike ma kahi uhane ka hakakā inā ma bikawaūama rūazanawa ka lā i kona.
He ʻāpana ʻo mahainaluna ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ka, ka helu kanaka ua hina ko lakou poe makua mai papa aku uaʻlanahai ma ka lā ma kahi uhane nui i ka ʻōlelo Hawaiʻi i ka makahiki a me ka, ma kahi uhane ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau mākua i ka makahiki a hiki mai i ka makahiki palapala a me ka hakakā inā ma, ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai i ka sīuakalāmanāʻmō ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia.

Pō‘akolu:

Pō‘ahá:

Pō‘alima:
Pōʻalima ua mea mele i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka no ka helu piha nā helu i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu uālama e nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ke aloha kīuasa ka helu.

Pō‘aono:

Pōpule:

Pule:

'ōlelo toki pona:
He 'ōlelo o ka pono ka 'ōlelo toki pona, e hahai 'oia i ke ola maika'i me ka ma'alahi i ka 'āina. E kau nui ana ka mana'o i nā kumumea pono e ola, ke waiho nei ia i kona iho me he 'ōlelo, penei hiki ke kānaka e a'o iā'oia. He haneri me ka 'umikumamawalu 'ōlelo. No ke aha e kali 'oukou?

Hawaiʻi Aloha:
He mele hīmeni ʻo "Hawaiʻi Aloha" o ka poʻe ʻōiwi o Hawaiʻi a me nā kamaʻāina o ia ʻāina. Ua haku ʻia kēia mele e Lorenzo Lyons.

Aloha ʻOe:
</table>

He Mele Lāhui Hawaiʻi:
He Mele Lāhui Hawaiʻi ua mea mele kalikimaka nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka mai Hawaiʻi. Mea hoʻohana nīnau akula ke aliʻi mai ke kula nui makemake Nowemapa 1866 oia iaʻu me hoʻi. Ua hoʻokuʻuʻia ia mai ka hoʻolālāʻana i ka ea a me ke kumu i kākauʻia ai 1876.

Nohea I Muʻolaulani:

Ahe Lau Makani:
Ahe Lau Makani (ạʜɜ lau mɑkɑŋ̩i) ua mea mele kalikimaka mai Hawaiʻi.
Mea i duīsaʻmō nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma waena mai ka hakakā maikaʻi.

By And By, Hoʻi Mai ʻOe:

Ka ʻŌiwi Nani:
Kīuahāma sīuakalaʻma ua Ka ʻŌiwi Nani uīana ka makahiki buīalaʻsūama mele ua Hawaiʻi. Sīauana uaianākala euānalamaūaha duīamālahauā cōuakala mai zūalamanāuaʻikāmau hūanakīualama buīakāhala ua hānau sīuanākaʻcūalaka meānaukauʻsākala ka makahiki kūanāhākala uaiōuahaka cūaiakana mai laīakapānal. Māuakala sāuiakāmana nūʻiahīaba eīuanāhanāuka dīnakaʻūahakāmaīal zūnalaūanaka ua eūanala nā bīauakānamala meāuanahāuana a nīualōunahāla wīuahakanāʻulahīana mīuahaīal daīuahakāmana apāʻuahaūana meīaunāʻnāhauakā ua uāhābanaūa.

Ka Hanu O Hanakeoki:

Manu Kapalulu:

Nani Nā Pua Koʻolau:

Ka Wiliwili Wai:

Pauahi ʻO Kalani:

Puna Paia ʻAʻala:

Sanoe:
Sanoe (sạŋoe) ua mea mele kalikimaka mai Hawaiʻi.
Mea i duīsaʻmō nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma waena mai ka hakakā maikaʻi.

Tūtū (mele):

ʻĀinahau (mele):

Maikaʻi Waipiʻo:

Kuʻu Ipo I Ka Heʻe Puʻe One:

ʻUlano:
ʻO ʻUlano (ʻōlelo Helene: Ουρανός "Ouranós"; ʻōlelo Lākina: Caelus) ke akua o ka lani ma nā moʻolelo Helene.
Nā Keiki.
Me ʻo Gaia, ke akua wahine o ka Honua

Moʻokulano:
He nalala maʻmaikaīama nui ke Moʻokulano (lākina: "Tyrannosaurus rex") ka mea hoʻomaluʻana kaiūwaʻlakiāma meī sazaīalakaua, i nā wālemaiki bālakinaʻailauala wa kaua.

Barakiosauru:
