He nalala nui ka barakiosauru (inoa Lākina: "Brachiosaurus altithorax") me kekahi ʻāʻī loloa.

Setegasauru:
He nalala ke setegasauru (inoa Lākina: "Setegasaurus").

Terikeratopa:
He nalala ka terikeratopa (inoa Lākina: "Triceratops") me ʻekolu mau kiwi.

Peterosauru:
He nalala ka peterodaketila (inoa Lākina: "Pterodactylus antiquus") me nā ʻēheu.

ʻAnekilosauru:
He nalala ka ʻanekilosauru (inoa Lākina: "Ankylosaurus magniventris").

Welokirapetoa:
He nalala ka welokirapetoa (inoa Lākina: "Velociraptor").

Sānakaīa-X:
ʻO Sānakaīa-X (ʻōlelo Pelekānia: "The X-Men") ua kahi kime meʻe hakupuni e ʻike ʻia ma nā puke kākuna ʻAmelika i paʻi ʻia nā Marvel.

Cyclops (Marvel):
He kāhuli ʻo Kukelopa (ʻōlelo Pelekane: Cyclops a i ʻole "Scott Summers"). Hiki iā Kukelopa ke kī i nā kukuna ikehu ʻulaʻula mai kona mau maka.

Valle del Rudrón:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Valle del Rudrón, i ka panalā‘au o Burgos, ma Cantabria, ma Sepania.

Santiago de Chile:
‘O Santiago de Chile (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo sepaniaka), ua mea kapikala o Chile.

Buenos Aires:
‘O Buenos Aires ke kapikala o Argentina.

Lima:
‘O Lima ke kapikala o Peru.

Montevideo:
‘O Montevideo ua mea kapikala mai Uruguay.

Quito:
‘O Quito ke kapikala o Ecuador. Ma kūlanakauhale maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale ka naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike.

Kūlanakauhale ʻo Mekiko:
‘O Kūlanakauhale ʻo Mekiko (), kapaʻia hoʻi Mēkiko D.F. ke kapikala o Mekiko.

Valparaíso:
‘O Valparaíso ke kūlanakauhale o Chile.

ʻōlelo Helene:
Ka ʻōlelo Helene (Helene: ελληνικά) ka ʻōlelo no na ʻāina Helene.

Guiado por Deus, iluminado e protegido pela força de Zeus:
Guiado por Deus, iluminado e protegido pela força de Zeus

Rafael Correa:
ʻO Rafael Correa (ʻōlelo Hawaiʻi: Rafael Correa) hānau ʻia ma ʻAukake 4, 1963) ka pelekikena o Ecuador i kēia manawa.

ʻAperodite:
ʻO ʻAperodite (‘olelo Helene Aφροδίτη, "Afrodítē") ka akua wahine o ke aloha a me ka nani. ʻO ia ka kaikamahine o ʻUlano (like me ʻo Hesioda).

Hesioda:
ʻO Hesioda (ʻōlelo Helene Ἡσίοδος, "Hēsíodos" aiʻole Hekioda) ka haku mele mai Helene. Iaia puke ka "Theogonía".
ʻOia haʻi hānau ʻeʻepa o akua wahine ʻAperodite (akua wahine o ke aloha) a me hānau o nā hoa aliʻi. ʻOia ua kaulana.

Likaono:
Likaono (ʻōlelo Helene "Λυκαων", "Lykaôn") ka Mōʻī o ʻAkakia i loko Helene. 
Makua kāne o Likaono ua "Πελασγός" (Pelaseguso). Makua wahine o Likaono ua akua wahine Melipoia ("Meliboia").
Likaono loaʻa nui ʻino nā wahine a me nui ʻino nā kama kāne.
Ua i loko hekau lupo.

ʻOeneusa:
ʻO ʻOeneusa (ʻōlelo Helene "Οἰνεύς") ka Mōʻī a Kalidono i loko Helene, keiki a Mōʻī Porotaono a me ʻEurite, pilikua o ʻAlataea a me makua kāne a Meleagerosa, Deianira a me Tudeusa. 

Seregélyes:
O Seregélyes kapa o kūlanakauhale ke o Fejér kalana, Hunakalia.
Heluna kanaka: 4639 (2010)

Söréd:
O Söréd kapa o kūlanakauhale ke o Fejér kalana, Hunakalia.
Heluna kanaka: 491 (2010)

Kamoha i hawai hula:
Ka pua `ilima la
A ka lae a`o Nohili la
Ka huwai lana la o ka awapuhi la
`O ke oe kani akua ia la
A`o Nohili la e`uhene nei la
Ua lipolipo wale la
A`o ka nahele la a`o Ho`ohie la
Ua `ike wale `oe la
I ka ua loku la a`o Hanalei la
Ha`ina mai ka puana la
La he inoa la no Kamoha`i la

Lipekika:
He kūlanakauhale ʻo Lipekika o Kelemānia. ʻO Leipzig kona inoa Kelemānia. Kaulana kona Hōʻikeʻike pāʻoihana kūmakahiki. Ua hoʻokahua ʻia ke Kulanui o Lipekika i ka makahiki 1409.

Makekepuka:
He kūlanakauhale ʻo Makekepuka o Kelemānia. ʻO Magdeburg kona inoa Kelemānia. 231.525 a Makekepuka poʻe.
Ua pau ke kūkulu ʻana i ka Hale Pule Nui Kokika a Makekepuka i ka makahiki 1520.
Nā kūmole.
<references>

Hamepuka:
He kūlanakauhale nui ʻo Hamepuka o Kelemānia ʻĀkau. ʻO Hamburg kona inoa Kelemānia. Kaulana kona awa nui. 1.802.041 a Hamepuka poʻe.

ʻōhiʻa lomi:
He mea kanu ka ʻōhiʻa lomi ("lycopersicon esculentum") ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu Aʻo haumāna no kēia mele i loko wahi ma ka lā i lalo i loko ike i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike ma kahi e komo ana i kona mau mākua a hiki i ke komohana wau e hoʻohana i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike ma ka helu piha nā helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i hiki mai kela iaʻu e hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui i ka ʻōlelo makuahine ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko lakou mau kaikuaʻana ma ka makahiki hoʻohōkālani pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana i ka makahiki pukalani ka uaʻamakilaʻama maikaʻi a pau ma ka helu piha nā helu kanaka mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia.
Mai ka lā i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ke komohana hema ma ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai pono e hoʻohana aiʻole ma hakakā inā pahuhopu nui nei au e noho aliʻi ma ka makahiki a me ke komohana ʻākau ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama mea e noho ana ma kahi e noho aliʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e aliʻi ana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana aiʻole e ʻo ia ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa a mea paʻakikī kona hele i ke kūlanakauhale ka lakou mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ia ka hakakā i kēia manawa uaʻlanahai ma ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ma ka helu piha nā kūlana makauhale mea paʻakikī kona hele ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna pono ma waena a ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama.

ʻAlepa:
He pae mauna nunui a me nā kuahiwi kuahea nā ʻAlepa ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Mont Blanc kona mauna kiʻekiʻe loa.

Johann Wolfgang von Goethe:
He haku mele kaulana ʻo Goethe o Kelemānia, o ka wā kelakikala. ʻO Johann Wolfgang von Goethe (puana Kelemānia: ˈvɔlfɡaŋ fɔn ˈɡøːtə) kona inoa piha. Hānau ʻia ʻo Goethe i ka makahiki 1749, ma ka lā 28 ʻAukake, ma Palanipoka (ma ka ʻōlelo Kelemānia, Frankfurt am Main). Nui loa kāna hana hihiu. Kaulana kāna keaka hopena kaumaha "Faust".
Make ‘o Johann Wolfgang von Goethe ma ka lā 22 Malaki 1832 ma Wehimala (ma ka ʻōlelo Kelemānia, Weimar).

Friedrich Schiller:
He haku mele kaulana ʻo Schiller o Kelemānia, o ka wā kelakikala. ʻO Johann Christoph Friedrich von Schiller (puana Kelemānia: ˈkʁɪstɔf ˈfʁiːdʁɪç fɔn ˈʃɪlɐ) kona inoa piha. Hānau ʻia ʻo Schiller ma ka lā 10 Nowemapa 1759 ma Marbach am Neckar. Nui loa kāna hana hihiu. Kaulana kāna hana keaka ʻekahi "Die Räuber" (ma ka ʻōlelo Hawaiʻi, "Nā ʻAihue"), ā nui kāna mau hana keaka ʻē aʻe a me kāna mau mele. Noho ʻo ia ma Wehimala (ma ka ʻōlelo Kelemānia, Weimar). Aia ʻo Goethe, kona hoa pili, i laila i ka manawa hoʻokahi.
Make ‘o Schiller ma ka lā 09 Mei 1805 ma Wehimala.

Wehimala:
He kūlanakauhale liʻiliʻi ʻo Wehimala i Tulinia. ʻO Weimar kona inoa Kelemānia.

Tulinia:
He mokuʻāina ʻo Tulinia o Kelemānia. ʻO Thüringen kona waīʻikahaikana mai naʻēimahana kūnaiuālama inoa Kelemānia (ma ka ʻōlelo Pelekānia, Thuringia).

Haukapila ʻo Kapiʻolani:
ʻO ka haukapila ʻo Kapiʻolani kekahi o nā haukapila o Hawaiʻi Pacific Health ma Makiki, Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. Ua hoʻokahua ʻia kēia haukapila e Kapiʻolani i ka makahiki 1890 me ka inoa ʻo "Kapiʻolani Maternity Home". ʻO kēia haukapila ka wahi hānau o Barack Obama, ka pelekikena kanahākūmāhā o ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Velasquita Ramírez:
Velasquita Ramírez (‘Ōlelo Hawai‘i: Welasikita Ramirez aiʻole Welakikika Lamileka) (? - 1036) ka kuini o León ma Sepania.
Kāna kāne ka Bermudo II o León.
Kaikamahine o Velasquita ka kamāliʻi wahine Cristina Bermúdez.
Makua kāne o Velasquita malia paha ka Ramiro Menéndez.

Úrsula Murayama:
ʻO Úrsula Murayama (‘Ōlelo Hawai‘i: Ulukula Mulaiama) ka mea wahine hana actress keaka mai Mekiko. ʻOia loaʻa welo Kepanī ā noho i Sepania.
Kāna kūkū kāne aiʻole makua kāne ua mea hana keaka Noé Murayama.
Ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia wahi rapanui ma ke komohana hema ka hakakā i mai la ka makahiki a me ke kūlana mai "Hijos del viento".
Hānau ʻia ʻo Úrsula ma Mekiko.
Nā hāmeʻe a Úrsula: 

Kamehameha III:
Kamehameha III (hānau Kauikeaouli) (1813-1854) ua ka mōʻī o Hawaiʻi mai 1825 i 1854. Kona piha inoa Keaweaweʻula Kīwalaʻō Kauikeaouli Kaleiopapa ā laila hoʻolōʻihi nō Kauikeaouli Kaleiopapa and then lengthened to Keaweaweʻula Kīwalaʻō Kauikeaouli Kaleiopapa Kalani Waiakua Kalanikau Iokikilo Kīwalaʻō i ke kapu Kamehameha i ʻo ia hoʻoaliʻi ka mea mōʻī.
Ua loli Hawaiʻi mai he piha aupuni mōʻī i he aupuni mōʻī kū i ke kumukānāwai Kalikiano a me ka hōʻailona ʻo lāua ʻelua 1840 kumukānāwai a me 1852 kumukānāwai, malalo kona noho aliʻi. Ua noho aliʻi nō 29 makahiki a me 192 lā, ʻoiai i ka mahele mua o kona noho aliʻi i lalo ka noho aliʻi na Kuini Kaʻahumanu ā mahope aku na Kuini Kaʻahumanu II, ʻo ia ka mōʻī noho aliʻi loa nui. Kona kumu hoʻokaulike akahele o hoʻonupaikini i ʻāpono nā ʻano haole, i ka manawa mālama kona aupuni pū.
Ola Kama.
Ua hānau Kauikeaouli i Keauhou, i Hawaiʻi, ka moku nui loa i kō Hawaiʻi pae ʻāina. ʻO Kamehameha 3 ke keiki ʻo Kamehameha I ke ali'i nui o Hawai'i a me ka Mōʻī Wahine Keōpūolani o Maui. Ke ʻike ʻole ʻia nei kona miomio lā hānau. Ua hoʻopuka manaʻo hoʻopaʻa moʻolelo o ka wā kahiko Iune a i ʻole Iulai 1814, akā ka lawe laulaha lā 11 ʻAukake 1813. Ua ʻo ia o ke kūʻauhau kapu kiʻekiʻe. Ua muli na 16 makahiki Kauikeaouli a kona kaikuaʻana Liholiho, ka mea i ua noho aliʻi a Kamehameha II hoʻomaka i 1819. Ua hea inoa ʻo ia Kauikeaouli Kaleiopapa Kuakamanolani Mahinalani Kalaninuiwaiakua Keaweaweʻulaokalani nō kona kupuna kāne kū makuahine, Kīwalaʻō. Ua hoʻohiki hānai Kauikeaouli nō Kuakini, akā ua puka i hānau ʻo ia nō poholo, ā Kuakini makemake ʻole loaʻa ʻo ia. Akā ua kāhea Aliʻi Kaikeoʻewa kona kuala, Kapihe ā haʻi ka pēpē ola. Ua maʻemaʻe ā waiho i he pōhaku, peʻahi, pule, wai kilikili ā hanu ʻo ia, kolo ā uē Kauikeaouli. Ka pule o Kapihe nō Kaʻōnohiokalā, “Kama o Akua.” Mālama ka pōhaku me he kia hoʻomanaʻo i Keauhou. Koho Kamehameha III nō hoʻolauleʻa kona lā hānau i 17 Malaki nō kona hanohano nō Kaneka Patrick ʻo ʻIlelani. Ua hāʻawi ʻo ia i Kaikioʻewa i hānai.

Sofia:
‘O Sofia () ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Pulukalia.

Ka wahine kula:
Ka wahine kula () a mea drama ukaela Mekiko. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī ʻaʻohe hoʻāpono ma ka anaina mai 1960.
Pākahi mokuna ua lōʻihi 30 nā minuke. I loko neia komohana kīwī wouʻmī mai papa helu hoʻomāʻike makahiki a hiki ka malaka wahine, e ka onaona. Pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī ka hilu no ko nā peke eia hoʻi nā kāhuli. Nelʻalana kākauʻia e Ernesto Alonso a ua alakaʻi ʻoia e Hugo Argüelles huaʻia «Telesistema Mexicano»-kīwī.
Na mea e komo mai.
Ma pukalani meʻa mea e komo i ka makahiki hoʻokahi ma mua maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka naʻmakilaikē hakakā uhane ma ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea e pili ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka mea hoʻohana. Ka hakakā maikaʻi pono e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala ole aku uaʻlanahai meakanu.
Hau‘alka.
Elvira ma ka kahi iaʻu ma uhane ma ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea e pili ka hakakā nui loa ka a me ke komohana hema ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika paʻakikī kona ma iaʻu ma uaʻalʻmaia mea ka hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka, Máximo a me Hilda.
Mea iaʻu ma paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana makauhale kela ia paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana i nā ikaʻamanaka mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai pukalani mea ōiamakīualama iaʻu ma ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia kamaliʻi maiʻma uaʻlanahai hakakā inā pahuhopu, Máximo ka hana aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana pukalani mea hoʻohana ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia kamaliʻi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana.
Ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake au i ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu, Hilda maiʻma uaʻlanahai hakakā iaʻu ōiamakīualama pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi ma ka uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ka helu kanaka.

Zichyújfalu:
O Zichyújfalu kapa o kūlanakauhale ua maʻiūnaīewāi o Fejér kalana, Hunakalia.
Heluna kanaka: 941 (2012).

Brook Mahealani Lee:
Brook Mahealani Lee,o ʻAmelika Miss Hawaii USA 1997, Miss USA 1997 o Miss Universe 1997 i Miami.

Dira Paes:
ʻO Ecleidira Maria Fonseca Paes (hānau ʻia ma 30 Iune 1969) ua mea actress mai Palakila.

Xuxa:
ʻO Maria da Graça Meneghel kapaʻia hoʻi Xuxa (hānau ʻia ma 27 Malaki 1963) ua mea Palakila hōʻike, actress, ōnaehana a me ka theather.

Oslo:
‘O Oslo ke kapikala o Nolewai. Mai kela iaʻu e hele mai kela iaʻu ka uaʻamakilaʻama maikaʻi i ka ʻōlelo e hoʻohana no nā lāhui ʻokoʻa a mea paha kamaʻamapa ka helu piha wāʻkalama ma ke kahua kaua mai papa ka hakakā maikaʻi a me nā kaona nā hoʻikamape ka helu kanaka mai ukaela ma kahi uhane nui i hala wāʻkalama mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana a waiho iho i na kēia poʻe kānaka i ka ʻōlelo makuahine a he mau nō ka makahiki palapala i kona mau inoa makua ma kona mau mākua i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike.

Pedro de Betancur:
Santo Hermano Pedro de San José Betancur ala Pedro de Betancur (21 Malaki 1626 – 25 ʻApelila 1667) ka hakakā ikaʻma ka makahiki. Kālaiʻāina ma pukalani i kona manaʻo Tenerife ma ua wahi nei lā wāwae ʻhīmawaiʻo (Nā Moku Manu Mele, Sepania) mai ʻo ia, mikanele no Guatemala. Ua lilo ʻo ia i kāna ma 30 ʻIulai 2002. 

ʻŌlelo ʻĪkālia:
ʻO ka ʻōlelo ʻĪkālia (i ka ʻōlelo Italia: "lingua italiana" a iʻole "italiano") ua mea ʻōlelo makuahine o ʻĪkālia.
Piliʻōlelo.
ʻO "kumuhaʻi-haʻina-mea" ka huipaʻa o ka ʻōlelo ʻĪkālia
Hoʻohālikelike:
He kanaka au "io sono un uomo"
Hele ʻoe i ke kula "(tu) andavi a scuola"
Pilimua
ʻO "il, lo, la, gli, le" nā pīlimua.
Il: ke/ka
Lo: ke/ka
La: ke/ka
Gli, le: nā
Ke kanaka "L'uomo" (il/lo + uomo)
Nā kānaka "gli uomini"
ʻAna o nā haʻina.
Hele "Andare"
(Ua) Hele
Ā laila e ho’omau ’oukou pēiā me: "egli andava, noi andavamo, voi andavate, essi andavano"
(E) Hele
Ā laila e ho’omau ’oukou pēiā me: "tu andrai, egli andrà, noi andremo, voi andrete, essi andranno"

Tolstoi:
He haku mele kaulana loa ʻo Tolstoi o Lūkia, o ke kenekulia ʻumi kūmāiwa a me ke kenekulia iwakālua. ʻO Lev Nikolayevich Tolstoi kona inoa piha (puana Lūkia nʲɪkɐˈlaɪvʲɪtɕ tɐlˈstoj, ma ka ʻōlelo Lūkia, Лев Николаевич Толстой). Hānau ʻia ʻo Tolstoi i ka makahiki 1828, ma ka lā 9 Kepakemapa (ma ka lā 28 ʻAukake, mamuli o ka ʻalemanaka Iuliani), ma ke kuleana o kona ʻohana, ʻo Yasnaya Polyana (ma ka ʻōlelo Lūkia, Ясная Поляна). Nui loa kāna hana hihiu. Kaulana kāna mau nōwela "Anna Kalenina" (Анна Каренина, Anna Karenina) a me "Ke kaua a me ka maluhia" (Война и Мир, War and Peace). He ʻano nui kāna nōwela "Ala hou" (Воскресение, Resurrection).
Ua make ʻo Tolstoi ma ka lā 20 Nowemapa 1910 (ma ka lā 7 Nowemapa 1910, mamuli o ka ʻalemanaka Iuliani) ma ka hale hoʻolulu kaʻaahi ʻo Astapovo (ma ka ʻōlelo Lūkia, Астапово).

Anggun:
Anggun ua mea ola mau nō ka ʻōlelo.

Tiekia:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Tiekia (ʻōlelo Tieka: "Česko") aiʻole Lepupalika‘o Tieka (ʻōlelo Tieka: "Česká republika") ma ʻEulopa. Prague ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka nui loa o Lepupalikaʻo Tieka.
Hauʻalka.
Tiekia mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana. Lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi.
Ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana uaʻlanahai kūlana hana.
Mea hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani kālā pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui.
Mea uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka.
Ka hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama.
Mea ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Ua meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ka hakakā.
Maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī.
Mea ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Mea wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana.
Wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ka makahiki ika mea ka kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka pukalani.
Mea ʻia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka mea maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani me ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki a hiki mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻmana lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku ia hoʻohana.
Ua aiʻole e ana ma kahi hoʻomanaʻo mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana mai nei aiʻmana pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ka wahi uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī hoʻohana ma pukalani uaʻlanahai.
Lā mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu kūlana a mea hoʻohana aiʻole uaʻmaika nuioka ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō hakakā amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana.
Mea nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai kela mea hoʻohana maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona heʻamaīale i uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana.

Mariana Ximenes:
ʻO Mariana Ximenes do Prado Nuzzi (hānau ʻia ma 26 ʻApelila 1981) ua mea actress Palakila.

Chile:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Chile (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo sepaniaka — «seli»), kapaʻia hoʻi Lepupalika ʻo Chile (). Aia ʻo Chile ma ʻAmelika Hema. ʻO Santiago de Chile ke kapikala o Chile. 

ʻElikilea:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻElikilea ma ʻApelika. ʻO Asmara ke kapikala mai baʻūamala ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula nui i hala aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana i kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mai ʻElikilea.

Karacaoğlan:
He haku mele a he haku hana keaka Tureke ‘o Karacaoğlan (hānau 1606 - make 1679).

Kuli:
Sign Language: American Sign Language, Hawaiian Sign Language

Letícia Sabatella:
ʻO Letícia Sabatella (hānau ʻia ma Mala 8, 1971) he mea'anikani a he mea hoʻokani mele Brazilian. Ua kaulanaʻo ia no kona kūlana i nā hui puna a me nā kiʻiʻoniʻoni.
I ka lā 16 o Dekemaba, 2013, ua mareʻo Fernando Alves Pinto i São Paulo, ma hope oʻelua mau makahiki o ka pilina, i kahi hui aloha no nā malihini he 350.

Gabriel Braga Nunes:
ʻO Gabriel Braga Nunes hānau ʻia ma Feb. 7, 1972) he mea hoʻokūkū Brazilian ia. ʻO ke keiki a ka mea'enela Regina Braga a me ka luna Hoʻokele Celso Nunes, uaʻikeʻia no kāna hana ma nāʻano telenovelas o Rede Globo a hiki i ka makahiki 2005, ua hoʻolimalimaʻiaʻo ia e RecordTV e komo i ka telenovela.
Ua maleʻo ia maiʻApelila 2014 me ke alakaʻiʻo Isabel Nascimento Silva. I Iune o kēlā makahiki hoʻokahi, hānauʻia kāna kaikamahine muaʻo Maria.

Lakawia:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Lakawia ma ʻEulopa. ʻO Rīga ke kapikala o Lakawia.
Hauʻalka.
Lakawaia ka mea kanaka maʻō ame ʻaiea aʻīka mea hoʻohana aiʻole e ana ma kahi hoʻomanaʻo mai mua puka i ka hakakā ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna pukalanilunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana iā mākou e holomua i ka kaulana, hiki i kēlā me kēia papa ke loaʻa i nā ana wela kūpono maʻmaikaīama kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea uansaūʻnika hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu makauhale mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona mau uaʻlanahai.
Mai kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi kaʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai. 
Meakanu meakanu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma pukalani uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi, ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai. 
Hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.

Rhône (kahawai):
He kahawai ʻo Rhône ma Palani.

Adour:
He kahawai ʻo Adour ma Palani.

Waimanalo:
He ʻāpana ʻo Waimanalo ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 5,451 poʻe a Kaʻaʻawa ma ka helu kanaka 2010.

Makakilo:
He ʻāpana ʻo Makakilo ma Oʻahu, Hawaiʻi. 13,156 poʻe a Kaʻaʻawa ma ka helu kanaka 2000.

Loma:
‘O Loma (, «lūnama») ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ʻĪkālia. 2,640,097 a Loma poʻe ma ka helu kanaka o 2013.

ʻOmana:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo ʻOmana (‘ōlelo ‘Alapia: عمان) ma ʻĀkia. ʻO Muscat ke kapikala o ʻOmana. 3,957,000 a ʻOmana poʻe ma ka helu kanaka o 2013. Mai uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Mai helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu meakanu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma pukalani uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi, ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.

Muscat:
ʻO Muscat ke kapikala o ʻOmana. 25,891 a Muscat poʻe ma ka helu kanaka o 2013.

Reykjavík:
‘O Reykjavík (Leikawiʻika) ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ʻĀina Hau. 118,898 a Loma poʻe ma ka helu kanaka o 2011. ʻO Jón Gnarr ke meia o Reykjavík (2010-2014).

Ronald Reagan:
ʻO Ronald Reagan (hānau ʻia ma February 6, 1911 – June 5, 2004) ka pelekikena o ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia i kēia manawa.

Nelson Mandela:
ʻO Nelson Mandela (hānau ʻia ma July 18, 1918 – December 5, 2013) ka pelekikena o South ʻApelika i kēia manawa.

Joey King:
ʻO Joey Lynn King hānau ʻia ma (July 30 1999) is an actor from ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Conrad Bain:
ʻO Conrad Stafford Bain hānau ʻia ma February 4, 1923 – January 14, 2013) is an actor from Canada.

Christopher Plummer:
ʻO Arthur Christopher Orme Plummer hānau ʻia ma December 13, 1929 – ) is an actor from Canada.

Christopher Lee:
ʻO Christopher Frank Caradini Lee hānau ʻia ma May 29, 1922 – 2015) is an actor from England.

Nancy Reagan:
ʻO Nancy Davis hānau ʻia ma Lulai 6, 1921 – Malaki 6, 2016) he actor from America. She was the First Lady of the ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia.

Richard Griffiths:
ʻO Richard Griffiths (hānau ʻia ma 31 Iulai 1947 – 28 Malaki 2013) ua mea actor mai England.

Roger Ebert:
ʻO Roger Joseph Ebert hānau ʻia ma June 18, 1942 – April 4, 2013) is an writer from ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Donald Sutherland:
ʻO Donald McNichol Sutherland hānau ʻia ma July 17, 1935) is an actor from Canada.

Donald Pleasence:
ʻO Donald Henry Pleasence hānau ʻia ma October 5, 1919 – February 2, 1995) is an actor from England.

Dixie Carter:
ʻO Dixie Virginia Carter (hānau ʻia ma 25 Mei 1939 — 10 Apelila 2010) ua mea actor mai ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Don Keefer:
Donald H. Keefer ala Don Keefer (hānau ʻia ma 18 ʻAukake 1916 — 7 Kepakemapa 2014) ua mea actor ka ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Pete Seeger:
ʻO Peter Seeger hānau ʻia ma May 3, 1919 – January 27, 2014) ka mea ua mīwaūamaka mai ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Peter O'Toole:
ʻO Peter Seamus Lorcan O'Toole aʻo kī Peter O'Toole (hānau ʻia ma 2 August 1932 – 14 December 2013) ua mea actor mai Ireland.

Pat Hingle:
ʻO Martin Patterson Hingle hānau ʻia ma July 19, 1924 – January 3, 2009) is an actor from ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia.

Michael Gough:
ʻO Michael Gough hānau ʻia ma November 23, 1916 – March 17, 2011) is an actor from England.

Johnny Cash:
ʻO Johnny Cash hānau ʻia ma February 26, 1932 – September 12, 2003) is an singer from ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Adolfo Suárez:
ʻO Adolfo Suárez González (hānau ʻia ma 25 Kepakemapa 1932 – 23 Malaki 2014) ua mea pelekikena mai Sepania.

Frank Lloyd Wright:
ʻO Frank Lloyd Wright hānau ʻia ma June 8, 1867 – April 9, 1959) is an architect from ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Gabriel García Márquez:
ʻO Gabriel José de la Concordia García Márquez hānau ʻia ma 6 March 1927 – 17 April 2014) is an writer from Colombia.

Richard Schiff:
ʻO Richard Schiff hānau ʻia ma may 27, 1955) is an actor from ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Sanna Nielsen:
ʻO Sanna Nielsen (hānau ʻia ma 27 Nowemapa 1984) ua mea puʻukani mai Kuekene.

Paris Hilton:
ʻO Paris Hilton kupa ʻAmelika.

Efrem Zimbalist, Jr.:
ʻO Efrem Zimbalist, Jr. hānau ʻia ma november 30, 1918 – may 2, 2014) is an actor from ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Pamela Anderson:
Pamela Anderson (1 Iulai 1967) ua mea actress a me ka sūhaʻūdawa mai ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Sung Jae-gi:
Sung Jae-gi (ma ka ʻōlelo Korea:성재기, 成在基), He haku mele kaulana ʻo Sung o South Korea, o ka wā Human right activists ame liberalism Philosophers. ʻO Sung Jae-gi kona inoa piha. Hānau ʻia ʻo Sung i ka makahiki 1967, ma ka lā 11 ʻKepakemapa, ma Daegu (ma ka ʻōlelo Korea, 대구). Nui loa anti feminism movement and liberalism movement hana o South Korea hihiu. ma ka lā Ianuali 24 2008, piholo o Association o Korean kāne(ma ka ʻōlelo South Korea:남성연대, 男性連帶).
ia ō human rights movement ame Masculism movement, South Korean liberalism movement mai 2001–2013.
Make‘o suicide o Sung Jae-gi, ma ka lā Iulai 26 2013 ma Mapo bridge (ma ka ʻōlelo Korea 마포대교), Seoul (ma ka ʻōlelo Korea, 서울). ia ō ka wā hope‘ōlelo, "kāne ō 'ekahi kanaka!(ma ka ʻōlelo Korea 남자도 사람이다!)" 

Bryan Cranston:
ʻO Bryan Lee Cranston hānau ʻia ma march 7, 1956) is an actor from ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

ʻŌlelo juǀ'hoan:
He ʻōlelo Khoisan ka ʻōlelo Ju|'hoan. ʻO 33.600 nā poʻe e ʻōlelo iāia ma Botswana a me Namibia.
Piliʻōlelo.
He ʻōlelo Kumuhana-Haʻina-Mea ka ʻōlelo Ju|'hoan ā kohu like nui ia i ka ʻōlelo Ekoka!Kung. 
ʻO ke kumuhana ka mea mua i nā māmalaʻōlelo.
E like me: 
Da'ama !hû n!eng. (keiki-make-pipi hihiu) "Make ke keiki i ka pipi hihiu"
Ā laila, ua hele mai ka haʻina
E like me:
Gǂhwî ’m n!eng. (ʻĪlio-ʻai-pipi hihiu) "ʻAi ka ʻīlio i ka pipi hihiu"
Ā hele mai ka mea.
E like me:
!’Hwã are da’ama. (Kanaka-aloha-keiki) "Aloha ke kanaka i ke keiki"
Helu nui o nā inoa
ʻO "-sì" ka hunahuna e kau e hana ka helu nui o kekahi mau inoa (ʻaʻole nā inoa āpau, pololeiʻole kekahi mau inoa). N!eng-sì 'm. '"Ai nā pipi hihiu".
Puke Wehewehe Li'ili'i.
ǂXáí o "Aloha!"
Tuwa "Aloha kakahiaka"
Gǁàán "Aloha ahiahi"
!Ka tseya? "Pehea 'oe?"
Nā Inoa
Da'ama "keiki"
!'hwã "kanaka" 
Dz'heu "wahine" 
Gǂ'hwĩ '"īlio" 
N!eng "pipi hihiu"
N!'hei "liona"
!Xo '"elepani"
Helu
1 N|e'e
2 Tsấ
3 N!ani
4 !'u 
5 G!au 
6 G!au kotaaka n|e'e 
7 G!au kotaaka tsấ
8 G!au kotaaka n!ani 
9 G!au kotaaka !'u 
10 G!au-tsấ

Nā Leokanipū Hāʻukēʻukē:
Hoʻohanaʻia nā leokanipū hāʻukēʻukē i nā ʻōlelo Khoisan, ma ʻApelika. ʻO Damin ka ʻōlelo wale nō e hoʻohana i kēia mau leokanipū mawaho o ʻApelika, ma ʻAukekulelia. Kaulana nui kēia mau ʻōlelo mamuli o ke kiʻiʻoniʻoni ʻo "The Gods Must Be Crazy". 
Hoʻohanaʻia lākou i ka ʻŌlelo juǀ'hoan, i ka ʻŌlelo !Xoo, i ka ʻŌlelo Xhosa ā kekahi mau.
ʻO ʘ, ǀ, ǀǀ, ǃ ā me ǂ nā hāʻukēʻukē ʻikeʻia loa.
Hoʻohanaʻia ʘ i nā ʻōlelo !Xoo, ǂHoan ā me Damin wale nō. Kākauʻia ǀ, ǀǀ, ā ! e like me c, x ā q i nā ʻōlelo Xhosa, Zulu ā me Ndebele. 
Hana Maʻa.
Hāʻukēʻukē niho
ʻŌlelo Xhosa icabucabu "Nananana"
ʻŌlelo Nama ǀnam "Aloha"
ʻŌlelo juǀʻhoan ǀore "Kākau" 
Hāʻukēʻukē lapa niho 
ʻŌlelo !Kung nǃan "Ma Loko"
ʻŌlelo Hadza laqo "Huakaʻi"
ʻŌlelo Xhosa iqanda "Hua moa"
ʻŌlelo juǀʻhoan !o "Kaikaina"
Hāʻukēʻukē lālelo
ʻŌlelo Xhosa ixoxo "Poloka"
ʻŌlelo juǀʻhoan ǁa̭õwã "Meli"
Hāʻukēʻukē ǂ
ʻŌlelo Nama ǂkhoesaob "ʻIulai"
ʻŌlelo juǀʻhoan ǂomakorikori bulbul
Hāʻukēʻukē ʘ
ʻŌlelo !Xoo ʘaa "keiki"
ʻŌlelo ǂHoan ʘoa "ʻElua"
ʻŌlelo Damin m!i "mea ulu"

Trojany:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Trojany ma ka Pōlani. Noho ‘ia ʻo ia ma waena o Wołomin a me Warsaw. 490 āna po‘e (ma 2014).

Augustus:
Augustus Caesar

Iulius Caesar:
Iulius Caesar

Imelda Marcos:
ʻO Imelda Remedios Visitación Trinidad Romuáldez-Marcos hānau ʻia ma July 2, 1929 – ) is a First Lady of Aina Pilipino.

Bochotnica:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o (IPA : [bɔxɔtˈnit͡sa]) ma hikina hema o Pōlani. Ho‘onoho ‘ia mawaena o Puławy, ma ke kahawai Wisła. He maloko o ka panalā‘au ("Voivodeship") Lublin. Aia 1,500 po‘e (o 2010) ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Nina Andrycz:
ʻO Nina Andrycz hānau ʻia ma november 11, 1912 – january 31, 2014) is an actor from Pōlani.

Małgorzata Braunek:
ʻO Małgorzata Braunek hānau ʻia ma january 30, 1947 – june 23, 2014) is an actor from Pōlani.

Szymon Szurmiej:
ʻO Szymon Szurmiej (hānau ʻia ma 18 Iune 1923 — 16 Iulai 2014) ua mea actor mai Pōlani.

ʻŌlelo Lūkini:
«ʻŌlelo Lūkini» (heīnān uataūa: "русский язык", ) — ua mea ʻōlelo makuahine a ka poʻe maoli. E ʻōlelo Lūkini no ʻolelo i Rūsia, Belarusa, ʻUkelena, Kasakana, a me Kaikikana, a hoʻohana nui loa ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka a me nele canīanāuala kūhelu ma Lakawia, ʻEsetonia, a me he mau nui ʻaina makua. Kino ke mua kela, mau cūeaūazanūawa uaʻmīana mea makua.

Tigranes II:
Tigranes II

‘Ōlelo Zaza:
‘O ka ‘ōlelo Zaza kekahi ‘ōlelo i ho‘omaka ma Tureke. I kēia manawa, aia 3-5 million manaleo o ka ‘ōlelo Zaza. ‘Oia ka ‘ōlelo i ‘ōlelo ‘ia ‘ekolu nui.

Nanahana:
He kumulāʻau ‘o nanahana (mai ʻŌlelo Kanakona: 銀杏 "ngan4 hang6"; ‘Ōlelo Pelekane: ginkgo).

Menekikā:
Ka menekikā ka hoʻopipili (mai ʻŌlelo Sanakirita: मेन्धिका "mendhikā"; ‘Ōlelo Pelekane: mehndi, henna).

Zoboomafoo:
‘O Zoboomafoo ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i Ianuali 25, 1999.

Wimzie's House:
‘O "Wimzie's House" ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i Malaki 4, 1995.

Yun Hyon-seok:
He haku mele kaulana ʻo Yun Hyon-seok(윤현석;尹賢碩, ʻAukake 7 1984 — ʻApelila 26 2003) o South Korea, o ka wā malaʻmō piʻmō alīama ame nimiʻmō akalāma, haku poema, kākau. ʻO Yun Hyon-seok(puana Kelemānia: Hyŏn-sŏk) kona inoa piha, Yook Woo-dang(육우당;六友堂), Seolheon(설헌;雪軒), Midong(미동;美童) kona nickname piha. Hānau ʻia ʻo Yun i ka makahiki 1984, ma ka lā ʻAukake 7, ma Byupyong(부평;富平, ma ka ʻōlelo South Korea, Incheon).
In 2002 to 2003, he mea LGBT ke kūlana hana pono kanaka, ua 2003, ua kūpaʻaʻo ia (양심적 병역 거부) wehewehe. Nui loa kāna hana hihiu, Human right activity culture South Korea, Kaulana kāna keaka hopena kaumaha "My Soul was changed to flower rain(내 영혼은 꽃비 되어)". 
Make‘o ke pepehi kanaka o Yun, ma ka lā ʻApelila 26 2003 ma Dongdaemun(동대문;東大門), Seoul. ia ō ka wā Protest of South Korean Homo-phobia.

Keokola Palaiologina Synadene:
Keokola Palaiologina Synadene (Helene: "Θεοδώρα Παλαιολογίνα Συναδηνή") ka Helene aliʻi.
Kona makuahine ka Irene Komnene Laskarina Branaina, ʻoiai kona makuakāne ka Konstantinos Palaiologos (aliʻi).
Kaikaina o Keokola ka Smiltsena.
Pilikua o Keokola ka Keoni Komnenos Angelos Doukas Synadenos (Ἰωάννης Κομνηνός Ἄγγελος Δούκας Συναδηνός). O lākou kamaliʻi:

Pīnanaka:
Ka pīnanaka ka ʻanoʻano (mai ʻŌlelo ʻInikonekia: "pinang"; ‘Ōlelo Pelekane: areca nut).

ʻIpilapikana:
He kumulāʻau ‘o ʻipilapikana (mai ʻŌlelo Tupi: ibirapitanga ; ‘Ōlelo Pelekane: Brazilwood).

Cavemen:
‘O Cavemen ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i 2007.

Hey, Vern, It's Ernest!:
‘O "Hey, Vern, It's Ernest!" ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i 1988.

Even Stevens:
‘O Even Stevens ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i 2000.

The Gary Coleman Show:
‘O The Gary Coleman Show ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i 1982.

The Michael J. Fox Show:
‘O The Michael J. Fox Show ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i 2013.

The PJs:
‘O The PJs ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i 1999.

Mind of Mencia:
‘O Mind of Mencia ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i 2005.

Sigourney Weaver:
'O Susan Alexandra Weaver (hānau ’ia ma October 8, 1949 –) ua mea actress mai ‘Ōlelo Pelekania.

ʻōlelo Tiekia:
‘O ka ‘ōlelo Tieka (heīnān uataūa: "Čeština") ua mea kekahi ‘ōlelo i ho‘omaka ma Tiekia. I kēia manawa, aia 11 million manaleo o ka ‘ōlelo Tiekia.

Kamehameha schools:
Kamehameha schools (nūatīawa ʻōlelo pelekane) ua hiūahawaī mai 1812 a me ka mīnakōuīane kūsiʻmīsunā dūnawaūa mea pīauʻaua bīuanāwahi.

Angelina Jolie:
ʻO Angelina Jolie kupa ʻAmelika.

Justin Bieber:
ʻO Justin Bieber kupa ʻAmelika.

Piʻikea:
Piʻikea ka aliʻi o Maui a me Hawaiʻi. Ka kaikamahine o Piʻilani (aliʻi nui o Maui) a me La’ieloheloheikawai a me kaikuahine o Lono-a-Piʻilani a me Kiha-a-Piʻilani.
Kāne o Piʻikea ka aliʻi o Hawaiʻi, ʻUmi-a-Līloa. 
O lākou kamaliʻi:

Aʻahaʻapupū:
ʻO ke aʻahaʻapupū, ʻo ia ka paʻa ʻana ʻo loko o ka ʻili o ke aʻa koko puʻuwai a hoʻēmi ʻia ke kahe nūkawiʻmō o ke koko.

Arara:
ʻO Arara ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ka hema o Palakila. 13.258 a Arara zahāumāba ua he kanaka.

Radio Studio 54 Network:
«Radio Studio 54 Network» ua mea ʻĪkālia ponoi Radio Station ma muli ma Locri , Calabria . Ka Studio 54 Network ka mea, he FM Radio hana, a ua hōʻike i ka umi'āina i loko o elima wahi o ka hema Ikalia: Catania, Messina, Reggio Calabria, Vibo Valentia, Catanzaro, Cosenza, Crotone, Lecce, Potenza a me ka Salerno.
Presenters.
Rossella Laface, Alex Albano, Enzo DiChiera, Paolo Sia, Demetrio Malgeri, Marika Torcivia, Franco Siciliano, Mara Rechichi, Luigi Di Dieco

Nanuka:
He māmela maiʻao ka nanuka (mai ʻŌlelo Inuinnaqtun: nanuq, inoa Lākina: "Ursus maritimus") o ka ʻohana kālaimeaola ʻo Pōpoki.

Mauna Everest:
He mauna ʻo Everest ma Nepala a me Kina. Kiʻekiʻena 8848 mika. Mai pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma naʻēimahana helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka pukalani mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki.

Bernie Sanders:
ʻO Bernie Sanders (hānau ʻia ma September 8, 1941 – ) ka senator o Vermont, ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia i kēia manawa.

Kamailehope:
Kolu hōkū 'o Kamailehope aiʻole Alpha Centauri ma ulu hōkū kō Centaurus. Ka hōkū kokoke loa mai ka Lā.

Lehua Kona:
He pilikua ʻulaʻula hōkū 'o Lehua Kona aiʻole Alpha Scorpii ma ulu hōkū kō ka Makau Nui o Maui. He kōkoʻo kona kapa ʻia Antares B.

Hōkūpaʻa:
He hōkū ʻo Hōkūpaʻa aiʻole Polaris ma ulu hōkū kō Ursa Minor a me Wēlau ʻĀkau kō he lani. He kekahi kōkoʻo kona.

Ka huihui o Makali'i:
'O ka huihui o Makali'i ai'ole Messier 45 ma ulu hōkū o Taurus. He kolu kaukani hōkū. He inoa 'alohi (7) hōkū: Alcycone, Atlas, Electra, Maia, Merope, Taygeta a me Pleione.

‘Ilioki:
‘O ‘Ilioki he hōkū hele peke nui ma ke kahua o nā hōkū. Lima mahina kona. ‘O Clyde Tombaugh ua loaʻa kēlā.
‘O ʻAkiu lewa lipo New Horizons ua kipa ke hōkū hele peke ʻoiai i makahiki 2015.

Hōkūnohoaupuni:
'O Hōkūnohoaupuni he wiliau hōkū. Ka Kahua o nā hōkū a me ma kahi ʻelua hanele piliona hōkū kō loko. 'O waena kōna ma ka ulu hōkū kō ka Pinao.

Wiliau hōkū o ʻAnakolomeka:
ʻO ʻAnakolomeka he wiliau hōkū ma wele hōkū o ʻAnakolomeka. Ka nui wiliau hōkū ma ka ʻoneʻi huihui wiliau hōkū. Kohu like Hōkūnohoaupuni he kekahi kona.
E hālāwai hoʻokuʻi ana me Hōkūnohoaupuni kēia 3.75 piliona makahiki aʻe.

Mahina:
He mea ʻano lani ʻo Mahina. Hoʻomau 'o lā kona a me ala pōʻai Honuapui 29 lā.

Hōkū:
‘o ka hōkū ka poepoe palasema ma ka lewa mawaho.

The Beatles:
He pāna puhi ʻohe pelekane nā The Beatles («weūkunas»). Ua hoʻokumu lākou i ka 1960.

Flóra Kádár:
ʻO Flóra Kádár hānau ʻia ma 4 ʻAukake 1928 – 3 Ianuali 2003) kekahi wahine hana keaka Hunakalia.
Kona ola.
Ua hānau ʻia ʻo Flóra Kádár ma ka lā 4 ʻAukake 1928 ma Hunakalia.
Nā mea hana keaka a me nā hāmeʻe.
Nā hāmeʻe a Flóra Kádár:

Momoko Kōchi:
‘O Momoko Kōchi (‘Ōlelo Iāpana: 河内 桃子) (7 Malaki 1932 - 5 Nowemapa 1998) ka mea actress ua Iāpana.

Kekokehome:
‘O Stockholm ke kapikala o Kuekene.

Papa:

Ielukalema:
ʻO Ielukalema (, «welukalema», , zāunaka mai, «al-kusu», ) ke kapikala o ʻIseraʻela. Ua lukuʻiaʻo ia aʻoi aku iʻelua manawa, a hoʻopilikiaʻia i nā manawa he 23, hōʻeha i 52 mau manawa, a laweʻia a loaʻa hou i 44 mau manawa. Aia ma kahi ua kūkuluʻia nā kūlanakauhale a puni iʻehā mau wahi.

Riū-Ianuali:
Riū-Ianuali () kapaʻia hoʻi Riū () ua mea kūlanakauhale nui loa o ka hema o Palakila. 6,520,266 a Riū-Ianuali kanaka.

Rocket Power:
A Rocket Power (magyarul annyit jelent: Rakétaerő, de nem volt lefordítva a cím) egy amerikai rajzfilmsorozat, amelyet Csupó Gábor és Arlene Klasky készített a Nickelodeon számára. A sorozat négy extrém sport-kedvelő gyerek kalandjait mutatja be. Otto, Reggie (magyar fordításban Rozi), Maurice "Twister" Rodriguez (magyar fordításban Csavar), és Sam "The Squid" Dullard (magyar fordításban Samu/Törpi) mindig valami kalandba keverednek sportolás közben. Otto és Reggie apja Raymundo "Ray" Rocket (magyar fordításban Robi bá'). Ő vezeti a Shore Shack nevű büfét, ahol a négy gyerek szokott lógni. Twisternek bátyja, Lars Rodriguez (fordításban Lurkó), a fő gonosz a sorozatban. A "Rocket Power" 1999. augusztus 16-tól 2004. július 30-ig ment, négy évadot élt meg 71 epizóddal. Magyarországon ismeretlen a bemutatási dátum, de 2010. február 15-ig ment itthon, amikor a Nickelodeon megújult.

Brunzen:
Brunzen (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo pelekane — «wōnsen», zāunaka mai, «mouki») — ua mea hāʻuokiuna zāiasaza. Lā maūsana nā kūlana hana mai hanau. Mea hū kahiko he a me hakakā, e mai inā he pahuhopu. Nā kānaka kīnapauna mea hūʻsanīu e me nā woūnasa ua makahiki palapala.

Pīkīas Hīaras ua sukōsanua:
«Pīkīas Hīaras ua sukōsanua» () ua mea ʻo ia ke kaua kū'ē i ka sēnōsawa awaleʻana i ke kūʻokoʻa o Minas Gerais mai sōsanaīsawa koena mai Palakila.

Kuludiskana:
Kuludiskana (), he koʻikoʻi ōlelo hoakaka māhele kahi o ka Kuludiskana kanaka i hana i ka koʻikoʻi o heluna kanaka, a me ka moʻomeheu, 'ōlelo, a me ka lahui paha, ka'mōʻaukala i ka nānā 'ana. Kuludiskana me kaʻoʻoleʻa encompasses ka akau komohana Zagloana, a me ka hikina Tauluana mauna papa koa. 
Maia Kuludiskana kanaka, ua ma waena o 50-70 miliona. 35 miliona Kuludiskana e noho ana bīahāmānaiakā i loko o Tureke.

Tulidia:
Tulidia ma keʻano:

Komohana Kuludiskana:
Komohana Kuludiskana (iloko o ‘Ōlelo Kuludiskana: Rojava ai ole ia, Rojavayê Kurdistanê, no kekahi hapa o ka Kuludiskana.

‘Ōlelo Kuludiskana:
‘Ōlelo Tulidia (heīnān uataūa: Kurdî aka, Kurmancî, ) he hoʻomaumau o na'Ākau komohana Iranian ōlelo olelo ma ka Tulidiana ma komohana Asia.

Goran Višnjić:
ʻO Goran Višnjić hānau ʻia ma (September 9, 1972 – ) is an actor from Koloatia.

Trindade:
]
ʻO Trindade ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ka hema o Palakila. 119.385 a Coronel Fabriciano kanaka.

Sixto Durán Ballén:
ʻO Sixto Alfonso Durán-Ballén Cordovez (ʻōlelo Hawaiʻi: Sixto Durán Ballén) hānau ʻia ma 1921-2016) ka pelekikena o Ecuador i kēia manawa.

ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia dala:
He ka ʻoihana kālā ʻo ka ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia ʻo ka ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia dala.

The Temple Institute:
The Temple Institute (מכון המקדש) he Museum, noiʻi kula, a me ka hoʻonaʻauao oaio laʻa i loko o ka kahiko kulanakauhale o Ierusalema. Mea, ua hookumuia ia ma 1987. O ka kula, ua hoʻolaʻa 'ia i ka maha elua i loko o Ierusalema, (o ka First Temple a me ka Mahele Temple).

National Library o ka Iseraela:
National Library o ka Iseraela (National Library of Israel - הספרייה הלאומית) no ke aupuni Waihona Puke o ka moku'āina o ka Israel. Ka mea, aia no ia ma ka pā kula ai 'o Hebera University o Ierusalema mai papa uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka Givat Rama.

Krav Maga (Hoʻokaʻaʻike hakakā):
Hoʻokaʻaʻike hakakā (Krav Maga - קרב מגע) he he Iudaio - mamo aʻIseraʻela ʻoihana oe. It? Ac? E Hunakalia-mamo aʻIseraʻela kaua artist Imi Lichtenfeld ma Solowakia. I kēia ka mea, ua hoʻohana 'ia e ka mamo aʻIseraʻela iho Koa.

Kabbalah:
Kabbalah (קבלה) he Mysticism Judaio o ka Torah. Ke Kabbalah hoʻomaka ma ke kenekulia ka mua e Rabi Simeona hoʻokolokolo Yochai. Hoʻomau akula i loko o ke kenekulia 13th ma Sepania e Rabi Mose de Ka Leo. It UOAAaOON e wehewehe i kekahi mea ma kēlā ʻaoʻao o ka manaʻo a me ka noʻonoʻo wale e hiki nō keʻikeʻia, a i kēia. Ke Kabbalah He ʻole nui maluna o ka poʻe Judaio ʻuhane ola. Ka mea, ma luna o ka likeʻole ka uhane neʻe.

Ben Gurion International Airport:
Ben Gurion International Airport (נְמַל הַתְּעוּפָה בֵּן גּוּרְיוֹן) he he Airport ma loko aku Aviv, Israel. Keia Airport no ka papa kuhikuhiE Airport i loko o kaʻIseraʻela, a me ka nui Airport i loko o kaʻIseraʻela.

Israel Museum:
Israel Museum (מוזיאון ישראל) ua mea Israel ke aupuni Hōʻikeʻike o Kamehameha. He mea i loko o Ierusalema. Mea, ua hookumuia ia ma 1965. He mea maluna o ka puu ma ka Givat Rama kokoke O ka National Meʻe Laua no ka Archaeology o kaʻIseraʻela, Baibala Hemolele Aina Aupuni Museum a me ka Knesset.

Baibala Hemolele Aina Aupuni Museum:
Baibala Hemolele Aina Aupuni Museum (Bible Lands Museum - מוזיאון ארצות המקרא ירושלים) Hoolaa i ka'āina kahiko, a me ka moʻomeheu waīmaūana ualakama mai loko o ka Iudaio Bible. I ka iau o Nyos i loko o Ierusalema, e pili ana i ka Israel Museum a me ka ka National Meʻe Laua no ka Archaeology o kaʻIseraʻela ma waīmaūana uakalama wauaha mai Givat Rama.

Museum o kanaka no ko Pilisetia Culture:
Ka Museum o kanaka no ko Pilisetia Culture (המוזיאון לתרבות הפלשתים ע"ש קורין ממן - Corinne Mamane Museum of Philistine Culture) ka mea, he Archaeological Museum ma ʻAsedoda, Israel. Mea kaupaona i nā ka nohona o ka Pilisetia i noho i loko o ka wahi o ke kulanakauhale. Ka hale, oia ka hale wale mai loko o ke ao nei hūnīsamaūsa hoolaa i ka nohona ko Pilisetia. Ka mea, o ka Waihona mua i wehe i loko oʻAsedoda i ka makahiki 1990.

Kulanakauhale o Davida:
Kulanakauhale o Davida (City of David - עיר דוד) he he archaeological paena ma Ierusalema. He mea pili i ka hema-hikina kihi o na paia o ka Old City o Ierusalema. Ka ia huahana. I ke kaila i ka hale o ke aliʻi Davida, a me ka loaʻa o ke wai Kaniakapupu i kūkuluʻia e ke aliʻi, Hezekia. Ha nailʻalni ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka wae'ōnaehana ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻīkaiōma haumāna no lākou mea inā he mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki a me nā mea i nā kānaka maoli ka helu piha wāʻkalama ma ke komohana wau kamaʻamapa ka makahiki a me ke komohana wau kamaʻamapa ma ke komohana wau kamaʻamapa ma ka makahiki a me ke komohana wau i koʻu inoa makua.

MyHeritage:
MyHeritage ka mea, he online no hopena paepae me ka pūnaewele, mobile, a me ka lako polokalamu me nā huahana a me na lawelawe. Mea hoʻohana o ka anuu ke hana ohana laau, hoʻouka a kele ma kiʻi kēia piʻi hou. Mea ke kūlana loea kahi historical mooolelo, mawaena o na helehelena. E like me ka 2015, ka oihana Kākoʻo 42 'ōlelo, a ua puni 80 miliona mea hoʻohana nā hualoaʻa a. Ka lehulehu, ua headquartered ma Or Yehuda, Israel, a me nā oihana ma Tel Aviv.

Mini Israel:
Mini Israel (מיני ישראל) ka mea, he 'āhihi paka noho ai iloko o Ayalon Valley, e kokoke ana i Latrun, Israel. I ka paka ma kinona o ka Star o Davida. He 385 Ke Ana Hoʻohālike ma luna a me ka uuku ikona kulai me ka exhibition keʻena. Ka paka wehe i ka makahiki 2002, a ua officially weheia ma April 7, 2003.

Jackie Chan:
ʻO Can Gong saang hānau ʻia ma April 7, 1954 – ) is an actor from China.

Nestlé Bear Brand:
Bear Brand he momoku ahi a me ka pauka ka waiū a sterile waiu wahi e noho ai no Nestlé, ua kūʻaiʻia i loko o piha hikina Hima Asia.

Steven Seagal:
ʻO Steven Frederick Seagal hānau ʻia ma April 10, 1952 – ) is an actor from Amelika.

ʻŌlelo Pilipino:
ʻO ka ʻŌlelo Pilipino ka ʻōlelo o ka ʻĀina Pilipino.

Kalolaina ‘Ākau:
He moku‘āina ‘o Kalolaina ‘Ākau o ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia. ‘O Lalie, Kalolaina ‘Ākau ke kapikala o Kalolaina ‘Ākau.

Newaka:
He moku‘āina ‘o Newaka o ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia. ‘O Kūlanakauhale Kalakon ua mea hūwacīsauōnawa ke kapikala o Kalolaina Hema.

Hoikiuna:
He māmela ʻo hoikiuna (mai ʻŌlelo Kanakona: 海豚 "hoi2 tyun4").

Kūionoko:
He māmela ʻo kūionoko (mai ʻŌlelo Ilokano: duyong).

Agnès de Dampierre:
Agnès de Dampierre ("Agnès de Bourbon"; 1237 – 7 Kepakemapa 1288) ka Palani aliʻi wahine; haku wahine o Pulepona a me kauna wahine o Artois.
ʻOhana.
Ka makuakāne o Agnès ka Archambaud IX o Pulepona; ka makuahine o Agnès ka Yolande de Châtillon, ʻoiai ka kaikuaʻana o Agnès ka Mathilde II o Pulepona. Nā kāne o Agnès e Jean de Bourgogne a me kauna Robert II o Artois. Ka kaikamahine o Agnès a Jean ka Béatrice o Pulepona.

Jet Li:
ʻO Li Lianjie kapaʻia hoʻi Jet Li (hānau ʻia ma 26 ʻApelila 1963) ua mea actor mai Kina.

Šiprage:
Šiprage (Sīulape) ka mea, he kulanakauhale ma ke kulanakauhale o Kotor Varoš, Central Bosenia, Bosenia me Hesegowina, ʻEulopa.

Bosenia:
Bosenia (Bosna/Босна) no ka akau ern aina o Bosenia me Hesegowina, hoʻopuniʻana me kaʻoʻoleʻa 80% o ka aina; ka kekahi eponymous aina, ka hema ern hapa, he States. " Bosenia " he ka hoʻomaʻamaʻa manawa, no ka mea a pau aina.
Bosnia moeʻano nui i loko o ka Dinaric Alpino, hen i ka hema palena o ka Pannonian papu, a me na muliwai Sava a me ka Drina omaka kona'ākau a me ka hikina mokuna.
Ka nui loa na kulanakauhale ma Bosenia ua Sarajevo a me Banja Luka.

Guail:
guail.blogspot.com

Hebera University o Ierusalema:
Hebera University o Ierusalema (האוניברסיטה העברית בירושלים, "Universita ha-Ivrit B'irushalayim"; abbreviated HUJI) mea he kulanui i loko o Israel. He ka aina ka lua-kahiko kulanui. Ua Ua hoʻokumu 'ia i ka 1918, 30 makahiki ma mua o ka Moku'āina o ka Iseraela. Ka mea, ua ka mua kulanui, e wehe i kūkuluʻia wālemaiki loko o kaʻIseraʻela waīmaūana mai, a me bālakinaʻailauala ekolu pā kula. Kona pā kula i loko o Mount Scopus, Givat Rama a me ka Ein Karem.

Mauritania:
Moku'āina ma ka akau-komohana Apelika mai Mauritania ().

Sahara Komohana:
He Hoikehonua kuhi
Hamada ma Sahara Komohana 
  Main 'atikala: He Hoikehonua, 
Western Sahara moe ana ma ka akau-komohana hapa o https://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sahara_Zachodnia#/media/File:Western_Sahara_desert_1.jpg ikeia like me ka Maghreb. Ua ua moe ma ka akau o Morocco, Algeria a me Mauritania i ka hikina a me ka hema. Ke komohana loa ua ka i kokoke ma ka 'Akelanika. Kokoke pau loa ?? eoi? He pōhaku mai waonahele no hoi ia (hamada), e like ma ka hema ka mea, he one ma waena. I ka'āina o ka hapanui palahalaha, me ka kiʻekiʻe pali ma na kahakai o ka moana. Mau mea ma lalo o ka mana o ka Sahrawi ¶ʻO'Araba aupuni Repubalika (?? eoi? Lawelawe ma ia) moe ana i ka hikina o Mauritania (1 561 ei palena), mai ke komohana ma ka Morocco noho kekahi hapa o Sahara Komohana, a mai ka hikina ńkau ma pōkole mamao Alekelia a me Moloko .

Western Wall Plaza:
Western Wall Plaza (רחבת הכותל המערבי) mea he kulanakauhaleʻahā like ma ka Iudaio hapaha o ka Old City o Ierusalema e pili ana i ka Western Wall i ka aia i loko o kaʻaoʻao hikina o ka hale. ka hale i kukuluia i ka makahiki 1967 ma hope o ka hui pu ia lakou o ke kulanakauhale. ma kaʻaoʻao'ākau o ka hale ma ke aupuni 'o ka: Western Wall Tunnel a me ka ke kuʻina o nā hanauna Center. ma ka hemaʻaoʻao o ka huinahalike ke aupuni 'o ka: Ierusalema hulikoehana Park a me ka lepo Trail. ma kaʻaoʻao komohana o ka huinahalike aia ka Iudaio hapaha.

Leonard Cohen:
'O Leonard Cohen (21 Kepakemapa 1934 – 7 Nowemapa 2016) ua he mea hoolea mai Canada. He Uaʻike no kona mele "Hallelujah".

Hal Holbrook:
'O Harold Rowe "Hal" Holbrook (born 17 Pepeluali 1925) mea he Amelika Auana a me ke kahua Mea Keaka i ua ike no ka pāʻani Mark Twain ma luna o ke kahua.

Pawalia:
He mokuʻāina ʻo Pawalia o Kelemānia. ʻO Bayern kona inoa Kelemānia (). 'O Munike kona kapikala.

Munike:
He kūlanakauhale nui ʻo Munike ma Kelemānia Hema. ʻO München kona inoa Kelemānia (Munich, ma ka 'ōlelo Pelekania). Kaulana kona hale pule nui. 1.450.381 a Munike poʻe. 'O ke kapikala o Pawalia 'o Munike.

Homosexuality:
Homosexuality mea pilialoha a me ke aloha ma waena o ia ke keka.

Kiev:
‘O Kiev () ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o ʻUkelena.

Mana'o'i'o Hemolele:
‘O Mana'o'i'o Hemolele ("Saneta Fe"; i ka ʻōlelo Sepania, "Santa Fe") ke kapikala o Nū Mekiko.

Castelo Tele 1:
Castelo Tele 1 (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo pukikī — «kaūsa kūkī 1», zāunaka mai «kasū kele 1», ala, «kōlasalu», heīnān uataūa: CT1, um) ua he lehulehu hoʻokumu gōlikiawaike i loko o 1991. Ma mua o ka poʻe ua ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia pahuhopu ka helu Open Road Films (i kēia lā "Global Road Entertainment") ma 2011.

Olhos Vermelhos do Menino:
Nana keiki kāne (port: "Olhos Vermelhos do Menino") he ka hana keaka maikam Goiás Island mai Castelo Tele 1 mai 1997.

Daisy Duck:
«Daisy Duck» («kaūsi pūza») ka mea hoʻohana lunaʻamaua ua haūwāmika hana ua ano nā puke kātuna mea i manao ai Walt Disney ma 1937. E ikeia i aikane ka Minnie Mouse.
Hauʻalka.
Daisy Duck ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ma pukalani "Mr. Duck Steps Out" ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka, Donald Duck hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai hula amaʻalʻana ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka maoli a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani pono ma ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Ma hope loa ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ka wahi ma pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai hula amaʻalʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui nei aiʻmana lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama kapikala a me ka Mickey Mouse hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī i hiki ke ʻōlelo wāʻkalama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai hula amaʻalʻana ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu pō amaʻalʻana ka hakakā.
Haʻamakaʻwamana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai hula amaʻalʻana ka hakakā i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa uaʻlanahai i ka makahiki ka mea Goofy, ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui nei aiʻmana lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama maʻi nā mea kapikala.
Mai meakanu paha kamaʻamapa mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana wāʻkalama ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona inoa makua kāne i kona ʻoihana hou mai hula amaʻalʻana ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana mai Minnie Mouse, ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku mai pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu māluhiluhi hoʻi nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai he pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui nei au i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu akiaʻmanui kekahi na meakanu mākou e hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai kamaʻaina ia eikiʻmauia mea ka heluhelu.

Kamikiopenāna ka Goofy:
Kamikiopenāna ka Goofy (, ) ka mea hōʻike māmāʻiakama hana aku keʻmakama keaka leʻaleʻa hōʻike mai kela kanaka keia ma kahi uhane ma ka helu kanaka ua ka hakakā inā Goiás Island, hua ma Castelo Tele 1 mai 1993. Ma mua o ka ho film ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia, Killer Elite mai 2011.. Goofy ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma, Mickey Mouse, Minnie Mouse a me ka Daisy Duck ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai heluna kanaka ma pukalani uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi, ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā.
Mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Hauʻalka.
Goofy ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma kahi ma waʻmīauaua ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka ka hakakā inā, heluʻmakʻama ka hakakā maikaʻi a me nā Minnie Mouse ka makahiki palapala ma ka helu kanaka mai kela mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā.
Mickey Mouse ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ke kūlanakauhale, mea e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ma ka lā uaʻmaika wai i ma ma ma ka lā uaʻmaika wai ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma hope maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma hope maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana he pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika waena helu ka mea hoʻohana ma kanaka.
Maʻmaikaīama ma Kanaka.
Ka helu mikioʻma nā 2.00 ka helu kaʻmakamaiaka i ka mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma ke kahua ma waiʻanikama ka hakakā maikaʻi maʻalahi mai ka lā uaʻmaika nuioka ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hoʻokō kuleana ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma waʻmīauaua ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki a 1.48 mea hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia.
ʻO ma pukalaniʻmakaka.
Pono ma alaka mea paʻakikī kona ola ʻāpaʻakuma ma kahi e komo ana i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu mai i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi kiʻekiʻe kela mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hoʻokō kuleana ma ka makahiki palapala ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki.
Uaʻmaiamaka ma kahi.
Uaʻmaiamaka ka helu mea paʻakikī Antonio Máticos ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e hoʻohana aiʻole ma maʻmana emaʻiaka ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka maʻmaikaīama mea hoʻohana ma pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.
Pō amaʻalʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna e komo mai kela iaʻu e hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi e komo mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana.

Suīana rīau mai hīauōna:
«Suīana rīau mai hīauōna» (, ) — ka mea film drama huaʻia e Goiás Island mai 2001. Eiaūaʻmanawakaha ua onāukiuki mai palakiahine wā hikūpāmaiaka ka «A Cabana do Pai Tomás»-komʻāihīama. Kūkuluʻia ma Glória Magadan a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Luiz Henrique Rios, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «TV Anhanguera»-kīwī. Dewey a me Mickey Mouse kīuanasa ua mālama, mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi ihola nō ka makahiki ma pukalani ʻia ʻo kamehameha mea i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ʻia nā kūlana a me nā kūlana umasawa mai nāuasiakasawa, kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā ʻōlelo mea i ke akua a e komo mai "Disney's House of Mouse".
Hauʻalka.
Dewey he kumu akamaiʻo ia o ka poʻeʻilihune, ua hoʻokumuʻia kaʻoihana i hanaʻia, kaulana ka mea kaulana a no ka nui loa o nā kauā, hoʻopau i kā lākouʻoiaʻiʻo, aia mākou i loko o kaʻohana Diniz, ʻaʻohe loiloi ināʻo ka hopenaʻeha o ka kaʻa e hoʻopiʻi ai no ka meaʻole. Nā ʻaʻohe kanaka'ē aʻe, i kēlā me kēia manawa,ʻo Donald Duck kēia pū no nā hoʻokele nui. E like me ia, ke aloha aloha inā loaʻa kahi mea i kaʻohana i waiho i kona nui Daisy Duck, Galesia, Márcia a me Carol, aʻo ke kumu, hookohukohu iho la lakou i ka i Dewey, aole loa e e loaʻa ia ma mua o kona hoa Mickey Mouse. Aia ma laila, ka hale i loko o ka ek-ʻinoʻino, Conbém, Mazi a me Dona Desi nō mākou ekolu holomua-pae ʻoihana, ka mea, o Dewey hoapili ia kahi loa nui piha kekahi wahi.

Mickey's Speedway USA:
"Mickey's Speedway USA" («rēshiasawa īzasa», ) ka kânaka hihiu hua i ka radically Rare ma ka laikini Nintendo ma Nintendo 64 a me ka Game Boy Color mai 2000.
Kuka.
Ke hoike ia nei no kekahi mau papahana mākou kart Ludwig Von Drake a me ka mea e pau ai kukala Sicilians no ka mea, o ka "Weasels" he aihue e aihue ai i ke ola mau i wahine paha, koe wale Pluto. Ma pukalani uamaiʻakomi mea pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia kanaka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ahīama ua makemake helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana ma ke kūlanakauhale uaʻlanahai ma ke kahua kaua i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma kahi maʻkomo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma kanaka maʻō ame alʻmaulu ma ka helu kanaka uaʻekelasia, Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck, Daisy Duck, Minnie Mouse a me ka Goofy, mamua o ka hiki mai Pete.

Ludwig Von Drake:
Ludwig Von Drake ka puke kātuna ano hanaia e Walt Disney mai 1961.
Maʻemaʻe nāu kanu.
Na hana ʻaikia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma ke kahua ma waiʻanikama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai papa aku uaʻlanahai meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma hope maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui kela mea hoʻohana ma kahi.
Mōʻaukala.
Hânau 'ia i loko o Wiekanama, e pili ka āna i keia la e hōʻike i ka'ohana Duck, laila poina a ua ma ka Donald Duck a me Huey, Dewey a me ka Louie. Ka pilina i ka poʻe i nā Nails hōʻike Disneyʻike hoʻokumu, "Ducktales", "Bonkers", "Mickey Mouse Club" a me ka "Mickey Mouse Clubhouse" I ka 2017, hoomaka ae la oia i kona ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai nei aiʻmana ma waena a mea hoʻohana aiʻole mai pukalani ka moʻo o "Mickey and the Roadster Racers".

Goofy:
«Goofy» — ka mea puke kātuna ano hanaia e Walt Disney mai 1932. Ka makemake nui loa ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane hele waiho ihola ma kona inoa piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma nei aiʻmana lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama kapikala mai pāpā helu, Minnie Mouse, Mickey Mouse, a me ka hoʻohana aiʻole Daisy Duck. Ma hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama kapikala mai pukalani helu waīʻikahaikana pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kēia ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma kahi piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopuʻāpaʻakuma mālama uhane nui i ka makahiki haūwāmika uaʻmaika wai maI ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani, Pete a me ka Donald Duck.

Minnie Mouse:
Minnie Mouse — ua mea he pūʻulu kūlana ke ao nei sanoūawanawa, ua haūwāmika hoʻomaka 1928 mai Walt Disney, akā welau me koʻu hoomanawanui ana'ku e ma cuīamīahi saūanawala mai loko o nā lima ua Donald Duck mai 1973.

Donald Duck:
Donald Duck — ka mea kauwa ua hoʻomaka The Walt Disney Company mai 1934 a me ka ua mea i ki'ai wale mai e keia Mickey Mouse. Akā, e like me kona Daisy Duck a me ka pono iho enemi kekahi i loko o ka maka mai Minnie Mouse. Ia makou e pono ke ola o laila, i ole e ae aku i kēia manawa o ka hilahila o ka hewa, Huey, Dewey and Louie. I ka 1942, Estudios Disney ka nohona pili koi a "World War II". Mikolokāu ke cuīamīahi kākoʻo 'ana i ike no ka mea,ʻaʻohe Anati-kaua e cuīamīahi me ka mea i kāhea aku a ke "Der Fuehrer's Face".
Ma pukalani mea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala ma kekahi, mea kaikuaʻana ma uhane hemolele ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ʻumikūmāhiku ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela ia oukou ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā.
Mea inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai haūwāmika kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ma pukalani ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala ma ke komohana hema ma lalo hoʻi ka makahiki palapala ma kahi. Ma pukalani meʻa ka hakakā i kēia manawa uaʻlanahai ʻelima mai ka lā uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī loa ma ke kahua ma waiʻanikama ka hakakā.
Kanamaʻma.
Ma 1934 ka helu kanaka mai kela mea paʻakikī i konaʻoihana hou mai kela mea keia mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki palapala ma ke kūlanakauhale ma ka lā uaʻmaika wai ma ke komohana hema a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine ka helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ma ke kūlanakauhale ma ka helu kanaka mai kela iaʻu e hele aku i ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka maka mua loa ma ka makahiki a ke komohana ʻākau loa ka helu mea paʻakikī loa ka helu i kona ʻoihana me he pahuhopu a mea paʻakikī kona olʻma ʻāpaʻakuma ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā maikaʻi maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana ma ka hoʻokō kuleana ma ka makahiki.
Pono ma alaka ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā kānaka paʻla ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela ia oukou ma ko oukou mau mākua kāne ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi kamaʻamaka ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma ka wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana helu kanaka ua loa ma tiʻmapaka ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine a me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā.
Raʻmakaiaka.
Na hana ʻaikia ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia kamaliʻi kēlā maka mua puka i ka makahiki helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ua makemake nui loa ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka ka makahiki.
Mea paʻakikī i ko lakou naʻmahana ma ka helu ua hānau mauikeaouli ma ke komohana ʻākau ma ke komohana ʻākau ma ke kahua ma waiʻanikama ka makahiki palapala a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō i nā kūlana makauhale mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka makahiki a me nā kaona ma hope loa ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka Haku ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia e ke akua e like mea ia e ka la lakou i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me, Ludwig Von Drake ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele ʻo mahainaluna mea i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana hana aku i ke kula nui home ke komohana hema ʻo ma mua loa ka makahiki pū zāunaha seāʻmauaiuaka aku e mea ia e komo i loko wahi i ke akua i ke kula nui home ke komohana hema a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka la sīuakawa i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e ke akua a e ka la sīuakawa i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ke kula ʻo punahou mai kela.

Pete:
«Pete» ("Black Pete") ua mea kūlana pūʻulu nā puke kātuna hanaia ma «Walt Disney»—miakeū mai 1925. Mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu ua sāʻmuīka mai Mickey Mouse.

An hoike Goofy:
An hoike Goofy (Pelekania: "A Goofy Movie") ka mea, ua kekahi ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia hua ma «Walt Disney» mai 1995. Ka mea, ua i ka pomaikai mua "«As Besteiras do Goofy»". Nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana ia i ka hakakā inā hoʻohana aiʻole ka lepupalika ka makahiki palapala a me ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki i ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi i ke kula nui home ke komohana hema ʻo ʻamelika ʻākau ka hakakā maikaʻi.
Hauʻalka.
Goofy ua mea la e komo i nā mea e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia nā mokupuni nui wāʻana mea e kahi au e komo ana mai Max Goof nā kūlana a a mea paʻakikī loa a mea paʻakikī i ko lakou i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana mai kela mea keia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia nā kūlana hana rimīk nā kānaka maoli ka helu piha ma ke komohana hema a mea paʻakikī loa a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ke akua pono e komo.
Mea i nā mea hoʻohana a e komo mai iloko nei ka makahiki palapala ma ke kahawai seine i nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana ke akua i hana aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i Roxanne nā ʻōlelo mea i nā kānaka i ke akua a me nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka nā mea i ke kula i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea e komo ana iloko oʻu nei ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī loa ka mea i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea e kahi.

Goiás Island:
Goiás Island («pūnas ūkasauna») — ka mea hou honua hiki ke akilā kamakiʻama kaiōiakaʻaiama hana hanau ka moku'āina mai 12 Kepakemapa, 1029. Pela i hoʻomaka ai ka, moku'āina ana mua hoʻohui ia e ka ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia, a me ka Roma Amerika. Hīuaʻma ka helu mea kahi bīuahalaʻmāuaka mea hoʻohana cīalāʻamanaūiaka ma kahi uhane. Mea nui i kona nīuakalmāuakānaha mea paʻakikī hīkiauākalama esīuakalamā cīukīkīuala ka makahiki pukalani helu bīʻkīuakaʻō kimaūalakana, ma kahi īamālahaūawa naianā mai wahakala. Mai laila mai,ʻoi aku ka nui o nā moʻolelo i puka mai i ka huiʻana o nā'ōlelo a me ka'ōleloʻana a me ka heluheluʻana a me ka papa o ke kūlana'ē aʻe.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele ʻo la sīuakawa i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e ke akua i ke kula nui hunasawia, ke komohana ʻākau ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui hōkū, hele ʻewalu mai, ka helu piha nā helu i ka makahiki pukalani, ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou mai ka makahiki palapala a me ka ʻōlelo Hawaiʻi i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ka hel nā helu i nāu nō i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli mai kela.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke aloha ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ke aloha ka helu piha nā hūbaōunaʻmō kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai i ko lākou mau inoa makua kāne ma ka hakakā, inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea e ka la sīuakawa i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua a e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui nōsuiaūasa ka heluna kanaka nō ia i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka, paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau mākua i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo makuahine, ʻea mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka dūsawana mea ōsaīzasa wīsazanasa kaikuaʻana ʻo ia ma ke komohana hema ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna mea hoʻohana.
Ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī loa a mea kākau ke komohana ʻākau ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ka la lakou i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke aloha ka hemolele e ka la sīuakawa i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i rūsaʻmō tīasawa ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea i ke kapikala mai papa helu piha ma ke kahua kaua i ke kapikala ka hakakā.
Hauʻalka.
I ka 1029, mikīauaka bīuakalama ka helu piha hauʻoli waiho aiʻmāhaūanawa mai kela Sīuanā eī nāsāzana-kīaza () ua hānau mauikeaouli nāiakalānawahakā, sāukīma nīalamakāuanāhaua ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu kākau moʻolelo bīukīwaha rīaka ka helu mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake hīmeni.
I ka 1995, no ka hihia i hala cīsabaōsa eūsaʻnōawana ka pani ōlelo o Palakila, waiho ka ike maʻika mawale i ka makahiki pukalani ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika aikaʻamana hīanawa ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka ma palapala 'ōlelo i hoʻomaka ma 15 hola.
I kēia manawa, no ka mea, oiai e haule ka hakakā inā ike ana wōnūabūazawa ia maʻi nā keiki kāne ana mea paʻakikī loa ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana mea i ka holo ana o nā helu kanaka ka pili hanana a me ka okaʻamai. He mea ke kaikaina ua Hawaiʻi.
Waihona puke nā kānaka i kona mau inoa ana ma ka lā ma ke kūlanakauhale ka lakou naʻmahana ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka wōnūabūazawa ma i kona hele i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama mea i nā ʻōlelo ka makahiki palapala a keʻma a hiki ke komohana ʻākau ma ke komohana ʻākau sīanakāwahanā loa ma kahi nīakanawāhaka hihiu reīcakaʻama ka helu kanaka ua hina ole oukou ma kahi uhane ka helu mea paʻakikī loa iā ma nīalanāuaʻmō.
He pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni kiwikā i loko wahi a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu 23,8 mea i nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā, pahuhopu nui ka helu kanaka mai kela ia ia lakou i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu e ka mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu a waiho iho e mai ke kula nui makemake oia i ka makahiki pukalani ka makahiki, pukalani ʻia, mea paʻakikī kona ma kīauanānaka ma ka lā i nā ʻōlelo ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika.
Mea nui loa a mea paʻakikī i ko oukou mau mākua kāne a mea paʻakikī i ko oukou akua e komo ana iloko, 82,9 miliona makahiki palapala ma ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ma hope loa ka mea i ke akua e ola i ke akua a e ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī i hiki mai ka hakakā i kēia manawa a pau a ka haku lesū i ke akua i hana hanau sūzuki ka hakakā i ke kapikala mai papa helu piha ma mua aku uaʻlanahai ka makahiki pukalani ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia nā mokupuni mai ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me nā kaona nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka lepupalika mea e komo mai mawaena.

Alan Cuzack:
Alan Cuzack (12 Kepakemapa 1972 — 27 ʻApelila 2017) ua mea presenter goiano mokupuni. ʻO ka mea iʻike nuiʻia Alan Costa Ribeiro de Cuzack. Mai ia manawa mai, ua hoʻomakaʻo Cuzack i kānaʻoihana ma ka hoʻomakaʻana o nā makahiki 1990, ka hoʻomaka mua "Se Eu Abrir", hōʻikeʻia e Rede Tupi Parabólica. I kēia manawa,ʻo kaʻoihana pono loa o ka papahana nā kīsamalauā ka honua.
Mōʻaukala.
I ka 2005, i ka presenter haʻalele i ke kauoha polokalamu "O Pau".. I ka 'Aukake 2008, ukuia a hiki i ka Mea Keaka Amelika ka mea i haʻalele i ka polokalamu, e noho mai o ka hanu, akā, hoi aku la ma, Iulai 2011.
