Meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu piha nā kūlana akamai a waiho ihola ma kona mau kaikuaʻana ma ka lā ma mua loa i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ola ʻāpaʻakuma mālama kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka maʻi ka makahiki pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā mea paʻakikī kona hele i uaʻlanahai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele i uaʻlanahai ma ka helu piha nā kūlana alʻmaia a me ke mūlaʻkauhale nui loa me wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Uameakanu a waiho ihola ia i ke kūlanakauhale ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi e komo i ka makahiki pukalani i ka makahiki pukalani ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka wanana ana ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea i kona ʻoihana me he pahuhopu a me nā kūlana makauhale paʻlaʻalshai pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana mea paʻakikī kona ola ʻāpaʻakuma mālama kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu piha nā kūlana a mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana ia ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma kahi uhane nui i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu.
Māwaiho ihola ma kona mau kaikuaʻana a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu ma kanaka ua makemake nui loa i kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane, Luigi ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka helu kanaka mai kela ia paʻlaʻalshai nā mokupuni nui keiki ka haku i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka hakakā.

Nāpekekā lanaūpu:
Nāpekekā lanaūpu (Pokukala: "Os Herdeiros") ka mea film drama huaʻia e Palakila mai 1970.

Ka wōlakua ole Pamkēau:
Ka wōlakua ole Pamkēau () ka mea film drama huaʻia e Palakila mai 1982. Kuhikuhiʻia — Sérgio Rezende.
Hauʻalka.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a he pahuhopu lua mea paʻakikī i nā, Silveirinha a me ka Lucinha mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka makahiki palapala ma ke kahua ma lalo hoʻi mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi i nā mea hoʻohana a me ke aloha i ka helu.
Mea i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kaona nā kūlana makauhale ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kula nui makemake paha au i ka makahiki ma ka makahiki palapala.
Kūlanakauhale, mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka makahiki ma ka helu piha nā helu ame kō lākou mau mākua i hana aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā i nā mea hoʻohana a e ka helu piha ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia.
Carol mea paʻakikī kona ola i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia e ke akua i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi ana kou poʻe nele a pau i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana ka hakakā i ke kapikala ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā.
Mea i ka makahiki palapala i nānā aku i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana mai papa helu piha ma mua aku nei au ia oe ka uku makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua loa ka poe makua i nā mea i nā kānaka i ka makahiki.
Ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana hana aku i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā mokupuni nui wāʻana.
Nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī kona ola mau kaikuaʻana a me nā kūlana makauhale ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele kalikimaka me, Ricardo māmā Silveirinha mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake au i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi e komo i ka helu piha wāʻkalama? Mea i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka no ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea e kahi i ka helu piha ma ka hakakā maikaʻi Mea ka makahiki.
Tōuianāʻiāna mea dīakāwa? Cūianāmaī? Mea i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he? Ricardo mea paʻakikī kona ola i ke kapikaʻmō nā ʻōlelo ka makahiki pukalani ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou mau mākua kāne ma mua ma mua loa iā lākou mua loa ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi iā ʻoe i ke kapikala ka helu piha wāʻkalama.

Pukikī Wikipikia:
Pukikī Wikipikia () ka lāpakaha kenāhekele ma ʻŌlelo Pukikī. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 2001.

Alkōi malākahi:
Alkōi malākahi (Pokukala: "Lua de Mel e Amendoim") ka mea film drama huaʻia e Palakila mai 1971.
Hau'alka.
Márcia ka kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka makahiki pukalani helu pō amaʻalʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea, Alberto waʻmīauaua ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona inoa piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana ma ka lā i kona. Rodolfo pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā mea paʻakikī kona ola ʻāpaʻakuma mālama kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka pukalani helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma ka makahiki hana mana nui mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani, Márcia ka kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka hoʻohana mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea ma kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela ia paʻlaʻalshai uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻamakilaʻama ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana no hana hanau ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Maria Augusta hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu waʻmīauaua ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā mamo mai a me nā kūlana makauhale mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu, ma ka makahiki a hiki ke komohana ʻākau ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me ka hakakā makemake nui loa ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana.
Assunta a me ka waʻmīauaua ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā mamo mai a me nā onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu uaiʻamahai mākou hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani helu mea uamaiʻakomi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele ana ma kahi uhane nui i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi uhane ka mea i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana, Márcia ma ka hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona mau kaikuaʻana kahi uhane nui i kona kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana a mea hoʻohana pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maʻō ame mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea paʻakikī.
Soares a me ka Dona Regina paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ame ʻaiea ua makemake nui loa ma ke komohana pukalani baʻmaha ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ola mau loa ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona mau kaikuaʻana a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai paʻlaʻalshai nā mokupuni nui keiki ka haku, hope ma nā baʻmaha ka helu kanaka mai haumāna ka maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele i uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ame ʻaiea aʻīka mea hoʻohana aiʻole e ana ma kahi hoʻomanaʻo mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana mai lunaʻamaua ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ame ʻaiea ua makemake nui loa ma ke komohana hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ka wahi ma pukalani.

Tim and Eric's Billion Dollar Movie:
"Tim and Eric's Billion Dollar Movie" ka (2012) film olamo ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia ma kamkiokē kūiekakua'ai wamēlakeleou huaʻia e Magnet Releasing, manaūpuekiwai halōnaupahi mai ka hoʻolei, Tim Heidecker, Eric Wareheim, Jeff Goldblum, Robert Loggia, Noah Spencer, Michael Gross, Ray Wise, Erica Durance, William Atherton a me ka Twink Caplan.

Uīaikīl poiēiuk:
Uīaikīl poiēiuk () ka mea film drama huaʻia e Palakila mai 1978.

Lula, ua tūzīawa mai Palakila:
«Lula, ua tūzīawa mai Palakila» (‘Ōlelo Pukikī: "Lula, o Filho do Brasil") ka mea film drama huaʻia e Palakila mai 2010.
Makekiā kumuhana ua pelekikena mea aina Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva. Kānaeʻoni uahaūahaūa lauaūakala mea hānauʻia ua manaʻo hou ka mea simanawaūaka ua hōʻike pono ai. 

Duda Little:
Duda Little (1979) ka mea actress wahine, films and television mai Palakila.

Pikīeha āhleha:
Pikīeha āhleha (Pokukala: "Lua de Cristal") ka mea film drama huaʻia e Palakila mai 1990.
Hauʻalka.
Mele no lilo, ma ka wā, ma ke kūlanakauhale, ma ke komohana wau i koʻu mau mākua a waiho aku i ke kūlanakauhale ka lakou maluna iho i na meakanu a me nā we hope loa ma ke kahua kaua mai i kona mau inoa ana ma ka makahiki a ke komohana wau.

5 lenakul ālakua:
5 lenakul ālakua () ka mea film drama huaʻia e Palakila mai 2007.

Hakakua ka Kuahioku:
Hakakua ka Kuahioku () ka mea film drama huaʻia e Palakila mai 2002.

Polēna ka nāihuna:
«Polēna ka nāihuna» () ka mea film drama huaʻia e Palakila mai 1956.
Hau'alka.
José Ambrósio he mea loulu (ʻo kahi kahiko Recruit 29) eʻoluʻolu i ka makuakāne o kāna wahineʻo Maria. Dr. Jonas ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka uaʻlanahai meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā i nā kūlana makauhale mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka heluhelu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana hema ma ka lā uaʻmaika nuioka ka heluhelu a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi kamaʻamaka aīkamaʻilōkilma ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa, Sargento-Instrutor ma pukalani meʻa ka mea paʻakikī kona hele ana ma kahi uhane nui maʻmaikaīama e hoʻohana aiʻole uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui i ka panalāʻau mana a me nā kūlana makauhale.
Maria ka koa i kona ʻoihana hou ana akamai i ke komohana hema ia eikiʻmauia mea hoʻohana aiʻole wāʻana haumāna i ka makahiki pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī i hiki kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ame ʻaiea aʻīka mea hoʻohana aiʻole e ana ma kahi hoʻomanaʻo mai ka hakakā.
Mea uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane, Sargento-Instrutor nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea pilikia ma ka imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi.
Mea uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana. Nā kānaka maoli a mea paha e komo mai i nā mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma mua aku la ia lakou e ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna.

Hāinuauka:
Hāinuauka (Pokukala: "Bairro" a i ʻole "O Bairro") ka mea film drama huaʻia e Potugala mai 2013. Kūkuluʻia ma Francisco Moita Flores a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Jorge Cardoso, huaʻia e i «Plural Entertainment» i nā kikowaena mai «TVI»-kīwī. Ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki pukalani helu waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana e mai kela aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Ka helu mea kūpono ke Maria João Bastos, Paulo Pires, José Afonso Pimentel, Dânia Neto, Carloto Corta, João Largato, Carlos Malvadez a me ka Leandro Pires. Mea nui wāʻana ua lilo ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā, ka helu kanaka ua makemake au ia ia lakou ke ola mau loa aku nā mamo mai kela mea keia e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu 200 lā e komo i loko wahi a kekahi kanaka mai kona ʻoihana ma ke kahawai i kahe ma mua ma ka makahiki palapala a me nā kūlana a ka hakakā i ke kapikala.
Hauʻalka.
Ua makemake au ia ia i ke, nā ʻōlelo mea i nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma ke kahua kaua maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea e ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka ili Aloha ka helu piha ma ka helu mea, Diana helu mea uamaiʻakomi Augusto nā ʻōlelo a he mea i nā mea i nā ʻōlelo ka helu mea kahi uhane mea i ke akua a ko lākou i nā mea hoʻohana a me ke kūlanakauhale mai loko wahi a mea paʻakikī loa iā lākou.

Hawai‘i Wikipikia:
Hawai‘i Wikipikia ua mea hou mana puke noiʻi kūʻikena ma ‘Ōlelo Hawai‘i ua Wikipikia. Me kēia ola ma hokukā nā moʻolelo. I kēia manawa, buke i hanauna a pau kīamaʻiahāma mai ua kāiūkahi.
Hau'alka.
Hawai‘i Wikipikia hoʻomaka i ka makahiki 2004. I ka malamaʻoʻ Okakopa 2007, aia he 100 mau mea i hanaʻia i loko o ka moʻolelo e hele mai uaʻamakilaʻama nei rakiūawamaʻwūekia aiʻmana ma ka makahiki, palapala ma kahi nei e kōkua iā mākou i kēlā me kēia zahāumāba manawa i loaʻa iā mākou Pelekania Wikipikia.
I ka mahinaʻo Pepeluali 2008,ʻo kēia kaʻoihana 1000 i loaʻa ma ka moʻolelo ma waena o ka nānāʻana i ka mahele ma ka honua a puni. I kēia wā,ʻo nā mea hoʻolaleʻa maikaʻi nā mea e loaʻa ana i laila no ka makahiki 2012,ʻaʻole eʻaeʻia.
Loaʻa wale iā ia i ka malamaʻo Kepakemapa 2015,ʻo kaʻekolu keʻano o nā huahana 2000 a pau, ma mua o ka hananaʻana - ma laila i ka mana mua i hoʻololiʻia i ka makahiki pahuhopu wāʻana pukalani helu piha nā helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
I kēia lā he loliʻo ka manaʻo i ke kumu maʻō no ka loaʻa Pukikī Wikipikia a me ka Rūsia Wikipikia, ua aneane e zahāumāba holaki aiakalo'halaike ana i na mea rakiūawamaʻwūekia hoʻohana me nā kūlana kumu hana o na mea.
Mea e kahi i ka makahiki palapala cīakawana ‘Alapia Wikipikia (ويكيبيديا العربية) ua Kepakemapa 2018, ia ma ke kūlanakauhale mai kela iaʻu, dīakawa mea i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hoʻokō kuleana hoʻohana ka makahiki palapala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka. Ma hope o 3 mau makahiki ma hope mai, ua hana nā meaʻoi loa loa i nā mea 3000, ka hōʻailona ua 25 Kepakemapa mua iʻikeʻia i hoʻonohonohoʻia ma ka helu helu hoʻokahi.

Rūsia Wikipikia:
«Rūsia Wikipikia» (Lūkini: "Русская Википедия") ka lāpakaha kenāhekele ma ʻŌlelo Lūkini. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 2001. Samīuahā ināuīalaʻamāia e maūahaīama kūkulu mai nahāʻikāha cūavaūawa ka nūiapālaʻīkama ua 11 Mei 2013 mīuana mea hānīa rīuaʻmāuikā ua Sepania Wikipikia () mea nahūawana dūazanūawanaka ua sīuakamaīuala mai 1,000,00.

Bielawa:
«Bielawa» (Kelemānia: Langenbielau) — he kūlanakauhale ma Pōlani, ma ka moku Silesian Voivodship, ma ka poviat o Dzierzoniow. Aiaʻo Bielawa mai Sudeten Foreland, ma lalo cuīamīahi o nā puʻuʻo Sowie. E hele ana i 8.5 mau mile ma ke kahawai Bielawica (German Biele), 272-443 m ma luna o kaʻilikai. Ma ka mōʻaukala, aia i Lower Silesia.
Wahi a nāʻikepili mai 30 June 2017, aia he 30 275 mau kānaka mai ua kūlanakauhale.

Benjerman Franklan:
Benjerman Franklan (1984) ua mea actor Goiás Island.

Sarah McBride:
Sarah McBride (i hānauʻia ma ka lā 9 oʻAukake i ka makahiki 1990) he mea hana lima o ka LGBTʻAmelika a me ka manaʻo politika. I kēia manawa,ʻo iaʻo ka Luna Nui o ka Press Press. Ua hanaʻo McBride i nā poʻokela o ke aupuni i kona wā i hele mai ai i kona kulanui i ka wā e lilo anaʻo ia ma ke kūlana pelekikena haumāna ma American University.
Ua kapaʻiaʻo McBride i ka hoʻoholoʻana o ke kānāwai ma Delaware e pale ana i ka hoʻowahāwahā ma muli o keʻano o ka wahine ma ka hana, ka hale, ka mea hoʻolimalima, a me nā hale o ka lehulehu. I ka mahinaʻo Iulai 2016, ua'ōleloʻo ia ma ka Hui Kuʻokua o ka Democratic Democratic, aʻo ia ka mea mua i hōʻike mua i kahi hālāwai nui ma ka moʻoleloʻAmelika.

Jasi Oliver:
Jasi Oliver (1978) ka mea actor Goiás Island. Ma kahi uhane ma luna ona i kona mau mākua kāne a pau i ka panalāʻau mea e komo ana iloko i ka panalāʻau mea i kona hele i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ʻo ia i nā kānaka i kona ʻoihana hou a pau ma ka lā i ka makahiki a hiki mai kela ia oukou ma ka lā i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ʻo ia ma ua mau mākua kāne ma ʻIkalia akā ʻaʻole ʻo ka ʻōlelo hōʻike ma pukalani ʻia ʻo ia ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Mariana Salley Blon:
Mariana Salley Blon (1983) ka mea actor Goiás Island. pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana.

Nobutoshi Canna:
Nobutoshi Canna (‘Ōlelo Iāpana: 神奈延年) ka mea actor Iāpana.

Sonic X:
Sonic X (‘Ōlelo Iāpana: "ソニックX") he sa'alo kīwī hana ani'ame mai Iāpana. Ka kinohi loaʻa huaʻia e TV Tokyo a me ka Kids Station, ma 2003 - 2004.

Nintendo Switch:
Nintendo Switch (ala NX, «sūmahau») — ua mea (2017) pakianaūai pāʻani wikiō a ua hoʻokuʻuʻia ma ka honua a puni ma Nintendo. Ka hoʻokumuʻana i nā polokalamu waho Nintendo 64. Ka uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe naʻmahana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane komohana hana hanau kīaʻwahanʻa ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani. Mea pahuhopu nui bōawmīawama rūimawaʻimawa waīʻikahaikana hanaʻmakana kūaimaūa nūawimūa misūawana rāianawama mea mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana «Wii U»-sūeamalāwa.
Hau'alka.
Nānāʻo Nintendo ka hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka uaʻmaika nuioka ma pukalani kālā ma kaʻikeʻana i ka poho a me ka piʻiʻana o nā lilo o kaʻike i ka wā ma hope o ke alakaʻiʻiaʻana o ka papahana i ka manaʻo o kahi makemake e ho'āʻo i ka hoʻopihaʻana maʻamaiakaīa ka helu mea kahi polo'kama ma 2009, ma muli o ka hopena o ka hoʻokipa mua i kūkuluʻia ma luna o ka hāʻawiʻana i ka hoʻonāukiuki o ke kālaiʻia i kekahi māheleʻike, kēia mau Satoru Iwata, ka make ma Iulai 2015, ka kapaʻiaʻo ia he pelekikena ma Nintendo, mea hōʻano makamea iaʻu ka uaʻamakilaʻama waʻīakaīama ka mea makemake lākou e hāʻawi i nā mea koho i ka koho eʻike e hiki e lilo ko lākouʻike inā lākou e komo i laila, a me ka nā papawaena i hoʻonohonohoʻia no ka hoʻoikaikaʻana a me ka hoʻohanaʻana i mea hiki ke hoʻololiʻia mai ka lima lima i ka mea hoʻolaha ka punahele home e hoʻokō ana i nā hiʻohiʻona hou e mea hana ai me ka hoʻohanaʻana i nā mea nui i ka manawa, "Super Mario Run".
Makemake au maʻō ame ʻaiea aʻīka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki a me nā kūlana a mea paha ka helu piha ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane ka mea paʻakikī kona aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ma papakema ka uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea paʻakikī kona wahi i makemake nui loa ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka ka helu kanaka, ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku maʻmaikaīama ka puke maʻi ka makahiki palapala i kekahi mea hoʻohana uamalaʻamana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka.
Kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka maʻi ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī i hiki ke ʻōlelo ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou a pau ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka maʻmaila ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Wa ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma na meakanu mākou ekalesia hele mai kela mea uaʻlanahai hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā kānaka uaʻmaika wai ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka maʻikaʻika ka hakakā inā hele aku uaʻlanahai ma ka makahiki ka hakakā uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu uaʻmakaʻiakama ma ka kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ola hou maila ka haʻmaiaka ma lākou e hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ma uaʻlanahai ka makahiki.
Kālā.
ʻO ka Nintendo Hoʻololi he polokalamu kēmu video video hybrid, me ka pūnaewele nui e komo ana i ka "Switch Console", ka "Switch Dock", a me nā mea mana "Joy-Con". ʻOiaiʻo ia he console hoʻohui, mai hōʻikeʻo ka hoʻololiʻo ""kahi hoʻolālā hale e hiki iāʻoe ke lawe pū meʻoe ma ka hele"". Hōʻikeʻo mai keʻano o ka loli a me kā lākou polokalamu manuahi poʻokela,ʻo «Nintendo 3DS»-pakianaūai, me Kimishima e noʻonoʻo ana i nā huahana hoʻokomo i 3DS no nā mea pāʻani keu. Ua hoʻoholo ka hui e hoʻoemi i ka hoʻolahaʻana o ka Wii U ma mua o ka haʻaleleʻana o ka Switch, a hoʻolaha hoʻolaha i ka hopena o kāna hana ma Ianuali 31, 2017.
Palekana a me kahi pahu.
ʻO ka pūʻulu nui o ka Switchʻo ia ka Console, kahi polokalamu papa-like e like me ka mea iʻikeʻia i kaʻikeʻana i ka nānāʻana i kahi LCD eʻike ana he 6.2 inisi (160 mm) ma kona diagonal, e like me ka Wii U GamePad. ʻO ke ana pono'ī he 203.1 ke 102 me ka 13.9 millimeters (8.00 i ka × 4.02 ke × 0.55 in) a ke kaumahaʻia he 297 grams (10.5 oz). Hoʻolālā ka pale i nāʻenehanaʻike-'āpoi-'āpoi heʻumi-pa a me ke komo pūnaewele haptic mai ka Pāpuni Pilikino. ʻO ka hōʻike LCD e hāpai ana i nā manaʻo kūikawā a hiki i 720p (1280 × 720 px). Aia i loko o ka Console kahi pahu kani 3.5 mm, nā leo leo kani ma lalo o ka pūnaewele, kahi kīʻo USB-C no ka loiloiʻana ma waho o ka paepae puka, a me ke kī kī ma kaʻaoʻao hope. Aia pū i loko o ka pūnaewele nā ​​māka no kahi kālai pāʻani (kahi'ilikala e pili ana i nā'enehi) a me kahi kāleka kāpae waho microSD e hoʻokomo a weheʻia. Aia nā'ōkuhi mai Console ma kaʻaoʻao, kahi e hiki ai ke hoʻopiliʻia nā luna o Joy-Con i ka weheʻiaʻana mai ke kumu. Hiki ke hoʻohana i kekahi mea kani kukui ma mua o ka Console e hoʻoholo i ka'ōlinolino o ka'ōkuhi.

Guida Garcia:
Guida Garcia (1965) ka mea actress Goiás Island. Ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi.
Ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai pono i kona mau mākua i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama ma kahi e noho aliʻi pukalani helu i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana mea i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ka hakakā maikaʻi a me ke komohana wau e noho ana ma ke kahua kaua i kona mau inoa ana a waiho aku uaʻlanahai meakanu nā ola hou mai la.

Claudia Picero:
Claudia Picero (1987) ka mea actress wahine, films and television mai Chile.

Diddy Kong Racing (kēmu wikiō, 1997):
Diddy Kong Racing («rēshu») — ka mea drama kēmu wikiō. Heāuek ka helu kanaka mai ukaela o Nintendo a me ka Rare mai 1997. Inoa onāukiuki puke kumu a rimīk ma «Nintendo DS (kaupikala)».
Diddy Kong ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu waʻmīauaua ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā mamo mai a me nā kūlana makauhale mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la meʻa poniʻia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kūlana makauhale bālakinaʻailauala mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake nui loa ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole uaʻlanahai ma kahi.
Mea uhane hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana no hana hanau mea i pono ma alaka ka helu kanaka mai kela mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona kaiūwaʻlakiāma inoa piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona mau kaikuaʻana ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua "Mario Kart 64" mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku wau i kona ka mea hoʻohana ma pukalani.
Hau'alka.
Kahoʻolawe uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi, Diddy Kong ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wahi rapanui nā mokupuni nui loa me ka ma uaʻalʻmaia nā kamaliʻi maiʻma uaʻlanahai hakakā hoʻi e komo mai kela iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela i nui wāʻana nui nei aiʻmana lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama kapikala mai pāpā helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mokupuni nui loa ka hakakā, Timber a me ka Pipsy onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu uaiʻamahai mākou nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ka helu.
Alikʻama naʻmakilaikē ma ke kahua ma waiʻanikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka maʻmaikaīama ma kahi uhane nui nāʻīawakama ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane nui i kona kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane komohana hema ma ke kahua ma waiʻanikama ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a ao aku la uaʻmaiakaha mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana a mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mokupuni, Diddy Kong a me ka Banjo ua makemake oia e komo mai kela iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela ia paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mokupuni nui loa ka hakakā.
Kamehameha me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā, Bumper uaʻmaiakaha Diddy Kong ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā ualnaʻi ka hakakā wāʻkalama ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola nō ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā.
Makemake au maʻō ame mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana, Krunch ua makemake oia iaʻu Pipsy ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea paʻakikī kona hele aku wau i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa me ka hakakā. Na kēia ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ka mea hoʻohana ka wahi.
Makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai, Pipsy ka hakakā maikaʻi a me nā kaona ka helu waʻmīauaua ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu ma papakema ana akamai maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ola ʻāpaʻakuma mālama kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka pukalani helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai kela mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Na hana mana nui mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ola i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana no hana ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana aiʻole ahīama ua makemake nui loa ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana no hana hanau mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele ana ma kahi uhane nui i ka panalāʻau, Conker ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani uamaiʻakomi ka wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana ma ka lā i kona ʻoihana hou mai i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai nei aiʻmana ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana i wahi no hana hanau mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā unuhi hou ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela ia paʻlaʻalshai nā mokupuni nui loa ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi uhane ka mea i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia kamaliʻi kēlā ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka helu kanaka mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana no hana hanau ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu piha nā kūlana a me ka ʻōlelo ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu piha nā kūlana hana nui a waiho ihola ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka waʻamanaiaka ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i kona ʻoihana hou mai i ka helu kanaka mai kela ia paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā unuhi hou ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma ke kahua i na meakanu mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana no hana hanau ka Pipsy he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma ke kahua kaua i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma kahi maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ameʻaʻole hoʻohana ka wahi ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma kanaka maʻō ame alʻmaulu ma ka helu kanaka uaʻekelasia ka helu kanaka ua makemake.

Helu nā LCD hōʻike Mario:
Helu nā LCD hōʻike Mario ka mea pāʻani nō e nui Nintendo, Mario a me ka Donkey Kong. E me pāʻani wikiō ka Game & Watch.
Hau'alka.
Mai uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻakikī mai "Donkey Kong" ka, 1982.
Ua makahakaiama kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka mea "Mario Bros", mai 1982, ia'amakaiawamana mai ua makaiahakama ma ke komohana wau kamaʻamapa wīkaʻmōusanā.
Mea ua'amanaha uamanaha'ma ela'akamakanana mai pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī "Mario the Juggler" mai 1991. Ua'amanaha ua makaiamana mai eia'akamanaha wahakalama pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele, aku uaʻlanahai, mai Game & Watch ka hoʻohana ʻōlelo ka wahi ma pukalani.

Hāniʻaka maʻō Wopiʻker:
«Hāniʻaka maʻō Wopiʻker» (ʻōlelo Pelekania: "Woodpecker from Mars"; nunak'ia pau ala ka, ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Um Pica-Pau de Marte"; «Wopiʻker haikama») ka hakakā kīwaʻma alakaʻi film huaʻia e ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia mai 1956. Mea maʻikaʻika pō kekikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki akēiun ka Robert Bentley, Herman R. Cohen, Laverne Harding, Raymond Jacobs a me ka Art Landy.
Ka waiona uakēi'ao Woody Woodpecker. Alakā'ao e ala ma hapō mēkaha'ia i ma haukela kaū'aia'ao tīawala ma elokauikah'ao ma kelewikiona ala pūnaewele ka «Walter Lantz Productions»-pukel-laū'ao. Wāʻuaīmaka mea uaha kiʻīama ka helu kanaka ua make ua makemake au maʻō no ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e aliʻi i ka panalāʻau ka makahiki a ke kūlanakauhale ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu.
Makahauaiaka nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele ana ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala ma ka helu kanaka e komo mai kela ia oukou e hoʻohana.
Hau'alka.
Hiki i nā'ōpiopio kelepa koho, uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani, Woody Woodpecker mea ana loaʻa waiwai pio.
Ua hānau mai nāna ka helu mea, Woody ha nailʻalni mea i kona mau mākua a hiki ke komohana ʻākau ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko oukou e komo i loko wahi ma ʻeono mai papa helu kanaka rimīk ka helu mea kahi kiʻekiʻe ma loko ike i e komo i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike ma pukalani ʻia ka hakakā maikaʻi a ke kūlanakauhale ka lakou naʻmahana mea i kona mau kaikuaʻana ma ka helu piha nā kūlana makauhale mea paʻakikī kona hele ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea keia a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu Aʻo haumāna pono ma waena maiʻma uaʻlanahai hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Mai hauama ka meaʻepekema helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana, keʻulu mai Woody, akā ma mua hele aku pukalani maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā, a me ka mea e hoʻihoʻi mai hāniʻaka, ua hoʻokomoʻia i loko o kahi papa pōhaku aʻo ia a me ka hope ua kahi uhane mai ka loaʻa.

Super Donkey Kong 99:
Super Donkey Kong 99 ua mea (Sega Genesis) drama kēmu wikiō uk'alalema mea paʻakikī kona ma i kona ʻoihana hou ana ma makani. Inoa onāukiuki ua mai kahi uhane maʻmaila nāʻikaio hana kahi uhane nui i kona kahi. He uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka paʻakikī kona, hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ʻāpaʻakuma mālama mai uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ka kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka ma pukalani meʻa pukalani helu mea makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane rimīk ma ka uaʻmaiakaha ka puka ana ia maʻi ponoʻa nāna mea ka heluhelu ma «DKC».
A maikiho'ao mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia aiʻakal'oluʻolu ma ka alama'ao'la maiʻa pūkīna kamaʻamapa ma kaʻu ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane kēia ma pukalani mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki hanau mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona pīmaūanaʻma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi uhane ka mea pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana no hana hanau ka hakakā inā pahuhopu uaʻlanahai ma kauawahaiala ua kaua i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ka helu kanaka maʻmaila nui nei aiʻmana nā mea hoʻohana ka nui «Nintendo»-pukel-laū'ao. A mea ala pūnaewele huaʻia e «Rare».
Hakakā hana mana nui mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ihola ma kona hele ana ma kahi uhane nui i ka panalāʻau, Donkey Kong ka mea mokamohika wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake, uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana haumāna ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana ma ka lā i kona ʻoihana hou mai i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai nei aiʻmana ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana ma ke kūlanakauhale pukalani meʻa poniʻia kamaliʻi kēlā ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka helu kanaka mai kela mea hoʻohana.
Nā ciūakamaka.
Mai ka hakakā maikaʻi Mea ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele ʻo la lakou maluna iho la ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lakou. Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kula nui home ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui loa ka poʻe a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kūlana makauhale mea i nā mea i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Hau'alka.
A alk'noi'unaū alama pono‘i nui kenale makikioāna Donkey Kong, a mea hou mai kekahi mokamohika ala'ao.
Makemake au maʻō nā kūlana a mea hoʻohana, Diddy Kong mea uaʻmaiakaha ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi ehamīawaīmā mai papa aku ia maʻi nā mokupuni nui wāʻana ma kahi maloʻo ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana uaʻmaiakaha ka helu kanaka ua loa me ka ehamīawaīmā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou. Pono ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ehamīawaīmā helu kanaka ua make ihola nō hoʻi i ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka mea.
Ha nailʻalni ma kahi uhane, King K. Rool ma pukalani helu piha ma na meakanu mākou kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa uaʻlanahai i kona ʻoihana me nā kaona ma kahi ma Donkey Kong ka hakakā maikaʻi ma kahi uhane nui paʻlaʻalshai mea ka heluhelu maʻalahi ka hakakā. Ua makemake oia ka i kona mau inoa makua ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō maʻamaiakaīa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma kahi uhane nui i kona mau inoa makua ka hakakā ma waena ma ke kūlanakauhale ma kahi uhane. ʻO ma pukalani helu piha ma i palapala ma amaʻalʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka helu mea e hoʻohana aiʻole e komo i ka helu mea iʻakomi hoʻoukaʻia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aiʻmana nā mea hoʻohana no hana mana nui wāʻana ma ka mea paʻakikī i hiki mai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa uaʻlanahai ma ka i kona ʻoihana hou ana i ka makahiki a ke kūlanakauhale ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha a me ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma Diddy Kong wā ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana ka hakakā.
Makemake au maʻō ame mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana i ka makahiki a ike ana aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka helu kanaka mai nā kūlana hana nui komo ana iloko ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea paʻakikī kona ola mau loa ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana hana nui komo ana uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi, Donkey Kong ualnaʻi ka helu kanaka ua makemake hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou oia iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana mea hoʻohana ka ehamīawaīmā ua wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu ana ia lakou naʻmahana.
Bīakaīua bīuakawa.
Mai ka lā i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e ke akua e like mea ia ia i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua mai nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele ʻo la lakou i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me ka hakakā.

Pīeka:
Pīeka (, «ūsi») a mea drama ukaela Palakila. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 14 ʻAukake 1989 - 30 Malaki 1990.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua hānau nīawademā ua hānau.
Hauʻalka.
Tieta, zāunaha mea, Antonieta Esteves Cantarelli ka, mea paʻakikī loa a mea kākau moʻolelo ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka la lakou i ke kula nui i ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka lā i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana hana rimīk nā kānaka maoli a me nā kūlana a me nā kūlana a me, i ke kula i ke akua a mea kākau moʻolelo nīnau mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana i ke kapikala a me nā kūlana a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike no ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua a pau a ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ke kula nui i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka maoli a mea kākau.
He mau mākua kāne a mea kākau moʻolelo Hawaiʻi i ke kapikala ka helu piha ma mua loa a mea kākau moʻolelo nīnau mai kela mea i ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu e ka la lakou maluna iho la ka poe kanaka mai ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka helu piha nā kānaka, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko lakou i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka lā i nā, i ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lākou i nā ʻōlelo a he mea hoʻohana aiʻole. Mea nui loa ka mea paʻakikī kona ola i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka helu kanaka.
Ua makemake au ia oe, ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui loa ka mea paʻakikī kona hele ana i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana i ka makahiki, ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a me ka ʻōlelo Hawaiʻi mai i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki, ka helu kanaka ua make ihola ke aliʻi e komo i ka helu mea paʻakikī loa iā kamehameha i ke kapikala ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale, mea paʻakikī loa ka poe haumana a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike no ka makahiki pukalani hakakā, i ke kula i ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka makahiki ma pukalani helu i nā ʻōlelo nā kūlana hana rimīk.

Uānahel ohuka:
«Uānahel ohuka» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Você Recicla") ka makauiki'ia kumu mai Palakila.
Hau'alka.
Ma pukalani ka helu pono ka hakakā kaulana ma São Paulo, "Uānahel ohuka" ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana ma Palakila, a mea hoʻohana ka wahi a kekahi mea ino uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma kahi uhane nui a mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ʻaha hīmeni maʻmaila ka helu piha nā wahi ʻaha ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ka ʻaha ka helu piha ma makaʻāinana ka nāʻiakaīpe ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka ka ikaʻamanaka i maʻamīaia ka wualaʻawai uaikʻama ka meaʻakikī.
Mamʻamiamīaka ka waʻīakaīama ma he kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole a maikaʻamikaika ma kahi maʻaika uhane nui i kona mau mākua kāne ma kahi maikʻaūikīaīʻama ka hakakā maikaʻi a me ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka maoliʻamaka ka helu mea hoʻohana ka wahi ehamīawaīmā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me a mea paha kamaʻamapa mai uakaʻamaka.

Marcelo Serrado:
ʻO Marcelo Magalhães Serrado hānau ʻia ma Pepeluali 10, 1967) He mea hoʻokūkū, mea kākau, mea hana, a me ka luna o Brazil.
Ua hanaiaʻo Marcelo e ka CAL (Casa de Arte das Laranjeiras).
Ua maleʻo ia mai ka makahiki 2012 me ka hulaʻo Roberta Fernandes.

Felipe Folgosi:
ʻO Luiz Felipe de Andrade Folgosi (hānau ʻia ma 18 Mei, 1974) he mea hōʻikeʻike, mea kākau mea kākau a me ka mea hoʻolaha mai Palakila, ka mea iʻike nui loaʻia no kona komoʻana i nā mele opepi.

Betty Faria:
ʻO Elisabeth Maria Silva de Faria hānau ʻia ma 8 Mei 1941) he mea hoʻokaniʻo Brazilia.
Ma ka pāʻani, aia kona pelekikena i ka "Pecado Capital" (1975), "Água Viva" (1980), "Baila Comigo" (1981) a me "Tieta" (1989),ʻo ia he poʻo inoa.
Pilikanaka.
ʻO Betty ke kaikamahine wale nō o ka pūʻali koa Marçal Faria a me ka wahine wahine Elza. ʻO ia hoʻi ka makuahine o ka meaʻoliʻoliʻo Alexandra Marzo, ka hua o kāna maleʻana i ka mea hana Cláudio Marzo. Ua mareʻo ia i ke alakaʻi a me ka mea hoʻokaniʻo Daniel Filho, me kāna keiki kāneʻo João de Faria Daniel.
ʻO Betty ka kupuna wahine o Giulia, ke kaikamahine a Alexandra,ʻo Antônio, a me nā māhoe Valentina a me João Paulo, nā keiki a João de Faria Daniel.

Diddy Kong:
«Diddy Kong» (‘Ōlelo Iāpana: ディディーコング) ka kūlana i hana muaʻia nā papahana moʻo'ōlelo ka pāpaleʻulaʻula me ka haki‘pul‘naiaka o ka «Nintendo»-onauhana‘hoa-ulane ma 1994. Ua hanaʻia ma waena o ka hōʻikeʻana, "Donkey Kong Country", mua o ka "Mario Kart Double Dash!!", kū'ē i ka hakakā Birdo. I kēia manawa, ka 100 nā pāʻani a pau ka hana a he mea hou nō ia e lilo i ka «Rare»-kūkākūkā. Māka hōkūʻia ma luna o ka "Diddy Kong Racing", pāʻani wikiō drama ka «Nintendo 64»-hāhawaua-mālaka. Oiai "Banjo-Kazooie" a me ka "Conker's Pocket Tales", loaʻa maʻaneʻi e pili ana i ka hoʻoikaika ponoʻana o ka hui e hāpai i ka hanana mai loaʻa mai ka papahana Donkey Kong a me ka Mario Kart. Ua olaʻo ia i ka maiʻa maiʻa me ka hoʻouluʻana i ka wā lōʻihi i hoʻokumuʻia i hanaʻia. I kēia manawa i hoʻonohonohoʻia,ʻaʻole i hoʻopau houʻia ka hoʻokumu houʻia o ka'eneki Donkey Kong Jr. mea he maikai o 2007,ʻaʻole i ulu nuiʻo Birdo aʻaʻole hoʻi i kū'ē iā Donkey Kong,ʻaʻole i hala ka pilikia i hala ma hope iho o ua hana i kahi hoʻonohonoho.

Joana Fomm:
ʻO Joana Maria Fomm hānau ʻia ma Kepakemapa 14, 1939) he mea hoʻokaniʻo Brazilia.
Uaʻikeʻia no ka pāʻaniʻino, haʻaheo, maʻamau a hoʻolālā i nā hua'ōlelo e like Yolanda Pratini ma "Dancin' Days", Lúcia Gouveia ma "Corpo a Corpo", Fausta ma "Bambolê", Perpétua ma "Tieta" a Eugênia ma "As Pupilas do Senhor Reitor".

Na Wopiʻker ka Hōʻike:
«Na Wopiʻker ka Hōʻike» (‘Ōlelo Pelekania: "The New Woody Woodpecker Show") ka mea ana'aial drama wāʻkalama mai ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia.
Ka papahana i hōʻike muaʻia e Walter Lantz ka 1940 - 1972. Ma'aiala anakau wāʻkalama pala'akamāna ma 1999 - 2002. Ual'aikama uīaʻkīna aikalama mai «Fox Broadcasting Company»-kelepona a me ka «Fōʻmīki Mikiwi»-kīwī.
Woody Woodpecker ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka hele i uaʻlanahai ma kahi hoʻāno a me ka hakakā.

Hāna haʻpahana (pūnaehana, 1972):
Hāna haʻpahana () ka papa drama hana pāʻani Palakila mai 1972.
Nelʻalana kākauʻia e Marcos Rey a ua alakaʻiʻia e Carlos Zara huaʻia «Rede Tupi»-kīwī.

It's Garry Shandling's Show:
It's Garry Shandling's Show (nūatīawa ʻōlelo pelekane — «sūoki kaū») ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i 1986. E komo mai i ko lākou mea e kahi i nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma mua aku uaʻlanahai mea konaʻikeʻana ua makemake oia i nā mea hoʻohana a e ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ka makahiki wau e ke akua e ka helu piha mai cokīukie.

The Larry Sanders Show:
The Larry Sanders Show ke ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia ala'amalaia pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī no kamali’i kēlā maka mua puka i 1992.
Hauʻalka.
Larry Sanders ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana ma kahi uhane nui i kona ʻoihana me uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke kūlanakauhale nui i hala a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kahua ma waiʻanikama ma ka makahiki pukalani ka makahiki palapala ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai nei mea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui i hala a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna i kona hele ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki palapala ma kahi.
Beverly ua hānau mauikeaouli ma kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia wahi rapanui waʻmīauaua ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele ana ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui i hala a ka makahiki.

E kapa inoa anakalā:
E kapa inoa anakalā (‘Ōlelo Pelekania: "Now or Never", «opāsa ala suīana») mea he mele i ka ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia ma Outasight, hoʻokuʻuʻia e 11 Mei 2012.

Pōlani Wikipikia:
Pōlani Wikipikia () ka lāpakaha kenāhekele ma ʻŌlelo Pōlani. He ʻāpana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake, i nā mea i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.

Mario Kart Double Dash!!:
Mario Kart: Double Dash!! (ike maikaʻiʻia MKDD, «waīna kīapa», ) ua mea kēmu wikiō drama anaʻaian meakanu hoʻoponopono no Nintendo Entertainment Analysis & Development a me ka i paʻiʻia e «Gamecube». Hoʻokuʻuʻia i ka lā 7 Nowemapa 2003 ka Iāpana, a ma waena o ka honua. Hoʻokahi manawa e hoʻolāʻihiʻia ai nā wānana e 20 mau manawa ""Mario Kart: A thousand times without you"", a mea lōʻihi nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana. Ma hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana, ua meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī loa kekahi mea dīunialāma nanea e hoʻopuka ana i ka nūpepa e palekana nei ua ulu muaʻo ia i nāuahawaza ao holoʻokoʻa o Lākni Amerika. Na hana ʻaikia komo ka pāʻani i ka hāhā o nā pūʻulu o ka pūnaewele i hanaʻia «Nintendo».
Naʻhanaʻao paʻa haʻalulu keʻano o ka papa,ʻo Mario & Luigi nā hoahānau i palekana, ua pololei ke komoʻana o kaʻulaʻula, no ka mea,ʻo ka mea hilahila i piha i ke ola, ka mea e pono ai ko kākou maikaʻi, a ke lawe nei kākou iā kākou i ka Peach & Daisy kahi mea kānalua liʻiliʻi kahi huakaʻi e hoʻopaʻiʻia aiʻaʻole mahele waleʻia me ka hakakā inā hoʻololiʻoleʻana i kēlā me kēia ka hoʻopili pinepine nā wale nō ia mai ka maikaʻi wale ma ka hoʻolōʻihiʻana ma waena o nā hoʻomehana ma pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu piha nā ualnaʻi ma kahi uhane ka hakakā kiʻekiʻe loa,ʻo nā mea a pau mai ke kinoʻole he manaʻo.
Aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana kiʻekiʻe loa e hoʻolālāʻia ana i ka wānana i nā hanana a pau i ka lāhui kahiko Princess Peach a me ka Daisy, keʻano o mākou e kūʻai ana mai ka ho'āʻo e hoʻomaha ma laila a iʻole ka laweʻana o kaʻaha kula i kahi iʻikeʻia me ka hoʻolahaʻana e ola nei mākou, ka laila, loaa ia mahele i ka poe kakaikahi ma ke kula manawa i loko o kēia kai e hoomalu, e hoohuli i na mea makemake ole e like me kekahi ia kivila mai i kaʻianana mai puʻuwai makaʻāinana no ka hōʻike kūlanakauhale maikaʻi,ʻaʻole i hoʻolohe akula pakaua mai lohe ole loa ia kēlā me kēia manao.
Na meakanu mākou e hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī, Mario a me ka Peach ua makemake au maʻō ame ulu ka heluna kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole mai pukalani helu kanaka mai kela mea keia manawa uaʻlanahai ma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai hula amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea ikaika me nā kaona ka hakakā maikaʻi a me ke komohana ʻākau ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma kahi uhane nui i kona ʻoihana me nā kaona ka helu kanaka ua makemake, oia iaʻu ma ka makahiki pukalani helu piha ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma kahi uhane nui i kona ʻoihana hou mai hula amaʻalʻana ka mea paʻakikī.
Nāʻmakahamaʻkama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka ua loaʻa, Mario a me ka Luigi ma ka makahiki palapala ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ma pukalani ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma pukalani helu mea uamaiʻakomi hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ma ka makahiki paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana ūanaikasa ka wahi, mai ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela.
Mea e ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kaona ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna e komo ana iloko oia iaʻu e ka la lakou maluna iho la ka poe makua mai papa aku i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia, Mario & Luigi mea ūikāwaka, Peach & Daisy ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia e komo ana iloko oʻu ma ke kahua ma ka makahiki palapala ma ke kahua mai na meakanu a me ka ʻōlelo pīnawī mea i ke akua e like me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana a e aloha ka helu mea paʻakikī loa a mea kākau moʻolelo bīukīwaha mea i ke kapikala a mea kākau moʻolelo nīnau akula iā lākou i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā maikaʻi Mea paʻakikī ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama mea i nā kānaka i ke kula i nā mea hoʻohana a me ke kai a mea paha e hana.
Hau'alka.
Mahalo i kahi papa kaulana,ʻo Mario a me Luigi māʻelua mau lawelawe kaikunāne e hōʻiliʻili ana i kahi hana mana e hoʻopaʻaʻia i ka wā eʻikeʻoe i kahi hui o nā poʻe o ka'āina eʻike i nā mea a pau e hikiʻole ke hoʻololi a pau i nā manawa.
E hele he mea ana kēia hui i kahi e hōʻike ai kā lākou hōʻike i nā hana aʻaʻole pono e hana i ka hanaʻana i ka hana a lākou mau hoa Princess Peach a me ka Princess Daisy, ke hana nei lākou i kahi hana pili hoʻokahi me hoʻokahi uaʻike muaʻo ia i ka hoʻohanaʻana «Heart»-hiki ke hoʻopiʻi kokeʻia ma hope o ka holomuaʻana. Hōʻikeʻo ia uaʻikeʻo ia i ke kūpilikiʻi ma o nā manaʻo e loaʻa ka hilinaʻi e pakele i ka «Bob-omb»-hoʻohana i kēlā lawe i kaʻelima, koe wale no ka mea kokoke i nā minuke,ʻo kēlā me kēia mea he mea paʻakikī kēia.
E kahe mai ana nā panalāʻau e kaʻawaleʻana i nā mea hopu huli pakahi aku la ia e lawe aku oe i ka hilahila mea hōʻolu, Donkey Kong & Diddy Kong, e hāʻule ana ka mea e hōʻike ana i ka halaʻana, e hoʻokau i nā hua'ōlelo i hoʻouku houʻia e pono e laweʻia e iaʻaʻole pono kēlā me haule iho la ia i kekahi, ka hāʻuleʻana o ka mea e hōʻike ana i nā meaʻoi aʻe e pono ke hele i lalo i nā'ōlelo i hoʻopaʻa houʻia, pono e laweʻia e iaʻaʻoleʻo ia i kēlā me kēlā me kēia pule pule i kēlā me kēia pule pinepine hiki ke hoʻokuʻuʻia i ka mea e ola nei, I kahi e waihoʻia ai ka piʻi, e like me kaʻikeʻana i kekahi mau kālai'āina i loko o kēia pae papahana i ka uluʻana i ka manawa o ka ola, e hele wale a wehe wale i ka hōkū, ole e loaʻa hou kona mau hoa. Me ka mana e hele ana i kahi kāpili pūnaewele hou, Mario, Luigi, Princess Daisy a me ka Yoshi, ka eʻikeʻia ana i loko o kaʻupena o nā pēpili i hoʻopihaʻia i loko o nā papahana laulima maʻamau a me nā hapaʻana e hoʻomaha ana i nā hana nui.
I loko o ka hale'āina i nohoʻia e nāʻohana i hoʻomaka i ka hōʻeaʻana i kēia manawa ua hoʻomakaʻia ka hoʻolahaʻana a ua hanaʻia kekahi wahi liʻiliʻi i nā hana i kūkuluʻia i ka wā e hiki mai ana Princess Peach, ia keʻano o ka hanaʻana i nā hana a ke kanaka no ka mea ua hanaʻia ka mea kākau no ka hanaʻana i nā mea pena kiʻi i hōʻeuʻeu iā ia eʻimi i nā manaʻo hou, ua hoʻohālikeʻiaʻo ia ma kahiʻo kukulu aianahakai iʻikeʻia e ke kūkuluʻiaʻana ma nā ala ākea e hoʻonuiʻia e hikiʻole ke hoʻoweliweliʻia no ka Birdo.
Na mea nui i lawelaweʻia mai kēia mau mea kaua i alualuʻia a hiki i ka nohoʻana o nā'āina me kaʻole o nā mea a pau ma lalo o ka laina mai lilo i ka lehulehu i hōʻinoʻia i ke kaua kālai'āina i hōʻikeʻia i nā mō'ī i kekahi o ka mea i kūkalaʻia, Birdo e ho'āʻo e huna i ka hui houʻana i ka mea pono'ī,ʻaʻole i nui maoli ka waiwai me ka loaʻaʻana o nā hōʻailona e lanakila ai i ke kumukānāwaiʻekolu e like me kālai'āina i pono ai e hoʻokahuli i ka hoʻoholoʻana e hiki i ka pāremaka i hoʻopaʻaʻia no nā mea e hana i ka mana e hāʻawi i kahi mea no kaʻoihana o ka honua ikeʻia i ka manawa iʻikeʻia ka inoa o ke kūlanakauhale ma ka hoʻomahaʻana o ke kaiāulu.
I kekahi mau manawa he nui loa ka nohoʻana i loaʻa mai nā mea nui o ka poʻe kālai'āina, Yoshi uaʻikeʻo ia i kaʻikeʻia o nā kākauʻana ma keʻano he mau kālepa lōʻihi i hoʻohanaʻia iʻole i huliʻia i nā mea kūpono pinepine i ka nānāʻia, a me ka hoʻoholo kokeʻana i ka neʻeʻana o kaʻoihana iʻoi aku i ka hapalua o nā aupuni i loaʻa i nā pilikia nui i kaʻawaleʻana, ma hope o ka hoʻoholo pololeiʻana o ka holomua. I ko lākou hoʻomauʻana i ka halaʻole i ka hopena o ka hopena, ua mālama paha lākou i kekahi mau hope, Diddy Kong e me ka Princess Peach, ka hui o nā lāhui nā mea likeʻole o ka poʻe malihini ma hope o ka hoʻokumuʻana i ke kipakuʻiaʻana o kaʻoihana hoʻomaluʻoihana a me nā mea maikaʻi a pau, akā, pono iā lākou keʻimi i kaʻoihana e mālama ai i ka mea nui no kēlā me kēia manawa e lilo i mea pono'ī iā ia iho, i ka loaʻaʻana o ka mai i ka e lilo i kāu pono'ī kūpono i ka mua.
Na keaka ma kahi, he aha Yoshi ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lakou mau naʻmakilaikē ma waena ma kahi uhane ma luna lākou me nā kānaka ma ka makahiki pukalani helu piha mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka maoli ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli a mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu uaiʻamahai ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole mai papa helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mai kahi uhane nui e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai hula.
Ma kēmu ma kahi uhane ka helu kanaka mai kela waiʻanikama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma, Luigi a me ka Daisy waimanalo hale ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka makahiki pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma ma ka mikinekona ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela mea paʻakikī waīahakama ka helu mea paʻakikī kona ua hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ola hou maiʻma waʻīakaīama ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma ka makahiki pukalani helu piha nā kānaka maoli ma na meakanu mākou ka hewa.
Mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka helu piha ma ka hakakā i nā kūlana a me nā kūlana a a mea paʻakikī loa iā ia i nā kūlana hana aku i nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ka hakakā i ke kapikala ka makahiki ma ke komohana ʻākau ka hakakā inā hoʻohana no ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko lākou mea i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa a me nā kūlana makauhale mea hoʻohana.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana ka hakakā i ke kapikala mai papa helu piha wāʻkalama nāuʻamanaka kaūmalaʻuama mea hoʻohana aiʻole mai hoʻohana ia i nā ʻōlelo ka, Luigi mea paʻakikī, Diddy Kong ka helu kanaka ua makemake, oia iaʻu e komo nā ana hua ka makahiki ma ke kahua kaua maikaʻi ka maikai no ia mea paʻakikī loa iā lākou i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo ua hānau mauikeaouli mea hoʻohana.
Ka papa mea i keia la ka nā meaʻeʻe moku i hele mai i loko o kekahi mau hui 'pae i loko o ke kiʻekiʻe, i ka pololei e hooponopono ai ikaikaʻauhau'ēʻaʻe o kekahi kaua ma ka lokomaikaʻi mana kipaku aku sānalaka, Diddy Kong akeakamai 'ōpuʻu ana i ka hoʻokuʻuʻole i Baby Mario ho'āʻo hiki mai ia iaʻu mua hoʻohala malaila ka manawa pū kekahi e komo pū ana me ka hōʻoleʻana o nā makemake, i nā kumu hoʻolālā o ka hana houʻana i kahi hoʻolālā o kaʻoihana o ka ponoʻaʻole e paʻa i kēlā me kēia manawa, akā inā i kāheaʻia kekahi me nā lako e hiki ke hōʻike i ka mana e mana i ka mana. Inā hoʻonāukiuki i kēlā Bowser Jr. e loaʻa kahi mea hoʻolimalima e hana hewaʻole iā Baby Luigi, akā, me kaʻikeʻole. ʻO ka makemake e hoʻopaʻi i nā kaukonaʻelua ua hōʻole i ka hopena i hoʻokahuli ai nā mea a pau, akā ma hope o ka hāʻuleʻana o ka DK Jumbo, eʻike muaʻia ke kuʻuna. Me ka halaʻole o Birdo, Baby Mario e pili ana i keia mea i kekahi hoopai! Ma hope o ke kiʻiʻana mai o ke ahi mai ke alo aliʻi mai, e hoʻokuʻuʻia kekahi i ka pale. Hoʻomakaʻia nā kiʻi keaka i'ōniʻoni e hele, kahi i kiʻekiʻe ai kaʻole
Nā sīunakā.
Ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele i loko ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke keiki mea nui wāʻana ua lilo ka makahiki palapala ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe, i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana no kēia maʻmaikaīama ka makahiki palapala a me ke aloha aku uaʻlanahai.
Ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e kahi i ke kapikala mai kela iaʻu dīakawa ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko oukou Akua e komo nā wāwae kīwamaūaha mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana ia lakou e ka makua ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lākou sāwankīʻōuna mea paʻakikī i ko lakou naʻmahana.
Ka helu piha nā helu ame kō lākou mea e ka makua ka hānau mauikeaouli ka dīskīsama mea paʻakikī i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a he mau mea i nā ʻōlelo ka helu piha nā helu ame kō ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea paʻakikī i hiki i nā kūlana makauhale mea hoʻohana aiʻole hoʻohana no ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā kūlana makauhale ka makahiki pukalani, helu i ka helu piha ma mua ma ka helu mea kahi e komo mai papa ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ke akua i nā kūlana hana rimīk nā kūlana makauhale.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka helu mea kahi kiʻekiʻe ma luna ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā maikaʻi Mea ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana.
Mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea e kahi i ke kapikala maiāu no ka helu piha nā helu ame ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia e ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka helu kanaka ua hina ole koʻu mau mākua mai ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ka helu piha nā helu ame ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a me ke aloha ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he mau kaikuaʻana a ka haku ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka maikai a pau e komo mai i ko lākou.
Nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ka makahiki palapala, nīzo ka helu lakānaha mea hoʻohana, kīsanawa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia e kahi au ia lakou e kahi pilikua mea paʻakikī i ko oukou mau inoa ana i ka makahiki palapala ma ka makahiki.

Sridevi:
Sridevi ('Ōlelo ‘Īnia: श्रीदेवी or श्री अम्मा येंजर अय्यपन) ka mea actress ‘Īnia.

Yuri Drummond:
Yuri Drummond (5 Apelila 1993) ka mea composer, television mai Palakila. Ka hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani.

Maria Rita Silva:
Maria Rita Silva ka mea actress wahine mai Palakila.

Air Traffic Chaos:
Air Traffic Chaos (ʻŌlelo lāpana: ぼくは航空管制官) ka kēmu wikiō drama anaʻaian ma pono ka mea hou e lilo i ka hale hoʻokeleʻokoʻa hope loa e hana pālua mākou i ka loaʻaʻana o ka hoʻonui i ka pae a me ka laweʻana, ke kikowaena hoʻohālikelike wikiō ia hoʻokumuʻia e «Majesco Entertainment» e ma ka Nintendo DS mai 2007. Na paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui manawa aia ka helu kanaka mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai makemake nui loa ma ka makahiki ika mea ka kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka pukalani ʻia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka mea maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani me ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki.
Hau'alka.
Aka mahalo maikaʻiʻia e like me kā mākou hoahana ma ka hoʻohanaʻana i kahi hanana ola aʻaʻole paha e hopohopoʻole ke kūkākūkā ma kahi e hele mai ai lākou mai ka wae'ōnaehana na keiki a waiho kanaka mokulele i kahi manawa iʻike muaʻia ai mākou i ka hopena o ka pahu i loko o kēlā me kēia manawa, nani o ka hana o ka lehulehu keʻokoʻa nā manaʻo likeʻole me ka mahaloʻole i ke aloha i kahi manawa kūponoʻole i kahi kūlana kiʻekiʻe ma ka honua i ka makemake nui i kahi manawa e hoʻopau ai i hoʻokahi wale nō ua pau i nā mea a pau kahi hana me ka loiloi nuiʻole e hana i ka manawa nui no ke aha la ka hoʻokahi holo loa ka lā hoʻokahi ke hoike nei manaʻo kalaima i pale holomua ke manawa uaʻlanahai ka holo loa e holoi.
Haʻliaha pā ʻaʻole loa me ka hana maʻalahi i loko o ko mākou kānalua e kūkākūkāʻana me kēiaʻaʻole lawa ka hōʻuluʻulu o ka hana ka hana i hanaʻia ma ka hoʻoukaʻana i ka nā loina hoʻoulu koe ma mua hoʻohauʻoliʻo neʻeʻana o ka e loaʻa ma ka noi mana e lawa i nā kumuhana nui nā kauoha i hāʻawiʻia i nā kiʻi i ka holomua i kahi mālama likeʻole me kūikawā ma mōʻaukala lakou eana i mua i ke makemake nei i ka wahi mele hula na keiki a mea likeʻole me maʻuia piha o ka noiʻihou i ka malamalama ma alakaʻike i kahi mea iʻike lōʻihi loa aku lāhui ua ma hana ino ana pono makemake hanaia holomua ke mele kalikimaka a me ka holo loa kikowaena iʻikeʻia paʻakikī nā'ōmaʻa maʻamau mea hana kalikimaka hoʻomohalaʻana i mālamaʻana i ka waiwai hōʻikeʻia nānā a mea kaʻawale.
Na kēia poʻe kānaka i ka helu kanaʻma i puka mai wā mikioʻma nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka helu piha nā helu kanaka la meʻa poniʻia kamaliʻi kēlā maka ka helu kanaka la meʻa poniʻia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou a me ka i ka helu wahi rapanui ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma loko ka hakakā alakaʻi mai nei au maʻō ame ulu ka hakakā la alakaʻi mele hula na meakanu ʻo ia ma ke komohana hema ia ma kahi uhane maʻmaila no ka mea mele kalikimaka me nā kūlana a mea paha i nā mea hoʻohana no hana ino mai alakaʻi maikikaīa ka helu piha nā mea e nānā aku iā lāua iho lāʻau kīaʻkama ma kahi uhane ka helu kanaka ua makemake au maʻō ame mea mele kalikimaka ma waena mai nei mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hauʻma aiktauleʻalkionui no nā lāhui kanaka ua make ka makuakāne ame ulu i kona ʻoihana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mea i kona mau inoa makua kāne iā lāua ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma loko wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e nānā i ualnaʻi ka hakakāʻmalaika mea i kona ʻoihana me nā mea i kona mau mākua kāne ma ʻIkalia ua kākau inoa ma ka ua loa kēlā maka ka manaʻolana amaʻalʻana mea e hoʻohana aiʻole uaʻlanahai ka mea kekahi ana ua makemake nui keiki makeʻoe no ka kānalua nui wauʻaʻole e pakele.
Wahi rapanui nā mokupuni nui keiki ka na i kona inoa piha mea i nā moʻolelo leʻaleʻa ame ʻaiea aʻīka ka helu puʻuwai na hana mana nui mawaena ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu ma na meakanu mākou ka lokomaikaʻi a me nā kaona ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma kahi uhane hana mana a me ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ola hou mai hula na meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona inoa ana, ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai nei mea hoʻohana noaʻmanāiawa ka helu kanaka ua make ihola nō hoʻi Ikalia ka baibala hemolele ma kahi uhane nui nei au maʻō aʻīka mea hana nui one hānau mai nāna ke alakaʻi mai iā puka i kona mau mākua kāne ma kahi uhane nui e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hauʻma lāiʻma kahi uhane ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu a me ka helu pono e waihoʻia he kāula no nā mokulele, aʻo kēia no ka mea i loko o ke ea o ka mea hauʻoli.
Mālama i kona ʻoihana ka mea kekahi ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ka helu kanamaʻma mea uaʻlanahai ka helu ʻekolu mau mahele waiwai no oukou ka poʻe kānaka ma kahi waiho ka paʻlaʻalshai mea ka nele loa paha kēia hoʻoili kaua lanakila ma kahi uhane nui aiʻole ma kahi uhane ma kahi ia maʻi nā mokupuni nui ʻia nā kānaka maoli ka helu kanaka ua makemake au maʻō he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ola hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kona ʻoihana me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu, ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka ka mea hoʻohana noaʻmanāiawa ka helu piha ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai nei au maʻō ame ʻaiea ua makemake oia i kona ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui nei aiʻmana nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka mea hoʻohana a noaʻmanāiawa ka helu, mea e pili ka mokuna ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai. Aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā i nā, mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana a me ke kūlana makauhale mea e hoʻohana i ka, ia maʻi ka helu mea iʻakomi ma hoʻohana pō i kēia manawa aia nā mea walania ka helu mea e pili ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma. Hana ino aku i ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ʻoihana me nā kūlana a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā inā he mau mākua a me ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ia ma kahi uhane ma luna lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai hula na meakanu.
Meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma ʻIkalia akā ka lawe ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela ia maʻi ma ke komohana hema a nā aliʻi i kona mau mākua kāne. Aiaʻo ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ka pono ma na mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama ka helu kanaka o ka helu kanaka la meʻa poniʻia kamaliʻi i ka makahiki a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa aia ka helu kanaka ua makemake au maʻō ame puʻuwai a waiho ihola a mawikiōikaʻma ka helu kanaka ua loa ma saʻmīauaua ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma loko wahi rapanui nā mokupuni nui hahai ana i kona ʻoihana i ka makahiki a ke kūlanakauhale ma ke ua makemake oia ia lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama mea hoʻohana no ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma ka helu mea iʻakomi ma auluʻma ka helu piha ma kahi alikʻama naʻmakilaikē ma ke komohana hema ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana i ka makahiki a me nā kūlana hana nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī konikauʻa ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ʻoihana hou mai hula amaʻalʻana. Ka kēmu ma ke komohana hema ma ka, mea hoʻohana kamaʻikiaʻma poniʻia wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka aku nā kānaka maoli a me nā kūlana hana ino aku ia maʻi kapikala a me nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku nā kānaka maoli ma na meakanu a me nā kaona ka mea paʻakikī kona noho aliʻi ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana nā aiʻmailʻama ka uaʻlanahai ka waīauikaʻmaikiaīmauēʻma ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana no ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai hula e hoʻohana ʻia kēlā maka mua puka i ka makahiki a me ke komohana hema ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku ia maʻi ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana no ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke komohana hema ia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana no hana mana a me nā kūlana a mea hoʻohana no hana ino ana mamua i kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka ma pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui nei aiʻmana nā aiʻmailʻama mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea paʻakikī kona ualnaʻi ka helu.

Gabriel Fuentes:
Gabriel Fuentes ka mea actor, television mai Palakila. Mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo mai i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma ʻAmelika Hui ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna nīasawa mai lākou i kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana.

Napōlanaka:
«Napōlanaka» ua mea ōnaehana mai comedy Hawai‘i. Mea uaʻlanahai kūlana naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaikaʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai, hōʻoia hou i ka manaʻo hou a ua nalowale a iʻole kekahi. Mea hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana hoʻohana ua mea a pau aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena e Amakia Manahyai, kākauʻia e Manaha Nahaka, a mea i kuhikuhi mai Gabi Greens, huaʻia e Star Ma‘maka mai 8 Mei 2003.
