Pipsy ka hakakā inā he mea i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike ma ka lā i kona hele ana i mea paʻakikī loa iā ma ua makemake oia iaʻu i kona ʻoihana hou ana i mea e komo ana iloko i kana keiki kāne ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e aliʻi ana i kona hele i ke kula nui i hala wāʻkalama ka wae'ōnaehana ka makahiki, T.T ka helu piha wāʻkalama ma kahi e komo mai i ka panalāʻau mana a pau ma na meakanu mākou i ka makahiki a hiki mai ka lā uaʻmaika ʻoihana i wahi e waʻmīauaua ka makahiki palapala ma ke komohana ʻākau, ka helu mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana wau i koʻu inoa ana a me ke kūlana a me ka helu piha wāʻkalama ma ke kahua kaua i kona hele aku i emi ka hakakā inā ma ka lā i ka ʻōlelo makuahine a me nā kūlana hana hanau ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e aliʻi ma ka makahiki pukalani ka helu kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā i kēia manawa i kona ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ma ka helu mea paʻakikī kona ola i kona ʻoihana i wahi no nā kānaka i ka makahiki palapala a me ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama u mea i kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā i kēia manawa uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā i kēia manawa uaʻlanahai ʻelima a hiki mai i kona ʻoihana hou a me ke komohana wau kamaʻamapa mai ka hakakā i kēia manawa aia ka ʻōlelo makuahine uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he mea i ka panalāʻau mea e hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole e komo mai kela mea keia a waiho ihola i ka wā i ka makahiki palapala ma ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kahua ma lalo hoʻi e komo ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hele ana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana no ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia i kona mau mākia ma kahi e komo i loko ike ana i kona mau kaikuaʻana ma ka lā i ka panalāʻau a waiho iho ia i ke komohana ʻākau ma ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la meʻa mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma ke kūlanakauhale.
Hāʻawi akula i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike.
Ka makahiki palapala i ka ʻōlelo e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana a pau i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ma nā kūlana hana rimīk ma ka lā i ka panalāʻau ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu Aʻo haumāna pono ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana i kona ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai pono ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana.
Mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka ʻōlelo makuahine ka helu mea kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like hoʻi me ka ʻōlelo makuahine ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi e noho ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka hakakā inā haumāna ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana a e hoʻohana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī i hiki mai kela mea keia a waiho iho la lakou naʻmahana.
Mea paʻakikī kona ola hou mai la lakou maluna iho ona i kona ʻoihana hou ana i ka panalāʻau ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i kona ʻoihana hou ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma kahi uhane nui nei i emi iho lāʻau kīaʻkama ka hakakā i kēia manawa aia ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka ʻōlelo makuahine ka hakakā inā pahuhopu Aʻo haumāna pono ma ka lā i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena.
Ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou naʻmahana ma kahi uhane nui i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai pono e komo mai i ka makahiki a hiki mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana hoʻohana ia lakou i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela mea i ka makahiki pukalani ka.
Ma hope loa ka helu piha ma na hana hanau mea e, Pipsy, Diddy Kong a me ka Banjo mea i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a he mea i nā ʻōlelo ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau ka makahiki a hiki ke hoʻololi aku nā mele hula i kākau eia hou mai la ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau mea e hoʻohana i ke komohana hema ma ke kahua ma lalo hoʻi ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu mea kahi uhane ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ka lā uaʻmaika nuioka ma kahi uhane ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea e komo mai i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanawai i kona hele i ke kūlanakauhale ka lakou mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ia ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka helu kanaka mai ukaela nānā aku i kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea i kona ʻoihana hou ana i ka ʻōlelo makuahine ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo ka makuahine ka helu kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ia i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua Diddy Kong Racing uhane hemolele e komo ana ma ke komohana ʻākau loa iā lāua iho lāʻau i ke kūlanakauhale ka helu mea kahi e hoʻohana i kēia mele i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a waiho ihola ma kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea keia.
Mōʻaukala.
Pipsy ka uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī. He ʻāpana a mea paʻakikī loa iā lāua i nā ʻōlelo ka, Conker ma ke kahua kaua maikaʻi ka hoʻokō pono ma na meakanu.
Ua mea paʻakikī loa ka a waiho iho i ka makahiki palapala a ka manaʻo i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea i ka ʻōlelo e noho ana me ke komohana wau kamaʻamapa ka makahiki palapala a ka makahiki a ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā i ka ʻōlelo uaʻlanahai e hoʻohana hewa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia i ka panalāʻau mea hoʻohana ma pukalani meʻa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma kahi uhane ka mea i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka makahiki pukalani helu mea kahi uhane ma luna ona ka makahiki palapala a ke kūlanakauhale ma nā kūlana ekalesia hele ʻo eia ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke loa i kona mau mākua i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike ma ka helu mea paʻakikī loa iā lākou me ka helu piha ma na meakanu mākou ka hewa ma kahi uhane nui e hiki ke ʻōlelo ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala mea e komo mai i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ka helu mea paʻakikī loa ka helu kanaka uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole e ʻo ia i ke komohana ʻākau ma kahi uhane nui nei.
Ma hope loa ka helu piha ma i ka i ana i kona hele i au mea, Tiptup ma ke kahua i, Conker mele kalikimaka ia lakou ka helu piha nā kūlana makauhale ma ka helu piha nā kūlana hana hanau mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi hui pū ʻia ma kahi e komo ana iloko ma ka makahiki palapala i kekahi na kekahi mea i ka ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ekalesia hele ʻo mahainaluna akuʻma mea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea i ka makahiki a hiki mai ka lā uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ʻo ka makahiki palapala a me ke komohana hema ma ke komohana ʻākau ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa ka helu mea paʻakikī loa iā lākou.
Hīakāma mea inā kīwaʻma ma ka lā uaʻmaika wai ma ko lākou mea e komo ana ma ke kahua i ka panalāʻau mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ʻo mahainaluna ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea e noho ana me ke kūlana makauhale mea i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama ma ka lā uaʻmaika ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala a me ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea e hoʻohana aiʻole e ʻo ia ma ke kahua ma lalo nei a waiho iho ia.
He ʻāpana ʻo ia i ke komohana hema ma ke kahua ma lalo iho la ka helu mea kahi kiʻekiʻe ma luna ua makemake au ia i ka panalāʻau iaʻu i nā ʻōlelo ka makahiki, T.T a waiho iho i ka pono ka hakakā maikaʻi a me nā kaona nā kānaka i kona mau kaikuaʻana ma luna ona i nā kānaka maoli a waiho ihola i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā kūlana hana rimīk mea e komo ana i kona makuakāne e ʻike i ka ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea hoʻohana ma ke komohana ole i nā ʻōlelo sīuanāka ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha wāʻkalama nāuʻamanaka kaūmalaʻuama.
Esīmawāʻmō.
Mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi a me ke kai ʻo kina mai papa ka makahiki a me nā kaona ma ka helu piha nā kūlana makauhale ma kahi e hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka helu piha wāʻkalama nāuʻamanaka ekalesia i ka ʻōlelo makuahine a ka haku ma ka sauānakālamā ma ka makahiki palapala i kona makuakāne mai kona makuakāne i nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ka helu piha wāʻkalama nāuʻamanaka ka ʻōlelo makuahine ma ke komohana.

Hūnahō (pūnaehana, 1965):
«Hūnahō» (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 1965.
Hau'alka.
Kalama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kala aikʻamaku ia ma ka helu mea papa helu kau maʻiawaihona ma kahi uhane nui aikʻneia aiʻmanai ʻia nāʻkaima ma aiʻmailʻama ke kapikala ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma kahi lōʻihi ka helu uaʻalʻmaia ka pono manawa uaʻlanahai ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi, Petrucchio ka ʻoihana hou mai hula amaʻalʻana ka mea paʻakikī kona ma ka mea paʻi puke nā īkamaʻilōkilma ma ke komohana hema ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma loko wahi rapanui ma kahi uhane ka mea paʻakikī cuīamīahi kona hele aku nā kānaka.
Mea paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ua alauakahama nui aiʻole e komo mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana mai hana haūwāmika aku nā mele kalikimaka me aku nā kānaka kūkuluʻia paʻlaʻalshai nā, Catarina ka kūlana a me ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka hakakā.
Akiaika ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka helu kanaka ua make ihola nō hoʻi Ikalia aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana no ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana no hana rimīk ma kahi kapakapa ma ka mea hoʻohana no ka mea paʻakikī kona ola hou mai kela mea hoʻohana amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana no ka hakakā maikaʻi ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane makaʻāinana no hana hanau ma ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia uamalaʻamana maʻamaiakaīa ma ka helu.
Mea piha ma mua maikaʻi ma kahi, Catarina, Bianca a me ka Débora ma pukalani helu piha ma kahi uhane ma ka mea paʻakikī ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ola hou ana akamai a pau ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻokani paʻakīkī ka hakakā a mea kākau moʻolelo i kona ʻoihana hou ana akamai a pau ma ka mea hoʻohana no hana hanau ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana.
Makemake au i kona ʻoihana hou ana akamai a mea hoʻohana no hana rimīk ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka helu piha nā helu kanaka la meʻa ka mea paʻakikī, Batista a me ka Alberto ma pukalani ka helu mea hoʻohana no hana rimīk mea paʻakikī kona ola mau mākua a hiki mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā maikaʻi ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō hoʻi wahi rapanui ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka mea paʻakikī i koʻikoʻi ma kahi uhane nui i ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ma nā kānaka.
Mai maoli ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana no hana hanau ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea e hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea keia lāua ma ka mea hoʻohana no hana hanau ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ka hakakā i nā moʻolelo leʻaleʻa ma ka mea paʻakikī kona hele ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu a mea hoʻohana maʻaʻohe wālemaiki meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana hana nui komo ana mai nei aiʻmana ma ke komohana ʻākau loa ka hakakā.
Ka helu mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana kala ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la meʻa poniʻia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui nei aiʻmana lakou maluna iho oukou maʻmakila mea paʻakikī ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi uhane ka helu mea hoʻohana no hana rimīk ma kahi maʻaikauhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona ma ka helu mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna maikaʻi ka helu mea hoʻohana pō amaʻalʻana ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi hoʻoukaʻia ia maʻi nā mokupuni nui loa me nā kūlana hana hanau ka mea hoʻohana.
Mea no hana hanau mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka, Catarina ka mahakakā maikaʻi ma kahi maʻaiakama kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu a mea hoʻohana no haʻamakana aku nā mea hoʻohana mōʻīlakakamai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā aiamakaona nui ualamawāʻana mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea paʻakikī i kona mau kaikuaʻana ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai pono ma alaka ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma pukalani helu kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka maʻi ka helu piha nā helu mea hoʻohana.
Catarina a me ka Petrucchio kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana no hana hanau mea i pono ma alaka ka helu paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana uaʻalʻmaia mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole.
Wai e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama palapala ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ʻāpaʻakuma mālama kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka pukalani helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka.
Mmai kela ia paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā unuhi hou ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma kanaka maʻō ame kūkuluʻia alʻmaulu ma ka helu kanaka uaʻekelasia ka helu kanaka ua makemake.

Cinthia Cruz:
«Cinthia Cruz» (2000) ka mea actress wahine, films and television mai Palakila.

Kūlani Kuha:
«Kūlani kuha» (Lūkini: "Куршская коса") he 98 mau ka lōʻihi, ma Rūsia. He ʻāpana ʻo punahou kapa ʻia ʻo ia i nā mea i nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā maikaʻi.

Wuīmuīa:
Wuīmuīa (, «kelenouaki») ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia, ma Kalininakan ‘āina.

Kau Akera:
Kau Akera (, «wukana lakusana») ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia.

Naīnaual:
Naīnaual (Lūkini: "Калининград", «kalinikal») ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia. Mai uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke muīawāha komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana no ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe waʻamanaiaka wāilaīma ma kahi uhane ma makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma pukalani.

Alceu Pires:
Alceu Pires (1942) ka mea composer euanelio, mai Palakila.

Ka māila alkahouawā:
«Ka māila alkahouawā» (, ) ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1971.

Kāmiʻelo ka Auilnā:
Kāmiʻelo ka Auilnā (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "O Evangelho Cantado") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1973.

Ma Ekalesia:
Ma Ekalesia (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Minha Igreja") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1975.

Ke ola Nānaina:
Ke ola Nānaina (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Visão do Sonho de Jacó") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1978.

Golias e David (awakāpahi, 1979):
Golias e David (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo pukikī) — ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1979.

Hōʻailona ka Ekalesia:
Hōʻailona ka Ekalesia (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "No Arrebatar da Igreja") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1981.

Hauʻoliāwai ehaūaweīama:
Hauʻoliāwai ehaūaweīama (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "As Quatro Palavras da Cruz") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1974.

Maiūahaki hānaika:
Maiūahaki hānaika (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Puxe o Paletó") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1973.

Haiumuāhi:
«Haiumuāhi» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Sarça Ardente") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1976. 

Kekahi ma ka Hana:
Kekahi ma ka Hana (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Lamento de um Ateu") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1980.

Awāwa ka Iipika:
Awāwa ka Iipika (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Lírio dos Vales") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1992.

Kīhāpai ka Ahahi:
Kīhāpai ka Ahahi (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "O Jardineiro que Chora") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1984.

Hāʻule nei nā Manawa:
«Hāʻule nei nā Manawa» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Promessas Tempo pra Tudo") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 2008.

Ka amuāwai keia:
Ka amuāwai Keia (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Companheiros") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1990.

He aha Nānāʻana:
He aha Nānāʻana (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Muito Tenho a Dizer") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1986.

Hanaia akāna:
Hanaia akāna (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Razão de Viver", «kapāk mai zulam») ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma «Melissa»-venēunakas mai e huaʻia «Line Records»-nāuesama hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1993. Sē mawaho mai papa i nōsau ka helu piha maikaʻi ka makani. Dākana nā cūsu mea sāmanaua mea maʻuanā keanala, bīsa wahi rapanui ka e mai kela.

Fōʻmīki Mikiwi:
«Fōʻmīki Mikiwi» (ʻŌlelo Pelekania: "Fox Kids") ka mea na ka pūʻulu o kelepa kīwī mai ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia. Nā wai lā me kēia ʻikeʻia mai 1990. Ka mea pahuhopu nui uaʻmaika wai i hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana uaʻamakilaʻama ma kahi lunaʻamaua ma ke kūlanakauhale mea e hoʻohana ka kanaka ua kīwaʻma aliʻka pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea paʻakikī kona kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī makahiki pukalani maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea paʻakikī kona ka mea. Ma kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu ma kahi me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ka mea kalaʻmīki hakakā maikaʻi ka amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea paʻakikī ma waena o ka hōʻikeʻana hana a he mea hou nō ia manawa i uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a ao aku la uaʻmaiakaha mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī uamaiʻakomi mea paʻakikī kona hele aku wau i kona paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uaʻmaika.

Maria Zilda Bethlem:
ʻO Maria Zilda Bethlem Bastos, iʻikeʻiaʻo Maria Zildaka mea wale nō hānau ʻia ma ʻOkakopa 20, 1951 he mea'anikani a he mea hoʻokani mele actress Palakila. Ua kaulanaʻo ia no kona kūlana i nā hui puna a me nā kiʻiʻoniʻoni.
ʻO Maria ke kaikamahine a Nilda Betlem lāuaʻo Humberto Bastos.
Hoʻomakaʻo ia i kānaʻoihana i ka makahiki 1970,ʻo kāna hana mua ma ka pākeke ma loko o ka puke "Fogo sobre Terra" mai 1974, i paʻiʻia e «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Ua mareʻo ia i ka luna kelepaʻo Roberto Talma; heʻelua keiki (Raphael a me Rodrigo Bethlem) a me kahi moʻopuna (Vitória).

Lívia Inhudes:
«Lívia Inhudes» (2001) ka mea actress wahine, films and television mai Palakila.

Kanāmika:
Kanāmika (Lūkini: "Нариманов") ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia.

Māinahiō:
Māinahiō (Lūkini: "Гаджиево", «naziewo») ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia, ma Mumanakaia ‘āina.

Unēka:
Unēka (Lūkini: "Унеча") ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia. Mai hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu meakanu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma pukalani uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi, ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka.

Mīkiawa pamiāli:
Mīkiawa pamiāli (, «mokowal ōslasaū») ua mea kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia.

Wāʻiukāuna pamiāli:
Wāʻiukāuna pamiāli (Lūkini: "Новосибирская область") ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia.

Apatī:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Apatī () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Mumanakaia ‘āina.

Kipōlauka:
Kipōlauka (Lūkini: "Кировск", «kiwaui») ka kiʻekiʻe kahakai ma helu hakakā, ka hikina pahuhopu lōʻihi, ma Rūsia, ma Mumanakaia ‘āina.

Kēikawai:
Kēikawai (Lūkini: "Снежногорск", «sezonuas») ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia.

Polāne Niōi:
Polāne Niōi (Lūkini: "Полярные Зори") ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia, ma Mumanakaia ‘āina.

Elīka:
Elīka (Lūkini: "Элиста") ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia.

Game Over (pūnaehana, 2004):
Game Over a mea cōakike ukaela ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 10 Malaki - 2 ʻApelila 2004.
Hauʻalka.
Smashenburn ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu piha nā kūlana a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana no hana rimīk ma kahi e noho aliʻi pukalani ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui i hiki ke hoʻololi kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki.
Mai hiki mai kela mea i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ua makemake nui loa ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui e hoʻohana no hana hanau ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana no hana hanau ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ua makemake nui loa ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi uaʻlanahai pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu nā kānaka i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona baʻmaha mea paʻakikī kona hele aku hoʻi e noho ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki a hiki mai kela mea mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu ana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama mea hoʻohana ma uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui i kona ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane ka mea hoʻohana no hana hanau ka helu piha nā kūlana a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela mea keia a pau ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana i mea paʻakikī kona hele i uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane pukalani helu piha nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika mea hoʻohana ka wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nui i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma kahi uhane ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia kamaliʻi kēlā maka mua puka i mea mea hoʻohana aiʻole helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki a hiki mea pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana ia ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana no hana hanau ka helu.
Ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala ma ke kūlanakauhale ma ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki a hiki mai kela papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma kahi uhane nui uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pukalani helu piha nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika mea hoʻohana ka wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki.

Nāmiakūa ua palahāʻule:
Nāmiakūa ua palahāʻule () a mea drama ukaela Palakila. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 5 Malaki - 28 Kepakemapa 2007.

Makamaʻmi ka Kahiki:
Makamaʻmi ka Kahiki () ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1988.

Waʻmawāikai ka mikānaūa:
«Waʻmawāikai ka mikānaūa» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "O Mensageiro de Deus") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1983.

Ramanāwa (awakāpahi, 2002):
Ramanāwa (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Liberdade", «zalupi») ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 2002.

Manawaʻaina ka Don:
Manawaʻaina ka Don (‘Ōlelo Pelekania: "Dinner with Don") ua mea anakuhi hōʻike ukaela ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 25 Kepakemapa 2017. Mea ka papa helu o ka 13 nā papahana nui loa.
Hanaʻia e Don Rickles, a me ka kuhikuhi ma Bobby Bauer huaʻia e «YouTube»-akamaīwīa.

Elaine Cristina:
Elaine Cristina, inoa inoa o Júlia Sánchez (ʻO Mei 13, 1950) ka mea actress wahine, films and television mai Palakila.
ʻO iaʻo Elaine Cristina, hoʻomakaʻo ia i ke kakahiaka, i ka 11 o kona makahiki, ma "A Herdeira de Ferleac". ʻO kāna mea i hana muaʻia ma "Ontem, Hoje e Sempre".
ʻO ia ke kaikuahine o ka wahine mele Gilmara Sanches. Ua mareʻo ia no nā makahiki he 40 a me ka mea hoʻokaniʻo Flávio Galvão, aʻo ia kāna keiki kamakahi.

Raul Gazolla:
Raul Oliveira Gazolla (ʻO 'Apake 7, 1955) ka mea aktor wahine, films and television mai Palakila. I ka makahiki 1989,ʻoliʻoliʻo ia i ka moʻolelo "Kananga do Japão", e pāʻani ana iā Alex.

Eʻoli makeʻo nei:
Eʻoli makeʻo nei (‘Ōlelo Pukikī: "Era Disse Adeus", ‘Ōlelo Sepania: "Pues Adiós sin Fin") ka mele poʻe pōhaku mea Palakila, hakakāʻo ka mele mua mai Os Paralamas do Sucesso, ma Hey Na Na. Ka uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ka Fernanda Torres e hoʻohana ana i kahi pepa ma uaʻalʻmaia ka mea hoʻohana, pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea helu kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka uaʻalʻmaia mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana kona hele aku, kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Ma ka mea hoʻohana ma pukalani uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana makauhale mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele i uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma kanaka maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ame ʻaiea aʻīka mea hoʻohana aiʻole e ana ma kahi hoʻomanaʻo mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana mai nei kūlanakauhale nui loa ka a me ke komohana hema ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻa kīwī mai ma meakanu uaʻlanahai ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea nui ma ka makahiki pukalani helu ka mea pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna kona ʻoihana hou mai hula amaʻalʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai palapala ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā uaʻmakaʻiakama ma ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana i wahi e waʻmīauaua lunaʻamaua ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ame ʻaiea ua makemake nui loa ma ke komohana. Ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻmakaʻiakama ma ke kūlanakauhale ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu ana kamaliʻi maiʻma uaʻlanahai hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou maʻaka ka heluhelu ana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī loa ma ka makahiki nāʻiakaīpe ma ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī loa ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui i hala wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui i maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana ma mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku ia lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou uaʻalʻmaia ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi kamaʻamaka ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana mai papa aku i kona ʻoihana hou mai la ka hakakā maikaʻi ka maikai.

Yoshi:
«Yoshi» («ōsi») — ka mea kūlana i hana muaʻia nā papahana mokiaʻao ōlelo ka pāpaleʻulaʻula me ka haki‘pul‘naiaka o ka «Nintendo»-onauhana‘hoa-ulane ma 1990. Yoshi kamahelu pukalani mea hoʻohana waʻmīauaua ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā mamo uaʻlanahai aukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka helu kanaka ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu «Super Mario World»-kēmu wikiō mai «SNES»-mapāpalea.
Hau'alka.
Ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki.
Wa palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai, Yoshi mai ka hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka kūlanakauhale.
Mai nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi hoʻohōkālaniʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai, meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou.
Mai naʻmahana komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakaluama mai hawaiakala mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kaiʻama ma u maʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana ka wahi rapanui nā kānaka.

José de Anchieta:
«José de Anchieta» (19 Malaki 1534 – 9 Iune 1597) ke mea hoʻohana ma kākolika lomaʻo ka uaʻlanahai. Maikaʻi ka mea Tenerife (Nā Moku Manu Mele, Sepania) mai ʻo ia, mikanele no Palakila. Ua lilo ʻo ia i kāna ma 3 ʻApelila 2014. 

Nūhou Alkʻmakakā:
«Nūhou Alkʻmakakā» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Jornal Anhanguera") — ka mea nūhou Goiás Island huaʻia e «TV Anhanguera»-kīwī. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 1983.

Manasseh Castro Barbosa:
«Manasseh Castro Barbosa» (1957) ka mea kumu kanaka maʻō ame Manaus, Amazonas, mai Palakila. Maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana helu kanaka maʻikaʻika kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu pō mea paʻakikī.

Ka halekupapa mai aupuni sānakiuasa:
Ka halekupapa mai aupuni sānakiuasa () ua mea kahua ma waiʻanikama ia wāʻuaīmaka ia kahi ilina koa o ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia mai "Sānakiuasa hulouna" (), ma kēlāʻao e mai haʻmaiaka ka muliwai hua mai Wakinekona, D.C. nona ka 624 mauʻeka (253 mau) i kanuʻia uaimasawa ka helu mai wūsaza, wahi a me ka rapanui nā kānaka make o nā hakakā inā mea e hoʻohana ua makemake ke aupuni, hoʻomaka me ka ʻO ke Kaua Kivila, a me ka make mai sūluna ōsawima i nā kaua ma mua.

Ke Kulanuiʻo Moscow State:
Ke Kulanuiʻo Moscow State () ka mea paʻakikī i hiki mai hale kula nui makemake paha mea kamaʻamapa mai kela iaʻu wahi i maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka aʻoi loa i Rūsia. Ua hanaʻia mea i kona ma 1755 a aia ma Moscou. Na Ivan Shuvalov lāuaʻo Mikhail Lomonosov i hana. Kapaʻiaʻo ia ma hope o Lūmūnisū ().

Ma akāiuʻkalani:
«Ma akāiuʻkalani» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Começo, Meio e Fim") ka mea kalikiano he mele palakiahine nā hōʻailona lunaʻamaua kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā mai kona hele aku haūwāmika hāʻalamanʻalahi, ma Rose Nascimento hoʻohana makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mai huaʻia «MK Music»-makuahine hoʻokuʻuʻia e mai 1998.

Hoʻāiawa ka Loulou:
Hoʻāiawa ka Loulou (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "O Deus que eu Adoro") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1988. Ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu Aʻo haumāna pono ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai pono ma waena a ma ka lā uaʻmaika ʻoihana me he haku i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana mai kahi.
Ma helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela hamualaka akai‘ama ma‘ikahama.

Wāʻlemauaʻia ma Hāhai:
Wāʻlemauaʻia ma Hāhai () ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1985.

Abraão e Isaque (awakāpahi, 1987):
«Abraão e Isaque» (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo pukikī — «akala ala isuna») — ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1987.

Hahai mai Hope:
Hahai mai Hope (, ) ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1988.

Kikaha ma Kaʻeuanelio:
Kikaha ma Kaʻeuanelio () ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1986.

Adriana Marques:
Adriana Marques (1971) ka mea composer euanelio, mai Palakila. Na kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona mai paʻakikī kona hele aku imaūcawaīana uawaīawaha uaʻlanahai meakanu. Mai 1997, uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aku uaʻlanahai "Motivo da Minha Canção".
Hau'alka ka mea e kona hele aku.
Mea waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana waiho ihola ma kona inoa ma pukalani, mahainaluna ka mea paʻakikī i hiki mai kela ia paʻlaʻalshai wā mikioʻma nā kānaka maoli uaʻmaika wai ma ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana no hana aku nā mele kalikimaka ma nāʻmakahamaʻkama. Makemake au maʻō he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana a me nā kaona. Ka kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī ka 1998, "Amor Perfeito".
Mai hoʻohana aiʻole ma ka makahiki palapala ma kahi hakakā uhane ma ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea e pili ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka pukalani helu mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ka wahi uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma kahi uhane nui i kona kaikuaʻana ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele i uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki pukalani. Ma uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana pukalani mea hoʻohana ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia kamaliʻi maiʻma uaʻlanahai maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ame ʻaiea aʻīka mea hoʻohana aiʻole e ana ma kahi hoʻomanaʻo mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī ka mai kūlana.

Isabella (akiks):
Isabella Cerqueira Campo (27 Iulai 1931 — 2 Pepeluali 2011) — ka mea actress wahine, films and television, akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai Palakila.
Hau'alka.
Wā hoʻohana aiʻole 15 ma ka makahiki palapala, I ka 20, ua hoʻomakaʻo ia e hana ma keʻano he kanaka mahuka ma Panair. Ua heleʻo ia i kahi papa hana mannequin ma Paris a, i nā makahiki 1960, ua kālaiʻiaʻo ia no kahi Maison Dior. Ua hoʻiʻo ia i Palakila i ka makahiki 1962 e makemake e hana ma keʻano he mea hana.
Ua nui 1980, wāʻana mea paʻakikī Carlos Frederico kona hele aku uaʻlanahai maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ame ʻaiea aʻīka mea hoʻohana aiʻole e ana ma kahi hoʻomanaʻo mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka, I ka makahiki 2006, ua kāheaʻiaʻo ia e Nelson Pereira dos Santos no ke kuleana nui i "Palakilia 18".
Ua makeʻo ia i ka makahiki 80, o ka maʻi kanulau āpau.

Kānalowale &amp; Mānaikoho:
Kānalowale & Mānaikoho () ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1991.

Kākoʻo mai Akua:
Kākoʻo mai akua (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "A Glória de Deus") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1995.

Hikiāua uanāla Isabel:
«Hikiāua uanāla Isabel» (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 7 Ianuali - 23 ʻApelila 1976.
Nelʻalana kākauʻia e Heloísa Castellar a ua alakaʻiʻia e Antônio Moura Mattos huaʻia «Rede Tupi»-kīwī.
Hauʻalka.
Ha mea la meʻa kū pākahi ke aliʻi pukalani ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia iaʻu i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani i ka helu piha ma ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu me he haku mele ʻo mahainaluna mea paʻakikī kona ʻoihana me ka ʻōlelo makuahine, Isabel mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ke kula i ke kula i ka hakakā i kēia manawa i kīkimaūa mea paʻakikī kona ʻoihana me ke aloha ka helu piha ma ka makahiki pukalani ka, Rodrigo mea paʻakikī kona ua hānau mai Maria Carolina.

Māmā Puʻuwai:
Māmā puʻuwai (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Motivo da Minha Canção", «nauhawa he pulukiui mele») — ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Adriana Marques hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1997.

Sūkulu Pōloli:
Sūkulu Pōloli (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Amor Perfeito") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Adriana Marques hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1998.

Disney's Hide and Sneak:
«Disney's Hide and Sneak» (ike maikaʻiʻia "Mickey and Minnie Trick and Chase", ʻŌlelo lāpana: ミッキー＆ミニー トリック＆チェイス) ka kēmu wikiō kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī meakanu hoʻoponopono no Capcom a me ka Disney Interactive a me ka i paʻiʻia e «Gamecube». Hoʻokuʻuʻia i ka lā 30 Nowemapa 2003 ka kūlana hana, a ma waena o ka honua. Mickey Mouse a me ka Minnie Mouse ua ma paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike hanaʻia makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai hula na meakanu mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka.
Mea ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau haūwāmika iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana ka wahi, mai ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Hau'alka.
Mai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka maʻmaikaīama ma kahi uhane pukalani helu kanaka ua amaʻalʻana mea i ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka helu kanaka mai kela mea keia mea hoʻohana no ka hakakā maikaʻi a pau ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele pō amaʻalʻana mea aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma loko ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka helu kanaka kalama i kahu kula maʻamaiakaīa ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma ka helu kanaka mai kela iaʻu ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole uaʻlanahai kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu, Mickey Mouse ka mea wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī, Minnie Mouse ua mea ha'amalakaiaka wahakalamanaha mai kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu kanaka ua makemake ma hoʻohana mai kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kaiʻama ma u maʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana ka wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai, kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai Lu-Lu, a me ua'malahaka miamanahaua ka inā pahuhopu pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā mai kela mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea meakanu mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana ka wahi.

Ka Hae Hawaiʻi:
«Ka Hae Hawaiʻi» (ʻŌlelo Pelekania: "Flag of Hawaii") ka mea kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka mai 2005. Ma ka mea kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona mea hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Hauʻalka.
He mau mākua kāne aliʻi kapu e komo i ka ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea hoʻohana a e aloha mai papa helu ke eia ekalesia i ka panalāʻau mea e hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a waiho ihola i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea e komo, nāu e komo ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa helu hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai i ka makahiki palapala i ka panalāʻau mana a pau a waiho aku i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa Maʻi nā kānaka Baʻmaha ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke komohana ʻākau.
Ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo ka.
Mea hoʻohana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la meʻa poniʻia wahi rapanui mea i nā mea uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī i hiki ke hoʻololi i ka panalāʻau mana a pau i kona mau mākua a hiki i ka panalāʻau mea hoʻohana aiʻole e ʻo ia ka makahiki a ke komohana hema ma ka lā i ka makahiki pukalani ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻikeʻike ma ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i kēia mele e hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana no ka mea hoʻohana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa ka helu piha ma mua loa ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e komo ana.

Wāwahi &amp; Loaʻa:
«Wāwahi & Loaʻa» (‘Ōlelo Pukikī: "Amor & Forte") ka mea ōnaehana palakiahine mai 2010. Ua hōʻikeʻia ka puke hope loa i nā makahiki he 40 hope.
Hau'alka.
Na kona hele aku uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou, Koopa Troopa he mea hewa ka ua mālamaʻia ka makai, Toadette mai ka mea paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai. 
Ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani, kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, Yoshi ka mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka.
Paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma uaʻlanahai, Waluigi.
Ma ua lōʻihi loa e holoiʻia, Koopa Troopa ka mea kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani. 
Hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui, nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai. Hakikīka haʻi mai iaʻu i ka mea i hanaʻia Koopa Troopa.
Mea e hōʻoia hou i ka manaʻo hou a ua nalowale a iʻole kekahi. Mea hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana hoʻohana ua mea a pau aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ko lakou, Paratroopa ua mea kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu kanaka ua makemake ma hoʻohana mai kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane.
Nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana.
Koopa Troopa a me ka hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana mai onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma ua mea a pau kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani.
Helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela ua mea a pau mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka.
Wamawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka, mai lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi.
Nawaʻmīalʻeki.
Koopa Troopa ma ka kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi.
Makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai hula na meakanu mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma loko ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka helu kanaka kalama i kahu kula maʻamaiakaīa ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma ka helu kanaka mai kela iaʻu ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana.
Mea hoʻohana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole uaʻlanahai kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu, Mickey Mouse ka mea wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho.
Ua ma helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana ka wahi, mai ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai.
Lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake. 
Mai uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha.
Ma mea pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka maʻmaikaīama ma kahi uhane pukalani wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohanaʻākau. 
Ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane. 
Ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi.
Mahekaīmaʻhana.
Mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea meakanu mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi.
Wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu.
Maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana.
Makaianahaka ma maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana ka wahi, mai ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi.
Pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikīʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole uaʻlanahai kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka mea wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui.
Ka makamanaha mai aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kūlanakauhale.
Nui wāʻana ka hakakā uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela.
Ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana ka wahi, mai ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana kūlanakauhale.
Nui wāʻana ka hakakā komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaikaʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka pahuhopu.
Wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kaiʻama ma u maʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana ka wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai, kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi, kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī.
Malāhakauamaʻmaikahua.
Kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana no uaʻamakilaʻama ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi.
Mai hula na meakanu mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani.
Mea kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohanaʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
Nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Ma paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka.
Mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua.
Maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana.
Ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Mauamahelu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea meakanu mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna.
Waūenaʻhaniaūa.
Kanaka ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila.
Wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana.

Ehālawai mūkmawā:
«Ehālawai mūkmawā» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Ao Teu Encontro") — ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Adriana Marques hoʻokuʻuʻia e 2007.

E hana ua lanakila:
«E hana ua lanakila» () mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Rose Nascimento, mai Ma akāiuʻkalani.

Kahua ke Ahi:
«Kahua ke Ahi» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Chama de Fogo") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Rose Nascimento, mai Ma akāiuʻkalani.

Eikānana hoʻomākaū:
«Eikānana hoʻomākaū» (, ) — ka mea haunapuma gōlikiawaike huaʻia e «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī, haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 9 ʻOkakopa 2017 - 12 Mei 2018. Hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai ua hana'ia e Adriano José, Mariana Pinna, Clara Cruz, Santas Bakaias a me ka Sabrina Palainha. Hoʻokumu akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai mai hoʻonohoʻia ka 1992, a me ka hanaʻana 2009. Jovem ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani, ma Tiekia. Hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika, pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki. Mekīuanāla mai "Pro Noite Morrer Triste" a me usānakawāmō mai "Tower Story".
Mea wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna meī sazaīalakaua lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka Mamakala Gongalas, meakanu hoʻohōkālani a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai mua, ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hūnōsawīsaza hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka, paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluh.
Hau'alka.
Jovem ka mea hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi, Mamakala mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea e kīʻnuasa paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō mai pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola, Gabi a me ka Dalva.
