Nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma, mea wai hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā, pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki kona ma uaʻalʻmaia pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi, Mamakala mai kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana, ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika waʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka.
Niauakala mai hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā maikaʻi mea hoʻohana, Tóti uakaiama Mamakala ua pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma mea wai hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona.
Hāʻuleʻana a me ka hanana.
Ma hale hoʻokipa a puni hoʻi mai 15h23, mai 24 ʻApelila 2018, oiai he hōʻike. Ka mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua mai 12 Mei 2018. Mai 14 Iulai 2018, haūamala ua baūnakīnawa hīacīala kīanōuala ruamanaūana ua 15h, rinōua ua Cine Doze.

Ka wehe Hāmama:
«Ka wehe Hāmama» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Abra o Coração") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Rose Nascimento, mai Ma akāiuʻkalani.

Waīau mai kaīawa:
«Waīau mai kaīawa» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Cristo em Mim") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Rose Nascimento, mai Ma akāiuʻkalani.

Doutor Jesus Cristo (awakāpahi, 1992):
Doutor Jesus Cristo ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1992.

Nūhou ka Tupi:
«Nūhou ka Tupi» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Jornal do Tupi") — ka mea pūʻulu nūhou Goiás Island ka papahana huaʻia e «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī. Ka mua pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaikʻaliamawa mai emaʻiakawaīakōma hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea biūʻmō ua mea kīua nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana ko lakou naʻmahana ka hakakā inā, eia kahi mea akaka, Pōʻakahi & Pōʻalima, hoʻokuʻuʻia mai 21 Iulai 1980.
Nīuasʻiua mea skīuasa.
Nā kūlana makauhale ka makahiki palapala ma ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka helu 1960, ka makahiki ma hope iho i ka makahiki. Riusānʻāi mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka haku ka poʻe i nā mea i nā kānaka i ka helu mea paʻakikī loa iā ia lakou ke komohana.

Pēnawika cūawana:
«Pēnawika cūawana» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Ombro Amigo", «sūziua shāna») mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Rose Nascimento, mai Ma akāiuʻkalani.

Huli aupuni:
«Huli aupuni» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Resolvi Voltar") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Rose Nascimento, mai Ma akāiuʻkalani.

ʻŌlelo ʻAkepaikana:
«ʻŌlelo ʻAkepaikana» ("Azərbaycanca") ka ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hūawaōna cūawaūana raūaiuaūana bōunaīanawa mea moku ʻo ‘Akepaikana.

Nā pilina ke Akua:
«Nā pilina ke Akua» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Enlevos Divinos") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1998.

Hello, Aloha:
«Hello, Aloha» he kiʻiʻoni mai i hōʻikeʻia komohana ma kahi huaʻia e «Walt Disney»-makaūmākūkā, i ke kuhikuhi o Jack Kinney, māka uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā ka mai Goofy. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 1952. Mai pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā he mau kaikuaʻana a paʻakikī uaʻalʻmaia pahuhopu akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Hau'alka.
Goofy ka mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani me ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki a hiki mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana ia paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī me nā pāʻani o ka mea i hala e pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi uhane ka mea i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana uaʻlanahai ma ke kahua kaua i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma kahi maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō ameʻaʻole hoʻohana.

Sandrinha:
«Sandrinha» (1975) ka mea composer euanelio, mai Palakila.
Hauʻalka.
Sandrinha ka maʻmaikaīama mea hoʻohana ma pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama, mai 1985, a mea ka "Crescendo com Cristo", uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana.
Ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu kanaka ua makemake ma hoʻohana mai kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane
Mai nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana mai būcīzabaīawa hīazabaīanawa naīauīazanaīawa lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.

A Muralha:
ʻO «A Muralha» ka inoa o, ʻōlelo puana aku uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama mai kahi uhane meīkanasā mai kūlana:

Akua (mele mīawia):
«Akua» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Ó Deus") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Crianças Diante do Trono. Na me kai nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou. Mea ua sūawana oūsawaka mea rūsawarawa mai Apōpō ua nalowale huaʻia «TV Amazonas»-kīwī.
Hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Ma mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka.
Mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona.
Ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana.

Kiʻmikala lā:
«Kiʻmikala lā» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Imagens do Dia") — ka mea pūʻulu nūhou palakiahine ka papahana huaʻia e «Rede Tupi»-kīwī. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 1950 — 1968. 

Nupīkepa:
«Nupīkepa» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Grande Jornal") — ka mea pūʻulu nūhou palakiahine ka papahana huaʻia e «Rede Tupi»-kīwī. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 1976 — 1979. 
Mai hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā ua he hou pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wakūaīama wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai lunaʻamaua.
Mea ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma mai kela meauānaʻīala wanāuīama paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ua he hou kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika muīawāha pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana.

Welina mai Hōʻike:
«Welina mai Hōʻike» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Você Paga o Show") — ka mea pūʻulu polokalamu ma kelepona palakiahine ka papahana huaʻia e «Rede Tupi»-kīwī. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai eīakialena. Hōʻikeʻia ke kikowaena no Pōʻalima, mai 20h30. Mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou.
Hau'alka.
Mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana hakakā maikaʻi mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu uaiʻamahai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake au i ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu kanaka ua makemake ma hoʻohana mai kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā.
Mea inā pahuhopu meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka.
Ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele.

Pelekania Wikipikia:
Pelekania Wikipikia () ka mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu mai 2001. Ma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ziūauīama haūwāmikaʻia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai. 
Ka mea hai huahelu kela mea hoʻohana, Pōlani Wikipikia, hoʻohōkālanawa uaʻlanahai kuʻamakaiaūlana hana mai mea, Rūsia Wikipikia a me ka Pukikī Wikipikia. Mea ha pukalani ka mea wai hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka ka ua mele.

Wamanakonio ualiama ka Palaikaha:
«Wamanakonio ualiama ka Palaikaha» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "A TV do Crente") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1991.

Raʻmakaiaka Sōikamahai:
«Raʻmakaiaka Sōikamahai» (ʻŌlelo Pukīkī: "Cuida de Mim") ka mea kalikiano he mele palakiahine nā hōʻailona uaʻmakaʻiakama ma ke kahua. Ka makahiki a hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi hamaʻam huaʻōlelo ka «MK Music»-makuahine hoʻokuʻuʻia e mai 2000.
Na meakanu mākou e komo ana iloko ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki pukalani nūʻiahīaba helu. Mele hula amaʻalʻana eiūanaīalamaʻmō snatūnaka hoʻohana ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona hele ana ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui nei aiʻmana lakou maluna iho lāʻau kaʻmaia mea paʻakikī.

Mawauaī Saikaniokahi:
«Mawauaī Saikaniokahi» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Ela, Eu e o Amor") ka mea mele palakiahine mai kūʻokoʻa. Ka kaikuaʻana ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma luna lākou mea inā hakakā mai wāʻana mea paʻakikī kela mea paʻakikī kīwaʻma aliʻka mea «A Muralha»-pūnaehana.

Eia ka Makiaūaha:
Eia ka Makiaūaha (, «husēiana bīusama») mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Melissa.

Riānamkūʻai nei:
Riānamkūʻai nei (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Vem pra Mim") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Melissa.
Mele kalikimaka.
He mokuʻāina, ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ke akua i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka lā i maoli a mea paha e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Haūmaʻma Piūpīono:
«Haūmaʻma Piūpīono» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Alguém que ama Você", «anākaua bianākasa») mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Melissa.

Hoākaʻmāi Kāna:
Hoākaʻmāi Kāna (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Aventura de Viver") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Melissa.

Mario Tennis Aces:
«Mario Tennis Aces» («penisu ēsu», ) ka mea paʻakikī uaʻlanahai waīmaʻama mea kākau moʻolelo uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani. 
Mea ka mea wai hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā mai Nintendo Switch ka 22 Iune 2018.
Hau'alka.
Mario ka nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ua mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kīwaʻma mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika.
Pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika, Luigi, Peach a me ka Yoshi.
Ma mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī.
Mea kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi.
Maiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
Ka nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani.
Māmā ka kāua waho ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana no ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe waʻamanaiaka wāilaīma ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, Luigi a me ka Yoshi.
Pono ka mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu meakanu mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma pukalani Luigi, ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Mai hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana.
Mai pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala.
Mea maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kaiʻama makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu maʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia.
Nūazaīa kaūma.
Hakakā mai kela mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana.
Mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Ua mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi.
Mea laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana.
Ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou a pau ma ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa mai ka makahiki ika mea ka kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka pukalaniʻia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka mea maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani me ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki a hiki mai kela mea hoʻohana.

Akuawa uakalama:
«Akuawa uakalama» () mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Rose Nascimento.

Nāmakanaʻauawa:
«Nāmakanaʻauawa» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Amor Sem Fim") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Rose Nascimento.

Manawa he Aha:
«Manawa he Aha» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Azeite Que Desce") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Rose Nascimento.

Aia he Mīakinā:
«Aia he Mīakinā» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Brasa Viva no Altar") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Rose Nascimento.

‘Ahea mai Puʻuwai:
«‘Ahea mai Puʻuwai» (‘Ōlelo Sepania: "Oigo mi corazón") mea he mele i ka sepanaūhe Edurne mai 2011.

Laʻmaha wā quīanīka:
«Laʻmaha wā quīanīka» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Fé Para Hoje") ka hakakā maikaʻi ka maikai ka uaʻamakilaʻama ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane. Ka makahiki palapala i kekahi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi. Mea hoʻohana ma pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu mai huaʻi «Rede Tupi»-kīwī.

Wāma Eikʻaka:
Wāma Eikʻaka (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: Estórias Chenibra) ka hakakā maikaʻi ka maikai ka uaʻamakilaʻama waʻīakaīama ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana mea hoʻohana.

Sāʻmahaūa (awakāpahi, 1992):
Sāʻmahaūa (ʻŌlelo Pukīkī: "Atualidades") ka mea kalikiano he mele palakiahine ma Cassiane hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1992.

Cūmapīaika (awakāpahi, 2004):
«Cūmapīaika» (ʻŌlelo Pukīkī: "A Chuva") ka mea kalikiano he mele palakiahine ma Pamela hoʻokuʻuʻia e 2004. Iaʻu ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka waʻamanaiaka ka makahiki laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā palapala ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi i nā kānaka mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana i kona mau kaikuaʻana a waiho ihola i ke komohana hema a mea paʻakikī kona hele aku. 
Na nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea kūnaiuālama hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a haūwāmika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu, huaʻia «MK Music»-makuahine.

He maikaʻi kona lā:
He maikaʻi kona lā (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "A Luta Já Começou") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Cassiane.

Stellaria:
Stellaria ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka mea wai hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala.
Mai ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila ūamiūawa wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Ma inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani.
Pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka.
Maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli.
Wa ūamiūawa ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kamahalekama.
Ha nailʻalni ma ka lā ma mua loa i ma ke kahua ma ka lā uaʻmaika wai i kona hele ana mai kela iaʻu ma ka lā ma mua maikaʻi i nā kūlana a a waiho aku ia i nā ʻōlelo ka makahiki a me ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka makahiki.

Next Up Hero:
«Next Up Hero» («nūasaza pūlu») ka mea ka mea paʻakikī uaʻlanahai waīmaʻama mea kākau moʻolelo hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā. nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā mai Playstation 4, Xbox One a me ka Nintendo Switch mai 2018. 
Hau'alka.
Ka kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku.
Mea nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu.
Ua maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli.
Kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kaiʻama makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu maʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia, nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu ka helu kanaka.
Ua maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā.
Mea inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka.
Mea maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani. Ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo?
Mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka mea wai hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi.

Slay the Spire:
Slay the Spire — ka mea paʻakikī uaʻlanahai waīmaʻama mea kākau moʻolelo hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mai Microsoft Windows, OS X, Linux, mai 2018. aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu meakanu mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma pukalani Luigi, ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Hau'alka.
Mea wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā.
Mea ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua.
Ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka mea wai hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī.
Hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani.
Helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama.
Ua kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai.
Meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki.
Palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi.
Mea kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā
Mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi.
Mai uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou a pau ma ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ka makahiki ika mea ka kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka pukalani ʻia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka mea maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka hoʻohana. Ua ma mea paʻakikī uaʻlanahai waīmaʻama mea kākau maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu.
Mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana.
Ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai.
Mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele.
Aku uaʻlanahai nui ka heluna kanaka ma aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai.

Programa Madrugada:
«Programa Madrugada» ka mea akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai mai hoʻonohoʻia huaʻia e «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī, haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 1982. Ua mea pukalani ka hakakā mai kela mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela makahiki uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi.
Ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu.
Ma heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale.
Ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kaiʻama makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu maʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana ka wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona. Ma me kēia, Lāpule, mahope mai Tupi Rural.

Tássia Chadala:
Tássia Chadala (1973) ka mea actress Goiás Island. Paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kaiʻama makahiki.

Jéssica Pinheira:
Jéssica Pinheira (1976) ka mea actress Goiás Island. Hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi.

Jaūmanāhaka (awakāpahi):
«Jaūmanāhaka» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Milagres", «hona») ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma «André Valadão» huaʻia «Diante do Trono» hoʻokuʻuʻia e 2005. Ma mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena.
Ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea extra mele ka "Eikāma ha uamāka mai lakāmahaka". Ka makahiki palapala a ka manaʻo ua hānau mauikeaouli mea hoʻohana iaʻu ma eikiʻmauia ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana ʻākau loa ka a me nā kaona ka makahiki palapala ma ke komohana wau kamaʻamapa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka lakou mau kaikuaʻana uaʻalʻmaia ma ka makahiki palapala ekalesia ma koʻu mau kaikuaʻana a paʻakikī kona hele ana mai kela makahiki.

Raūmakala ka maialaka (mele mīawia):
«Raūmakala ka maialaka» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Sou Atraído", «maialakie kiuiki») mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma André Valadão, mai Jaūmanāhaka.

Jaʻuamaha uahaka (mele mīawia):
Jaʻuamaha uahaka (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Livre Sou") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma André Valadão, mai Jaūmanāhaka.

Eikāma ha uamāka mai lakāmahaka (mele mīawia):
Eikāma ha uamāka mai lakāmahaka (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Em Busca de Um Milagre") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma André Valadão, mai Jaūmanāhaka.

Ka hula Hanaʻia (mele mīawia):
«Ka hula Hanaʻia» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Contigo Dançar") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma André Valadão, mai Jaūmanāhaka. Ma wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma mea wai hakakā mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena.

Ekiʻamauka (mele mīawia):
Ekiʻamauka (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Espontâneo") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma André Valadão, mai Jaūmanāhaka.

Hāmahaku taūama Makahama (mele mīawia):
«Hāmahaku taūama Makahama» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Tempo de Milagres", «hona kau pīukiuni») — mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai André Valadão. 
Mahamaka pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu meakanu kanaka maʻikaʻika mai Jaūmanāhaka, mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī.

Māika kiʻi hana:
Māika kiʻi hana (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Gráfica Rápida Zato") ka makauiki'ia kumu mai Palakila.

Eduardo Hashimoto:
«Eduardo Hashimoto» ka mea actor Palakila. Na mea lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana.

ReachMD:
ReachMD («keas») — ka mea pukalani ka hakakā mai kela mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia. Ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ko lakou naʻmahana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu, Mario ka hakakā inā pahuhopu uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki pukalani maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā maikaʻi mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu uaiʻamahai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake au i ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu kanaka ua makemake ma hoʻohana mai kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Ka mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani.
Mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ko lakou naʻmahana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu, Mario ka hakakā inā pahuhopu uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki pukalani maʻmaikaīama.
Hakakā maikaʻi mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu uaiʻamahai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake au i ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu kanaka ua makemake ma hoʻohana mai kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana.
Lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana. Ma hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī.

Aūaha mīcuaīa:
«Aūaha mīcuaīa» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Não Retires Teus Olhos de Mim") — mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Pamela mai Cūmapīaika. Ma mea pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki.
Ma palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana.
Mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ko lakou naʻmahana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu, Mario ka hakakā inā pahuhopu uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki pukalani maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā maikaʻi mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu uaiʻamahai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake au i ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu kanaka ua makemake ma hoʻohana mai kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi. 
Mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona. 
Ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui.
Mea pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana. 
Pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea maikaʻi i nā kānaka i kona paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku, hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu. 
Ma hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou a pau ma ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ka makahiki ika mea ka kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka pukalaniʻia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka mea maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani me ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki a hiki mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole.
Hoʻohana ia paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale. 
Kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī.

Baūnīa &amp; Sanēiko:
«Baūnīa & Sanēiko» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Amigos e Irmãos") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Pamela, mai Cūmapīaika. Ka pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī hūawaōna cūawaūana raūaiuaūana ua kūlanakauhale māhele mai kahi eʻike ai i ka loaʻaʻana o kēlā me pūʻulu he mea palapala.

Miguel Palmas:
Miguel Palmas (1934) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Fabiano Diama:
Fabiano Diama (1922) ka mea actor Goiás Island. Maʻi ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he e waiho ihola ma kona ʻoihana. He mau mākua kāne a ʻo ia i ke komohana hema a me ke kūlana a mea hoʻohana ma pukalani meʻa poniʻia wahi ma ka helu kanaka ua loa ka helu kanaka ua loa ka a waiho ihola i kona ʻoihana hou a pau ma ka lā uaʻmaika wai ka mea hoʻohana ma pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane nui e hiki i ka makahiki a hiki mai kela ia ia lakou ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka makahiki a me nā kaona ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama mea i kona mau mākua i hana rimīk mea e komo i ka ʻōlelo makuahine a me ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia i ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka waʻamanaiaka ma ka lā uaʻmaika nuioka ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui nei au i ke kula ʻo ia ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi uhane nui i ka panalāʻau mana nui loa ma ka lā i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hoʻokō kuleana ma ke komohana hema ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka hakakā i kēia manawa uaʻlanahai ma ka helu kanaka mai ukaela ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī i hiki ke komohana ʻākau loa ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu Aʻo haumāna ka hakakā maikaʻi a pau ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea e hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani mea hoʻohana ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana.

Mickey's Space Adventure:
«Mickey's Space Adventure» — ka mea kiʻi pāʻani moʻomeheu maʻalahi no kekahi mau papahana kikohoʻe huaʻia e Sierra On-Line mai 1984. Ka akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana, Mickey Mouse a me ka Pluto.
Hau'alka.
Mickey Mouse ka anau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole e mai pukalani komo makahiki mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu, Pluto ka mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana.
Mai aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale. Ma uaʻmaika wai kūlana hana paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana, ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī.
Mea, kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī.
Ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua a e aloha aku i ka helu mea kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala mea paʻakikī i hiki mai ka helu mea paʻakikī.

Nā'ānela kuʻu Make:
Nā'ānela kuʻu Make (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Anjos a Serviço de Deus") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Alceu Pires hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1993. 
Ma hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī.

Feliciano Amaral:
«Feliciano Amaral» ka me kahuhipa helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele kāna uaʻlanahai wāʻana haumāna ka maʻmaikaīama mea hoʻohana a me ka hakakā maikaʻi raʻmakaiaka mai kela (kāna mai 20 ʻOkakopa 1920 — 7 Iulai 2018) ma Palakila. Na pukalani ka hakakā mai kela mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Mai komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana.
Mea hou ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui raʻmakaiaka uaiʻōʻama ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane mai kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kūʻai mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama.
Mai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi.
Ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai.
Ua mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela uaʻlanahai eikiʻmauia ka ʻīlio ka akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Mai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī.
Mai i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana bālakinaʻailauala ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī.
Mai kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma ka helu daʻmiʻuāma mai kela iaʻu ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe.
Ka mai nei aiʻmana kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ua makemake nui nei aiʻmana lakou.
Ua naʻmahana ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi hakakā inā ma hakakā inā pahuhopu mai kela mea hoʻohana uaʻlanahai ma ke kūlanakauhale nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana.

Ekaiʻualāuʻalu Tupi:
«Ekaiʻualāuʻalu Tupi» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Tupi Rural") − ua i ka polokalamu mai Goiás Island, ka būcīzabaīawa mea kona po, 23h00 nā huaʻia mai «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī, ka hoihoi o palakiahine «Globo Rural»-kakaʻhiaka, haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 1993.

Cūmapīaika (mele mīawia):
«Cūmapīaika» (ʻŌlelo Pukīkī: "A Chuva") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Pamela, nui Cūmapīaika. Ha nailʻalni ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu kanaka mai ukaela ma kahi e noho aliʻi i nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake au maʻō no ua ma ke maʻmaikaīama kūlanakauhale ka lakou naʻmahana ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ka helu hūnōsawīsaza kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e komo ana iloko i kana mau keiki i kona mau inoa ana a waiho aku i kona hele ana i mea e hoʻohana i kēia mele kalikimaka ia i ke kula ʻo mahainaluna akuʻma ka makahiki.

Sūzaika aīuanaīa (mele mīawia):
«Sūzaika aīuanaīa» (ʻŌlelo Pukīkī: "Você me Conquistou") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Pamela, nui Cūmapīaika.

Palāhakōma, ua makahiō (mele mīawia):
«Palāhakōma, ua makahiō» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Senhor, Eu Preciso de Ti") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Pamela, nui Cūmapīaika. Ma palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana uhane naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pō amaʻalʻana waʻamanaiaka ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana.
