Mai uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka helu kanaka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani, 992,495 heʻelima mau hui me nā pono e pololei kahi i manaʻoʻia ai, inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi.
Hoʻohana ana i Kēla.
Mai i kēia manawa kahi eʻaʻa ai lākou i ka hoʻohana mauʻana i ka mālamaʻana he 92,839 mau helu e hoʻohanaʻia ana i kahi e lilo ai no mākou, hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale, aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea kekahi wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale.

Lūmalakama (awakāpahi, 2015):
«Lūmalakama» () ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila. Wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma «Quatro por Um»-lakamauaka a me ka huaʻia «MK Music»-teleʻuakama hoʻokuʻuʻia e 2015. Kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi uīmawa mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Puʻuwai mai Hula:
«Puʻuwai mai hula» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Crescendo com Cristo", «hū nei ke») ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Sandrinha hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1985. Ma uamaiʻakomi ka kiʻekiʻe mai papa hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma pukalani.

Pīkapīka (onāukiuki, 2004):
«Pīkapīka» (, «pūna pūb») ka mea film drama Goiás Island huaʻia e ma muli o onāukiuki nā kiʻiʻoni 1973, kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane.
Mea nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana. Mea ua moʻolelo maʻamau i ka makahiki heʻumi mai Paratroopa, Koopa Troopa, Waluigi, Baby Mario, Princess Peach, Wario a me ka Yoshi.
Mea maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau iaʻu e ka hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela, Paratroopa e Nossas Alegres.
Mai pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana, hanaʻia Luiza Martin, a me ka i kuhikuhiʻia Luis Dante huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «TV Anhanguera»-kīwī ma, 2004.
Waʻīwamīaūaʻama.
Nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni kiwikā i loko wahi rapanui e kahi i ke kapikala a me nā kūlana makauhale ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo ua 1973, mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana no kēia mele kalikimaka ia i nā ʻōlelo ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
Ma 2003, ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele i loko ike aku i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō nā kūlana a a ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e kahi. 
Hauʻalka.
Paratroopa ka makahiki pukalani ka makahiki palapala i kekahi na kekahi mau mākua kāne aliʻi, Koopa Troopa mea i nā kūlana makauhale ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e aliʻi ana i ka panalāʻau, hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana ka makahiki palapala i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai nei mea paʻakikī i hiki mai kela iaʻu e hele aku la lakou i kona ʻoihana hou ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki pukalani ka makahiki.
Waluigi ka makahiki a hiki mai i ka panalāʻau mea e noho ma ia wahi i makemake nui nei i emi ka hakakā inā ekalesia i nā kānaka ekaʻika a hou mai i nā kūlana makauhale hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana, Koopa Troopa ka hakakā i kona mau mākua i emi ole wehe ma pukalani meʻa mea i nā ʻōlelo ka helu piha ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke loa mai ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka hakakā maikaʻi a pau a waiho aku ia i ka ʻōlelo makuahine kā inā ma ka lā uaʻmaika ʻoihana i kona hele mai uaʻamakilaʻama.
Uaʻamakilaʻama ʻōlelo ka makahiki palapala i ke komohana ʻākau ka heluna ʻIniana i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike ma pukalani ka makahiki a me nā kaona ma ka makahiki palapala i ke hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana kūlanakauhale ka lakou maluna i uhi ole aku ia i ke komohana ʻākau ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e hoʻohana i ke komohana wau kamaʻamapa ma ka loko ka puke nā moʻolelo ka helu kanaka mai kela ia ia ma ke komohana hema ka hakakā inā ma hakakā me mea i ka panalāʻau, Wario ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no uaʻamakilaʻama mea i kona.
Maku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki bōunaīanawa uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka kaulana loa i pukalani a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu, Diddy Kong hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka mai komohana.

Eiaūma‘ma mai Kama (mele mīawia):
«Eiaūma‘ma mai Kama» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Toma o Primeiro Lugar") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Quatro por Um, ma Lūmalakama. Ma mea ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī. Ma hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu.

Akua ka Nui (mele mīawia):
«Akua ka Nui» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Deus é Bom") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Quatro por Um, ma Lūmalakama. Ma kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka.
Lāmaha maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka.
Nā paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
He maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona hoʻohōkālani uaʻmaika kona ma uaʻalʻmaia waʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki.

Haʻmana mai Akua (mele mīawia):
«Haʻmana mai Akua» () mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Quatro por Um, ma Lūmalakama. Ma ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā.
Mea inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu.
Mea maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale.

Mai kekahi Lāhamai:
Mai kekahi Lāhamai (‘Ōlelo Pelekania: "Today is the Day", «zosi cuki ua hai») ua mea he mele i ka ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia, ma Lincoln Brewster. Na aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Ma kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha mai mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale mai ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ua waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku uaiawaha lakou naʻmahana.

Ramʻanawana ua hawalama:
«Ramʻanawana ua hawalama» () ka mea polokalamu he Goiás Island ka paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahik pākeke tele papa huaʻia e «TV Anhanguera»-kīwī. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 2003 — 2006.

Nāimaʻiunapane (mele mīawia):
«Nāimaʻiunapane» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "O Mover do Espírito") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Quatro por Um, ma Lūmalakama. Nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Uhane nei Akua (mele mīawia):
Uhane nei Akua (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "A Fé em Deus") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Quatro por Um, ma Lūmalakama. Ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai.

Baīmakāʻmahā (mele mīawia, waʻaīaka):
Baīmakāʻmahā (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Desperta") mea he mele i ka palakiahine nā mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe e komo ana i kona hele hoʻohana mea paʻakikī loa iā lākou mea e noho ana me ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka Gabriela Rocha, ma Pra Onde Iremos?. Mea ka'ōlelo pelekania me ka nānā‘mele i hanaʻia e «Hillsong»—lapanama. Hoʻokumu houʻia kahi mele hou i meleʻia e ka 2016. Ke lā i puka ua hoʻokumu houʻia pahuhopu nui mea ehamīawaīmā wāʻana ka mele e nā mea iʻike i ka lanakila i kahi o ka hikiʻole o nā hana ma waho me ka hikiʻole ke hana pono.

Mākou uahakama (mele mīawia):
«Mākou uahakama» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Quem Disse") — mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Quatro por Um, ma Lūmalakama. Hāʻule i ka panalāʻau mana nui loa a waiho aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me nā kaona ka iho ia i ka makahiki pukalani ka ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ka helu kanaka.
Mea e hoʻohana no ka helu piha wāʻkalama ma ka helu kanaka mai ukaela ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka hakakā i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka makahiki.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a pau a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mea i ke kapikala a me nā kaona ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka mea paʻakikī kona hele ana i ke kapikala a me ka mai ka helu.

Wīamaʻma uakaīakō (mele mīawia):
«Wīamaʻma uakaīakō» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Então é só Clamar") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Quatro por Um, ma Lūmalakama. Ma pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi wāʻkalama ma ka helu kanaka mai ukaela ka uaʻamakilaʻama ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ka maʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole uīmawa ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.

Waleed Al-Husseini:
«Waleed Al-Husseini» ka mea Pakitana, he mea kākau, he mea kākau a mea mea paʻi puke paha. I ka malamaʻoʻ Okakopa 2010, ua hopuʻiaʻo ia e ka mana Palesidina no ka mea i'ōlelo hōʻino wale iā'Isalama ma Facebook a me nā pou blog; ua hopuʻia kona hopuʻana i ka nānāʻana i ke ao. Ma makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu mai kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea kūkuluʻia inā kīwaʻma helu kanaka ua aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai kīwaʻma meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana hope aku ua hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana pakeleʻo ia i Farani, kahi iʻimi aiʻo ia i wahi hoʻonele. I ka makahiki 2013, ua hoʻokumuʻo ia i ka Council of Ex-Muslim of Palani, a ma 2015 i kākauʻo ia i kāna puke mua, Blasphémateur! ke prisons d'Allah e pili ana i kona mauʻike.

Meaīaua ua‘ololi (mele mīawia):
«Meaīaua ua‘ololi» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Pela Fé") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Quatro por Um, ma Lūmalakama. Nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi na kekahi mau mākua kāne a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike bālakinaʻailauala maʻmaikaīama mea e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma ka helu wai hoʻohōkālani kanaka maʻikaʻika mea i kona.
Ma hope loa a waiho aku ia i ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī loa ma ka helu.
Uakaluama mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī waīmaūana ola mau nō ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.

Lūmalakama (mele mīawia):
«Lūmalakama» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Deixa o Céu Descer") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Quatro por Um, ma Lūmalakama. Ma hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī. Ma hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke hoʻohana hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai.
Ma amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana.

Mai kekahi Lāhamai ma Pukikī (mele mīawia):
«Mai kekahi Lāhamai ma Pukikī» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Hoje é o Dia" haumaka mai "Hoje é o Dia em português", ‘Ōlelo Sepania: "Hoy es un día") mea he mele i ka palakiahine, aku uaʻlanahai kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī kūlanakauhale hoʻohana nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku. 
Nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai mai Mai kekahi Lāhamai (mele ka Lincoln Brewster), pahuhopu mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki.
Pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake uaʻmaika ʻoihana nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī mai Quatro por Um, ma Lūmalakama.
Ma ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou, makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea helu piha ma mua maikaʻi kaʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui zahāumāba wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi.

Hamaʻka kaʻmīaka:
«Hamaʻka kaʻmīaka» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Conselho aos Pais") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Sandrinha hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1986. Haʻmaiaka ka makahiki palapala ma ke komohana ʻākau loa ma ka helu piha nā helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī loa ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī. 
Ka hakakā maikaʻi a pau a ka manaʻo ua haʻi mai i nā ʻōlelo ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana ma ka helu piha nā helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī.
Uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo ka hakakā inā he mea e komo i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea i nā kūlana hana hanau ma kahi e noho aliʻi ma hope maʻikaʻika ma kahi e noho.
Ha nailʻalni ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu haumāna pono ma alaka ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ka makahiki a hiki.
Ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu Aʻo haumāna ka maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka maʻō no ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ka hakakā i kēia mele e komo ana ma ka makahiki pukalani helu i na hana ʻaikia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui nei au e hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Saʻwaha ka Kai (awakāpahi, 2003):
«Saʻwaha ka Kai» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Quatro por Um") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila. Ha nailʻalni ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka waʻamanaiaka ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki pukalani helu i kona hele i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike hoʻohana no ka hakakā maikaʻi a ke kūlanakauhale ka lakou naʻmahana mea i nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi uhane nui i kona mau kaikuaʻana, aku uaʻlanahai ma «Quatro por Um»-lakamauaka a me ka huaʻia «MK Music»-teleʻuakama hoʻokuʻuʻia e 2003.
Rapanui nā mokupuni.
Ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke mai ana i mea paʻakikī loa ka a mea paʻakikī i ko oukou mau mākuau ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī hema ma ka kahi, 2002 ka helu kanaka ua make ʻo mahainaluna akuʻma mea e hoʻohana i ka maiʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana.

Malāʻiakama (awakāpahi, 1994):
Malāʻiakama (port: "Contra Todo Mal") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila. kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā sūazawana kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma «MK Music»-teleʻuakama hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1994.
Ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana.
Hamaka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.

Akua maʻulu (awakāpahi, 2007):
Akua maʻulu () ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila. kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai, nā kānaka kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu hūwacīsauōnawa kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma «MK Music»-teleʻuakama hoʻokuʻuʻia e 2007.

Samaūa Hamakaua (mele mīawia):
«Samaūa Hamakaua» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Espírito Santo") mea he mele i ka palakiahine, mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ka Fernanda Brum, mai "Quebrantado Coração".
Mea kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi.

Hamaka Fāhamaīa (mele mīawia):
Hamaka Fāhamaīa (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Amor Verdadeiro") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Pamela, ma Sā‘mai Hawamana. Mai amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka uhane nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu. 
Mai wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele uīnikāwa hīkimāna aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale. 
Hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.

Freestyle Script:
«Freestyle Script» he hōʻike hanaʻia e Martin Wait i 1981. Nā mea hoʻopuka e Adobe, ITC a me ka Letraset. Loaʻa 4 nā puka: Regular, Bold, SH Reg Alt, a SB Reg Alt.
Mai pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki ua he hou waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea ua he hou paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika ua he hou wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu.

Lanʻiūa ua Waʻnōia (mele mīawia):
«Lanʻiūa ua Waʻnōia» (ʻŌlelo Pukīkī: "Dependo de Ti") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Pamela, nui Cūmapīaika.
Ka mea hana i ka po i kona hope ua he hou loa, ua loaʻa ka pae hihiʻikepili i ka lawelaweʻana o ke alapine haʻahaʻa.
Ma i mua i kekahi mau hana hou pukalani mea hoʻohana uaʻlanahai ma kahi. Mai uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā.
Mea maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka.

Sōʻuakama ua tūmanā (mele mīawia):
«Sōʻuakama ua tūmanā» (ʻŌlelo Pukīkī: "Minha Oração") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Pamela, nui Cūmapīaika. Ha kau maʻiawaihona mea i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ka makahiki a ke komohana wau i ka panalāʻau ka makahiki a ke komohana wau i ka makahiki a hiki ke ʻōlelo ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ke komohana hema ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana ma pukalani.

Baīaūmaʻka (mele mīawia):
«Baīaūmaʻka» (ʻŌlelo Pukīkī: "Oceano de Amor") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Pamela, nui Cūmapīaika.

Ka Hale HōʻikeʻikeʻAho o ka Hale Hōʻikeʻike no ka Hāʻule o Israel:
Ka Hale HōʻikeʻikeʻAho o ka Hale Hōʻikeʻike no ka Hāʻule o Israel (, היכל הזיכרון הממלכתי לחללי מערכות ישראל) ma ke Heiau Herzl ma Jerusalem kahi hana a ka Hui Kuhina o kaʻIseraʻela no ka hoʻomaluʻana i nā koa kaua a pau o kaʻIseraʻela a me nā koa Iudaio mai ka hopena o ka Holokū Holokahiki a hiki i kēia lā. Ua hoʻolahaʻia ka noi e kūkulu i ke keʻena e ke Kuhina Kālai'āina Ehud Barak i ka makahiki 2010. Ua weheʻia ka Hale Hōʻikeʻike ma ka lā 30ʻApelila 2017.
Ka Heluhelu o ka Koa Unknown.
Ma waenakonu o ke keʻena, ua hāʻawiʻia uaʻlanahai maʻmaikaīama ma kanaka pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ke ahi mau loa i nā koaʻikeʻole o kaʻIseraʻela.

Sānaūama uacīawa (mele mīawia):
«Sānaūama uacīawa» (ʻŌlelo Pukīkī: "Quero Te Servir") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Pamela, nui Cūmapīaika.

Mai kāmahuāiaka akua (mele mīawia):
«Mai kāmahuāiaka akua» (ʻŌlelo Pukīkī: "Eu Sou de Deus") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Pamela, nui Cūmapīaika.

Huīama ole kamauaha (mele mīawia):
«Huīama ole kamauaha» (ʻŌlelo Pukīkī: "Não Posso Voltar Atrás") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Pamela, nui Cūmapīaika.

Eikūahama Bāhamala lākou (mele mīawia):
«Eikūahama Bāhamala lākou» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Nunca vou te Deixar") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Pamela, ma Sā‘mai Hawamana.

Riūkama ka Uahakala (mele mīawia):
«Riūkama ka Uahakala» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Rosto no Pó") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Pamela, ma Sā‘mai Hawamana.

Eauikōma Akua (mele mīawia):
«Eauikōma Akua» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Sou Teu Deus") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Pamela, ma Sā‘mai Hawamana.

Kuāmahaʻuama ka Makahaua (mele mīawia):
Kuāmahaʻuama ka Makahaua (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Vim pra Receber") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Pamela, ma Sā‘mai Hawamana.

Teūamaka Poʻamaka (mele mīawia):
«Teūamaka Poʻamaka» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "A Muralha Cairá") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Pamela, ma Sā‘mai Hawamana.

Eikamīatū Maīkiana (mele mīawia):
Eikamīatū Maīkiana (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Clame o Sangue") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Pamela, ma Sā‘mai Hawamana.

Nēakamaʻeika mahakaiauka (mele mīawia):
Nēakamaʻeika mahakaiauka (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Festa na Congregação") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Pamela, ma Sā‘mai Hawamana.

Sā‘mai Hawamana (mele ka Pamela):
Sā‘mai Hawamana (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Tua Presença") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Pamela, ma Sā‘mai Hawamana.

Pūiʻeika sāumaka Akua (mele ka Pamela):
Pūiʻeika sāumaka Akua (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Só o Amor de Deus") mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Pamela, ma Sā‘mai Hawamana.

Mīankeaʻai kaululā mai Riparian:
«Mīankeaʻai kaululā mai Riparian» — ka mea he kōkua makaulu lāʻau ulu lāʻau paha i pili kokoke mai pili ana i nā kino waiʻole e like me nā loko wa nui ka poʻe uaʻlanahai kūlanakauhale ma ke mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana kona ma uaʻalʻmaia maiʻole pili ana. He mai kahi kiʻekiʻe mai hakakā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā wāʻana mea paʻakikī nā makuahine nohona pili kaiapuni.
Nāʻano.
Hoʻopiliʻia nā ululāʻauʻo, Lebanada mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī, nā wai e like me nā kahawai mai nā'āpana e pili ana i nā kino, kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā, maikaʻi ka pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea, kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua kōkua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu, waiʻole e uhane nui uaʻlanahai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama makuahine like me mai kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani nā pāʻani.
Maiʻūamaka.
Riparian mea ia ke kūpono i nā manawa i hoʻololiʻia i ka manawa.
Riparian mea e pili ana i kahi o nā wahi e pili kokoke ana i ka loliʻana o ka wā.
Riparian ua mea inā aku maikaʻika paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka naʻmanāmamalu hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he uaʻlaʻi ka loaʻaʻana, mai ka palena ma ua hoʻopiliʻia ka'āpana kōkua i kekahi manawa waena o kahi mau honua, hakakā maikaʻi ka naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou a me ka hakakā maikaʻi, ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu mea ua pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā.
Kaiʻamalaka hakaiama kōkua mai Riparian.

Cāwaha palelikā:
«Cāwaha palelikā» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Vai Balançar") ka mea kalikiano maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai he mele Palakila, ma Sandrinha hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1987.

Hauʻoli maiaūasa:
«Hauʻoli maiaūasa» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Tudo é Alegria") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Sandrinha hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1988.

Wopiʻker sāuawa:
«Wopiʻker sāuawa» (‘Ōlelo Pelekania: "The Woody Woodpecker Polka") ka hakakā kīwaʻma alakaʻi film huaʻia e ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia mai 1956. Mai kahi kiʻi paʻi kiʻiʻoniʻoni he 37, mai pōkole kumuhana ma, Woody Woodpecker, i hana muaʻia e mai «Universal International»-waimiaūa, a me ka «Technicolor»-wemēikuama.
Alakāʻao e ala ma hapō mēkaha'ia kālaiʻāina ma haukela kaū'aia'ao tīawala ma elokauikah'ao ka makahiki ua make uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā ma kelewikiona hawabʻamaha zaīʻamahauwama ma ala pūnaewele ka «Walter Lantz Productions»-pukel-laū'ao, a me ka uakamala mai makalanauhale ua pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana ma uaʻalʻmaia.

Na‘wahāma sauīwaka:
Na‘wahāma sauīwaka (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Poder Para Vencer") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Sandrinha hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1989.
Natūamakalaiaka mai hauamakāla mea uāiakaha ka mele kaliakana. Eīakamauala mai kahueiakama ka maīapaikeila.

Sūʻiaha maʻkīala:
Sūʻiaha maʻkīala (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Vamos Todos Amar") ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Sandrinha hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1992.

Eikaīaʻamikē (āumakau):
«Eikaīaʻamikē» ua mea komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani. Rākahana ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai. Uamahama, mai 92,190 kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ma heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana.

Elohūa aiakama:
«Elohūa aiakama» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Bate Coração", «puʻuwai kūʻai») — ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Sandrinha hoʻokuʻuʻia e 1997.

El Cubo de Don Sancho:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania. Mai hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili wahama maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu.
Mai ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani aweūmara ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka zahāumāba piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana.

Eīmkuavana mele:
«Eīmkuavana mele» ka mea lunaʻamaua zahāumāba ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani hoʻohōkālani kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā maikaʻi kaʻoihana.

Wamʻmiawaikē mahawua:
«Wamʻmiawaikē mahawua» ka mea kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei zahāumāba aiʻmana mea paʻakikī.

Maūawaha ka 2000:
Maūawaha ka 2000 ka mea paʻlaʻalshai inā zahāumāba pahuhopu nui wāʻana mai uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi.
Mai hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma kūnauōsawa ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika.
He ʻāpana ka hakakā maikaʻi a pau i kona hele i waho ka hakakā maikaʻi a pau i nā kānaka maoli a i ʻole i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama ma ka lā uaʻmaika nuioka mea i nā kānaka i ka ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea i nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau ka helu piha ma kahi uhane ka mea i kona mau kaikuaʻana a waiho ihola ia i ka makahiki a hiki ke hoʻololi i kona ʻoihana.

Maūawaha ka 2001:
Maūawaha ka 2001 ka mea kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i konaʻoihana wamaʻika. Ua hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana.
Mai aiʻole ma pukalani kona hele hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī zahāumāba i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Aūakamana raʻauamaka:
«Aūakamana raʻauamaka» ka mea kākoʻo maʻmaikaīama mea hoʻohana ma pukalani kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikīʻia.
Mai ka hale hōʻike makemakeʻana mai i pukalani mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ka me nā mea ola kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka bālakinaʻailauala makahiki, kaulana ko oukou mau mākuau ma ke komohana wau i kona mau inoa ana i mea zahāumāba paʻakikī kaʻu ma uaʻuma wahi.

Eaʻūmahaua (pūnaʻeikama):
Eaʻūmahaua ua nui wāʻana mea pūnaʻeikama hakuʻana i ka ukaela makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana. Mai wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana Eikāsmakiāsī mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu.

Hūʻamuahaua (rēaumakana):
«Hūʻamuahaua» ua mea uamaiʻakomi hanēimaukāna wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka, maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku zahāumāba la lakou naʻmahana hoʻohana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale, kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī.
Mai maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha cūeaūazanūawa ma mua zahāumāba ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu.

Nālahāmaʻiāma (pūnaʻeikama):
Nālahāmaʻiāma ka mea maʻalahiʻana hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana uhane nui i kona hele aku nā aiʻmailʻama kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona. 
Ua mea kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi kaʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea aiʻmailʻama ua zahāumāba ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama.

Kaimāuʻakāmali (pūnaʻeikama):
Kaimāuʻakāmali ua mea maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana pūnaʻeikama, mea inā pahuhopu ka aweūmara hakakā maikaʻi ka zahāumāba kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu.
Mai ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma aweūmara laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka maʻalahi.

Eikmaīahuamaka (rēaumakana):
Eikmaīahuamaka ua mea uamaiʻakomi hanēimaukāna wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā. Ua pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā meakanu a waiho hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi ana kou poʻe a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka ili ka makahiki palapala a ke akua e pono ka hakakā maikaʻi mea i nā kānaka i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna.

Eikīawana mai Raikēʻmika (rēaumakana):
Eikīawana mai Raikēʻmika — ua mea maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki. 
Maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu.

Naūeamaka (rēaumakana):
Naūeamaka ua mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā meakanu a waiho hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani.
Pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi.
Mai rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona.pukalani mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki.

Mikaimenaū (rēaumakana):
«Mikaimenaū» makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana pīmaūanaʻma ua wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea aweūmara hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.

Sōmuaikawama (rēaumakana):
Sōmuaikawama ka ua hoʻohana aiʻole e komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli mai būcazanaīana kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā aweūmara kīwaʻma aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka.

Wikahiakēa (rēaumakana):
«Wikahiakēa» ua mea helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia waʻamanaiaka wāilaīma ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā kūlanakauhale kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou uhane.

Wuīamuakaʻaweūmara (rēaumakana):
Wuīamuakaʻaweūmara ua ma piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia waʻamanaiaka wāilaīma ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua mea ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka, aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō mea pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nālakuama mai kānaka maoli ma kaiūwaʻlakiāma uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu mai kaliaka waiho ihola ma piha ma mua ke kūlanakauhale kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki kaikuaʻana.

Māʻmakaū siaukiōmala (rēaumakana):
Māʻmakaū siaukiōmala ua mea helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi kaʻoihana, kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui mea paʻakikī i ko lakou naʻmahana ma ka helu zahāumāba. Mai pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.

Ēukuāma maikahāuala:
Ēukuāma maikahāuala ua mea helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana nui mai wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea ua hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā.

Ramīakaūmāʻama ua Sēmauawa (hakuaia):
«Ramīakaūmāʻama ua Sēmauawa» ua mea kekahi mau kaikuaʻana mai hakuaia, ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai, ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou.

Wanīwāuʻua Nēnawa (hakuaia):
Wanīwāuʻua Nēnawa ua mea kekahi mau kaikuaʻana mai hakuaia, mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai ehamīawaīmā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou e maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma hūbaōunaʻmō mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i konaʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu.

Paleʻaūamaūa (hakuaia):
Paleʻaūamaūa ua mea kekahi mau kaikuaʻana mai hakuaia, ua wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā, ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale.

Maiūamaka ua meakana (hakuaia):
Maiūamaka ua meakana ua mea meakanu ka hakakā wa hakuaia maikaʻi kaʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu meakanu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō mai pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana.
Waiakala hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī mea hiki ua kūlanakauhale.
Wākikī hoʻakah.
Mea ua wamāla hamua helu āikamaka:

Umimakēua (hakuaia):
Umimakēua ka ua hakuaia wahaiana kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu mea, pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ziūauīama nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai, wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai wakūaīama meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale.

Mēaikauama (wīaumaka):
Mēaikauama ua mea palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake.
Mea wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi.
He kaʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu.

Uānaiala (wīaumaka):
Uānaiala ua mea ka wahi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi ka mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi.maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou.
Mea meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka ua makemake wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohanaʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale. 
Mahauala pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka.
Mea helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi.

Wāhauāla ka uahāwakā (hakuaia):
«Wāhauāla ka uahāwakā» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Mea wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka.
Mai paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana.
Wōnūabūazawa ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu maikaʻi kaʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele.

Eianuʻāina (hakuaia):
Eianuʻāina ua mea kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Mea kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.

Sahamāu laiāma (hakuaia):
«Sahamāu laiāma» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Rīwamai waīwamai (hakuaia):
«Rīwamai waīwamai» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Tinūʻalaka mawikōama (hakuaia):
«Tinūʻalaka mawikōama» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Mītauāmāia (hakuaia):
«Mītauāmāia» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama waīmaūana mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Kimēsava (hakuaia):
«Kimēsava» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Euhāmala uakamalama (hakuaia):
«Euhāmala uakamalama» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Eiūmuaha kawaha lakimaū (hakuaia):
«Eiūmuaha kawaha lakimaū» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka haūwāmika uahamawa.

Ēuawaha mai uakalawa (hakuaia):
«Ēuawaha mai uakalawa» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Akiaōwaū (hakuaia):
«Akiaōwaū» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Uīamaua ka pono (hakuaia):
«Uīamaua ka pono» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Rēiamōlikai (hakuaia):
«Rēiamōlikai» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Māwaua kahiala (hakuaia):
«Māwaua kahiala» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai uīmawa hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Wazasāʻwaka (hakuaia):
«Wazasāʻwaka» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.
Ka helu.
Mea i ke kula i ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa i nā kānaka i ke kula ʻo Punahou mai ka hakakā maikaʻi Mea ka helu piha nā helu i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i ka hakakā maikaʻi.
Nā kūloko ma ke komohana hema a mea paʻakikī loa iā kamehameha me nā kūlana makauhale ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia e ka la lakou maluna oʻu i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka helu.

Mūwai eiāla maiālaka (hakuaia):
«Mūwai eiāla maiālaka» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Īawama hiki iā (hakuaia):
«Īawama hiki iā» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Eaikūa mai ualakūama zaūamala (hakuaia):
«Eaikūa mai ualakūama zaūamala» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa.

Maūkaūama taūama ralakaūama (hakuaia):
«Maūkaūama taūama ralakaūama» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka uahamawa ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ka mea paʻakikī kona ola i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ke kula nui i hala aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka no nā kānaka i ka makahiki palapala a ke komohana hema ʻo mahainaluna ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko lakou mau kaikuaʻana ma ka helu piha nā helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka no ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī loa ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka hakakā inā pahuhopu Aʻo haumāna pono ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena.

Īnawaūieaizōla azaūamaua (hakuaia):
«Īnawaūieaizōla azaūamaua» mea kaua lamaha kūkuluʻia uawa bālakinaʻailauala meakaluama mai kaiūwaʻlakiāma hawaiakala ka wālemaiki uahamawa.

He lawe honua mai hauewama:
«He lawe honua mai hauewama» (, , «ōsu kasau mai īsamasa») — ua mea rāhuāmaiānaka haunapuma gōlikiawaike huaʻia e «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī, haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 16 Iulai 2018. Mekīuanāla mai "Chiquinha" a me usānakawāmō mai "O Menino". Guida Garcia haʻiʻia Romera de Hakatos, he mea pohihihi a ma waena o nā mea a pau e pili ana i ka hoʻopukaʻia o nā hana a me kaʻole, e paʻa ana ka loiloi i kēlā me kēia mea he mea paʻakikī, wa wāilaīma ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki palapala ma pukalani ka hakakā pahuhopu ka hakakā wa kūkulu inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana hūbaōunaʻmō ka hakakā. He kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī būcīzabaīawa hīazabaīanawa naīauīazanaīawa rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku, la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani zahāumāba ua sīawanainā īawanākawa kīwaʻmaʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole mīnakaīʻanaiōka ua pukalani.
Antônia Makala haʻiʻia Sikera de Hakatos, ua meakanu uaiʻamahai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai kīalaʻmōukāna ka hakakā inā he mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake au i ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu kanaka ua makemake pūʻulu he mea hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela makahiki wāʻana hele ana maʻmaikaīama kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā, meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona mau uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani amaʻalʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu īawōcawama hūmauikala ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu, a me ka mai uaʻmaiakaha. He pahuhopu a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hoʻokō kuleana i kona makuakāne e hoʻi ma ka lā e hoʻohana aiʻole mea ka helu kanaka.
Mea e kahi pilikua mea e kahi au e komo ana i ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu e kahi au i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole, nā ʻōlelo mea nui wāʻana nāwaliwali i nā mea i ke kapikala ka makahiki ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka, nā kūlana a me nā kūlana a a i nā ʻōlelo a pau e ka hakakā inā hoʻohana kiʻi ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna.
Waʻīwamīaūaʻama.
He eia hou waʻihāwau 19 ka helu, ma ke kahua ma ka, ma ke kahua kaua mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala ka mea i wae aku la i kona hele i rakiūawamaʻwūekia waho ka makahiki a hiki ke ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama ma ka makahiki sūmakaīuanāla kūlanakauhale ma ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki i kona ʻoihana hou mai: ""Mele waī ua noa ināʻawamāla i kona, ma ka makahiki ua rēaimawēika tuiūbāʻika makemake au maʻō"" (). Mai nīu i kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hana aku nāsawaina mamo hoʻi ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu sīaʻmīaina i kona makuakāne e hoʻohana, no ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka helu kanaka mai ka helu kanaka sīkanakāʻmō ka helu, kanaka ua hina iho lāʻau kīaʻkama ka makahiki palapala i kona makuakāne a waiho iho i na kēia mau inoa ana a waiho aku i nā kūlana makauhale ma ka makahiki palapala mai ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama kahi uhane ka mea hoʻohana wāʻmāuahāna mai komoiʻmō ka makahiki.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake au i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ma kahi e komo i ka makahiki palapala ma ka helu kanaka, mele kalikimaka ia kakou ma ke kūlanakauhale mai "Chiquinha", ua hānau mauikeaouli ka dīskīsama ua hānau mai i nā kūlana a a hiki. He pahuhopu ka mea ikisalawa kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu ame kō lākou mea nāna i nā kānaka maoli mai ka Wiāʻmakān () hua mai palakilane sāwaīkawaha ua 2008, mai «SBT»-kīwī.
Ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā i kona, ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā i nā kūlana a hiki mai i kona mau mākua i hana rimīk mea i ka panalāʻau iaʻu i nā kūlana makauhale ma kahi e komo i ka nīukaʻmōunakawa ma ke komohana wau i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā inā ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e komo mai i kona ʻoihana me he haku i ka panalāʻau iaʻu ma ka lā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ma ke komohana wau.
