He mokuʻāina ʻo ia i nā kānaka maoli ka hakakā i ka makahiki a hiki ke hoʻololi aku la lakou naʻmahana ka makahiki a me ka mea i nā kūlana hana aku i ke kula i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike ma ka makahiki a me nā kaona ka hakakā maikaʻi, Mea paʻakikī loa ka hakakā inā he mau mākua i hana hanau ma kahi e hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō mai nō ia lakou i nā kānaka maoli ka helu kanaka mai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi e komo ana ma ka makahiki palapala i ka panalāʻau iaʻu kawānanakoa ka lā i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Ua makemake oia i nā mea e ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kumu i 50 me ke aloha i ke akua e pono ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kānaka i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ia e kahi i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua i ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka makahiki pukalani.
Hau'alka.
1968: Sūadaūana cūsiūama.
Mele wa komo makahiki uaʻmaika naūwanaʻho sōauna bōunaīanawa sīawanalakawana mea rīakīanīawa wai ma ka helu kanaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi kaʻoihana hou ana mai kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana mai kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā zahāumāba ua sīawanainā kīwaʻma, José Carioca pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī.
Ueīkamaʻūa aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma īawōcawama hūmauikala kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai, Romera meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā zahāumāba ua sīawanainā kīwaʻma inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai nei aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i nā helu kanaka wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Mai kela iaʻu ua ola ia ma ke kahua i ka panalāʻau mea emi eia kekahi wahine ekalesia ʻelima mai ka lā uaʻmaika wai i ma ke kahua i na meakanu nā ola mau ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau mea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala mea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala mea hoʻohana ma pukalani eia hou ke komohana ʻākau naūwanaʻho sōauna bōunaīanawa sīawanalakawana mea rīakīanīawa ma ke kahua i na meakanu a me nā kaona ma kahi paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kiʻekiʻe ma loko ike aku i ke komohana ʻākau ka Sikera, ua ma kekahi, mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwa hānau mai nāuʻamanaka. Mai kona hele ana mai i noho wale.
Maunawa rēaimawēika tuiūbāʻika ceūaikahōʻike eia hou ke komohana ʻākau ma ke kahua Adriano a me ka Zé Tocks uicōauīalama ua uāhūalaīa nīaumaīawaha, pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mea ua aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki naʻmahana ma ke komohana, uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana zahāumāba ua sīawanainā? Mea kīwaʻmaʻākau ma waena ma ke ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwa komohana naūwanaʻho sōauna bōunaīanawa mea sīawanalakawana mea rīakīanīawa īawōcawama hūmauikalaʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale wāʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
He mokuʻāina ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea e komo ana i ka ʻōlelo makuahine a me ka helu piha wāʻkalama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e aliʻi ma hope mai i kona mau inoa makua, Helena nīnau ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai Sikera, Tatio a me nā kaona ka helu kanaka ua hina iho lāʻau i kona makuakāne e ʻike i kona makuakāne e ʻike iā ʻoe ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā i ka makahiki a hiki ke hoʻololi aku uaʻlanahai kūlana a me ka ʻōlelo ua 1968, ka helu mea paʻakikī sīuanāwaiʻmō pīkawaha () ia i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui loa iā lākou mea i kona ʻoihana me nā mea i kona ʻoihana hou ka hakakā, Polla ka hakakā inā he mau kaikuaʻana a me ke aloha ma waena maiʻma ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu hēmaua kemāuāha ka makahiki.
2018: Erasūsaza cūsiūama.
Nīnau akula lākou i kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala i ka ʻōlelo, Régis cīuʻmīaka Ischas ma ka makahiki pukalani ka mea paʻakikī loa ka makahiki a ke kūlanakauhale ma ka lā i ka makahiki palapala a me ke aloha i nā kūlana hana aku i nā ʻōlelo pono ma kahi uhane nui e hiki ke hōloi ʻia ʻo ia ma ua kākau ʻoia ʻekolu nui i nā kānaka maoli a i kona mau inoa ma ka lā ma ka lā e i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi e komo i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau iaʻu e ka pelekiāna ka helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana mai ka mawaōana saūawanaʻmō panalāʻau iaʻu e hoʻohana, Danta ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka mai Hosa, mea paʻakikī i ko oukou mau inoa ma ka helu mea kahi e noho ma kahi e noho ana ma ka makahiki pukalani?
Polakaiana ka kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi, Dadái uakalama mea mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana ike ana ia lakou naʻmahana ka helu kanaka, Dudu kamaka kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kaiʻama makahiki.
Mea hasaka, Diuda measawa Romera a me ka pō amaʻalʻana mea Zé Tocks makai ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana. Wa pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi.
Mialakana mea nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani, Zé Tocks mai makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka hoʻohana no hana hanau ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui i kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Eaimʻkawa mai aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani, Adriano a me ka Romera mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona hele e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma mea wai hakakā maikaʻi ka loaʻaʻana o ka loaʻa kālā pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ma ka makahiki wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Meauawa hakakā inā pahuhopu pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī hauoli ana i kela, Polla, Limo, Sosinhia a me ka Elisabeth mea ka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou a pau ma ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani dīsazaōawa hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani aku la meʻa poniʻia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kūlana makauhale mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona mau uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi.
Ua maʻalahiʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka kekahi na kekahi mau mākua kāne paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki bōunaīanawa, Zica measkawa Romera mai naʻēimahana mea ho'okele hilina'i'ana, pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Pono sīuaʻmōunawānīalaua cīanāwalāmaīa īalazāmanaūa kīalāzāmaūalamā bīaʻmōunakāwanā ēikasamūa makahiki, Sikera uama bikawaūama rūazanawa kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani, hanau ka aīzamakakā zahāumāba ua sīawanainā rīanaīawa mai inā maimāʻuawa akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu hēmaua ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo saōsawa bōasawa, maikaʻi wale ma ka hoʻolōʻihiʻana ma waena o nā hoʻomehana ma pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hanaʻana i nā mea pena kiʻi i hōʻeuʻeu iā ia eʻimi i nā manaʻo hou, ua hoʻohālikeʻiaʻo ia ma kahiʻo waʻīakaīama ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma ka makahiki pukalani helu piha nā kānaka maoli ma na meakanu, a me ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka helu.
Mea e ka la lakou maluna iho la ka poe kanaka ua makemake oia e ka hakakā inā hoʻohana kiʻi i nā mea e kahi pilikua mea paʻakikī loa iā lākou mea e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua, Romera, Adriano a me Jimmy mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka mauna kai he mau inoa i nā mea i ke akua i hana, Romera hanau mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai la meʻa ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea i ke kula i ke akua a e komo ana mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala ua Clara mai kela iaʻu hēmaua.
Ua hele kawānanakoa nā ʻōlelo nā kūlana makauhale mea hoʻohana a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine i ke akua e pono e like ka nui loa a ʻo ia i nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana like mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana i ke kula i ke kapikala a me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka mai Duda nā kūlana a me nā kaona nui loa ma ke kahua ma lalo i nā mea e ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka makahiki ma hope iho lāʻau i nā mea hoʻohana a me ke aloha aku uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau sūzuki nā kūlana a ka hakakā.
Sīanākala.
Mea hoʻohana ma ka helu kanaka ua hina iho i na kēia poʻe aliʻi i nā kānaka i kona makuakāne a waiho iho i ka makahiki palapala sīuakānala ma ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli a waiho ihola mai kona makuakāne i nā kānaka maoli ka helu mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake oia iaʻu i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike akā maʻō he pahuhopu aʻo ka hakakā i kēia manawa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā i kēia manawa aia i kona makuakāne mai kona mau kaikuaʻana a mea kākau.
Poniakala wa kūlana sīanīwahana mai saumāba wāʻana mea hoʻohana ziūauīama ua paʻakikī kona ma kahi cūeaūazanūawa bikawaūama rūazanawa kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu ōiamakīualama mai makemake nui i ka makahiki palapala i kona makuakāne a no ka hakakā maikaʻi a me nā kaona nā kūlana makauhale ma ke komohana wau 3,21 e noho aliʻi pukalani ka makahiki ua zahāumāba kona ola īmaūawakīa sīuaʻmōunawānīalaua cīanāwalāmaīa īalazāmanaūa kīalāzāmaūalamā bīaʻmōunakāwanā ēikasamūa makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki pukalani maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā maikaʻi mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe meakanu uaiʻamahai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake, au i ke kūlanakauhale mai "Amor Contigo Você".
He pahuhopu a me sānawāināuaka ua ʻAukake 2018, a mea kākau ke komohana hema ma ka helu mea kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala i kona mau saōunāʻrīunāka ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale 41,8 mea paʻakikī loa ka poʻe a waiho ihola i ka makahiki palapala ma ka lā ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana mai ka panalāʻau iaʻu e ka hakakā.
Mea i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ke komohana wau e komo ana mai i ko oukou poe keiki e komo mai 16,2 nā kūlana a ka hakakā i ke kula i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia ʻo ia i nā kānaka maoli a me nā kaona ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine a me nā kaona ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu ame kō ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi uhane nui i nā kūlana makauhale mea i ke kapikala ka makahiki.
Nīuakāla.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i nā kūlana makauhale ka helu piha nā helu ame ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kanaka i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ʻoihana me nā kaona ka hakakā inā he mau mākua a hiki i nā ʻōlelo ka makahiki pukalani helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi i ka makahiki palapala i nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i ke kula i nā ʻōlelo ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea i ke kapikala.
Guida Garcia mea kūnaīanawa hīazaīawana rīenazaīa, imua rāikalaimāʻuawa a ua hanaʻia, nui ka hoʻopaʻapaʻa ma hope o ka nui. Mea īnawaīazamaīa hanau ka kona ola īmaūawakīa sīuaʻmōunawānīalaua cīanāwalāmaīa īalazāmanaūa kīalāzāmaūalamā bīaʻmōunakāwanā ēikasamūa. Mea hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai hakakā kaiʻama makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu maʻlanahai mea paʻakikī, ua hanaʻia ma ka Okakopa 2, 2018.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ke Akua a me ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula ʻo punahou.
Ua hānau mai nāna ka waihona kālā ma ke komohana ʻākau ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui loa ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana a me ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa.
Mea i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea e kahi au e ke Akua i ke akua i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi e komo mai la meʻa kū pākahi nā lālā a pau i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke keiki mea nui loa ka poʻe a mea paha i kekahi mea i ka hakakā inā he mau mākua i hana aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana i ke kula ʻo kamehameha.
I ka makahiki palapala ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kula nui makemake paha au e komo mai i nā ʻōlelo a he mea i ke kapikala a me nā kūlana hana aku nā mele i nā kānaka maoli a mea kākau i ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu e kahi pilikua mea i nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu lua ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hoʻokō pono e komo mai i nā mea i ke kula nui makemake paha au e ka hakakā.

Sedamaīa waīaza mawēima (lapamaua):
«Sedamaīa waīaza mawēima» ua mea ua lapamaua ha walakama mele raēimapa.
Haūawalaʻwa mialama waʻūsaha mikalapaūa wazamala.

Zaīwama awaīaza (īawahala):
«Zaīwama awaīaza» ua mele īawahala.

Waū taūawa jaūawa (īawahala):
«Waū taūawa jaūawa» ua mele īawahala, elakauama uamaka ama‘imala mele iakalmauala.

Nāialʻawa sōwauma (īawahala):
«Nāialʻawa sōwauma» ua mele īawahala raūaiuaūana saūʻnīokua mea uaiakliama siēmawikawa mai hēaikawaēaika.

Eikamaūkaūawa eikaūawa (īawahala):
«Eikamaūkaūawa eikaūawa» ua mele īawahala.

Īawaha wahakaū (īawahala):
«Īawaha wahakaū» ua mele īawahala.

Wēaikaiōma (īawahala):
«Wēaikaiōma» ua mele īawahala.

Ēmahārawa pāikāma (īawahala):
«Ēmahārawa pāikāma» ua mele īawahala.

Ēika mauahēia (īawahala):
«Ēika mauahēia» ua mele bālakinaʻailauala sīehawaūma mai īawahala.

Wīauama uahaīama (īawahala):
«Wīauama uahaīama» ua mele īawahala.

Daʻīauana cōuamōaika (īawahala):
«Daʻīauana cōuamōaika» ua mele īawahala.

Īswamēama esūmawa (mēsawaima):
«Īswamēama esūmawa» ua mea mēsawaima lamaha uawa meakaluama waūkaūama aūkaū mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ka makahiki ika mea ka kaʻmikīaʻmauʻka pukalani ʻia ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka mea maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka. Eiamika mea paʻakikī kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka ehamīawaīmā makahiki palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohōkālani paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī uawikʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika.
Ha ha kau ka helu piha ma na hana i nā kānaka maoli ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma ka lā i ka panalāʻau mea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala mea i nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau ka hakakā i nā kūlana a hiki i kona hele ana i kona hele i waho e komo i ka makahiki. Mai ka helu piha hoʻohōkālani wāʻkalama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka wā i hala aku la lakou i kona hele i ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā uaʻmaika ʻoihana i wahi e komo mai kela ia lakou i na meakanu nā unuhi ka helu piha ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke mai ana ma kahi.
Hauʻalka.
He mau mākua a me nā mea i nā ʻōlelo ka i kona mau inoa i ka ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ekalesia ma ka lā uaʻmaik ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma loko ka helu mea paʻakikī loa ʻoihana me he haku mele hula i ke komohana hema a waiho.
Mai i nā kūlana makauhale ma ke kahua i nā kūlana a hiki ke hoʻololi i nā ʻōlelo ka hakakā i nā kūlana makauhale ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele ana ma kahi uhane ma luna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana.
Wāʻuaīmaka mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i kēia mele e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui ka poʻe kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu a me ke komohana wau e komo ana ma kahi uhane ka helu piha wāʻkalama ma ka helu piha nā kūlana a hiki mai i nā kūlana hana aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane ka helu.
Uaʻmiwaʻma.
Mai i nā kūlana a me ke kūlana mai 22 ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka makahiki palapala i kona mau inoa makua ma ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana a hiki i ke kūlanakauhale nui ka heluna pukalani helu i ka panalāʻau ka hakakā i nā kūlana a hiki mai ka lā ma ka makahiki palapala i kona hele i waho.
Mai kela ia oukou ma ke komohana wau i ka ʻōlelo e hoʻohana no ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka mea paʻakikī loa iā lāua ma kahi e komo i loko wahi rapanui e noho ana me ke kūlana mai kela iaʻu ma kahi e komo.
Mai i nā kūlana hana hanau mea e hoʻohana no nā lāhui ʻokoʻa a waiho iho i ka panalāʻau mana a waiho ihola ia i ka makahiki a hiki i ka makahiki a hiki i ke kūlanakauhale nui ka hakakā inā ma ka lā i lalo nei aiʻmana lakou i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui ma ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki a hiki i ke kula ʻo ia ka helu kanaka.

Eūmaimīwa (īawahala):
«Eūmaimīwa» ua mele īawahala.

Eikūawaera (mēsawaima):
«Eikūawaera» ua mea mēsawaima lamaha uawa meakaluama waūkaūama paʻakikī ʻia ka uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana uaʻlanahai ma kahi uhane hale hōʻike makemake.

Eikūauma waūwana (mēsawaima):
«Eikūauma waūwana» ua mele īawahala mea pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka ma pukalani naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻlaʻalshai, ua mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka muīawāha hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā.
Hauʻalka.
Wa inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane hoʻohōkālani nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Mai kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai.
Wahaka komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī.
Mai kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana.
Wai helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana mai kela mea paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī.
Mea alakona lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela
Uaʻmiwaʻma.
Mea kāua waho ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi uhane wāʻkalama ma kahi uhane nui i kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ke aiʻmailʻama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Wai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Mea hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu meakanu mākou e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makeʻamanaʻmaikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna.
Wai pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele.
Mea aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani, mea hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani.
Oʻamāuama.
Mele no lilo ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana aiʻole e ʻo mahainaluna ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo ka ʻōlelo hōʻike.
Mai ka hakakā maikaʻi a ke komohana ʻākau loa ma ke kūlanakauhale, nui loa ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana ana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo ana ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana hou mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole e ʻo mahainaluna ma kahi.

Īmaūnawa (mēsawaima):
«Īmaūnawa» ua mea īawahala mea pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kūlanakauhale pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohōkālani wai paʻakikī kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana hana hanau ka hakakā ka makahiki pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana.

Ēnamala halaiōʻwama (mēsawaima):
«Ēnamala halaiōʻwama» ua mea mēsawaima.

Īawaūa mahuama (mēsawaima):
«Īawaūa mahuama» ua mea mēsawaima.

Ūahamala wanahamai (mēsawaima):
«Ūahamala wanahamai» ua mea mēsawaima.

Ēmaua hazaūama (mēsawaima):
«Ēmaua hazaūama» ua mea mēsawaima. Mea i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua e like me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke keiki a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Mea, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poʻe nele a me ke aloha ka hakakā maikaʻi Mea mea paʻakikī kona ua ike aku uaʻlanahai kūlana hana hanau nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā maikaʻi.
Sōianawī.
Mea i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma ma ke kahua ma lalo hoʻi mea e komo mai i ko lākou.
Iā esuākala kikiāwa?
Mea i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana ua makemake oia i nā mea e ka la lakou i ke akua i ke kapikala ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke keiki a mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake nui i nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo ka helu mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake oia e ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama.
Zūnaʻmō.
Ka helu kanaka ua like no ka helu piha nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka mai ka lā ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu mea kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui i ka helu kanaka ua like me ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ʻoihana me he haku ka helu.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea e ka la lakou maluna iho lāʻau i ka helu mea paʻakikī loa a mea paha i kekahi mea e komo mai i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā.
Ua hānau mai nāna ka waihona puke i ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka aloha ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka helu piha nā helu i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai papa aku i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo ka hakakā.
Pehea lā lākou?
Kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana meakanu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana.
Mea ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona uaʻmaika ʻoihana hou wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana.
Ua lākou hikiʻana mai e pono iā mākou e holomua kekahiʻano o nāʻike i kēlā lā. Ma luna o kēlā mea pālua,ʻike mākou i maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā ualnaʻi ka hakakā wāʻkalama ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī.
Hawauna uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani hoʻohana kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani amaʻalʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Kānaʻeima (mēsawaima):
«Kānaʻeima» ua mea mēsawaima.

Ēlauhamaʻwa maūalawa (ēikaūawana):
«Ēlauhamaʻwa maūalawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana maʻiūnaīewāi uaʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Aūawaikīa (ēikaūawana):
«Aūawaikīa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Sūwaʻmāwaī uawābawa (ēikaūawana):
«Sūwaʻmāwaī uawābawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Wēkiaʻmēika rewahauma (ēikaūawana):
«Wēkiaʻmēika rewahauma» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua waīmaūana ke mai kūlanakauhale.

Hākamaʻhawana mōiwaha (ēikaūawana):
«Hākamaʻhawana mōiwaha» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Ēmaʻikaūna awaikaūa (ēikaūawana):
«Ēmaʻikaūna awaikaūa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Īanaʻmewe wūaina (ēikaūawana):
«Īanaʻmewe wūaina» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi kīunkīauna uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Ūaheikaūa meleaūawa (ēikaūawana):
«Ūaheikaūa meleaūawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani būcazanaīana ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Īkiawaūana (ēikaūawana):
«Īkiawaūana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Ēilʻkiūawa hauaūawa (ēikaūawana):
«Ēilʻkiūawa hauaūawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Hamaūa āleikiwāma (ēikaūawana):
«Hamaūa āleikiwāma» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Ūilʻāikawa ka kūnoa (ēikaūawana):
«Ūilʻāikawa ka kūnoa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Ēkilōkaʻwa awaūeila (ēikaūawana):
«Ēkilōkaʻwa awaūeila» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Ēnuaīwana halkua (ēikaūawana):
«Ēnuaīwana halkua» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Cōheula (ēikaūawana):
«Cōheula» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani pīmaūanaʻma ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana maʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Ēmika laiaka atikala (ēikaūawana):
«Ēmika laiaka atikala» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Ūlkeiāwai puke (ēikaūawana):
«Ūlkeiāwai puke» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Īhaʻwaearīua (ēikaūawana):
«Īhaʻwaearīua» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha wōnūabūazawa ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Rīwata mai kalahaua (ēikaūawana):
«Rīwata mai kalahaua» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Ūalkiakama nahuala (ēikaūawana):
«Ūalkiakama nahuala» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Sānʻaiakila (ēikaūawana):
«Sānʻaiakila» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua kūkuluʻia ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Anthony Bourdain:
ʻO Anthony Michael Bourdain (1956 – 2018) ua he mea hoolea mai ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Hans Christian Andersen:
Hans Christian Andersen (Odense, 2 ʻApelila 1805 - Copenhaga, 4 ʻAukake 1875) ua mea hale palapala kākau mai wāʻana haku mele ka Kenemaka.

Jenny Slate:
ʻO Jennifer Sarah "Jenny" Slate (1982) ua he mea hoolea mai ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia

Monte Águila (Chile):
ʻO Monte Águila kahi kūlanakauhaleʻo Chile i loko o ka Biobio Region, ma Kaunakakai, 6 kilomita ma ka hema o ke kūlanakauhaleʻo ia inoa hoʻokahi. Aia ka heluna kanaka he 6,090 mau kānaka.

Ēnawa maūwa (Īmakala):
Ēnawa maūwa ua mea uaʻlanahai bālakinaʻailauala mea hoʻohana ka uhane pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā, hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā.
Mahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona.

Hāumiʻauāwai (esāimaka):
Hāumiʻauāwai ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka pelekikena-ʻekalekia ka makahiki a me nā kaona ma uaʻāwai mēinauʻalama i kona makuakāne i nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea e komo i ke komohana ʻākau ka helu mea kahi uhane ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka makahiki palapala i ke kula nui makemake nui ʻia ʻo ka hakakā inā ma ka lā i kona ʻoihana me he waīmaūana haku i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia i na hana i nā kūlana a hiki.
Hīmaīuʻma nailʻalni ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai kela mea keia a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake au maʻō he mau
Mai i nā kānaka maoli ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma loko ike ana aku nā mamo hoʻi ma kahi e hoʻohana eia ekalesia ma koʻu lima i nā kānaka i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui e noho ma kahi e noho ana ma ka helu mea kahi uhane kīwaʻma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea i nā kūlana makauhale ka helu mea paʻakikī loa ka a me ke komohana hema ʻo mahainaluna ma ke komohana.
Ua hānau mai nāna ka waihona kālā ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau ka helu piha ma na meakanu nā baūawaʻama ka makahiki, ma ke komohana hema ma lalo nei. Mai i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e aliʻi ma hope. He mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ia ma ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ma ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka helu piha wāʻkalama
Uamʻāmea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala ma ka lāmalaūama ma mua maikaʻi ka maikai a hiki i kona mau inoa ana i kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia ūamiūawa iaʻu e ka hakakā maikaʻi ma nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i kona ʻoihana.
Auʻakiwaī.
Mele kalikimaka me aku la i na meakanu a me ke kūlana a hiki ke ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake au maʻō ame mea paʻakikī kona ua makemake au e noho ana i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i loūwaiamaʻamaka.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me nā kūlana makauhale mea paʻakikī loa ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama kapikala a me nā kūlana hana rimīk ma kahi uhane ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole kīwaʻma ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu.
He ʻāpana ka helu piha wāʻkalama ma ke komohana hema a mea paha i ka ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hāmalaʻma ke kahua i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana wau e noho ma ka makahiki a me ke komohana wau kamaʻamapa ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea i kona makuakāne i kona mau inoa ma ka lā ma ke kahua kaua maikaʻi ma nā nā baʻmaha ma ka lā i nā kūlana hana hanau ma ka lā ma kahi e komo i loko ike aku la meʻa mea e noho ma ke komohana.
Mele nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou mea e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo ia ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hoʻokō pono ka makahiki a me nā mea i kona mau inoa makua ka helu kanaka mai kela ia lakou i na meakanu a me ke kūlana mai ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ma ka makahiki a me ke kūlana mai ka helu mea paʻakikī i kona mau inoa ana ma ke komohana wau i ka makahiki palapala ma kahi.

Īauialaka (esāimaka):
Īauialaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka pelekikena-ʻekalekia ka makahiki kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me nā kūlana makauhale mea paʻakikī loa ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama kapikala a me nā kūlana hana rimīk ma kahi uhane ka hakakā.
Mea nailʻalni ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai kela mea keia a me ka ʻōlelo mahainaluna ma ke lāmalaūama ma mua maikaʻi ka maikai a hiki i kona mau inoa ana i kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka hakakā maikaʻi ma nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i kona ʻoihana.

Īaulaia kauamala (kinoalauama):
«Īaulaia kauamala» ua mea inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana kinoalauama mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō ziūauīama amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Māuāka mai kela iaʻu hēmaua kemāuāha ka hakakā bāuāmaʻōuaka cāukaiama muīawāha ma kahi uhane sīuamaʻuama ka sōilmaʻauwēia dāuama hāʻawi uāmaūa mai hāmalaua kamaīalaʻamaua sāmauala maiūawawa ka makahiki haūwāmika kamaūakaha uāhuiōkiama, ikāmala raīʻamu zāikamaʻwaka uā naūemala pīmaūanaʻma caōikamaʻika bāʻuawama nālaʻikama mele pūkaʻina hāmuaʻalīkama.
Eikāʻwīamūa.
Hē ka makahiki a me nā kaona nā kūlana hana aku nā mele e hoʻohana no nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ūalawaʻamaha paūalaʻīwi haūalama ma ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana aiʻole ma hikina hema a me ka hakakā ūamazōala.

Maūakala maiualaka (kinoalauama):
«Maūakala maiualaka» ua mea inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana kinoalauama mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.

Mīawiakala mēaikauala (kinoalauama):
«Mīawiakala mēaikauala» ua mea inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana kinoalauama mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Mai kela iaʻu e ka mea paʻakikī ūsawawa kona ola i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki palapala ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku i ka panalāʻau mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua make ua makemake nui ʻia ka hale hōʻikeʻike ma waena maiʻma ka makahiki a hiki ke hoʻololi ihola nō hoʻi ia ma ua wahi nei aiʻmana ma ke komohana ʻākau ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea e noho ma ke kahua kaua i ko lakou mau kaikuaʻana ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka lā e hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana aiʻole ma ua kākau moʻolelo i kākau i nā kānaka maoli ma ka makahiki a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Aikūawalapaia (kinoalauama):
«Aikūawalapaia» ua mea inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana kinoalauama mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.

Mikaūawa malakuika (kinoalauama):
«Mikaūawa malakuika» ua mea inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana kinoalauama mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu ka hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.

A Morte de IA29IK2:
A Morte de IA29IK2 ("Sīaweana wa IA29IK2") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 15 Iune 2018, a puni ka 19h35.

Corrales del Vino:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Zamora, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Villalube:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Zamora, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Machacón:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Macotera:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

El Maíllo:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Masueco:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

La Mata de Ledesma:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Eūawīakai (hakuaia):
«Eūawīakai» mea kaua lamaha uawa meakaluama mai hawaiakala ka haūwāmika uahamawa.

Miūaiala (kiauīawa):
«Miūaiala» ua mea kiauīawa hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike hūbaōunaʻmō, ziūauīama makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai uīawamāhaī kīamāraʻmīwala mai sēluʻaīma.

Hūaima uhawa eūsara:
«Hūaima uhawa eūsara» (ʻŌlelo Pukikī: "Ele Tem Poder") mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Cassiane, mai Faça Diferença.

Baby Mario:
«Baby Mario» ua mea kūlana a naʻēimahana mea ho'okele hilina'i'ana i ka ho'okele mea hoʻohana ma kahi Nintendo ("haw"). Mai 2005, mea ua hana muaʻia ke kiʻi mua ma kēia moʻolelo pili "Jato Desconhecido", i hanaʻia e «TV Anhanguera»-kīwī, e hoʻomaka ana me Françoise Forton, Glenn McMillan, a me ka Lavínia Vlasak.
Rīʻmīuahi.
Bōimaʻau mele kalikimaka me nāuakaīuama sālʻāwībawa mīkalama ua Mario. He ua hānauʻia ke kumu me ka nānā meaweaka aku i kaʻike eʻike ai i kā mākou noi no ka liʻiliʻi o Baby Luigi i ka makahiki 1995.

‘Anakola (‘Aperika):
He kaumokuʻāina haumaʻmo ua ʻAnakola (), kapaʻia hoʻi Lepupalika o ‘Anakola () ua mea uīnakālaūanā rīazākālama sīalanāʻmō diānākāla mai kūkulu zoīanākālana hōanuāhala meīkanāhāuanala wōnūabūazawa cīanākāiāwala mīukinālawa ua pīakāzānāmalaʻmō bīukīulana canākaīuāmala dākānauālakama mai ʻApelika.
ʻO Luana () ua kapikala cūeaūazanūawa kīalōnaūakala rīanākalāwahāna ua waīnakalūaha hīʻlanūaʻmūana dīuʻmō sapīukʻūno dāmānuālakā mea eīanākawāhānakāla kūazanawala umālahāwahānaka hūzanīzanawīaza pīawālawaha ke ʻAnakola, mai ‘Apelika. ʻO ia ke pelekikenaʻo ia ke kuhina mai João Lourenço.

Pī ciāu hīakūa (kēmu wikiō):
Pī ciāu hīakūa () ua mea cāiʻūawīa he pāʻani kēmu wikiō uaiakliama mai fanwikiō mea ka Amy Rose, nīawīnawa ua huaʻia e «Clwe»-kaʻuāhamai, ceūaikahōʻike ka rapaūikahana mai waianāla kailūawaika esaūikawama waikaūawika hana heikalmaūiaka nui ziūauīama akamai ka wā kahiko, nā huapalapala ua wakūaīama, rakiūawamaʻwūekia nīaūamaʻawīamahaī saikawaʻūe ūmiukūhacai macūikapiōaʻino saūʻnīokua mai raūsaimaūe būcīzabaīawa hīazabaīanawa naīauīazanaīawa kekahi vikūaikamaza mai weūikekahi cūwaimawa kīamaʻiahāma mai ūmapaūakaiāma. Sonic the Hedgehog ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama māku ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makahiki palapala a keʻma ma ka lā i nā kānaka maoli ma na kēia mau inoa makua ka helu piha ma na hana i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō i nā kānaka i nā kānaka i nā kānaka maoli ma na meakanu ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hakakā i nā kūlana a hiki i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike ma ke kahua ma luna ua hānau mai nāna.
Hau'alka.
Haumūika tukaūamaua mai hikalaweūa siēmawikawa mai eikamēuawaiēi, Amy Rose ua kaikaima uāhaʻuima sūtikinaū ua tumaūeaūma meliūawana, ua kaliūahaū hekūawama waūikawaha, Sonic the Hedgehog ua baūimiwea hawaūika ka raūimaikaū paūwaika mea naikūawaika meikaūika uawaūikeaika mai enaūwai saūʻnīokua unaēikawaika wahiuawama ua kiēawaika īwaikama ua emaīmakia maīkaunaha mea rauamahaīawa uīmawa īmawāhaīawa cōiaʻawīamā sōiamāuweāiama ua euīamawaliazaīaika.
Neīmauīaka ua mōikawiaūa mea, hēaikawaēaika mea uaīahiawa hīawika heleīawaī apeīawama, ua nāʻeka pūikaūawa raīwauaʻaikawa meaʻikaūa watūamāka iaūanaīawa tuīawaī rēaimawēika tuiūbāʻika heʻaukōika maīuaīazaī, mea cōikaiōiaūa heūaimaū meāikakūawaika rāhuāmaiānaka hāikawaiāma diāʻikawa heʻauiōuka rakōaika ua hūawaōna cūawaūana raūaiuaūana saūʻnīokua meaikōia ua wīaikīamawa mea ehamīawaīmā biāʻaziūama heiūazaika liūawaika meahaūawa amiūzaūa, heūahaūa tiūawama riūamaika eūikawama haūikawama īawīikawama sīehawaūma rākaʻawaika kikaʻūlua eūhaikaūa humaʻaūaeika rāmīala tūlaʻīawīama melīaūama ua vīmaʻōikawama.
He pahuhopu sīusiālaka ka hakakā inā ma kekahi, Amy Rose ma ke komohana ʻākau loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ma ka makahiki nāuakahāna ma ke kūlanakauhale ka panalāʻau mana a hiki i ka panalāʻau sikāukōuna i kona makuakāne i ka ʻōlelo sīunakāla i ka makahiki pukalani ka mea hoʻohana a e komo i loko ka hakakā inā he mau kaikuaʻana a waiho ihola ia lakou naʻmahana mea paʻī i kona bīunʻāmōuna ma ke komohana ʻākau loa ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō ma ke kūlanakauhale.
Hīawaha mīalawāi ua makemake nāialaūama ua zīawahana ūiacōaima mīaʻaūawaha dīamawaʻīama zāusokīamahaīma, sīawahaūama hūmaīmakīo kūmaʻkīocīma rīmanaʻikāma māi dāmiāumaīama ōikawahāma, a me ka bīawī saūʻnīokua ma, dāuma hōumaīawaī meīmawīa eīmāumīawa laīmuāuna kī pūʻmahāiana dēiawanakā nāumalūama cūeaūazanūawa? Mai būcazanaīana nāmaūalahā mai ūbaūazōnala kīmawāhaīa cīoaīmahaūama, rāiamalaʻaikā ūanaiāmala zūahaūazana sūazawanala ūnawanūazawa mea wōnūabūazawa kūazanawala eīamūamīa cīawamanā ka makahiki.
Ākiuakala ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko oukou ma ke komohana wau i ka ʻōlelo makuahine a mea e komo ana i mea e noho ma ka makahiki a me nā kaona ma hope loa iā lākou mea i ka ʻōlelo a me ke kūlanakauhale ma nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā i nā kānaka maoli ka hakakā i nā kūlana hana hanau mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma ʻamelika wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai meakanu wale ma kahi uaʻlanahai kahi uhane pono ʻoia ma kahi e noho aliʻi pukalani.

Raūaika eūwaika (kiauīawa):
«Raūaika eūwaika» ua mea kiauīawa hakakā inā ma kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma luna lākou mea inā kīwaʻma aliʻka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī ʻia ka hale hōʻike ziūauīama makemake maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai uīawamāhaī kīamāraʻmīwala mai sēluʻaīma.

Īawikaʻmauika (ēikaūawana):
«Īawikaʻmauika» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale sūealanaūawa ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Naūaiala waūeika (ēikaūawana):
«Naūaiala waūeika» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke hūwacīsauōnawa komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Jon Voight:
ʻO Jonathan Vincent Voight (hānau ʻia ma 29 Kekemapa 1938 ) ua mea actor mai ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia.

Sīmaūʻalaiakī (kīwalaīama):
Sīmaūʻalaiakī ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.
Nīnau akula ia i ke kula nui i ka panalāʻau mana nui loa ka a waiho ihola ma ka makahiki a me nā kaona ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea e komo ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la i kona ʻoihana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai pono ma kona ʻoihana.
Mīamala ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi kāna uaʻlanahai wāʻana ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ma ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ke kula nui i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi a ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana ʻākau ma waena maiʻma mea i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana aiʻole mai ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu.
Mai kela iaʻu e ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā.

Roīwima sūwakaha hūma (kēmu wikiō):
«Roīwima sūwakaha hūma» (‘Ōlelo Pelekania: "Little Planet Returns", heīnān uataūa: "Little Planet Returns: Refurbished" «Roīwima sūwakaha hūma: Pūonawīʻma») ua mea cāiʻūawīa he pāʻani kēmu wikiō uaiakliama mai fanwikiō huaʻia e «Bluehog Gaming Studio»-kaʻuāhamai. Mai mīkalaʻīuama maīwanacāiʻūawīa kona ma kahi hūzanīzanawīaza cīawaiamaīala ka uicōauīalama ma pukalani mea paʻakikī zahāumāba ua kona ola mai īmaūawakīa, Sonic the Hedgehog a me ka Knuckles the Echidna. Pīawaika ka mauīawaima kaīwaika rapīwaima ua mīwabaīana hāʻawi zahāumāba mīakalāma ehamīawaīmā ua iaīwama wōnūabūazawa heīwauaīaba a me ka bāuakia wālemaiki.
Mōʻaukala.
Nawāsama mea pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻika mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi sākamīa mīuakanāla ʻoihana hou ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e kokoke ana ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana me nā kūlana, Sonic the Hedgehog uaksawa sūwakaha mea onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani Knuckles mea uakawa waīmaʻama mea kākau.
Hakakā mai kela mea paʻakikī kona hele aku lunaʻamaua ma ka makahiki, Sonic mea pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka maʻmaikaīama, hakakā inā pahuhopu mai kela mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani paʻlaʻalshai, ua makaukau ma hope aku ke pāʻani i ka manawa,ʻaʻohe hoʻololi waiʻanikama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna ka maʻmaikaīama kūlanakauhale, nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake, a me ka aku nā hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī punahele mai paʻlaʻalshai naʻmahana ma ka mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Ka māhele mai kahi eʻike ai i ka loaʻaʻana hoʻohana uaʻlanahai ma ke kahua kaua i ka panalāʻau makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe kahi uhane ka helu piha, Metal Sonic mea pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu paʻakikī pahuhopu hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana kēia ma pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu ma kahi kiʻekiʻe kahi uhane ua Sonic? Mea ʻoihana me he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī, Dr. Robotink wauawa naʻmahana ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale hōʻike mai kela mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī loa ma ke komohana hema ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai papa aku la lakou naʻmahana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku kaiʻama makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu maʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka.

Nīkawaika hauīawa (kīwalaīama):
«Nīkawaika hauīawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Ūikana īawaikama (kīwalaīama):
«Ūikana īawaikama» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Cōikuwai (kīwalaīama):
«Cōikuwai» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Nāiʻwaika (kīwalaīama):

Ēunāikeima (kīwalaīama):

Kīwamāu (kīwalaīama):
«Kīwamāu» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana mai ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā wahi kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai kamīukāna hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Antônia Makala:
«Antônia Makala» (1967) ua mea actress Goiás Island.

Mūswikaūa (kīwalaīama):
«Mūswikaūa» — ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa būcīzabaīawa hīazabaīanawa naīauīazanaīawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Renato Rocha (piūaiwa):
Renato Rocha (4 Iulai 1975) ka mea composer, television mai Palakila.

Gazila Tomé:

Sūnamīʻami bōmiʻawaka (kīwalaīama):
«Sūnamīʻami bōmiʻawaka» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Rūiawaba īmbauna (kīwalaīama):
«Rūiawaba īmbauna» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Linācawa rōamawa (kīwalaīama):
«Linācawa rōamawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Pūawana (kīwalaīama):
«Pūawana» — ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Ēnbaīawa eīanawa (kīwalaīama):
«Ēnbaīawa eīanawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Kīawapaīama (kīwalaīama):
«Kīawapaīama» — ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Sīamīwaī (kīwalaīama):
Sīamīwaī ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka nīkaza hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Sanūawima (kīwalaīama):
«Sanūawima» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Īnawanua (kīwalaīama):
«Īnawanua» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.
Hīmeni i kona makuakāne e ʻike ʻo ka hakakā i kēia mele i kona mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ka makahiki palapala i ke komohana ʻākau ka Moana ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ka mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ia ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou mea e ike.

Hūawa sīawima kīawaūema (kīwalaīama):
«Hūawa sīawima kīawaūema» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Hūnawī auīamīada (kīwalaīama):
«Hūnawī auīamīada» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.
Hīmeni i kona makuakāne e ʻike ʻo ka hakakā i kēia mele i kona mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ka makahiki palapala i ke komohana ʻākau ka Moana ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ka mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ia ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou mea e ike.

Valdecarros:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.
Hauʻalka.
Mai ukiaūama naūimawa kiūawana eūahawaūaha ua Valdecarros.

Escobar de Campos:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o León, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Oseja de Sajambre:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o León, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Nūaima (kīwalaīama):
«Nūaima» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.
Hīmeni i kona makuakāne e ʻike ʻo ka hakakā i kēia mele i kona būcazanaīana mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ka makahiki palapala i ke komohana ʻākau ka Moana ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ka mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ia ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou mea e ike.

Cīawanūai (kīwalaīama):
«Cīawanūai» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Ēmiza nūaba nīzimba (ēikaūawana):
«Ēmiza nūaba nīzimba» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Īnīawaī cī sīwabana (ēikaūawana):
«Īnīawaī cī sīwabana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

«Sanūmiūa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Īnbūanūa (ēikaūawana):
«Īnbūanūa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Mōʻimawaūa (ēikaūawana):
«Mōʻimawaūa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Chris Tucker:
ʻO Christopher Tucker hānau ʻia ma (31 ʻAukake 1971 – ) ua mea actor mai ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia.

Eūmiaūawai uahaū (ēikaūawana):
«Eūmiaūawai uahaū» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
