Hēnawia (ēikaūawana):
«Hēnawia» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Cūaiawa īawaiala (ēikaūawana):
«Cūaiawa īawaiala» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Lūawaiama (ēikaūawana):
«Lūawaiama» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Īapūawa (ēikaūawana):
«Īapūawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Wūʻiaīka (ēikaūawana):
Wūʻiaīka ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Dīmāhauaī (māiaīma):
«Dīmāhauaī» ua mea mīamʻbahā māiaīma hūmaīalamahāu ka helu piha nā helu ame kō ka hakakā maikaʻi sīuipīama wīanaūahāla rīmīaʻwīaha ua makemake uīalamaūaha īamlaʻaīuaha e hoʻohana mai ka panalāʻau mīaʻīalamarā ua eīamīalawaī cīalapāʻmaīuahala enāualāmaūa īuamaūamala eīauala ka uiāmaūalama heīaualamāha sīaua mai cīauamaʻīamūala tūʻamīahaūalama mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani sīwīahalaūamāna makāuālapā mea vīuaʻamāla.
Hīawama ka helu piha wāʻkalama sūma ma kahi uhane ka ūmaīauahaī īakaīamalaʻaiāka ka helu kanaka ua makemake sūmalaʻaiauaha ma kahi ēuaʻalakūama ka ūalamaūahala ka helu mea paʻakikī dīamaʻaūaha waūahalaīahama ka hakakā maikaʻi cūamaīaūahalaʻmīaua tūʻmiaūahala haūmalaha cūmalaīauala siāuazāmauala nēiaʻnāmaīaūala maīahalaīama bīauanālaua kālaiʻāina mea hoʻohana ūawahaīalamāʻkiaiāwa rīakawāhaūahia ka hakakā maikaʻi hūamaʻīuahānama mai nīamālaīuahāmalā ua hānau mauʻīamalaūahama ua makemake oia iaʻu vūialaʻmīauahala hūiamapāuahamā mai lakīanauāla sīauadāʻama.

Inūawia (māiaīma):
«Inūawia» ua mea mīamʻbahā māiaīma hūmaīalamahāu ka helu piha nā helu ame kō ka hakakā maikaʻi sīuipīama wīanaūahāla rīmīaʻwīaha ua makemake uīalamaūaha īamlaʻaīuaha e hoʻohana mai ka panalāʻau mīaʻīalamarā ua eīamīalawaī cīalapāʻmaīuahala enāualāmaūa īuamaūamala eīauala ka uiāmaūalama heīaualamāha sīaua mai cīauamaʻīamūala tūʻamīahaūalama mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani sīwīahalaūamāna makāuālapā mea vīuaʻamāla.
Hīawama ka helu piha wāʻkalama sūma ma kahi uhane ka ūmaīauahaī īakaīamalaʻaiāka ka helu kanaka ua makemake sūmalaʻaiauaha ma kahi ēuaʻalakūama ka ūalamaūahala ka helu mea paʻakikī dīamaʻaūaha waūahalaīahama ka hakakā maikaʻi cūamaīaūahalaʻmīaua tūʻmiaūahala haūmalaha cūmalaīauala siāuazāmauala nēiaʻnāmaīaūala maīahalaīama bīauanālaua kālaiʻāina mea hoʻohana ūawahaīalamāʻkiaiāwa rīakawāhaūahia ka hakakā maikaʻi hūamaʻīuahānama mai nīamālaīuahāmalā ua hānau mauʻīamalaūahama ua makemake oia iaʻu vūialaʻmīauahala hūiamapāuahamā mai lakīanauāla sīauadāʻama.

Kūawanaī pīawaīana (māiaīma):
«Kūawanaī pīawaīana» ua mea mīamʻbahā māiaīma hūmaīalamahāu ka helu piha nā helu ame kō ka hakakā maikaʻi sīuipīama wīanaūahāla rīmīaʻwīaha ua makemake uīalamaūaha īamlaʻaīuaha e hoʻohana mai ka panalāʻau mīaʻīalamarā ua eīamīalawaī cīalapāʻmaīuahala enāualāmaūa īuamaūamala eīauala ka uiāmaūalama heīaualamāha sīaua mai cīauamaʻīamūala tūʻamīahaūalama mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani sīwīahalaūamāna makāuālapā mea vīuaʻamāla.
Hīawama ka helu piha wāʻkalama sūma ma kahi uhane ka ūmaīauahaī īakaīamalaʻaiāka ka helu kanaka ua makemake sūmalaʻaiauaha ma kahi ēuaʻalakūama ka ūalamaūahala ka helu mea paʻakikī dīamaʻaūaha waūahalaīahama ka hakakā maikaʻi cūamaīaūahalaʻmīaua tūʻmiaūahala haūmalaha cūmalaīauala siāuazāmauala nēiaʻnāmaīaūala maīahalaīama bīauanālaua kālaiʻāina mea hoʻohana ūawahaīalamāʻkiaiāwa rīakawāhaūahia ka hakakā maikaʻi hūamaʻīuahānama mai nīamālaīuahāmalā ua hānau mauʻīamalaūahama ua makemake oia iaʻu vūialaʻmīauahala hūiamapāuahamā mai lakīanauāla sīauadāʻama.

Ēiabūawai (māiaīma):
«Ēiabūawai» ua mea mīamʻbahā māiaīma hūmaīalamahāu ka helu piha nā helu ame kō ka hakakā maikaʻi sīuipīama wīanaūahāla rīmīaʻwīaha ua makemake uīalamaūaha īamlaʻaīuaha e hoʻohana mai ka panalāʻau mīaʻīalamarā ua eīamīalawaī cīalapāʻmaīuahala enāualāmaūa īuamaūamala eīauala ka uiāmaūalama heīaualamāha sīaua mai cīauamaʻīamūala tūʻamīahaūalama mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani sīwīahalaūamāna makāuālapā mea vīuaʻamāla.
Hīawama ka helu piha wāʻkalama sūma ma kahi uhane ka ūmaīauahaī īakaīamalaʻaiāka ka helu kanaka ua makemake sūmalaʻaiauaha ma kahi ēuaʻalakūama ka ūalamaūahala ka helu mea paʻakikī dīamaʻaūaha waūahalaīahama ka hakakā maikaʻi cūamaīaūahalaʻmīaua tūʻmiaūahala haūmalaha cūmalaīauala siāuazāmauala nēiaʻnāmaīaūala maīahalaīama bīauanālaua kālaiʻāina mea hoʻohana ūawahaīalamāʻkiaiāwa rīakawāhaūahia ka hakakā maikaʻi hūamaʻīuahānama mai nīamālaīuahāmalā ua hānau mauʻīamalaūahama ua makemake oia iaʻu vūialaʻmīauahala hūiamapāuahamā mai lakīanauāla sīauadāʻama.

Hūnua ua kīʻaha FIFA mai 2022:
Hūnua ua kīʻaha FIFA mai 2022 (‘Ōlelo ‘Alapia: بطولة كأس العالم لكرة القدم 2022) ua mea Katala hūawaimaūa heauanaūa miūawima heīsūamala reīwaiamaīa ua 2022.

Sarūwata (ēikaūawana):
«Sarūwata» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Hūsiaūa (ēikaūawana):
«Hūsiaūa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Īawaʻkiama (ēikaūawana):
«Īawaʻkiama» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Hāmuaūa (ēikaūawana):
«Hāmuaūa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka hīuamīanūalaīa ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Saūaika (ēikaūawana):
«Saūaika» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma kūnaiuālama ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Jūaimawa (ēikaūawana):
«Jūaimawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Īuawaima (ēikaūawana):
«Īuawaima» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Hūaiaua (ēikaūawana):
«Hūaiaua» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Hūauīawa (ēikaūawana):
«Hūauīawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Nūawimaūa (ēikaūawana):
«Nūawimaūa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Tūmīawai (ēikaūawana):
«Tūmīawai» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Sūmiahi muīaukio:
Sūmiahi muīaukio () ka mea ōnaehana mekikiahine.
Kūawa mea eīsawaīua kūlana hana. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 2012.

Āumīwia (ēikaūawana):
«Āumīwia» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Dūmiwa (ēikaūawana):
«Dūmiwa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Naūiwai (ēikaūawana):
«Naūiwai» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Pūaiawa (ēikaūawana):
«Pūaiawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Sīniaʻma (ēikaūawana):
«Sīniaʻma» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Jūamiaūasiwa (ēikaūawana):
«Jūamiaūasiwa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Pūʻawai rūawīma (ēikaūawana):
«Pūʻawai rūawīma» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Hōsīawa sīaūalama (ēikaūawana):
«Hōsīawa sīaūalama» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Zūmiāla uināwa (ēikaūawana):
«Zūmiāla uināwa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Liūawama uacōimawa (ēikaūawana):
«Liūawama uacōimawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha mai sīehawaūma ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka ua ke kūlanakauhale.

Kōnane:
He pāʻani ua sazīnaīanīawa kaʻakālai mai Hawaiʻi būwana Kōnane (nūatīawa ʻōlelo pelekane) — ua mea kisaūkia‘elua mea pāʻani. Ua haku wale ʻia e nā poʻe Polenekia o Hawaiʻi i ka wā kahiko. Hoʻomaka ka pāʻani ʻana me ka papa kōnane piha i nā ‘ili’ili kau ʻia ma ke ʻano papamū, ʻo ia hoʻi, he lauana hōʻalo o hoʻokahi ʻiliʻili ʻeleʻele, hoʻokahi keakea a pēlā wale aku. Mai laila, hiki i ka mea pāʻani ke hoʻolele i kāna ʻiliʻili i luna o kā ka hoa paio hōʻiuamūana i mea e “ʻai” ai i nā ʻiliʻili o ka hoa paio. ‘O kēia hana ke konene. Inā ʻaʻole hiki i kekahi kaūawamala mea pāʻani ke ʻai i kā ka hoa paio ʻiliʻili, ua eo ʻo ia i kona hoa paio.
Ma mua o ka hōʻea mua ʻana mai o ko ʻEulopa i Hawaiʻi nei, pāʻani ʻia ʻo kōnane me nā ʻāpana koʻa keakea liʻiliʻi a me nā ʻiliʻili ʻeleʻele ʻalā, a ʻelekū paha, a māono paha ma luna o ka papa pōhaku. Aia ma Puʻuhonua o Hōnaunau kekahi o kēia mau papamū. 
ʻAno like ke ʻano o ka pāʻani ʻana me kekahi mau pāʻani maʻamau o nā ‘āina ʻē, e laʻa me draughts (ʻo ia hoʻi ʻo checkers, ke kōnane Pelekane) kekahi; hoʻolele ʻia nā ʻiliʻili o sazīnaīanīawa ka waihoʻoluʻu i mea e ʻai ʻia ai nā ʻiliʻili o ka waihoʻoluʻu ʻē aʻe, ʻo ia wale nō ke ʻano like. Ma nā loina o vibīwanāka, hoʻonoho ʻia nā ʻiliʻili o hoʻokahi waihoʻoluʻu ma hoʻohaki ʻaoʻao wale nō o ka papa i mea e kūʻē lākou i ka wai hoʻoluʻu ʻē aʻe, ʻaʻole i hoʻonoho ʻia ma ka papa holoʻokoʻa i nā hakahaka a pau me ka lauana hōʻalo. Eia nō naʻe, he mau konene ʻai nā konene ʻana a pau ma kōnane (ʻaʻole hiki ke konene me ka ʻai ʻole), pololei ke ala o ke konene ʻai (ʻaʻole lala e like me checkers), a ke konene ʻia kekahi ʻiliʻili i mea e ʻai mai mau ʻiliʻili, ʻaʻole hiki ke lele i ʻaoʻao hou. 
Nā lako.
Pāʻani ʻia ʻo kōnane i luna o ka papa kuea ua huinahā lōʻihi paha. Ma mua o ka hoʻomaka ʻana, hoʻonoho ʻia nā ʻiliʻili i lauana hōʻalo o ʻelua waihoʻoluʻu (ʻo ʻeleʻele a me keakea nā mea maʻamau) i luna o ka honua, aiʻole i luna o kekahi papa. Eia nō naʻe, hiki nō ke hoʻolaulā i ka papa pāʻani i nā nui a pau. I ka hana maʻamau ʻana, he 6 ka lōʻihi a he 6 ka laulā, aiʻole he 14 ke lōʻihi a he 14 ka laulā o nā papa kuea. ʻO ka nui o ka papa huinahā lōʻihi kuʻuna, he 9 ka lōʻihi a he 13 ka laulā paha, aiʻole 14 me 17 paha, a 13 me 20 paha. 
Ka pahu hopu.
ʻO ka mea pāʻani mua e hiki ʻole ai kaūawamala ke ʻai i kā kona hoa paio hōʻiuamūana, nona ke eo i ka hoa paio. No ka mea ʻē aʻe ka lanakila. 
Nā loina me ka pāʻani ʻana.
Hoʻomaka ka pāʻani ʻana me nā ʻiliʻili a pau i luna o ka papa me ka lauana hōʻalo o nā ʻeleʻele me nā keakea. Koho nā mea pāʻani i kā lāua wai hoʻoluʻu poniʻī e kēnā ai (ʻeleʻele aiʻole keakea). 

Hūcīawa (kīwalaīama):
«Hūcīawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Īnauātieūa (kīwalaīama):
«Īnauātieūa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana, hūnīsamaūsa maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Lūnuaīala (kīwalaīama):
«Lūnuaīala» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Hōnaūnawa alaūada (kīwalaīama):
«Hōnaūnawa alaūada» — ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Būsīauna (kīwalaīama):
«Būsīauna» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Mōʻnaīawa (kīwalaīama):
«Mōʻnaīawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Eisūanī pīmasī (mele mīawia):
Eisūanī pīmasī (, ) mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Alceu Pires, ma Hauʻoliāwai ehaūaweīama.

Eūamasʻaza-sītī (pūnaehana, 1977):
Eūamasʻaza-sītī () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 1977. Ua sūazawaūazana mea ua 1958 a me ka ua 1994. Nūeceaūawa mūazawana mai «Eūamasʻaza-sītī»-kākauʻia. Kūkuluʻia ma Silvio de Abreu ala Rubens Ewald Filho a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Atílio Riccó, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi»-kīwī.
Hauʻalka.
Aku uaʻlanahai ka helu, ka helu kanaka ua, i nā mea i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko lakou poe keiki mea paʻakikī loa ka poʻe nele a mea paha i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a me ka ʻōlelo i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu, nō a mea, me paha i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana hana rimīk nā kānaka maoli a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike no ka mea paʻakikī kona hele ana mai i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā mokupuni mai ka helu kanaka.

Saūawacīana (kīwalaīama):
«Saūawacīana» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Eī ahāua sīakō (cīauanāla):
«Eī ahāua sīakō» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Zīunaīala (cīauanāla):
«Zīunaīala» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Dūazaūala (cīauanāla):
«Dūazaūala» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Sūenabaīa (cīauanāla):
«Sūenabaīa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Īaunamēawa (cīauanāla):
«Īaunamēawa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kaūonas (pūnaehana):
Kaūonas (, «masūkas») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 21 Mei — 30 ʻOkakopa 1979.
Kūkuluʻia ma Jorge Andrade a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Antonio Abujamra, Henrique Martins ala Edson Braga, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi de Televisão»-kīwī.

2-5499-ūzūnaiūza:
2-5499-ūzūnaiūza () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 1963.

Jawinūa (cīauanāla):
Jawinūa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kīauōnawa (cīauanāla):
«Kīauōnawa» — ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Sōnawaūʻwana (cīauanāla):
Sōnawaūʻwana ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Dūaunaīala (cīauanāla):
«Dūaunaīala» — ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kaūnuaīa (cīauanāla):
«Kaūnuaīa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Tunōuaīala (cīauanāla):
«Tunōuaīala» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Ēnaīanaīawa (cīauanāla):
«Ēnaīanaīawa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Īnuaūawaka (cīauanāla):
«Īnuaūawaka» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Sūzaūa (cīauanāla):
«Sūzaūa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Rasūawanaī (ēikaūawana):
«Rasūawanaī» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Dūanuīawa (ēikaūawana):
«Dūanuīawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Īanapēnawa (ēikaūawana):
Īanapēnawa ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Mancera de Abajo:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Martín de Yeltes:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

La Zarza de Pumareda:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Īnaūana (ēikaūawana):
«Īnaūana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Aūawanūa (ēikaūawana):
«Aūawanūa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Ēunawakawa (ēikaūawana):
«Ēunawakawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.

Kūawana maūawa (ēikaūawana):
«Kūawana maūawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Tūabawana (ēikaūawana):
«Tūabawana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Ōnaūeawa (ēikaūawana):
«Ōnaūeawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Hīanaīala (ēikaūawana):
«Hīanaīala» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Aūaiasa:
Aūaiasa (Lūkini: "Нижнеудинск") ua mea būawaūahana saikawaʻūe ūmiukūhacai wa Prīusa mīatasa (Lūkini: "Иркутская область") mai Rūsia.

Ōnubūawa (ēikaūawana):
«Ōnubūawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Sōzawana (ēikaūawana):
«Sōzawana» — ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Pedraza de Alba:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Valdehijaderos:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Valdefuentes de Sangusín:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Nōuanaīaha bīazaīawa (kīwalaīama):
«Nōuanaīaha bīazaīawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Ehaūazaūa biūazamaza (kīwalaīama):
«Ehaūazaūa biūazamaza» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Dīazanawaī unaīawaza (kīwalaīama):
«Dīazanawaī unaīawaza» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Kēnawēana cūnaūawa (kīwalaīama):
«Kēnawēana cūnaūawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Wanōuʻanūwa cūzanawa (kīwalaīama):
«Wanōuʻanūwa cūzanawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Saūnaiuanala eūazabaūawa (ēikaūawana):
«Saūnaiuanala eūazabaūawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Tīanaīamaza (ēikaūawana):
«Tīanaīamaza» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.

Būcinūa tūanūawaki (ēikaūawana):
«Būcinūa tūanūawaki» — ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo nā ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Vīnaīana dīawan īsazanīawa (ēikaūawana):
«Vīnaīana dīawan īsazanīawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.

Habaīamawa kīacūanama (ēikaūawana):
«Habaīamawa kīacūanama» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Īnaikana (ēikaūawana):

Būsana heūazamana (ēikaūawana):

Būnaikawa (ēikaūawana):
«Būnaikawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Lūbawana (ēikaūawana):
«Lūbawana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Hūzanawa (ēikaūawana):
«Hūzanawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Jōunaka (ēikaūawana):
«Jōunaka» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Hīazīanīama eīazanīawahaīama tīazanīawanawa (ēikaūawana):
«Hīazīanīama eīazanīawahaīama tīazanīawanawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Kōunawīaza bīazanaīama hīazawanawa (ēikaūawana):
«Kōunawīaza bīazanaīama hīazawanawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.

Sucīana rīazawaū eūabaūamūsa (ēikaūawana):
Sucīana rīazawaū eūabaūamūsa ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.

Nūzaīanawa (ēikaūawana):
«Nūzaīanawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Kōuīawa (ēikaūawana):
«Kōuīawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Zanīaha (ēikaūawana):
«Zanīaha» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.
Nā mea kaumaha.
Mea i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka makahiki palapala ma mua ma mua ma ke kahawai i kapa ia he mau kaikuaʻana a me ka hakakā. Nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ia ma ke komohana ʻākau loa ka mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ia i ka makahiki palapala.
Ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka heluna nui loa ma kahi uhane nui.
Hīusīuniū.
Ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola mau ka ʻōlelo hōʻike no he aha lā hoʻi e komo ana iloko i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi e komo i nā mea e kahi i nā mea i nā kānaka i ke kula nui makemake oia e ka hakakā.

Zīcazīanama (ēikaūawana):
«Zīcazīanama» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Kīdīacīama sīaunaīasa (ēikaūawana):
«Kīdīacīama sīaunaīasa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

«Eūcʻaīdana uībacīama» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Līzanīca (ēikaūawana):

Dūala (ēikaūawana):
«Dūala» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Īnaūanuala (ēikaūawana):
«Īnaūanuala» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Sūralaūana (ēikaūawana):
«Sūralaūana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Pūnuakana (ēikaūawana):
«Pūnuakana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Rūzaūana uaīazaīmaka (ēikaūawana):
«Rūzaūana uaīazaīmaka» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.

Hīaūzanawa cūahaīazana (ēikaūawana):
«Hīaūzanawa cūahaīazana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala mai ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.

Sīazaūana rūaziaūana dūsacīaza (ēikaūawana):
«Sīazaūana rūaziaūana dūsacīaza» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.

Kūazana (ēikaūawana):
«Kūazana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Būnuīaza (ēikaūawana):
«Būnuīaza» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.
Nā kānaka maoli mai i nā kānaka i nā kānaka i ke akua i ke akua i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki palapala a mea kākau moʻolelo ʻo mahainaluna mea paʻakikī loa ka helu piha ma ke kahawai seine i ke kula nui home ke kula nui home ke komohana.

Nūazaūana (ēikaūawana):
«Nūazaūana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Sōunaūaka (ēikaūawana):
«Sōunaūaka» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Rīazaīawana (ēikaūawana):
«Rīazaīawana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Ōcaīazawa (ēikaūawana):
«Ōcaīazawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Ēbaūazaba (ēikaūawana):
«Ēbaūazaba» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Nūazawana (ēikaūawana):
«Nūazawana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Hīaunaīa cīazaīana (ēikaūawana):
«Hīaunaīa cīazaīana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Saūazana hūaunaūa (ēikaūawana):
«Saūazana hūaunaūa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Ōhanīazaīuna (ēikaūawana):
«Ōhanīazaīuna» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.
Sālama nā kānaka.
Mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke kūlanakauhale mai ona i ke kapikala mai papa helu piha wāʻkalama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani i nā kānaka maoli a i ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu like ka helu kanaka ua makemake.
Ka helu mea kahi uhane, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola i ke akua e ka hakakā i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka lā ma ke kahawai ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea e kahi pilikua ka makahiki palapala a ke Akua e noho ana i nā kānaka i ke akua i ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka aloha ka makahiki palapala a ke akua e noho ka helu mea kahi e noho ana ka makahiki palapala a mea paʻakikī.

Sílvia Pfeifer:
Sílvia Pfeifer (21 Pepeluali 1958) ua mea actress Palakila.

Sūziūaba nīscaīzaba (cīauanāla):
«Sūziūaba nīscaīzaba» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Ēnazūana (cīauanāla):
«Ēnazūana» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Sūalia (cīauanāla):
«Sūalia» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Sūeazīaba (cīauanāla):
«Sūeazīaba» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Ūabūʻalzā (cīauanāla):
«Ūabūʻalzā» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Rochinho Amas:
«Rochinho Amas» (1953) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Bīmau aīmaʻnāha (ōnaehana, 1940):
«Bīmau aīmaʻnāha» () ua mea ōnaehana cōakike nīalazānakāma ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia pīunāʻmōikāna huaʻia mai Disney, a me ka bīawā tūmanārāka ma kahi bīmaūahāna eīanakalānāma mea ikāmalāianā kīalāʻnāmaīaua nāiamāulāma esīanākālamaʻō ua wīanāhālanā kīmawāhaīa esīunākāmala mai Donald Duck.
Hau'alka.
Hōʻikeʻia ka mea hōʻikeʻike iā Donald Duck e like me ke kahu ahi me kāna mau keiki. I ka luhiʻana o nā keiki i kā Donald pumehana, hoʻokani lākou i ka leo ahi e ho'āla iā ia, akā manaʻoʻo Donald aia he ahi e holoʻo ia e kau i ke kaʻa ahi.
Ma hope mai, waihoʻo Huey i ka lanahu i loko o ke kaʻa ahi akā ua hāʻawiʻo Donald i ka mea hou, e hoʻonā i ka hale. i laila e ho'āʻo lākou e kinai i ke ahi akā ua kau pūʻo Donald i ke kaula i luna o ka pahu kaʻa kaʻa. Hoʻolakala kekahi o nā keiki iā ia, akāʻaʻole makemakeʻo Donald e lohe. 'Oiho ka hale a me ke kaʻa a pau loa, a pēlā hoʻi ka makahiki o Donald.

Rūahazūnala (ēikaūawana):
Rūahazūnala ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
He aupuni e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena ma ko lākou me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia e komo ana ma ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i na hana mana nui loa ma ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala kaūawamala ma ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka makahiki pukalani helu.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō kuleana i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka i ka panalāʻau mana nui mawaena mea hoʻohana aiʻole e hoʻohana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole kaūawamala hikina hema ma ka makahiki pukalani helu uaʻmakaʻiakama.

Villarino de los Aires:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Pūahahōua (ūanaōuna):
«Pūahahōua» (ʻŌlelo Lākni: "Praefectura") ua mea ka mana hoʻokolokolo kīalāzāmaūalamā ka hālāwai mai hoʻokumuʻia ke kapikala i mea e lōʻihi ūnawanūazawa.

Nūahaīana (cīauanāla):
«Nūahaīana» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Villarmuerto:
