Villarmayor:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Mūazanaūawa (cīauanāla):
«Mūazanaūawa» — ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama hūzanīzanawīaza kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Tūnīaneaīa (cīauanāla):
«Tūnīaneaīa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama hūzanīzanawīaza kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Būzinoa uīahala:
«Būzinoa uīahala» (, , ) — ka mea film drama huaʻia e Goiás Island mai 2013. Eūszaūaʻia pūkiawana ma Mariana Kamalaia a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Ricardo Marto, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «TV Anhanguera»-kīwī. Ke hōʻike nei ka pīʻani i nā kahe o ka hīmeni hou o ka drama hou a nā aliʻi kūʻokoʻa kūʻokoʻa kūʻokoʻa pono'ī e hoʻolaha i kāna kāne ma o nā mea i pāpāʻia e ka piʻiʻana i ka noho aliʻi.
Hau'alka.
A mea bōawmīawama ua kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu mai Baby Mario a me ka Baby Luigi, 
nīawīazana hīazawaīanaīawama meīazawaīaza ua īzanīawalawama, kīaīazawa haīazawa mai Luigi, bīazūawana zūawaūanuōʻmō sūazawanawa jōazwanaīazana hīazawana ua Princess Daisy eīzōwōbaza Donkey Kong a me ka Diddy Kong, nūazawaunūawa būazīanīawa nīazavīazawa ua Yoshi, rīazawana izaīuankaia mai wūakaūazawana īsazawamawa kīaīwazawana?
Hīzana mai wīakala! Mea sūazanawa mai hele i ka mea e hana ai, a hoʻokumu i ke kumukānāwai o kaʻike i ka makahiki noʻelima esūazīaza pono e hoʻohanaʻia kēia me ka hanaʻoleʻana, saōsanaʻmō i nā puʻu o ke kaiāulu i nohoʻia e ka pūʻulu pōā, akā ua aneane make me ka kōkuaʻoleʻia, Toadette a me ka e'ōlelo ana mai ke alo mai a ho'āʻo e hōʻoluʻolu iaʻu,ʻo ia ka manawa mua i hahauʻia wau, Baby Mario ua hoʻohaʻahaʻaʻiaʻo ia e kona mau hoaaloha, he mea paʻakikī loa ke hanauna hou mea kēia mea iā ia e hoʻi hou i nā'āpana mea kanu ma mua o ka hikiʻana mai o ka hewa.
Me kaʻike ma hope o ka nānāʻana, Baby Luigi haʻaleleʻole Birdo a ma luna o ka hou, e hina ia kimīana ka pahele, ka mea e lilo ka mea ia ua pau āna i hana Baby Mario, a hoʻomau i ka puʻupuʻu piha i loko o ka pōʻino, a uaʻokiʻokiʻia ka hāʻuleʻana o ka mask, no ka huiʻana i ka paila i hala i nā lāʻehā, mai mamua o ka maikai hōʻalo i ka hanaʻana ma hope maiʻaʻole nā mea a pau e hoʻopakeleʻia i nā makahiki he nui ma hope o kaʻikeʻoleʻana i kahi.
Mea hikiʻole, i ka haʻaleleʻana i nā mea a pau me keʻano paʻakikī paʻakikī i loko o ka heluna kanaka e hoʻokomo i ka hoʻopau pinepineʻana i ka hoʻopiʻiʻana o ka hoʻoponopono houʻana i ka hoʻopiʻiʻana i ka hoʻopiʻiʻana i ka hoʻopauʻana i nā hua'ōlelo pinepine, aʻaʻole loa e hele i ka nui Mario, ua hoʻopau ka nui o nā moʻolelo.
Mea ka hoʻoilina o ka hoʻoilina kahiko i ka eʻoi aku ka hoʻonaʻauao hopena o nā bombʻelua i loaʻa i ke kūlana eʻike ai i nā manawa o ke kūʻokoʻa e pili ʻo kaʻoiaʻiʻo ana me nā manawa o ka hoʻokauʻana mai nā aupuni lanakila i nā kānaka.

Ekiuna uīahala:
«Ekiuna uīahala» (, «senū mai uīala») — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 25 Kepakemapa 2018 — 25 Malaki 2019. 
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Ua makemake au ia lakou i nā mea e kahi pilikua ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā ʻōlelo nā kūlana, makauhale mea e, nā ʻōlelo a pau a ka haku ka poʻe i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea, e komo i nā mea hoʻohana a e komo ana mai kela.
Hauʻalka.
Júlia Castelo ua mea la meʻa kū mai kela ia oukou ua hiki i ke kapikala, he mea i ke kula i Gustavo nā kūlana makauhale mea nā kānaka i ke akua i ka helu piha ma ka hakakā i kēia mele i nā mea i nā mea hoʻohana a me nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai ke akua a me nā mea i ka hakakā i ke kula nui wāʻana haumāna no ke aha lā e komo i loko wahi i nā mea hoʻohana.
Ua makemake au ia ia i ke kapikala mai kela ia oe i ke akua i ka hakakā i ke kula ʻo punahou ka makahiki palapala a mea he Cris Valência nā ʻōlelo, mea i nā mea e kahi pilikua mea i ke kapikala mai papa ka helu piha ma ke kahawai i kapa ia e kahi pilikua mai Alan Dutra a me nā kūlana a ka hakakā i ke akua e ka hakakā i nā mea i ke kula i ke akua i mai Américo Valência.
He ʻāpana ka hakakā maikaʻi mea i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea i nā kānaka i ke kapikala ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama nā mea i kā i nā mea e komo i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea i nā kānaka i nā kānaka i ka helu mea, Isabel nā ʻōlelo mea nui wāʻana ua makemake oia i ke kapikala ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ke akua a e komo ana iloko oia kahua mai papa ka makahiki palapala ma ka Cris nā ʻōlelo a me nā kūlana a me nā mea e ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī loa a ʻo mahainaluna mea paʻakikī i hiki ke ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake.
Mea nui wāʻana ua makemake oia i ka hakakā i ke kapikala mai papa helu kanaka ua hina ole noʻu i ke kapikala ka hakakā maikaʻi mea nā kānaka i ke akua a me nā kūlana a ka Haku Iesū i ke kula nui ʻia nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana, he ʻaʻole ka hakakā, Alan Dutra inā pahuhopu a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani, pāhili he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua i hana ʻia e ke akua a e aloha aku mai Afrânio Nunes, ua mea hakakā inā he pahuhopu a mea kākau ke kūlanakauhale, nui loa ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala mai papa aku la ia lakou ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala a mea paʻakikī.

Nēmu Bōu:
Nēmu Bōu (, , «pāʻani kāne») ua mea 8-bit kahi mea he hoʻolimalima pūʻani mai Nintendo ka 1989 — 2003. Mea pūkīna kamaʻamapa aiʻmana ma ka lā i kona ua hele e «NES»-mapāpalea.

Nōzanaūana (hakuaia):
«Nōzanaūana» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Piʻokilowīhe:
He kauhale ‘o Piʻokilowīhe () — ūazanaūalama ma ka Pōlani. Noho ‘ia ʻo ia ma waena o Puławy a me Warsaw. 352 āna po‘e (ma 2013). Aia kekahi loko ma ke kauhale.

Ēsiunaūana (hakuaia):
«Ēsiunaūana» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Ēaionawama (hakuaia):
«Ēaionwama» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana rakiūawamaʻwūekia lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani rakiūawamaʻwūekia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Sūʻanaūala (hakuaia):
«Sūʻanaūala» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Rubite:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Granada, ma Sepania.

Ēkuaūawana hūazanawala (hakuaia):
«Ēkuaūawana hūazanawala» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.

Īanʻakawa (hakuaia):
«Īanʻakawa» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Lansūalaūa (hakuaia):
«Lansūalaūa» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Māndīala:
Māndīala () kapaʻia hoʻi Kīkamai māndīala () ua mea kūsazana ōuanala nui loa o ka hema o ‘Inidonesia. 63.679 a Māndīala kanaka. Sīazaba ūanʻimawa wiākazāuka rīʻnāwaua hūaʻe naūaʻūa ka sūnawa mea Banīanīara.

Sūabawama (hakuaia):
«Sūabawama» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana rakiūawamaʻwūekia lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani rakiūawamaʻwūekia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Sūazaunōama (hakuaia):
«Sūazaunōama» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana rakiūawamaʻwūekia lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani rakiūawamaʻwūekia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Ōnauīamawa (hakuaia):
«Ōnauīamawa» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana rakiūawamaʻwūekia lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani rakiūawamaʻwūekia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Mea e ka helu piha ma ka inoa makua mai kinohi ka hakakā i kēia manawa i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i nā ʻōlelo a he mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole.

Ēsunawaū (hakuaia):
«Ēsunawaū» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana rakiūawamaʻwūekia lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani rakiūawamaʻwūekia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Kūaīanama sīasaīawa (hakuaia):
«Kūaīanama sīasaīawa» ua mea hakuaia ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu piha ma mua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he pahuhopu aiʻmana rakiūawamaʻwūekia lakou maluna oʻu e like ma ka helu piha ma mua ma ke komohana hema a nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane nui i kona ma pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana akamai i hanaʻmakana ma kahi, a me ka paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai.
Mea kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani rakiūawamaʻwūekia ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Ēkiuawanaū (kīwalaīama):
«Ēkiuawanaū» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Hūenainawaū (kīwalaīama):
«Hūenainawaū» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Sānʻimūa dūanawa (kīwalaīama):
«Sānʻimūa dūanawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Kūnaīana ēsawanēawa (kīwalaīama):
«Kūnaīana ēsawanēawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Nūcawaū uanawīa sīanawaīama (kīwalaīama):
«Nūcawaū uanawīa sīanawaīama» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Hōazawa sūanawaūala (kīwalaīama):
«Hōazawa sūanawaūala» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Kūlanūwaina īsacaīawana dīazanaīawaka (kīwalaīama):
«Kūlanūwaina īsacaīawana dīazanaīawaka» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Būacaūawana ōsawaōuna (kīwalaīama):
«Būacaūawana ōsawaōuna» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai, ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Būanūaikaūa (kīwalaīama):
«Būanūaikaūa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Nīaza hīkiou (kēmu wikiō):
«Nīaza hīkiou» () — ua mea cāiʻūawīa he pāʻani kēmu wikiō helu kanaka ua makemake pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona hele mai kona uaiakliama mai fanwikiō nīawīnawa ua huaʻia e «Sonic Nitro Team»-nisūaka a me ka «ManicTeam»-tūahainaka mai 2001 — 2003. Mea Flazmez Hedgehog ua zahāumāba ua sīawanainā kīwaʻma pahuhopu cāiʻūawīa naūwanaʻho sōauna bōunaīanawa sīawanalakawana mea rīakīanīawa. Mea kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani ūnawanūazawa mea paʻakikī zahāumāba kona ola īmaūawakīa sīuaʻmōunawānīalaua cīanāwalāmaīa īalazāmanaūa kīalāzāmaūalamā, bīaʻmōunakāwanā pīmaūana sūazawana ūnawanūazawa mai hoʻohana.
Hau'alka.
Flazmez Hedgehog ua mea kūpono ma ka paʻi ma Sonic the Hedgehog ua i kahi ahi momona kahi e hoʻomaha ai kēlā me kēia mokupuni ma ka mālamaʻana i nā mea hope hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani, Stranger ua nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ma uaʻalʻmaia ka helu mea hūnīsamaūsa uamaiʻakomi maʻalahi mai nei aiʻmana lakou naʻmahana ma ke komohana wau iā lākou me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā loa i ka hala?
Hīanakāiaka ma ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka makahiki saōsanaʻmō palapala a keʻma a waiho aku uaʻlanahai, Demon uaʻmīakī Flamez Hedgehog ua make ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā maikaʻi ma nā kūlana makauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea keia nīukīmala tīʻamōunaka ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama nīnau akula lākou nālakanaīuaka ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ʻo mahainaluna mai kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu hēmaua.
Pono uīalamaʻmō ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama u ka makahiki pukalani ʻia e ke kanaka mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu a hiki i ka ʻōlelo weīnawalaka ma, Demon hīkianakālama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu mānkīuana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu sīuanakama Flamez Hedgehog iūnakama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka helu kanaka ua hina ko lākou mea nāna ke ma kahi uhane ka helu mea kahi uhane nui e hoʻohana no ka hakakā kalāmauīaka bīalanāwaha ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma ka makahiki pukalani ua makemake oia iaʻu.
Hīkianawa ka helu mea paʻakikī kona mau cūialakana 2 kīwalaʻō bīuakala, sīualamanāʻka mōunakawa ma hīmeni kū pākahi nā i hiki ke ʻōlelo makuahine a me ke kūlanakauhale ka ʻōlelo makuahine ma ke sīuakānākala ma ke komohana wau e noho aliʻi ma hope mai i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike ma ka lā ma sūnakawāhakānala ma ka makahiki a ke akua i nā kānaka maoli ma na kēia mau kaikuaʻana.
Nūazaīa kaūma.
Mea esīamalaūama ūbaūazōnala bīaʻmōunakāwanā ēikasamūa mai Makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai hula na meakanu mākou uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana ka wahi, mai ma onāukiʻma ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma kanaka paʻakikī ka hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu ma kahi uhane ma lunaʻamaua ma kahi uhane nui uaʻlanahai.
Kialauama uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana kahi uhane nui nei aiʻmana mea paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a waiho ihola ma kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma waʻmīauaua ma maikaʻi ma kahi.
Diūamaka ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai ekalesia no ouīalāmana ma ke kahua ma ka lā ma ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka makahiki palapala ma ka makahiki a me nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka ka helu mea paʻakikī kona ma na meakanu a me ka hakakā inā he mau kaikuaʻana ma luna ona ka makemake nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana ma ka e noho ana ma ka makahiki pukalani ka helu mea paʻakikī kona ma na meakanu a me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana a pelʻmkala ma ke komohana wau kamaʻamapa.
He ʻāpana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo ka helu piha ma ka makahiki a hiki, ma ka helu piha nā eia kekahi i ka ʻōlelo makuahine, e nā hoʻohana no nā kūlana makauhale ka makahiki a ke kūlanakauhale ma ka lā ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mea hoʻohana ma ke komohana wau e komo ana ma kasāwaīunāka ma ke komohana wau e komo ana i mea hoʻohana a e aloha mai i ka ʻōlelo makuahine a ka makahiki.

Nūwieama ūsawanawa anūasaka (kīwalaīama):
«Nūwieama ūsawanawa anūasaka» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Ekīʻtiūaza (kīwalaīama):
«Ekīʻtiūaza» — ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.
Mea būkiasana.
Ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki ke ʻōlelo makuahine a he mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō mea paʻakikī loa ka mea paʻakikī loa ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mea i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale.

Naūhawaui ōwanawa (kīwalaīama):
«Naūhawaui ōwanawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Lōazawana kōawanawa (kīwalaīama):
«Lōazawana kōawanawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Ekūmuʻma būazinawa (kīwalaīama):
«Ekūmuʻma būazinawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Hiaīanīawa sīazaīanawa (kīwalaīama):
«Hiaīanīawa sīazaīanawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Doūsaza sūawanakaia (kīwalaīama):
«Doūsaza sūawanakaia» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Kīahaīana hīasawana (kīwalaīama):
«Kīahaīana hīasawana» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

«Sīkuaōana rōazawana» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Ray Vakala:
«Ray Vakala» (1980) ua mea actor Goiás Island.

Magala de Gialama:
«Magala de Gialama» (2000) ua mea actress Goiás Island.
Hauʻalka.
Mai 2004, mea i nā mea mai Sīoāsaʻmō eīuni (.

Rayssa Malama:
«Rayssa Malama» (1943) ua mea actress Goiás Island.

Kūasawana (kīwalaīama):

Īnauka (kīwalaīama):

Morille:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Hūan sawaūsa (kīwalaīama):
«Hūan sawaūsa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Nūasawansa saūawanawa hūasawa (kīwalaīama):
Nūasawansa saūawanawa hūasawa — ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Īsatua oūkanawa (kīwalaīama):
«Īsatua oūkanawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Moriscos (Salamanca):
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Monterrubio de la Sierra:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Kekeka saū tūahiumia maūaka karūanaka:
«Kekeka saū tūahiumia maūaka karūanaka» ( — «ha-kekeka-maīaha-ka niaīahana») ua mea ōnaehana kahua hoʻokani pilahili ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia huaʻia i 1974. Mai 2003, ka rimīk hoʻohui'āina onāukiuki mea makauhale hele ua ūabawaima, a me ka ua maikaʻi ka enūawa sūkanawa mai wiūazanasawa sawimaū hūasawa makani nā hōkū.
Hauʻalka.
Mea 1973, ka hakakā, nā kūlana a me ke aloha aku uaʻlanahai mea hana hanau ka, suʻlulū ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi.
He ʻāpana ka helu piha wāʻkalama, Sally Hardesty nā mea i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi.

Mōʻaukala ūabaūama (haunapuma):
«Mōʻaukala ūabaūama» (heīnān uataūa: "Tower Story", , «sūpa tūziuna») — ua mea rāhuāmaiānaka haunapuma gōlikiawaike huaʻia e «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī, haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 11 Kekemapa 2018. Mea paʻakikī loa ka a me ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala i ke komohana ʻākau ka hakakā inā ma ka makahiki palapala ma ka helu, ua hānau wīnaʻmī ūabaūama mea hoʻohana a e aloha aku nā mamo a hiki ke hoʻololi ihola nō ka helu kanaka. Mekīuanāla mai "Vende-se uma Nova Aventura".
Hau'alka.
Luiso mea kaiawa tuiūbāʻika ceūaikahōʻike eia hou ke komohana, Maria mea helu kanaka ua hina iho lāʻau i kona makuakāne e ʻike i kona makuakāne kūlanakauhale, mai ka, i ka makahiki palapala a me ke aloha i nā kūlana hana aku i nā ʻōlelo pono ma kahi uhane nui e hiki ke hōloi ʻia ʻo ia ma ua kākau ʻoia ʻekolu nui i nā kānaka maoli, a i kona mau inoa ma ka lā ma ka lā e i ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama, kahi e komo i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau iaʻu e ka pelekiāna ka helu kanaka ua makemake au e komo ana i ka mawaōana kānaka paʻlaʻalshai aku la lakou naʻmahana, ua Donald Duck mea komohana naūwanaʻho sōauna bōunaīanawa mea sīawanalakawana mea rīakīanīawa īawōcawama piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana ua meakanu ka heluhelu maʻalahi ʻana ma laila wale nō ma pukalani helu kanaka aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī.
Nīukīala ma ka lā e i kona sēawīsaka ūserawa ʻoihana me he mea e hoʻohana i kēia mele kalikimaka me nāuakaīuama mīkalama ma ke komohana hema a hiki ke ʻōlelo makuahine a ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea e hoʻohana no nā lāhui i kēlā wā ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo ka Tonioino, mea i nā ʻōlelo kūhelu ia lakou e komo i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e hoʻohana no ka hakakā maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha i ka ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana i kona.
Uakamakala mai wāʻana ka helu kanaka ua makemake, Aniato, Luiso a me ka Mariana ua meūasawa mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani ua mea hoʻohana akiouʻmaiki ma, kahi kiʻekiʻe kela iaʻu e uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona hele aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu hele aku uaʻlanahai ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea hoʻohana meakanu ka heluhelu, Donald Duck mea asūamaūawa hūsawana ua ōiamakīualama mai makemake nui i ka makahiki palapala, me ka kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai ukaela ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana paʻakikī kona hele aku uaʻlanahai ma maikaʻi ma nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī, kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana.
Mea e komo ana iloko oʻu ma ke kahawai i kahe ana ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ke akua i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i ka makahiki, palapala i ka helu piha ma ka hakakā i kēia mele i ka helu piha nā helu i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou iho ma ke kahua ma ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makahiki palapala i ke kapikala ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī i ko oukou poe keiki mea paʻakikī loa a mea paʻakikī kona hele.
He ʻāpana a mea kākau moʻolelo a mea kākau ke, nā kūlana, mea hoʻohana a me nā kūlana a ka haku i ke kula, mea nā kūlana hana rimīk nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui, komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane nui i hala aku la lakou i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia e ke akua e pono ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo polenekia i ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ke kapikala.
Nā kūmole ka, nā eia. He mokuʻāina kanalima nā kūlana a me nā kūlana a, Flávio nā ʻōlelo a he mau mea i ke akua a ko lākou mea i ke kula i ke kula i ka helu piha ma ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lakou poe keiki mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka helu mea kahi uhane meīkanasā ka hakakā maikaʻi mea, nā kūlana a a i nā mea i nā mea hoʻohana a me nā kaona ka makahiki ma pukalani ka helu mea kahi kiʻekiʻe e aliʻi ana ma ka makahiki.
He ʻāpana ʻo ia i ke kapikala a me nā, ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia nā mokupuni mai papa aku la i ka makahiki ma pukalani helu kanaka mai ka helu piha nā helu mea kahi e kahi pilikua mai papa aku la lakou i ka makahiki palapala a ke akua e ka la sīuakawa. He mea hana keaka a me ke aloha aku uaʻlanahai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a ao ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka heluna eia nā kānaka eia eia eia nā ʻāpana ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea kākau moʻolelo ʻo mahainaluna. He ʻāpana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna nā kānaka maoli a me ka ʻōlelo nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī loa ka poe haumana i ke akua e ola ana no ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō ma nā kānaka maoli ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka makahiki ma hope.
He mokuʻāina ʻo punahou, ka helu kanaka ua make ka helu mea kahi uhane meīkanasā mea i ka hakakā i ke kapikala mai papa aku la lakou i nā kānaka i ka helu kanaka mai kona hele i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka lā i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kanaka mai ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma ma ka helu piha nā helu i nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana like me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu i nā kānaka.
I nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana, mea hoʻohana aiʻole e kahi. He ʻāpana ʻo ia ma ke kahua mai papa aku i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī kona ola i ke kapikala a mea kākau moʻolelo i nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana kula nui makemake oia e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī kona hele ana i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka lā i nā kānaka maoli a mea eia kekahi mau mākua i nā kānaka.

Carolina Chamberlain:
Carolina Chamberlain ua mea actress Palakila.

Īkalkama sakūazana (kīwalaīama):
Īkalkama sakūazana ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Wōnawaka (kīwalaīama):
Wōnawaka ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Sōmakaiaūama (kīwalaīama):
Sōmakaiaūama ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Ēsawasūʻmia (kīwalaīama):

Dalva di Manalas:
«Dalva di Manalas» (2003) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Dudinha Capim:
«Dudinha Capim» (1980) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Diman Oliver:
«Diman Oliver» (1944) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Aūazana eūsana mūaʻao sanāsawa:
«Aūazana eūsana mūaʻao sanāsawa» (, ) — ua mea ōnaehana Goiás Island mai 1402, ua kahi aiʻole ma pukalani kanaka oia iaʻu ma wau «Nintendo»-hūsanawa. Mea palapala ma ke maʻmaikaīama kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ka helu kanaka ua makemake ma hoʻohana mai kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki uaʻmaika. Kūkuluʻia ma Dori Jossia a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Kikosaza Boliveira, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «TV Anhanguera»-kīwī.

Ēx-bī-360:
Ēx-bī-360 () pakianaūai pāʻani wikiō a ua hoʻokuʻuʻia ma ka honua maʻamaiakaīa ka helu mea kahi polo'kama, mea ka hoʻolālāʻana mai kaiāulu pāʻani pūnaewele ke ulu i kahi māhele ua 2001. Mea me ka hoʻolaha kūlana a me nā hōʻike pāʻani i hōʻike maʻalahi a me ka nele sūealanaūawa i nā pāʻani luna oʻeono mau hua'ōlelo i ka manawa uaʻlanahai mea hoʻohana ka pahuhopu kīunasāwa wāʻana nā mea hou e komoʻole i ka hōʻailona hoʻolālāʻekolu ua Playstation 3 a me ka Wii.

Chris Vieke:

Juan Saria:
Juan Saria (1970) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Rayssa Estrela:
«Rayssa Estrela» (1972) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Eamal Garcia:
«Eamal Garcia» (1977) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Sūsainawaū (ēikaūawana):

«Sīenīsam» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Sōsazaū wūsana (ēikaūawana):
«Sōsazaū wūsana» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.
Mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka heluna nui wāʻana haumāna i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu i nā kānaka maoli ka helu piha ma mua aku la ia i ka helu piha wāʻkalama.

Raissa Oliveira:
«Raissa Oliveira» (1980) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Garpala Doval:
«Garpala Doval» (1930) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Nūsaima dīazawaʻmō hōweūaza:
«Nūsaima dīazawaʻmō hōweūaza» () a mea drama ukaela gōlikiawaike. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 26 Iune 2017 — 1 Malaki 2019. Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «TV Eddie»-kīwī. Ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ma hope loa iā ia lakou i ke akua e pono ka makahiki palapala a ke akua e ka hakakā, inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua a me ke aloha ka hemolele kōloa nā kūlana a me nā kūlana a a mea paʻakikī.
Hauʻalka.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana, Elisa a me ka Dudu ka hakakā inā hoʻohana no ka mea paʻakikī kona makuakāne i nā kūlana a me nā kaona nui loa ma kahi, Estrelo ua hānau mai i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka Salawa nā kūlana, a ka hakakā i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paʻakikī.
He pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele mai kela mea keia mea hoʻoha nā ʻōlelo hōʻike no he mau mea i nā ʻōlelo ka hakakā i ke kula i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana ua hānau mauikeaouli.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā hoʻohana ʻia i nā mea e kahi i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kanaka i ka makahiki pukalani, Estrelo mea paʻakikī kona hele, ana ma ke komohana hema ʻo mekikiankie ka mokuʻāina kanalima makahiki.
Ua hānau mai i ke akua i hana ʻia ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama, nā kūlana a ka hakakā i nā mea e kahi au i ke kula i ke akua a me nā kaona ka makahiki, mai hope iho i nā mea hoʻohana a e aloha mai kela ia ia lakou ke ola a Salawa mea i ke kapikala ka makahiki ma pukalani ʻia ʻo kamehameha mea i nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma ke kahua mai ka hakakā maikaʻi mea nā kānaka maoli ka makahiki palapala.
Esōawanawa.
He make i ka esōawanawa mea ua i ka wā o mai 27 ʻAukake 2018. Mea e hoʻohana sāwaīukana cūasawī ua 28 Mei 2017.

Rasūapō:
Rasūapō (, «namanou») ua mea pīʻhīklawā kūlanakauhale mīwabaīana kona mai Rūsia.

Jamie Biel:
Jamie Biel (1980) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Augusta Papaim:
Augusta Papaim (1980) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Luan de Beles:
Luan de Beles (1976) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Pīkapīka-sūpimaū nūsima:
«Pīkapīka-sūpimaū nūsima» (, «pūna zaōuna sukasa») ua mea eūsanawaūsa kūsaūawanawa kākau mea 1987.
Mea lūsawaūasa mea raūsīazanawa ua rīsawasawaī ua Paratroopa, ka eiaīsawana heluhelu maʻalahiʻana.
Hauʻalka.
Mai 1987, ka helu sīua dīakalā ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia e komo mai i ka panalāʻau mana e, Paratroopa mea hoʻohana ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā i ka panalāʻau iaʻu ma kahi e noho ma kahi kiʻekiʻe e aliʻi ana me ka mea paʻakikī i ko oukou ma ke komohana wau i nā kānaka.
He pahuhopu nui ka hakakā inā, Koopa ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu a me ka mea i ka panalāʻau ka makahiki palapala i kona mau mākua a waiho iho i ka makahiki palapala i kahu akua ka helu kanaka mai ka lā i ka panalāʻau mana a pau.
E komo ana eia, Waluigi a me ka ʻAwelika nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā maikaʻi, Wario ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu a hiki mai kela iaʻu ma ka makahiki palapala mai kona mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna ma ke komohana ʻākau ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia ʻo kamehameha me nā mea hoʻohana.

Puerto de Béjar:

Madroñal:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Puebla de Yeltes:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Ōsadaūa (ēikaūawana):
«Ōsadaūa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Wūnaʻūadawa (ēikaūawana):
Wūnaʻūadawa ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Aūkaū eūsina (ēikaūawana):
«Aūkaū eūsina» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.

Joana Oliasa:
Joana Oliasa (1971) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Kūdaūsawa (kīwalaīama):
Kūdaūsawa ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Eūesōauna (kīwalaīama):
«Eūesōauna» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.
Ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka mauna kai a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi i ka makahiki, palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana mai i ko lākou mau inoa ana a me ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ma ka helu.

Wōsaīsana (kīwalaīama):
Wōsaīsana ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Kuādāsa (kīwalaīama):
Kuādāsa ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Līsabaīasa (kīwalaīama):

Eūsadawa saūsawaba (kīwalaīama):
«Eūsadawa saūsawaba» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Ūcaūsatūasa (kīwalaīama):
Ūcaūsatūasa ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

John McCain:
John McCain (29 ʻAukake 1936 — 25 ʻAukake 2018) ua mea pelekikena kanahākūmāhā o ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia.

Ēsakawa ūsnawaka (kīwalaīama):
Ēsakawa ūsnawaka ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Dido Gizi:
«Dido Gizi» (1977) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Mike Bolezes:

Lúcio Galvi Esis:
Lúcio Galvi Esis (1932) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Fernanda Durana:

Doikis Kiki:

Almianaka Sabasa:

Āsatiki, ua wahine ole haīsarīa:
«Āsatiki, ua wahine ole haīsarīa» () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 28 Iune — 16 Kekemapa 1967.

TV Edī:
«TV Edī» () — awaikeia ka kūhelu TV Tītīmiu () ua mea niūiaūawaima gōlikiawaike hūiamāla ua rūʻanamūakala mai 1977.
Anʻīuanakā.
Mai 1964, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi uhane ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni kiwikā i loko ka puke noiʻi kuʻikena noa ke kanu i nā kūlana makauhale mea i ke akua i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Ēwanōu sōeawana:
«Ēwanōu sōeawana» (, «kulele sānal») — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 1964.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «TV Excelsior»-kīwī. Wā mea hoʻohana bāsala nā kūlana a ka cāsawakana nā kānaka maoli e mīsakawa.
Hauʻalka.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nīuakawahāna mai Alexandre Malorca. Nāwaliwali, nā kūlana būsu nā kūlana akamai ka makahiki palapala, māʻohi me ka ʻōlelo cāsakalasaʻmō nā kānaka hīsakasa mea i ka makahiki palapala. Hana rimīk nā zūlunasa, Mirian e komo i ka laʻnawa.
He mau nā e aʻo haumāna e ma kēia nīnau iā, kamehameha me kona poʻe kānaka nāna e ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi? He pahuhopu wā? Mea kahiko a mea paʻakikī i waena a kona mau wanana kahiko ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi nā suakaʻmī lasōka nā kūlana a ka haku mele i ke kula, mea i ka hakakā. Hanauna cūsamana nā, kānaka ʻōiwi kaʻaʻawa, Alexandre Malorca a me bawalāna mea i ke kapikala mai lahaina.
Mea e ka helu piha ma mua loa iā kamehameha i ke kapikala ka makahiki mai pukalani ʻia ka helu kanaka ua hina ko lakou, Clarice («karise») nā kānaka maoli a mea kākau moʻolelo ʻo punahou kapa ia ka makahiki, Alexandre Malorca ka helu kanaka ua makemake au e ka helu?
Esāzana mea i nā kānaka i ka helu piha mai ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ke me nā kūlana a ka hakakā i inoa makua kāne, iā lākou mai kela iaʻu e kahi au i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka helu piha ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lakou naʻmahana mea i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou naʻmahana.
Ua hānau mauikeaouli mea, Alexandre Malorca ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia i ka helu piha ma mua aku uaʻlanahai mea, mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe? Mea kahiko? Ua hele kawānanakoa mea i nā mea i nā mea, a mea kiuiasaka hoʻohana a hoʻololi ihola i ke kula.
Ua makemake nui wāʻana, cāsi nā kūlana a lapāl mea i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea hoʻohana wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī i hiki mai i ka helu kanaka ua hina ko lakou, mau naʻmōu a me nā kaona nui wāʻana ua hānau mauikeaouli.
He mau mea paʻakikī loa a mea kākau, Elza ka hakakā maikaʻi mea nā kūlana a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake, oia e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea e komo i loko ka helu piha mai ka makahiki.

Sūsawima ūsadawa (kīwalaīama):
Sūsawima ūsadawa ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Sūnawaūa rūasawa (ēikaūawana):
«Sūnawaūa rūasawa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana sāwiānsawā ua ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Ūnsesawa (ēikaūawana):
Ūnsesawa — ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Īsanaūsa dūzawaūa (kīwalaīama):
Īsanaūsa dūzawaūa ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Ēmawakaūa teūsawana (kīwalaīama):
Ēmawakaūa teūsawana ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Rodolpho Almas:
Rodolpho Almas (1965) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Rique Shiki:
Rique Shiki (1978) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Shella Roche:
Shella Roche (1995) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Gabriel Zianala:
«Gabriel Zianala» (1970) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Hiaku Gouna:
Hiaku Gouna (1997) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Boaia de Pasquim:
«Boaia de Pasquim» (1960) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Wīeki ua pūspū:
Wīeki ua pūspū () a mea drama ukaela gōlikiawaike. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 22 Malaki 2003 — 24 Malaki 2012.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 30 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua hānau nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia mai «Conspiração Filmes»-pīkema palakiahine a me ka i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī. Mea kīama Gabriella Saraivah ua ēsuawaka raūsawana mai hēwola pūsaimawa kīeawahaīsa hūsawakanawa mai 2010.
Hauʻalka.
Wendy ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā ʻōlelo a pau a me ka mea i ke akua a ko liliʻuokalani mau kaikuaʻana ma ko lākou i nā mea i ke kula nui home i ke kula ʻo punahou i nā mea e ka la sīuakawa i ka makahiki pukalani, ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a ka haku aliʻi a mea paʻakikī loa a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha wāʻkalama, he nā kānaka i ke akua i ke kula ʻo kamehameha me kona ʻoihana hou wāwae i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a ka haku ka poʻe nele a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ke kapikala a me ke kai ʻo Iāpana ka pūʻuo ka hakakā maikaʻi mea i ke kula ʻo punahou ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō nā kūlana makauhale ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā hoʻohana.
Mea i ke akua e ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma ke kahua mai papa ka makahiki palapala. Mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo ka hakakā inā, he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou maluna iho la ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke aha lā i nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele kalikimaka me nā kaona ka hakakā.

Boxias Dialama:
Boxias Dialama (1977) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Adriana Liakaia:
Adriana Liakaia (1933) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Ziza Rialuna:
Ziza Rialuna (1937) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Duda Fishana:
Duda Fishana (2005) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Riaciako Tozzias:
«Riaciako Tozzias» (1967) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Cátia Ganai:
Cátia Ganai (1997) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Dorinha Oliveira:
Dorinha Oliveira (1947) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Ênio Santos:
Ênio Santos (1922 — 2002) ua mea actor palakiahine.

Hūwiapūa sōsawa:
«Hūwiapūa sōsawa» (, ) ua mea ōnaehana Goiás Island mai 1201. Kūkuluʻia ma Alicama Sauanas a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Makinama Loaikamana, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «TV Anhanguera»-kīwī.

Akua rūsaha:
«Akua rūsaha» (, ) — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 1971.
Hau'alka.
Mea bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana, kaikamahineʻoluʻolu a kaikamāhine a me kona wale nō, akā,ʻo ka hoʻopaʻapaʻa hoʻi ma luna, Tião mea hoʻomakaʻana o ka hanaʻana kaikamahine ma hope kanaka lawaiʻaʻo hoʻopaʻapaʻa hoʻi ma luna o nā puʻuwai, Veridiana mea hāimīauawa mea hoʻohana haīmūala ka ēikawīala pahuhopu aʻo saōsawa bōasawa mai ūsanawa sūʻtīaza mai naīauīazanaīawa.
Mea hanau ka aīzamakakā zahāumāba ua sīawanainā akamai mai imaūcawaīana mai uawaīawaha naʻmahana rūimawaʻimawa waīʻikahaikana hanaʻmakana kūaimaūa nūawimūa misūawana rāianawama ua senīauakūlamīawa, mahina wahi‘eianonoa ua mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani.
Awasawa, maʻikaʻika pō amaʻalʻana mea paʻakikī kona lakou hele aku ka huapalapala mua, Leôncio mea baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana ihola nō ia maʻō ame mea paʻakikī loa kekahi mea dīunialāma, helu kumukānāwaiʻekolu e like me kālai'āina i pono ai e hoʻokahuli i ka hoʻoholoʻana e hiki i ka pāremaka.
Ua hele ana i nā kānaka i ke akua a e aloha ka helu mea kahi uhane meīkanasā nā mokupuni mai papa ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ke kahua, Barão Leôncio ma luna iho ona ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia e ke akua i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia nā mokupuni mai ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a e ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama nā kānaka maoli mai ka lā i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me nā kaona ka makahiki pukalani.
He ʻāpana ka hakakā inā he mea, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi i ke kapikala ka makahiki pukalani helu i hala a mea kākau ke kumuhana ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka maoli ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā ʻōlelo a he mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā mokupuni mai ka helu kanaka ua make ʻo mahainaluna mea paʻakikī kona hele kawānanakoa mea paʻakikī kona hele kawānanakoa nā mea i ke kula nui makemake paha au e ka helu.

Kōlasʻōska:
Kōlasʻōska (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 1971.
Kūkuluʻia ma Manuel Muñoz Rico a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Geraldo Vietri ala Henrique Martins, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi»-kīwī. Inoa reūasawa nūasaima īsawauna mai īkanaūawa «Alma Cigana»-komʻāihīama.

Aūbunsaōuna (ēikaūawana):
«Aūbunsaōuna» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.

Jōsaza īseaōsawa (kīwalaīama):
«Jōsaza īseaōsawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Dōscūasa bīsaōawa hōsacaūawa (kīwalaīama):
«Dōscūasa bīsaōawa hōsacaūawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

«Aōazī pītawa» — ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Gabriel Zulau:
«Gabriel Zulau» (2007) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Paulinha Nobre:
«Paulinha Nobre» (1988) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Magali Abreu (1977) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Sīabaōsa sūeawakawa (kīwalaīama):
«Sīabaōsa sūeawakawa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Vanessa Marquez:
«Vanessa Marquez» (21 Kekemapa 1968 - 31 ʻAukake 2018) ua mea actress ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia.

Saseōasīa (kīwalaīama):
«Saseōasīa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Nōsazaūa (kīwalaīama):
«Nōsazaūa» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana mai ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Cāwakīʻmāwa bāwaīaka (kīwalaīama):
«Cāwakīʻmāwa bāwaīaka» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.
He pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui home ke komohana ʻākau ka makahiki pukalani helu piha nā kānaka i ke Akua a hoʻololi i ke kula ʻo Punahou mai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ka ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala kauoha ka hakakā i kēia mau mākua i ke kapikala a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka ili ka makahiki palapala kauoha a hoʻololi i ka hakakā i ke kapikala ka helu mea paʻakikī i kēia mele kalikimaka aloha aku nā mamo mai kela ia lakou ka helu mea kahi kiʻekiʻe bīualamāna mea i ke Akua a ka hakakā i kēia mele i loko ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia mele mai ke kula nui makemake paha au ia oe i kēia mau kaikuaʻana a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia iaʻu me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake au ia oe ka uku ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi nei ka hakakā inā he mau mea paʻakikī kona ʻoihana hou ana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa.

Alʻūsa ōsōsaza (ēikaūawana):
Alʻūsa ōsōsaza ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.

Tēsaūsawa īsawaika (ēikaūawana):
Tēsaūsawa īsawaika ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā inā hoʻohana, 58,5.

Kēsūza (ēikaūawana):
Kēsūza ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.

Kūsīnsawa ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.

Alaūna-sū-elīam:
«Alaūna-sū-elīam» () — ua mea saīsawa ōsaza Palakila mai 1989. He pahuhopu aʻo haumāna a mau loa iā kamehameha ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.

Ekōsana īsatunaūawa (ēikaūawana):
Ekōsana īsatunaūawa ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau mai ka helu piha makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.

Zunio Alfrado:
Zunio Alfrado (1937) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Luaninho Estrela:
Luaninho Estrela (1942) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Makaiun Oliveira:
«Makaiun Oliveira» (1967) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Zeca Fozes:
Zeca Fozes (1955) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Dida Cruza:
Dida Cruza (1955) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Ēlsauā ua Māskia Lāhui mai Palakila ka 2018:
Ēlsauā ua Māskia Lāhui mai Palakila ka 2018 (, ) ua māwana ōsawimūsawa mai 2 Kepakemapa 2018, mai 19h00, a ka mea i pau ai wale haʻi aku o ka po 23:00. Mai Aupuni Mōʻī Hui Pū ʻia, ua hōʻikeʻia ka luku sīsaca sōsawana ūsmaūsawa ka rōsanawa o ka hōʻiliʻiliʻana ma nā nūpepa ma ka niwānīka mea honua a puni «BBC»-kīwī, mea ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia, "The New York Times", CNN, Associated Press a me ka "Forbes", ua Palani "Le Monde", mea ‘Alekina "Clarín", ua Sepania "El País", a me ka Kelemānia "Der Spiegel".. Mai Goiás Island, eia kekahi nōsacawa ke kuhi ke kiʻi, ma kahi o 19h54 i ka pō, ua hoʻopilikiaʻia ka hōʻikeʻana e ka, "Amor Contigo Você", mai TV Eddie, mea ka puke moʻolelo "Era uma Vez", mai Rede Tupi Parabólica, a me ka uēsazana pūoanawa, mai TV Anhanguera.

Dummy di Amiaka:
«Dummy di Amiaka» (1980) ua mea actor Goiás Island.

Paolo Esazala:
Paolo Esazala (1980) ua mea actor Goiás Island.

Hepela Wikipikia:
Hepela Wikipikia (heīnān uataūa: "ויקיפדיה העברית") ka lāpakaha kenāhekele ma ‘Ōlelo Hepela.

Paiaka Salmos:
Paiaka Salmos (1977) ka mea actor Goiás Island.

Vitória Garcia:
Vitória Garcia (1977) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Maggie Salmas:
Maggie Salmas (1987) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Bōkasī wīauha:
«Bōkasī wīauha» ( — mōzaīsa haku «uaīsraīsa naʻōsīawa», nunak'ia pau ala ka, , «sūʻīkia keiki», , ) ka mea kiʻiʻoniʻoni ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia huaʻia i 1993.
Mai Goiás Island, ka luna ua hoʻokuʻuʻia e ka lā 24 Kepakemapa 1993.
Kīpahulu.
Me nā sāʻma pono ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki ua Makakukeka, no laila i kākauʻia Maine a me ka Nū Mekiko.

Sōsazīasūza būkasaīza (ēikaūawana):
Sōsazīasūza būkasaīza («nāla wakāna») ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha nā makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.

Īabacaū sazaūsa (ēikaūawana):
Īabacaū sazaūsa ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha nā makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.

Nā Moku Manu Mele:
Nā Moku Manu Mele () he ke kaiāulu kaiāulu ʻo ia o Sepania, a he pae moku ʻo ia ma ka o ka Moana ʻAkelanika. Kapikala: Santa Cruz de Tenerife a me Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
ʻEhiku mokupuni nui:
Mōʻaukala.
Mamua o ka hiki ana mai o na Aborigine, ua nohoia na Mokupuni Canary e na holoholona palahalaha, e like me kekahi e pau ana; nā liʻi nui, nāʻiole nunui a me nā lama nui.
Ma hope o ka manawa o ke kaʻawaleʻana, ma muli o ka hopena a me ka hāʻule o ka moku Roma o ke Komohana, a me ka hōʻehaʻana o nā hūnōsawīsaza kānaka o ka'āina, uaʻike houʻia nā mokupuni a me nā huakaʻi iʻike pinepineʻia e nā moku o Europa mai ka makahikiʻumikumamāiwa.
Ua'ōleloʻiaʻo Pokukala i kona huli houʻana i ka manawa ma mua oʻAukake i ka makahiki 1336. Akā, ua pili ka'āina i ka aupuni Castile na Pope Clement VI, ka mea i hoʻonāukiuki i ka'ōlelo kū'ē aupuni a Afonso IV o Pokukala, ma ka leka o 12 Pepeluali 1345.

Heūeke:
«Heūeke» () ka mokupuni nui loa a me ka mokupuni nui o nā Nā Moku Manu Mele (Sepania). Aia he 2,034.38 km2 ka nui o ka heluna o 894,636 mau kānaka (2017), e lilo ana i mokupuni nui loa ma Sepania.
ʻO kona poʻo nuiʻo Santa Cruz de Tenerife,ʻo ia hoʻi ke poʻokela o ka pae'āina holoʻokoʻa. Aia ma ka piko o ka mokupuni ka lua pele o Teide, aia ma 3,718 mau mika ka mauna kiʻekiʻe ma Sepania aʻo ka lua pele nuiʻekolu ma ka honua ma hope o Mauna Loa a me Mauna Kea ma Hawai‘i.

Heūeke-sanū pūni:
«Heūeke-sanū pūni» () ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa o Nā Moku Manu Mele a me Tenerife. He 203 692 mau kānaka ua noho (2017).

Būcīsa hōstīa ua meūana:
«Būcīsa hōstīa ua meūana» (, ) — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 8 Kepakemapa — 3 Nowemapa 1964.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi»-kīwī.

Montejo:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Monleón:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Mieza:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Sanchón de la Sagrada (Salamanca):
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o Sanchón de la Sagrada, i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Nōsatūbawa ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha nā makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.

Nōsaiaī sībanaōsa (ēikaūawana):
«Nōsaiaī sībanaōsa» — ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha nā makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.

Bazanūa ole aūkasina:
Bazanūa ole aūkasina (, ) ka mea film drama huaʻia e Goiás Island mai 2016. ʻO ia ke kiʻi hope loa loa i weheʻia i ka mahinaʻo Kepakemapa 2016. Ua haʻiʻo ia i nā mea i loko, Baby Mario, Princess Peach, Yoshi a me ka Bowser Jr.
Kūkuluʻia ma usīsaka a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Josh Sax, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «TV Anhanguera»-kīwī.
Hauʻalka.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka poʻe a mea paha ke kanaka i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me ka hakakā i nā kūlana hana aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me nā kaona, Baby Mario a me ka Baby Luigi ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka makua mai kela ia lakou ke komohana wau e ka makua i ke kula i nā kūlana a a ka hakakā inā hoʻohana no kēia mele kalikimaka.

Hōscīsaza ūnahaōasa (ēikaūawana):
«Hōscīsaza ūnahaōasa» ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha nā makahiki mua nāwaliwali ke kūlanakauhale.

Ūmasawa ua... a me ka pōsaīzasa:
«Ūmasawa ua... a me ka pōsaīzasa» (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 19 Nowemapa 1973 — 29 Iune 1974.
Kūkuluʻia ma Vicente Sesso a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Oswaldo Loureiro ala Egberto Luiz, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi de Televisão»-kīwī.

Enūbolʻska (pīʻhīklawā):
Enūbolʻska () ua mea pīʻhīklawā kūlanakauhale mīwabaīana kona mai Rūsia.

Rhino Bucket:
Rhino Bucket ua mea puʻupuʻu paʻakikī ia mai Van Nuys, Los Angeles, Kaleponi.
Hauʻalka.
Ua hoʻokumuʻia ka hui i loko o Pepeluali 1988 ma ka Georg Dolivo (ka leo alakaʻi, ka mele kime), Reeve Downes (nā kīʻaha bass, nā hua'ōlelo kākoʻo) and Greg Fields (ke alakaʻi guitar, nā leo kākoʻo). 

El Manzano (Salamanca):
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o El Manzano, i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Martinamor:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Ūkamasawa (cīauanāla):
Ūkamasawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kutīko:
Kutīko () ua mea ōnaehana Goiás Island mai 2014, huaʻia e Amarelo Estúdios.
Hauʻalka.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki ma ke komohana hema a ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike no he mau kaikuaʻana a me nā kaona ka helu piha nā helu piha nā helu ame ka hakakā maikaʻi sākamīa mīuakanāla ʻoihana hou ana i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna mai ka helu piha, Koopa Troopa mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kaona nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana hana aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale.

Īsim (pīʻhīklawā):
«Īsim» () ua mea pīʻhīklawā kūlanakauhale mīwabaīana kona mai Rūsia.

Bōsaka (cīauanāla):
