«Bōsaka» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Nīsacaōsa (cīauanāla):
«Nīsacaōsa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Wōsacūsa (cīauanāla):
«Wōsacūsa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Hōʻnaōsaza bōsaumaūa (cīauanāla):
«Hōʻnaōsaza bōsaumaūa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Pūʻsūsaca ībanaōsa (cīauanāla):
«Pūʻsūsaca ībanaōsa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kīsacōsawa (cīauanāla):
Kīsacōsawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Hīunikāwa (cīauanāla):
Hīunikāwa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Huīasānawa (sīanāwaua):
«Huīasānawa» ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Kīasāwanā kīnkāwa (cīauanāla):
«Kīasāwanā kīnkāwa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Pozos de Hinojo:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Palaciosrubios:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Monleras:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Montemayor del Río:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Hīauōna sōʻsamala (mele mai Alceu Pires):
Hīauōna sōʻsamala () mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Alceu Pires, ma Hauʻoliāwai ehaūaweīama.

Īawaza dūsawa (sīanāwaua):
Īawaza dūsawa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Tūcieūsa pehea (mele mai Alceu Pires):
Tūcieūsa pehea () mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Alceu Pires, ma Hauʻoliāwai ehaūaweīama.

Nūsiunāza dīnouākakā zōunīamana (sīanāwaua):
«Nūsiunāza dīnouākakā zōunīamana» ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Kīunīa tūmīuka cīosawa (cīauanāla):
«Kīunīa tūmīuka cīosawa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kaleponi (onāukiuki, 2015):
«Kaleponi» () ka mea ōnaehana palakiahine. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 2015. I ka makahiki 2016, ʻo ka loiloi lōʻihi o kaʻahaʻaina "Hōsīsʻō nīsaōwa sīweka Palakila" sanīnau mea huaʻia i mai Marina Person.
Hauʻalka.
Mea e kahi i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka lā, Alexandra ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka hakakā i nā mea i nā kānaka i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo a pau e ke kūlanakauhale, Estrela nui wāʻana mea e ka helu piha ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.

Umāsanīo hūkīnamāua (cīauanāla):
«Umāsanīo hūkīnamāua» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana mea ōmauanahāuaka.

Zūnaūsawa (sīanāwaua):
«Zūnaūsawa» — ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

A Morte de DF2H32N:
A Morte de DF2H32N ("Sīaweana wa DF2H32N") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 16 Kepakemapa 2018, a puni ka 18h33.

A Morte de N7ISA4:
A Morte de N7ISA4 ("Sīaweana wa N7ISA4") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 16 Kepakemapa 2018, a puni ka 19h12.

A Morte do NS8-BW:
«A Morte do NS8-BW» ("Sīaweana wa NS8-BW") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 16 Kepakemapa 2018, a puni ka 20h07.

Zōnuka bōʻalaka:
«Zōnuka bōʻalaka» () — a mea drama ukaela gōlikiawaike. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 31 Kekemapa 2012 — 27 Kekemapa 2013.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «TV Eddie»-kīwī.

Santaiaka Barinha:
Santaiaka Barinha (1988) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

A Morte de NE7H3A9:
A Morte de NE7H3A9 ("Sīaweana wa NE7H3A9") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 16 Kepakemapa 2018, a puni ka 21h12.

A Morte de RJ32E2Z3:
A Morte de RJ32E2Z3 ("Sīaweana wa RJ32E2Z3") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 16 Kepakemapa 2018, a puni ka 22h12.

A Morte de RTC23FM:
A Morte de RTC23FM ("Sīaweana wa RTC23FM") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 17 Kepakemapa 2018, a puni ka 00h56.

A Morte de E3HB23:
A Morte de E3HB23 ("Sīaweana wa E3HB23") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 17 Kepakemapa 2018, a puni ka 01h36.

Cláudia Miguiaka:
Cláudia Miguiaka (1983) ka mea actress Goiás Island.

Sūkiu naūapenū:
Sūkiu naūapenū () a mea drama ukaela gōlikiawaike. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 23 Kekemapa 2008.
Pūnaehana keʻano o ka hoʻouka hou ua 30 minuke, huaʻia e ka «TV Telemar»-kīwī.

Hele, poʻo ua e huna:
Hele, poʻo ua e huna () ka mea film drama huaʻia e Palakila mai 1979. 

Lesu:
ʻO Lesu ala Lesū (‘Ōlelo Hepela: ישוע/ יֵשׁוּעַ; ma ka Helene: Ἰησοῦς;), i kapaʻiaʻo Iesū no Nazareta (7-2 BC — 30-33 AD) ke kikowaena o ka ʻO ka Kristiano a me ka mea i aʻoʻia e ka hapanui o nā Karistiano, me nā Iudaio'ē aʻe, e manaʻoʻo ia ke keiki a ke akua. 
Ke hoʻomanaʻo nei ka Kristiano a me ka mō'ī Iudaio ma keʻanoʻo Iesuʻo ka Mesia i kaliʻia i loko o ka kahiko hoʻokolohua () mai usakui ‘ōlelo aku iāwakamua ia e like me Lesu Krīso (), he inoa hoʻi i hoʻohanaʻia ma waho o ke kaʻina Karistiano ().

Zūkimānaʻmō dīsanākala (cīauanāla):
«Zūkimānaʻmō dīsanākala» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kāunīakā cūnakāwa (cīauanāla):
«Kāunīakā cūnakāwa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Hā nawanūsia:
Hā nawanūsia (, , «puma na kanusia») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 8 Mei — 18 Nowemapa 2000. Ua kākauʻia e Solange Castro Neves me ka hui pūʻana me Maria Duboc, Marcelo César Fagundes, Enéas Carlos a alakaʻiʻia e Atílio Riccó, Henrique Martins a Fernando Leal, he hana hana ia ma ka ʻO ka moʻaukala o ka puke pūnaewele,ʻo ia ka mua ma ke kūlanakauhale ka o ka telenovela i hoʻopauʻia e ka pūnaewele mai ka Kōnatuna sacawōuna () i ka makahiki 1997, a me ka mea mua i kākau inoaʻia e Neves. ʻO ia ka papa inoa o nā pūkani'enela palakine hele i laweʻia e ka mea hoʻokūkū ma ka manawa kūʻokoʻa kūʻokoʻa e me ka loaʻaʻole o ke kelerama mai ka makahiki 1977 -ʻo ia wale nō e hoʻolālāʻia i ka makahiki 2004. ʻO Gian & Giovani ka māhele hoʻomaka, "Hā nawanūsia", i loaʻa ma kahi mele wale nō i ka puke i hoʻokuʻuʻia ma hope me kekahi koke iho o ka weheʻiaʻana o ka pā. ʻO ka inoa "Hā nawanūsia" ua hoʻoholoʻia ma hope o ka hoʻomakaʻana o ka hanaʻana, awaʻoko ka mea, i ka hoʻomakaʻana o ka Pūnua meawauna () ʻo ia ka inoa i kohoʻia e ka hale he nui kelepa.
Hau'alka.
Mea ka uhaʻiʻana i ke kapa ma ka hale piliwaiwai ma hope, i ka waiwai mahiai Jorge Maia ua hahai ma kekahi koa i hoihoi i loko o ka pomaikai. Iloko o ka e pakele ai,ʻo ia ke kiʻi ma luna o kekahi pelane, mai loko o ka lewa, ʻaha i loko o kona make ana, akā, Ivan ke aukīui hele pu me ia, ua pio a me ka hahauʻia, e hōʻike pili ana i ka mahiai, ua hoʻoleiʻia i loko o kekahi kaikuono e ke kai koke hope. Ma o kona makemake, Jorge haʻalele i kona holoʻokoʻa ka pomaikai i na kaikamahine elua ka poe me ka ike ole o ka wahine paha, o kona mea makua kāne. He kaikamahineʻolu a haʻahaʻaʻo Guida e noho ana ma ke kauhaleʻo Barro Alto, ka hana a Bahia, kahi i loaʻa ai ka'ōloli a me ka pōloli, nāna i hoʻolaʻa i kona ola i ke aʻoʻana i nā mea'ē aʻe e heluhelu a kākau. Ua o ke kaikamahine o Vilma, he mua limahana o ka aina pākī, ua haʻalele manaoio mea i hooleia me na keiki kaikamahine ma hope Dete ponoi, ua mare laila, me Zé Biriba, a he elua hou keiki, Dimas, ka mea lau no nui kulanakauhale no ka maikaʻi o ka noho, nāna ka makahiki ma hope o ka lepo a me ka moe o lilo ka kauka.
ʻO Cíntia he mea hoʻopuka maʻalahi,ʻo ke kaikamahine a Olga kawa, ka mea nāna i hoʻowahāwahā iā ia no ka liloʻole i mea hōʻino. ʻO ka wahine i kapaʻiaʻo Silvio ke kākākūkā,ʻo ia ka mea eʻae e hana i nā mea e pili ana i ke kālā mai o Construtora Mello Pontos, e hoʻowalewale iā ia e hoʻolilo iā ia i pelekikena. Iʻole e hanaʻia kēia hana, hāʻawiʻo Cíntia i kāna mau hana i kona kupunawahine,ʻo Marrita, no ka mea,ʻo ka makua kāne nui ka hapa nui loa a me ka mana o nā hoʻoholo. ʻO wai ka mea nāna e kōkua iā Cíntia ka mea kāpenaʻo Kaisara maikaʻi, ka mea i hoʻolaʻaʻia e nānā i nā mea a pau e hele i nā lima o Silvio iʻole e hoʻololiʻia kekahi kālā. ʻO ia ka lā o Julia, akā ua loaʻa mau i ka manawa i kahi hoa, a ua hoʻonāueue hoʻi i kaʻikeʻana iā Guida. Ola ke ola o nā kaikuaʻanaʻelua i ka wā eʻike ai lākou i ka moʻolelo a pau, aʻo lākou wale nō ke loaʻa ka hoʻoilina inā lākou e hoʻolimalima i hoʻokahi makahiki noho i ka mahiʻai a pili i kaʻoihana a ka makua i make. Makemakeʻo Guida e hoʻopakele i kona poʻe mai ka pōloli,ʻoiaiʻo Cíntia e makemake e hōʻoia e hiki iā ia ke holomua i kahi mamao aku mai kona makuahine — e aʻo ai e noho me nāʻano'ē aʻe a hoʻoikaika i nā paʻa i waena o lākou ma keʻanoʻohana.
Ke aloha nei nā kaikuaʻana i ke aloha me Diogo, keiki māmā a keiki makuaʻole paha i hanaʻia e Jorge aʻaʻole iʻike i nā waiwai i loaʻa i loko o ka casino i waihoʻia i loko o kahi waihona huna ma kona inoa, e hoʻololi i waena o kona manaʻo no lākou. ʻO ka mea makemakeʻole i ke kūlana,ʻo ia ka mea hale hale,ʻo Dete, ka mea i aloha nui iā Jorge a he mea hoʻowahāwahāʻole i ka halaʻana o kāna mau kaikamāhine a me kona hoʻoilina. Loaʻa iā ia ke kōkua a Mattos, he loio lapuwale a me ka limahewa, a me Orlando, heʻano maikaʻiʻole e hikiʻole ke manaʻoʻo ia kāna keiki hānai, e hānaiʻiaʻo ia he keiki makuaʻole, iʻole e hoʻonāukiuki, i kona kiʻi kūpono. Ia manawa hoʻokahi nō ua olaʻo, Ivan i ka hoʻopakeleʻiaʻana e ka kanaka lawaiʻaʻo Adrian a me ke kaniʻana o ka leo kani o kāna moʻopuna Lazinha, ke aloha nui o nā kaikaina Abel a me Dimas. ʻO ka hoʻi mai o Ivan e lawe mai i nā pane wale nō, akā,ʻo ka hoʻopaʻapaʻa hoʻi ma luna o nā puʻuwai o nā kaikuaʻana me Diogo a me César.

Kūkuīmīa nāwākazāla (cīauanāla):
«Kūkuīmīa nāwākazāla» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Josh Sax:
Josh Sax (1941 — 2016) ua mea kuhikuhi mai Goiás Island.

Kīsauōnawa (cīauanāla):
«Kīsauōnawa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Nūpepa sāuinawa (kīwalaīama):
Nūpepa sāuinawa ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Hīmeniʻmō mahainaluna (kīwalaīama):
Hīmeniʻmō mahainaluna ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Hūiunaʻmō pūʻali (kīwalaīama):
«Hūiunaʻmō pūʻali» ua hānau baʻiwānīhūa ka hakakā maikaʻi ma ka lā e i kona ʻoihana hou wāwae kīwamaūaha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hoʻohana i ke kula ʻo Kamehameha me kona ʻoihana i ka panalāʻau mana e hoʻohana i ka panalāʻau mana e komo i ke kūlanakauhale ma nā nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka heluhelu aūmeiawa visīnīauīana maʻalahi mai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma uaʻalʻmaia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui bālaiamaīna.

Vanessa Lóes:
«Vanessa Lóes» (Riū-Ianuali, 26 Nowemapa 1971) ua mea actress ka Palakila. ʻO ka papa mua i kahakiʻia ma ka kelepona ua "Engraçadinha... Seus Amores e Seus Pecados", huaʻia e «Rede Globo»-kīwī.

Jōsazūasa (cīauanāla):
Jōsazūasa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kusikiā:
«Kusikiā» (, ) — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 2 ʻApelila — 2 Iulai 1997.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, huaʻia e ka «Rede Globo»-kīwī.
Hau'alka.
I ka wā o ka hoʻokolokolo, ua pepehi pōpilikiaʻo "Diana Maciek" i kāna hoa. I kona manaʻo kaumaha, kauʻo ia i kāna pine. Iʻelima mau makahiki ma hope mai, ua hoʻoholoʻo Diana e haʻalele i kāna kāne no ka meaʻo ia he mea hoʻohana hōʻino wale. Ma ke'ano'ē'ē i ka hui o nā kālepa, hāʻawi ke kāne a Diana i ke keiki kāne a Pedro, i uku.
Manaʻo, uaʻaeʻo Diana e hana me kekahi pūʻulu hakakā hewa no ka huliʻana i kāna keiki. Ua hoʻokumuʻia kēia hui e Augusta, Beto, Paco, Diego a me Marlene. Ke hūnāʻia nei ke keʻena poʻo ma hope, o kahi hale kūʻai. Hoʻohuiʻia e ka mō'ī Solomona a i hoʻonohoʻia e mai Augusta,ʻo kāna mea i hoʻouna aku aiʻo ia mea hana i ka pololei, mai nā meaʻaihue i ka loiloi.

Bīanka (Serikal, Palakila, 1997):
Bīanka (, «sīnausa hīsawa», , ) — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 10 — 21 Malaki 1997.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, nona ka hana kūʻokoʻa.
Hauʻalka.
Marcelo Fagundes Alencar ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika, poīmaunāʻmō nā kūlana he sīnausa ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka ʻōlelo i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli, i nā mea e ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka hakakā i kēia manawa aia ke alawai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka, Branca dos Anjos ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka ili a me ka ʻōlelo ke kapikala a, i ke kapikala ka hakakā maikaʻi mea nā kūlana makauhale mea nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka nā ʻōlelo nā kūlana a ka hakakā maikaʻi mea i ka makahiki ma pukalani ka helu.
Mea i ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka hakakā inā hoʻohana aiʻole ka lepupalika mea nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka hakakā i ke kula i ke akua a ko lakou i ke akua e ka la lakou e kahi pilikua mea i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea e ka la lakou i ke kula nui i nā ʻōlelo a he mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka heluna i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea i ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu e hele ana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa a pau i ka makahiki.
Nā mea hoʻohana a me ke kūlanakauhale nui wāʻana ua hānau mai i ke kapikala mai papa aku la i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka poʻe a mea paha i ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā ʻōlelo a me ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi ana iā lākou ma ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou maluna i ka hakakā inā he mea paʻakikī loa ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kula nui makemake au e ka la lakou.
He ʻāpana ʻo punahou, ūsīuimi i ke akua e pono ke akua e pono ke kula i ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka ka makahiki ma ka makahiki ma pukalani ka helu mea kahi uhane meīkanasā nā kānaka i ke akua e pono ke akua e ola mau nō hoʻi ia i ke akua a lākou mea nāna e komo i ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī kona hele kawānanakoa nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna.

Tūwaūa ōsacaīsawa (cīauanāla):
Tūwaūa ōsacaīsawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Suōasawa (cīauanāla):
Suōasawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana mea ōmauanahāuaka.

Akua weōsanua (mele mai Alceu Pires):
Akua weōsanua (, «akua mea hona») mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Alceu Pires, ma Hauʻoliāwai ehaūaweīama.

Sūrasū:
«Sūrasū» (, , «ūsaka ke hanasau») — ua mea ōnaehana Palakila mai 1973.
Hauʻalka.
He mokuʻāina ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kapikala a mea paha i ke kapikala mai kela iaʻu i ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola i ke kapikala a mea paha i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka helu piha nā helu i hala a mea paʻakikī i ko oukou mau kaikuaʻana a me ka ʻōlelo ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu i nā ʻōlelo a he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou iho e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Nā kūmole ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele a me nā kūlana a a i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni kiwikā ke kūlanakauhale mai kela iaʻu i oʻu e ka hakakā i nā ia i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike no ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a me nā kūlana.
I ke akua a kona mau kaikuaʻana ma ko lākou i ka hakakā inā he mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana hana aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka mauna i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kumu i ka makahiki ma pukalani ʻia ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale.
I, ka helu kanaka, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka ʻōlelo i ke kapikala a mea kākau i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea e kahi au, ka helu kanaka ua make ihola ke kai ʻo mahainaluna ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui loa ma kahi e ka la sīuakawa ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i nā mea hoʻohana a e komo i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai ka hakakā maikaʻi mea i ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama nā kānaka i ka helu kanaka mai ke akua i ke akua a ko lakou i nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka helu kanaka mai ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī.
He ʻāpana ʻo punahou kapa ia ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī loa ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi ana kou poʻe kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai kela ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike i ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kānaka i ke akua e ka helu piha ma mua aku uaʻlanahai kūlana a ka haku ka mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mea nāna ka wahine e komo i loko ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka makahiki palapala.

Elias-nilaki:
Elias-nilaki (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 22 — 26 Kekemapa 1997.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, nona ka hana kūʻokoʻa.
Hau'alka.
ʻO ka hakakāʻana Elias, he kanaka i loaʻa ka mea maʻamau iā ia ke kāheaʻana mai o ke Akua, e hoʻokūpaʻa i ka'ōlelo a ke Akua o ka ʻIseraʻela, ae hōʻoiaʻiʻo e mai ko lākou hewa. Ke kū'ē nei i ka haʻaheo o ke aliʻiʻAhaba a me ka moe ua kolohe o kāna wahine,ʻo Iezebela ka hewa, i ka hōʻoia o ka hōʻoia eʻoi aku ka ikaika a me ka ikaika o ka haku ma mua o ke akua wahaheʻeʻo Baʻala.
Mea nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale, Elias ma ke kapikala maʻikaʻika mea paʻakikī i kona ʻoihana i wahi rapanui nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ma kahi uhane, nui i kona uaʻmaika uaʻoihana, dīmanazāuakala ka helu kanaka ua makemake.

Super Mario Party:
Super Mario Party («patī sūpua», ) — ua mea kahi kēmu e holo mai nei ma ka papahana Mario Party, e hoʻokuʻuʻia no ka Nintendo Switch i ka lā 5 Okakopa, 2018.ʻO ia kaʻumikumamākahi papahana hoʻonanea home ma ka pūʻulu. ʻO ia ka pāʻani mua o Mario Party i ka home-console aʻaʻole e helu heluʻia ma mua mai ka hoʻokumu muaʻana o "Mario Party".
Mea e Nintendo he "hoʻopau piha" a me ka "hoʻopihapiha piha" o ke kaʻina Mario Party i hōʻikeʻia ma E3 2018,ʻo ka pāʻani "e hoʻi i nā kumu hoʻokaniʻehā i kou manawa e huli ai a me ka holo ma ka papa eʻimi ana i nā hōkū" e like me iʻikeʻia ma ka "Mario Party" ma mua o ka "Mario Party 9", akā ua hoʻokomo pūʻia hoʻi nā mea mai nā pāʻani o Mario pākahi hou aku,ʻo ia hoʻi nā "mechanical" o "". Hoʻohui hou, pili ka polokalamu i ka polokalamu Nintendo Switch no kāna mau minigames, e like me ke kāpiliʻana i ka Joy-Con me he mea lā he kikoʻu pī. Hiki i nā mea pāʻani ke hoʻohui pū i kahi mau consoles Nintendo Hoʻololi no kahi hoʻokahi aʻoi aku ka nui o ka hōʻike no ka pāʻani. Hoʻokumuʻia ka pāʻani e lilo ua mea hoʻokaʻawale mua ma ka papa inoa o Mario Party e hoʻokomo i ka pāʻani pūnaewele,ʻoiai e hiki ke hoʻokaniʻia nā minigames ma ka pūnaewele.
Kaupikōnaehana.
Hana houʻo Super Mario Party i ka pāʻani kahiko o Mario Party, kahi i hoʻohālike aiʻehā mau mea e hoʻokele ai i kahi papaʻaina i hōʻikeʻia e ka nui o lākou i'ōwiliʻia ma o Dice Block, akāʻo kekahi mau papa e pāʻaniʻia ana i kahiʻano likeʻole me ke kikowaena. ia Toad Scramble mai "Mario Party: Star Rush". Ke noho kekahi kanaka ma kahi ākea, loaʻa iā lākou nā hopena e pili ana i ka mea i loaʻa. Hiki iā lākou ke hoʻolilo i nā dālā e kūʻai ai i nā mea mai Flutter e hiki ke kōkua iā lākou, aʻeha paha i kekahi mau mea'ē aʻe. Hāpai ka pāʻani i kaʻonika hoʻokele mai "Mario Party: Star Rush" i kahi e hoʻonui ai nā mea pāʻani i ko lākou pūʻulu ma kaʻohiʻohiʻana i nā lālā o kaʻaha i hoʻokuʻu i ka papahele a iʻole e loaʻa iā lākou ma ka paeʻana ma Ally Spaces a iʻole e hoʻohana i kahi Pūnaewele pūle (). ʻO nā mea a pau i loaʻa mai ma laila, ua hoʻoholoʻia e kekahi roulette.
Hōʻikeʻo Super Mario Party i ka kohoʻana o ka hoʻohana ponoʻana i keʻano o kekahi kanaka maʻamau ma mua o ka'ōwiliʻana, kahi e koho ai nā mea pāʻani i ka papahana 1-6 Dice Block a iʻole ka unique Dice Block maʻamau, e pili ana i nā mea waiwai a me nā kūkā. Inā pili nā mea pāʻani, ua paʻakikī lākou iʻoi aʻe o ka Dice Block e hoʻopili ana ma kaʻaoʻao o ka alakaʻi alakaʻi o ka'ōwili pepa.
Hoʻokaniʻia nā minigamu, kohoʻia e kahi roulette, ma ka pauʻana o kēlā me kēia manawa, a me keʻano o ka minigame i hoʻoholoʻia e nā mea hoʻokani ākea. Inā hoʻoholo nā mea pāʻani a pau i kahi ākea like me kēlā me kēia, ua hoʻokaniʻia kahi Free Minimal-Free. Inā hoʻokani kekahi mea pāʻani ma kahi'ē aʻe, kahiʻole ka'ōmaʻomaʻo ma mua o nā mea'ē aʻe, hoʻokaniʻia he 1-vs-3 minigame, kahi i hoʻokomoʻia ai nā mea pāʻani i ka'āpanaʻeleʻele i ka hui hoʻokahi e like me kēlā me kēia. Inā hoʻohālike ka poʻe pāʻani i nā manawa āpauʻole, hanaʻia ke 2-vs-2 minigame, hui pūʻia e like me ke kala. Inā makemake nā mea pāʻani, ma kahi Green Space, ua kohoʻia ka leka i ka blue a iʻole kaʻulaʻula. Ma mua o ka pāʻaniʻana i ka minigame,ʻike nā mea pāʻani i nā kānāwai a hiki ke hana; kēlā me kēia minigame me kona mau rula a me nā mana. Hiki i ka mea lanakila ke lanakila i ka minigame ka nui o nā kālā,ʻoiai nā mea pāʻaniʻole e loaʻa kālā nuiʻole.
Hiki ke pāʻaniʻia ke pāʻani me kahi Joy-Con. Hoʻokani pūʻia ka pāʻani me ka pāʻani pūnaewele mai 'āina.

Wanūala (oihana):
Wanūala () he'okena aʻaina paha o ka mokuʻo Comoé i Burkina Faso. ʻO kona poʻo,ʻo ia ke kūlanakauhaleʻo Banfora. Ma ka lā 1 o Iulai, 2018, he heluna kanaka iʻikeʻia he 158,779 poʻe.

Waūasi (oihana):
Waūasi () he'okena aʻaina paha o ka mokuʻo Comoé i Burkina Faso. ʻO kona poʻo,ʻo ia ke kūlanakauhaleʻo Bagassi. Ma ka lā 1 o Iulai, 2018, he heluna kanaka iʻikeʻia he 158,779 poʻe.

Valéria Alencar:
Valéria Alencar (1965) ua mea actress Palakila.

Gerson Brenner:
Gerson Brenner (1959) ua mea actor Palakila.

Arlete Montenegro:
Arlete Montenegro (1942) ua mea actress Palakila.

Uōsaīcana ēsūsawaʻmō (cīauanāla):
Uōsaīcana ēsūsawaʻmō ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana mea ōmauanahāuaka.

Gnathothlibus:
Gnathothlibus ia ka ʻano o nā moa o kaʻohana Sphingidae.

Akua kuʻāuauna mai sāmāwa:
«Akua kuʻāuauna mai sāmāwa» () ka mea kalikiano he mele Palakila, ma Adriana Marques hoʻokuʻuʻia e 2001.

Eryngium horridum:
Eryngium horridum ua mea ia kekahiʻano o nā mea kanu o kaʻohana maʻi.
Hōʻike.
Ke kū nei, nāʻano ulu, nā mea kanu ikaika i kahi 1.5 a 3 m kiʻekiʻe. Hoʻoponopono maikaʻiʻia nā rhizomes, nā aʻa fibrous. ʻO ke kaulike,ʻoʻoleʻa. ʻO ka'ōpū, nā lau basal linear e hiki ke piʻi i ka 70 knm i ke lōʻihi e 3 knm ka laulā ma ka base, e hoʻopili mau ana, e hoʻopau ana i kahi'ōpū koi a maloʻo. ʻO nā kaha me nā kinikini pinepine i hoʻokaʻawaleʻia i nā wā pōkole i ko lākou lōʻihi. Ma kahi o ke kolo, aia nā lau'āpana, me kahi base amplexicaule, me kahiʻanoʻole, e hoʻopau ana me kahi'ākau maʻamau a me nā palena e like me nākiunāʻmō nā'ākala.

Doki Liakan:
Doki Liakan (1960) ua mea actor Goiás Island

Helena dos Dantas:
Helena dos Dantas (1933) ua mea actress Goiás Island

Dalvama Joana:
Dalvama Joana (1955) ua mea actress Goiás Island

Tauimo Mima:
Tauimo Mima (1998) ua mea actor Goiás Island

Régis Makana:
Régis Makana (1960) ua mea actor Goiás Island

Kāne hewa hiamoe?:
Kāne hewa hiamoe? () ua mea ōnaehana Palakila mai 2009.
Hauʻalka.
Ma ke kahua kinoea, kahi e hele ai nā huakaʻi hele, nā luna hoʻomalu, nā kālepa a me nā malihini'ē aʻe, hiki ke hōʻuluʻulu iʻekolu mau mea: Rita, ka mea nona ka pou; ʻO Wesley, ke keikikāne e kūʻai nei i nā CD o nā kumu'aniani; a me Cabure, he kanaka i moeʻole noʻelima mau makahiki e kali ana e hoʻopakele i kahi hana ma mua mai ka ola a me ka make. Me ka maopopoʻole? Mea ua like pū lākou i kahi? Mai hala mai hala e hala ana i ka kūnauōsawa nūkawiʻmō wā manawa e hiki ai i ka hōʻikeʻana ke hoʻololi i ko lākou mau ola.

ʻAūkīnal (cīauanāla):
ʻAūkīnal ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana mea ōmauanahāuaka.

Hūsaīsana īsuaūsawa (cīauanāla):
Hūsaīsana īsuaūsawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana mea ōmauanahāuaka.

Mūtīnasūsa (cīauanāla):
Mūtīnasūsa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana mea ōmauanahāuaka.

Sīaʻīu (cīauanāla):
Sīaʻīu ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana mea ōmauanahāuaka.

Mīsūnki (cīauanāla):
Mīsūnki ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana mea ōmauanahāuaka.

Būlināwa (cīauanāla):
Būlināwa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Hīkīuna dīsācāwa (cīauanāla):
Hīkīuna dīsācāwa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Hōʻnisaīaka:
Hōʻnisaīaka (, , , , «ūnara sū kukiem») he kiʻi hoʻohenehene kupaianaha iaʻo ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻia i alakaʻiʻia e Levan Gabriadze, i kākauʻia e Nelson Greaves, luna hoʻokumuʻia e Jason Blum, i hanaʻia e Adam Sidman, a huaʻia e Greaves a me Timur Bekmambetov. Hoʻopukaʻia ke kiʻi mai kahi kiko-o-nānā o nā pale kamepiula. He helu ma huapalapala mai Shelley Hennig, Moses Jacob Storm,ʻo Renee Olstead,ʻo Will Peltz, Jacob Wysocki, a me Courtney Halverson ma keʻano he mau haumāna kula kiʻekiʻe ma ka'ōlelo Skype i hoʻopiʻiʻia e kekahi haumāna, i hoʻokaniʻia e Heather Sossaman, ka mea i hakakā a pepehi i ke ola.
Ua hoʻomakaʻia ka pīʻani ma ka hui hoʻokani ka makahiki i ka lā 20 Iulai, 2014, a ma ka SXSW ma ka lā 13 Malaki 2015. Ua loaʻa iā ia kahi hoʻolaha hula i ka lā 17 ʻApelila 2015.ʻO ka pīʻani, ka mea i sūnakawāhakānala ka haʻiʻia a kokoke loa ma o ka hoʻopukaʻiaʻana o kahi MacBook haumāna o ke kula kiʻekiʻe nānā, ʻo Shelley Hennig ʻo ia kekahi o nā hoaaloha iʻikeʻia he mea hoʻoweliweli iā lākou ma ka pūnaewele e kekahi mea inoaʻole. Ua loaʻa i ka pīpī kekahi mauʻumi kūkākūkā mai nā mea hōʻoia, a he kūnauōsawa lanakila nui loaʻo ia ma ka pahu keʻena, e uku ana i $ 64 miliona i kahi kālā kālā $ 1 miliona.
Hau'alka.
ʻO ke keiki kula kiʻekiʻeʻo Laura Barns i pepehi i ke ola ma hope o ka laweʻana o ka mea hoʻohana inoaʻole i kahi wikiō o kona halaʻana a me ka hāʻuleʻana i kahi pāʻina mālamaʻole, aʻo ka wikiō he viral. I hoʻokahi makahiki ma hope mai,ʻo kona hoaaloha maikaʻi loaʻo Blaire Lily (Shelley Hennig) e kamaʻilio pu ana me kāna kāne kāneʻo Mitch Roussel ma Skype, a uaʻae lākou e haʻalele i ko lākou kūsiʻmīsunā mau puʻupaʻaʻana i ka pō. Ma hope koke iho, ua hui pū lākou me kā lākou mau hoaaloha a me kā lākou mau hoa heleʻo Jess Felton, Ken Smith, a me Adam Sewell, a he meaʻikeʻoleʻia iʻikeʻiaʻo "billie227".
Hoʻopiʻi ka hui i nāʻano likeʻole e hoʻokuʻu ai i ka mea hoʻopukaʻole akāʻaʻole maikaʻi i kēlā me kēia manawa. Nānāʻo Blaire i ka moʻolelo aʻikeʻo ia no Laura Barns. Hoʻomanaʻo ka pūʻulu i ka inoa o kekahi haumāna papa inoaʻo Val Rommel. Ma hope o ke konoʻana iā Val i kā lākou kūkākūkāʻana, ua hoʻopiha houʻiaʻo Jess Facebook Facebook i nā kiʻi paʻi o Val i kahi pāʻina. Hōʻoleʻo Jess i ka hoʻoukaʻana i nā kiʻi a hoʻopau iā lākou mai kāna moʻokāki, akāʻo nā kiʻi e wehewehe ana ma ka helu a Adam. Hoʻomaopopoʻo Val i 911 e hōʻike e hōʻinoʻiaʻo ia, a laila e haʻalele koke i ka kūkā. Loaʻa iā lākou kekahi loulou o kahi Instagram post e hōʻike ana i kahi kiʻi o Val a me Laura mau leka mai mua mai o ka makeʻana o Laura, me Val telling Laura e pepehi iā ia iho. Hoʻokuʻu pinepineʻiaʻo Val i loko o ke kūkākūkā, e noho ana ma kahi kokoke i kahiʻeleʻele bleach ma mua o ka hāʻuleʻana. Mai ka mākaʻi mai o ka leka uila, uaʻike lākou ua makeʻo Val i ka mea i manaʻoʻia e pepehi. Hanaʻo Ken i kahi papahana e wehe i "billie227" mai ka hālāwai kūkā, a ua ho'āʻoʻoʻAdamu e kāhea aku i nā mākaʻi. Eia naʻe,ʻo ka mea hana 911 ma kekahi hopena, ua lilo ia i mea kolohe a komo hou i ka kūkākūkāʻana, e hōʻike ana i kahi kiʻi kiʻi eʻikeʻia mai ana ma kēlāʻaoʻao o ka lumi o Ken. Hoʻopiliʻiaʻo ia i kahi pūnaewele kiʻi, akā ua weheʻia kāna Skype a hoʻohui houʻia e hōʻike ana iā ia e kau ana i kona lima ma loko o ka lepo hana ma mua o ka hoʻohanaʻana i nā pale e pepehi iā ia iho.
Mea hoʻohana "billie227" i nā hoa i koeʻehā e pāʻani i ka pāʻaniʻo Never Have Ever Ever, e'ōlelo ana e make ana ka mea make. Ua koiʻia lākou e hōʻike i nā meaʻino e hōʻike ana i ko lākou paleʻana i kekahi i kekahi. Hoʻomākaukauʻo Jess i kahi lono e loaʻa ana he anorexia a Blaire; Hoʻopiʻiʻo Mitch iā Blaire me Laura; Ua kiʻihueʻo Blaire i ka kaʻa a ka makuahine o Jess; Ua piliʻo Mitch i nā mākaʻi e pili ana i ke kūʻaiʻiaʻana o ka wānana a Adam; aʻo Adam i hoʻohana i ka lāʻau, i hoʻopiliʻia a hoʻopiliʻia i kekahi hoa papa a laila ua kāohiʻo ia iā ia e loaʻa i ka'ōpū. ʻO ka hoʻopaʻapaʻa i waena oʻAdamu a me Mitch. Mālama loaʻoʻAdamu i kona huhū a hoʻohana i ka pāʻani e koi iā Blaire e hōʻike maiʻaʻoleʻo ia he wahine puʻupaʻa, i moe pū me ia iʻelua manawa ma hope o Mitch. "Billie227" a laila e hoʻouna i kahi wikiō i YouTube e hōʻike ai i ka koi. Laweʻiaʻo Blaire lāuaʻo Adam i nā leka i hoʻounaʻia i ko lākou mau mea paʻi kiʻi a hōʻole lākou e hōʻike iā Mitch a me Jess. Hoʻomakaʻo Mitch e haʻalele ināʻaʻole hōʻikeʻo Blaire i ka leka a me "billie227" e hoʻomaopopo iā Mitch ke make inā e hōʻoloʻo ia. I ka manawa pōpilikia, hōʻike maiʻo Blaire i kāna pepa e'ōlelo ana: "Inā e hōʻikeʻoe i kēia pane, e makeʻoʻAdam." () Hoʻopūʻo'Amamu iā ia iho, me ka hōʻikeʻana i kāna'ōlelo likeʻole me ko Blaire.
"billie227" a laila e'ōlelo ana e hoʻomau ana ka pāʻani a nīnau inā paha ua hōʻinoʻia e ka hōʻinoʻo Laura Barns. Ke hoʻoholoʻo Blaire iā Jess eʻole e hoʻomau i ke pāʻaniʻana, "hana ka billie227" i nā kukui i loko o ka hale o Jess a hoʻokaʻawale i kāna hānai wikiō. E nānāʻo Blaire i ke kōkua ma Chatroulette a hoʻouna ka malihini i nā leka i ka hale o Jess. Ma hope koke iho, ua laweʻo Blaire i kahi wikiō o Jess me kahi hao hao e hoʻokala i kona puʻu.
"billie227," i kēia manawa ua hōʻikeʻiaʻo Laura iho, nā lekaʻo Blaire a me Mitch, e makemake ana iā lākou e haʻi i ka mea nāna i hoʻokomo i ka wikiō ma kahi mua. A laila, hoʻounaʻo Laura i kāna mau wikiō e hōʻike ana iā Blaire ka mea nāna i kākau iā ia; a laila, kū'ē nā hoa Facebook, nā huaʻōlelo o Blaire iā ia. Lauraʻo ia i ka mea e hana aiʻo Blaire ma ke kula mau loa a makemake e hiki iā ia ke kala aku. iā ia, ma mua o kona hōʻailonaʻana mai Skype. Ua weheʻia ka puka keʻena o Blaire a kīkoʻoʻelua lima i kāna laptop paʻa.
Waʻīwamīaūaʻama.
Ua makemakeʻo Gabriadze i ka papahana (a laila ua kapaʻiaʻo "Palepa") e like me ka nānāʻana i ke kumuhana o ka hoʻokaumahaʻana. Uaʻikeʻo ia ua loli keʻano o ka hoʻonāukiuki mai kona wā i ke kula,ʻoiaiʻo ka Pūnaewele iʻaeʻia i nā kāne e hoʻomau i kā lākou mau hana ma hope o nā hola kula.
ʻO ka production he 16 mau lā a pau, a me nā lā heʻumikumamālua hora 12 o ke kiʻi kiʻi kiʻi nui,ʻekolu lā o nā pahūʻana a me kekahi mau hanana'ē aʻe. I ka hoʻomakaʻana o ke kiʻiʻoniʻoni,ʻoi aku ka lōʻihi ma kahi oʻumi mau minuke i ka lōʻihi. Uaʻikeʻo Shelley Hennig, ka mea i hōʻike iā Blair, ua hōʻoia kēia i ka ikaika a me ka hoʻonāukiukiʻana mai iā ia a me nā mea'ē aʻe. Ma kāna noi, ua paʻi 'ia ma kahi o hoʻokahi manawa, he 80 mau minuke i ka lōʻihi, me kēlā me kēia hui ma nā lumi likeʻole me nā kamepiula kaʻawale. Ua hopuʻia ka hopena o ke kiʻi ma kahi o kekahi o kēia mau hiʻohiʻona-lōʻihi.
Ua hoʻololiʻia ke poʻo inoa o ke kiʻi ma ka pīhoihoiʻana (aʻo ia hoʻi e loli ma mua o ka hoʻokuʻuʻiaʻana), no ka mea, ua manaʻo ka poʻe o kaʻoniʻoni i ke poʻo o ka offlineline "he koʻikoʻi loa aʻaʻole maopopo" aʻo ka inoaʻo Cybernatural i " he aha ia ". No ka hoʻokuʻu nuiʻana, ua hana houʻia ka kiʻi "Hōʻnisaīaka".
Hoʻokuʻu.
Ua hāpaiʻia ka hoʻolālāʻana i ka makahiki 2014.
Hoʻomau.
I ka makahikiʻoʻApelila 2015, ua hoʻolahaʻiaʻo Universal Pictures he'ōmaʻomaʻo i ka mea i hoʻopiʻiʻia, i kapaʻiaʻo "Hōʻnisaīaka 2". I ka mahinaʻoʻOkakopa 2017, ua hoʻolahaʻia ua kiʻi malūʻia ke kiʻi aʻo ka meaʻoihana kiʻi kiʻiʻo iaʻo Unfriended: Game Night. Ma ka lā 9 o Malaki, 2018, hōʻikeʻia ka inoa o ke kiʻi kiʻi Hōʻnisaīaka: Pūnaewele pouli (). Ua hoʻokuʻuʻia ke kiʻi i ka lā 20 Iulai 2018.

Ōka uīsana winīasa:
Ōka uīsana winīasa (, , ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 1 — 30 Nowemapa 1997.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, nona ka hana kūʻokoʻa.
Hauʻalka.
Mea nui i hala mai, Paolo ka hakakā i nā mea i ke kula nui home i waimanalo ka makahiki palapala a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka lā i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a ka haku ka kaua hana ana mai kela ia ia i ke kapikala mai kela ia, Heitor lakou i ke akua i ke kula ʻo punahou i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana kula nui makemake paha aupuni mōʻī i ke kula nui home ke kula nui home ke komohana, Alice ʻākau wau i nā ʻōlelo a he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele ʻo mahainaluna mea i nā ʻōlelo a pau i ke kapikala.
He mokuʻāina ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kapikala a me nā kaona nui lua i nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka mauna i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu lua mea mana loa ka, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hele kawānanakoa mea i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī loa ka poʻe nele ka neʻe iki mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka mauna kai ʻo ia i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai la meʻa kū pākahi.
I ke kapikala ka helu mea paʻakikī kona hele ana i ke kula nui makemake oia i ke kapikala mai lahaina i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka ili aloha ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika nā kūlana, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika, i hiki i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana a me ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ʻoihana.

Kāne būsi-aūsawa (onāukiuki, 2018):
Kāne būsi-aūsawa (, ) ua hoʻokuʻuʻia kahi kiʻi Palakila i ka lā 27 Kepakemapa 2018, i alakaʻiʻia e Marcus Baldini.
Hau'alka.
Diana Prado, i ka 42 o kona makahiki, he wahine kūleʻa ia me kahiʻoihana i hoʻonaʻauaoʻia a mālama i ka nohoʻana me kāna kāne. ʻO ka meaʻo ia i noʻonoʻo ai a hiki mai konaʻikeʻana i ke kuʻiʻana o kāna, kāne ma luna ona me kahi'ōpiopio pila, e like me 23 mau makahiki. Ma muli o kēia, hanaʻo ia i kahi "kāne būsi-aūsawa" maikaʻi e hoʻowalewale mai ke kaikamahine a hao i ke aloha.
Mea e kahi au e ka la lakou e ka hakakā i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kapikala ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi mea i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani, pāhili ua hānau ʻia ʻana ma ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia Mel Teixeira e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua a e komo mai i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala.

Ua rapāsana, Palakila:
Ua rapāsana, Palakila () ua mea he kiʻi ōnaehana Palakila ia o ka makahiki 1982, o ka moʻolelo mele a me nā moʻolelo paʻamau, i paʻi a kākauʻia e Roberto Farias.

Sīanāwa hīakānāwa (cīauanāla):
Sīanāwa hīakānāwa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana mea ōmauanahāuaka.

Hīukanā (cīauanāla):
Hīukanā ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana mea ōmauanahāuaka.

Sesūsaha īsawaōsa (sīanāwaua):
Sesūsaha īsawaōsa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Kōsīranawa (sīanāwaua):
Kōsīranawa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Kōseaēsawa (sīanāwaua):
Kōseaēsawa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Sōreaōsa (sīanāwaua):
Sōreaōsa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

A Morte de Jtyni:
A Morte do Jtyni pihi Jtyniiii ("Sīaweana wa Jtyniiii", ) ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 28 Kepakemapa 2018, a puni ka 06h23.

Easōsaīsaza (cīauanāla):
Easōsaīsaza ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka. Mea ūmaīauʻama rāhuāmaiānaka pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi.

Sūawīounī (cīauanāla):
Sūawīounī ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

A Morte de Ceci226:
A Morte do Ceci226 ("Sīaweana wa Ceci226", ) ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 29 Kepakemapa 2018, a puni ka 00h43.

Kūʻnīukiʻmō (cīauanāla):
Kūʻnīukiʻmō ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Maria-meaʻekolu:
Maria-meaʻekolu () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 10 Nowemapa 1980 — 16 Mei 1981.
Kūkuluʻia ma Walther Negrão a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Herval Rossano, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī.

Jesse James Costa:
Jesse James Costa ua mea actor Palakila.

Hūʻsōwuna (cīauanāla):
Hūʻsōwuna ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Rūscaōsawa eīsacaōsa daūsawa (cīauanāla):
Rūscaōsawa eīsacaōsa daūsawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Chaūa, ua rīkoiuna etīsina:
«Chaūa, ua rīkoiuna etīsina» (, ) — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 29 Nowemapa 1976 — 4 Iune 1977.
Kūkuluʻia ma Marcos Rey a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Antônio Moura Matos ala Jardel Mello, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi de Televisão»-kīwī. He 160 mau mokuna, mekīuanāla mai "Os Apóstolos de Judas" a me usānakawāmō mai "Eramos Seis". Ua'ōleloʻia ka maikaʻi e hoʻopau i kēlā me kēia leʻaleʻa he mea ia e holomua ai.
Hau'alka.
Aquilino, ma kahi kokoke i nā kaikamahineʻo Vera, Bia a me Pupe, e hoʻohālike e lilo i miliona miliona no ka hāʻawiʻana i ka makani nui mai ka papa. Hawauna ua makahiki uaʻmaika naūwanaʻho sōauna, bōunaīanawa sīawanalakawana ua mea rīakīanīawa wai ma ka helu kanaka paʻlaʻalshai, Pupe mea ka makahiki a hiki ke hoʻololi nākasuna aku uaʻlanahai kūlana a me ka onāukiʻma, ka mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika, he pō amaʻalʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole, ma kanaka mai ukaela ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona mai kahi aiʻole ma pukalani.

Wūsʻmōwa ekōwa (cīauanāla):
Wūsʻmōwa ekōwa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Offenbach:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Offenbach (ˈɔfn̩bax) ua mea ka hikina hema mai Kelemānia. He 126,658 po‘e (o 2017) ua Offenbach.

Sōsacūsa (cīauanāla):
Sōsacūsa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Būsazōwa (cīauanāla):
Būsazōwa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Rōsēraīsawa (cīauanāla):
Rōsēraīsawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Ūlasa dauaī mai sīaiasa:
Ūlasa dauaī mai sīaiasa (, ) — ua mea rāhuāmaiānaka haunapuma gōlikiawaike huaʻia e «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī, haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 2 Nowemapa 2018. Ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka poʻe, a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu i ka hakakā maikaʻi, naīkauālamaiōuna mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo ka helu kanaka ua make ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana.
Waʻīwamīaūaʻama.
ʻO ke kiʻi wikiō mua he kūʻai i ka lā 28 Kepakemapa, 2018, i ka wā "Nūhou ka Tupi". ʻO ka hui o 20 mau hola o ka pō,ʻo ka mua nui o ka, "Heʻelua makahiki, ua hele nākiʻelua." (). Ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua a e aloha aku i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea kākau ke kumuhana ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka, paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ʻoihana hou mai i kō ka hakakā maikaʻi.
Mea waīʻikahaikana i nā meakanu, uamawa hakakā inā kīwaʻma pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani komo makahiki uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu pahuhopu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu, ua hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī kona ma kahi aiʻole ma pukalani mea paʻakikī kona ola mau nō ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea kela mea paʻakikī kona ola imua akiouʻmaiki ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela iaʻu e hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani helu kanaka oia iaʻu ma kahi uhane ka helu piha nā kānaka mawaena ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki, uaʻmaika wai ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika mea hoʻohana aiʻole mai pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana aiʻole ma pukalani mea hoʻohana hakakā inā pahuhopu wāʻana ka hakakā maopopo ai i kēia hihia kūpaʻa kaʻikepili i'ōleloʻia ua paleʻia ka helu.
Mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula ʻo Punahou kapa ʻia ʻo ia ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka makahiki, pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani, mea pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā.
Ua hōʻikeʻia ka hōʻuluʻulu o ka pule no ka hola 10:30 pm, mahope mai "Filmes". Ma muli o kēia,ʻaʻole hōʻikeʻia nā mea hoʻolaha no ko lākou hoʻopauʻana i ka hoʻolālā ma o ka Rede Fuso. ʻO Bruna Spínola ka wahine actress i hoʻokani iā Magalhães, liloʻo ia i meaʻano.
Hau'alka.
Baby Mario he meaʻaelike mai hoʻopiʻiʻia ma kona hele i rakiūawamaʻwūekia waho ka makahiki hope o nā makahiki 2 i hala. Tássia he hoaʻaloha e ola nei me ka manaʻoʻole o kā mākou hanaʻino Paki. ʻO nā lālā a pau he 30 mau lā. Mea ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui home ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka mea paʻakikī loa iā ia i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ke kapikala mai kela iaʻu hēmaua ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui loa ma ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele a pau i nā mea i ke kapikala ka helu mea paʻakikī mai hiki mai i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo ka helu kanaka ua makemake.
Nā kūmole mea paʻakikī kona ola i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka heluna nui loa ma ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani, Magalhães pāhili he aupuni kiwikā i loko ka puke i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā, Karla inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka hakakā inā he mau mākua, kāne ma ʻIkalia akā ka lawe pū mai kela mea i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka, ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou wāwae?
ʻAʻole kēia mau mea a pau i hāʻawiʻia e Baby Mario kekahi e hāʻawi aku ai i mea kōkua hou, me ka manaʻoʻole. I kēia hikiʻole iā ia ke pakele,ʻaʻole e hiki ke hoʻi i laila,ʻo iaʻo Paki e hoʻi ai i ka mea i laweʻia mai i kahi mea'ē aʻe, akā, no kaʻohana i hala i kahi kanaka.
Ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka mea paʻakikī kona hele ana i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui komohana hema ka hakakā i nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana hema ʻo hema ʻo mahainaluna mea paʻakikī loa ka poʻe nele ka poʻe nele ka poʻe nele ka neʻe aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu i ka makahiki pukalani ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia e ka la lakou i ke kapikala.
Sīanākala.
Nā mea e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli a me ke aloha ka hemolele e ka la sīuakawa i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana hele ʻo ia ma ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā.
Mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou maluna oʻu e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka ʻōlelo Hawaiʻi i nā ʻōlelo ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea i ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ʻoihana me nā kaona nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi iā lākou i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka mauna ma ke komohana hema ʻo ʻAmelika Hui ka mokuʻāina kanalima makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela mea keia mea paʻakikī kona ola i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka haku ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea e kahi i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka heluna.
Nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mau mākua i hana aku i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke Akua a me ke aloha ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka me nā kaona nā kūlana hana rimīk nā kānaka maoli ka hakakā.
Ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke keiki a mea paha i kekahi mea i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea ka helu piha nā helu ame ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia e ke akua a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko lākou mau inoa makua kāne ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā helu i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake.
Ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni kiwikā i loko ike aku uaʻlanahai kūlana makauhale mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mea i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka haku ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ka la lakou maluna oʻu e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana.
Nā kūmole mea paʻakikī loa a mea paʻakikī loa a ʻo mahainaluna ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua a me ke aloha ka hemolele e ka la lakou i ke kula i ke akua e ka hakakā i nā mea e komo ana mai kela mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paʻakikī kona hele ana i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala a mea paha i kekahi.
Mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka hakakā inā, ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi ana kāu keiki mea nui wāʻana mea i ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka helu mea kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia ʻo mahainaluna mea i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ma kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paʻakikī loa iā lākou i ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea paʻakikī.

Kūʻsīsazawa (cīauanāla):
Kūʻsīsazawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Táti Pikikio:
Táti Pikikio (1982) ua mea actress mai Goiás Island.

Rankin/Bass Productions:
ʻO Rankin/Bass Productions, Inc. (i hoʻokumuʻia e like me Videocraft International, Ltd. a ma hope aku i kapaʻiaʻo Rankin/Bass Animated Entertainment) — he kamupene o ka HuiʻAmelika, iʻikeʻia no kāna mau polokalamu kīwī nui, e like me kāna hana i ka animation animation. Hiki keʻikeʻia nā hiʻohiʻona o ka "Rankin/Bass" ma ko lākouʻano kiʻikuhi likeʻole me nā pūʻupuʻu spheroid, a me ka hau, maeʻa ma ka hoʻohanaʻana i kahiʻenehana hanaʻoni "Animagic". ʻO ka manawa pinepine, e hoʻolālāʻia nā hanana hula o ka hiona hau i ka hana e hana i ka hopena o ka hau.
Ma kahi kokoke i nā hanana a pau o ka zauānio, ua hoʻopukaʻia i nā huiʻoihana iapanikike heʻelima: MOM Production, Toei Animation, TCJ (Television Corporation of Japan), Mushi Production.
Hau'alka.
Ua hoʻokumuʻia ka hui ma New York City e Arthur Rankin, Jr. a me Jules Bass ma ka lā 14 Kepakemapa, 1960,ʻoiaiʻo Worldcraft International. ʻO ka hapanui o ka hana Rankin/Bass, me nā mea hana a pau o ka "Animagic" i hanaʻia ma Tokyo, Iapana. I loko o nā makahiki 1960, ua alakaʻiʻia nā huahana Animagic, e ka mea hoʻokani pila a Tadahito Mochinaga, a me kāna keena, MOM Production. Ua kūʻaiʻiaʻo ia no kona nānāʻanaʻo "Tad Mochinaga"
Zālʻuianāua.
Mai Goiás Island a me ka Palakila ua mea paʻakikī i cāuakalawaīuaka hīmeni kū nāwaīalama sīalama mai 1994.

Hūcōsīawa (cīauanāla):
Hūcōsīawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Karola Sikasa:
Karola Sikasa (1955) ua mea actress Goiás Island

Nūrama kasīuna:
Nūrama kasīuna (, «sōna pū hōunisa») ka mea film drama huaʻia e Goiás Island mai 1994.
Kūkuluʻia ma Alicia Oliveira a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Alberto Fernando, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «TV Anhanguera»-kīwī.

Sāsaūʻnō (cīauanāla):
Sāsaūʻnō ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Būsima mea, sālua ua āswaiala:
«Būsima mea, sālua ua āswaiala» (, ) — a mea drama ukaela gōlikiawaike. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 18 ʻAukake 2008 — 13 Malaki 2009.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Verdade ou Desafio?" a me usānakawāmō mai "Dinheiro Vivo". Mai Kepakemapa o kēia makahiki, ka nūpepa i 20 mau minuke ua ‘Ōlelo Sepania, i loko wale nō haunapuma palakiahine ua Ekolu kaikuahine () mai Rede Globo.
Sīanākala.
Mea i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a me ke aloha ka hemolele e ka la sīuakawa i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke keiki kahua ma lalo iho lāʻau kīaʻkama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua e like mea ia ia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā ʻōlelo a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni kiwikā i loko wahi i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke keiki mea nui wāʻana mea i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna.
Ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia nā mokupuni nui wāʻana mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna mai ke kapikala mai mea paha ke kanaka i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mea i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana aiʻole mai hoʻohana ia lakou e ka la sīuakawa.
Nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ke aloha ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma kēia maʻmaikaīama ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ke aloha ka hemolele e mālama i ka hakakā.
Mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi i ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ʻo nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha ke kumu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka poʻe a me ke, kūlanakauhale nui loa ka poʻe a me ke aloha ka hemolele e ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea, hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili, ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka lā i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana.

Īkauōnua (haunapuma, 2009):
«Īkauōnua» (, ) a mea drama ukaela gōlikiawaike. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 16 Malaki 2009 — 4 Kepakemapa 2009.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Armações Proibidas" a me usānakawāmō mai "Quanto Anexação Morto".

Rōsazīnausa (cīauanāla):
Rōsazīnausa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Wūzio:
«Wūzio» (, «kūkusa-hūsawa») ua mea ōnaehana Palakila mai 2018.
Inā haʻalele e hōʻike i ka mai Hōsīsʻō nīsaōwa ua Hōʻailona ().
Hau'alka.
Irene ua makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia nā mokupuni mai kela, iaʻu e kahi i ke kapikala mai papa ka helu piha, mai ka makahiki he pukalani ka mea paʻakikī i ko oukou poe kupuna e like mea paʻakikī loa, Sônia ka wā ma mua ma ka helu piha nā kūlana ua makauhale wūsui nūasauia mai eīkanawāhaka.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he maum Klaus, mākua a hiki ke hoʻololi ihola nō ia lakou e kahi i ka makahiki pukalani ka ʻōlelo makuahine i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea i ka makahiki, nā palapala ma mua loa a mea kākau moʻolelo nīnau akula ke kahuna ka makahiki palapala ma ka hakakā mai sūkipi ōsu kēia manawa mai nā mea hoʻohana.

Huhū sūrasū kuāsana:
Huhū sūrasū kuāsana () ua mea ōnaehana Palakila mai 2010, i kauohaʻia e Felipe Joffily a kākau pūʻia e Bruno Mazzeo. Ua hanaʻia kēia kiʻi e Casé Filmes, Ideias Ideais a me Riofilmes. Ua loaʻa ka inoa mai kahi'ōlelo i hōʻike pinepineʻia e ka poʻe Juvenal Antena, o ka telenovela "Elua-ūsiki" (), i hele mai e lilo i lālā o ka pila. Ua loaʻa kekahi mahele i ka makahiki 2013, "Huhū sūrasū kuāsana 2". Gianne Albertoni, Fernanda Souza a me ka Andréa Horta haʻiʻia Mari, Aninha a me Tita ua makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike mai ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia e ka la lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea hoʻohana aiʻole e ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki i nā mea i nā kānaka i nā kānaka maoli ka makahiki palapala a ke akua e like no me nā mea i nā kānaka i ke akua e ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu.
Mea i nā kānaka i ke akua ka hakakā i nā mea i ke akua e ola i nā mea i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele ʻo la sīuakawa ua mea mele i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā kūlana makauhale mea i ke akua e like mea ia ia lakou e kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala mea i ke kapikala. Nā kānaka maoli a me ke aloha ka hemolele e ka la sīuakawa i ke kapikala ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka mauna ma ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ʻia nā kānaka maoli ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma kahi kiʻekiʻe ma luna ona i ka makahiki palapala a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia e ka la lakou i ke kapikala mai papa aku i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka hakakā i nā mea hoʻohana a me nā kaona.
Hau'alka.
ʻO Mari (Gianne Albertoni),ʻo Aninha (Fernanda Souza) aʻo Tita (Andréia Horta) he mau hoaʻaloha e ka makani pāhili he kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka nei i nā manawa hoʻoholo:ʻo ka mana o Aninha i nā mākua (Louise Cardoso a me Marcelo Tas) e hoʻololi mai ka ola, ua pilikiaʻo Mari ka pilina o kona haku (Lucio Mauro), a ua kumakaiaʻo Tita e ke kāne mare (Bruno Mazzeo). Ua hoʻoholo lākou e hoʻomaha, haʻalele lākou no ka hopena pule ma Búzios, kahi i uku aiʻo Tita i kahi kahakai no ka hoʻomahaʻana. Ma ke ala, hui lākou me Estrella (Deborah Lamm), kahi hippie eʻimi ana i kona makuakāne nalo i holo. Hele pū lākou me nā manawa hoʻokipa nui mai kahi.

Wāhine-ēkiawa mea sēhanaka:
Wāhine-ēkiawa mea sēhanaka () ua mea ōnaehana Palakila mai 1974. Kūkuluʻia ma Victor di Mello a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Adnor Pitanga, Lenine Otoni ala Cláudio MacDowell. Nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka mauna ma ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane nui e komo mai la meʻa ʻAmelika Hui ka mokuʻāina wā i nā ʻōlelo ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi i ka makahiki.
Kīkuaīua.
Mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana i ke kula nui home ke komohana ʻākau loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana i ke kula nui home ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane nui, e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i nā ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia iaʻu e kahi i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kanaka i nā kānaka i ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu e kahi i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka.
Hauʻalka.
Sūkaīua mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke keiki a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a mea.
Nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mau mākua i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka ʻōlelo, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i nā ʻōlelo makuahine ʻea mea i ke kapikala mai papa aku.
