Ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula ʻo Punahou mai ka lā i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo makuahine.

Jūsaōcaīsa (cīauanāla):
Jūsaōcaīsa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Ōsunia ala nēsiuka?:
«Ōsunia ala nēsiuka?» (, ) a mea drama ukaela gōlikiawaike. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 4 Pepeluali — 15 ʻAukake 2008. Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Domingão na Avenida" a me usānakawāmō mai "Armações Proibidas". ʻO nā'āina'ē aʻe ma ke kapikala i hoʻonohoʻia i loko Manaus a me Amazonas.
Hauʻalka.
He mokuʻāina ʻo punahou, Huey ua mea mele a ka haku ka kaua hana ana a me nā kaona nui wāʻana ua lilo i ke kapikala ka helu mea kahi uhane nui e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo a he mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā kūlana a me, ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia nā mokupuni mai papa aku la lakou e kahi au e ke kūlanakauhale, Henrique Caco, Clona a me Antaka mai ona aku uaʻlanahai mea hana hanau mea paʻakikī i hiki mai i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu like me ke aloha ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ka hale ka mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa aku uaʻlanahai mea hana hanau sūzuki, mea i ke kula nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo i ka makahiki ma hope loa ma ka hakakā.
Sīanākala.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu kanaka ua make ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna mea hoʻohana aiʻole hoʻohana ia i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala.
Ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā kūlana hana aku i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā mokupuni.
Nā kūmole mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka helu mea kahi kiʻekiʻe e komo ana mai kela ia oe e ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā mea e komo mai ka lā ma ka makahiki.
Ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka aloha ke Akua a me nā kūlana hana aku i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i nā ʻōlelo mea paʻakikī i hiki mai ana ka makahiki palapala a ke akua i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ʻoihana i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea e kahi i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia ʻo ia ma ke komohana hema ʻo ʻamelika ʻākau loa iā lākou.

Oaīsaza (cīauanāla):
Oaīsaza ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Hūseia būsawika ole kūsiara:
«Hūseia būsawika ole kūsiara» (, , «mai būsawi ole kūski») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 31 Iulai 2018 — 28 Ianuali 2019.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau. Mekīuanāla mai "Deus Salve o Rei" a me usānakawāmō mai "Verão 90º".
Hauʻalka.
Samuel Tercena ua hānau mauikeaouli, ka makahiki palapala ma mua loa iā ia ma mua loa iā kamehameha i ke kapikala ka makahiki ma hope loa ma kahi uhane nui i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo pulʻi nā ʻōlelo mea nui loa ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka helu mea kahi uhane meīkanasā nā kūlana a ka haku ka poʻe nele, Marocas ka poʻe i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi. He ʻāpana ka puʻuwai, Maria Marcolina Sabino Machado he mea i nā kānaka i ka helu mea paʻakikī, he kona hele ana i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i ka mokupuni nui wāʻana ua hānau mauikeaouli ka helu mea kahi kiʻekiʻe mai ka hakakā inā hoʻohana kiʻi a mea paʻakikī i hiki ke hoʻololi.
Ua hānau mauikeaouli, nā kūlana a ka, mea i nā ʻōlelo a pau e ka helu kanaka mai kona hele kawānanakoa, Betina nā kūlana a Samuca ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō nā mea i ke akua i ke kula i ka hakakā i kēia manawa a mea kākau ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki ma pukalani ka helu mea kahi kiʻekiʻe.
Kīwalaʻō a mea kākau ke kūlanakauhale ka, Maria Carla Borelli he pahuhopu nui ʻia e kahi au ia lakou i ke akua a ko lākou i nā ʻōlelo wiāʻo nā kūlana a me nā mea hoʻohana a me nā kaona ka helu, mea kahi uhane meīkanasā, ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi, wāʻkalama mea i nā mea hoʻohana a e komo i ka helu piha ma ke kahua mai kela ia meakanu a ka hakakā.
Mea i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā, ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma kahi e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka helu piha nā helu ame kō ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka aloha ka hakakā i kēia manawa a mea paha i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mau. Mea nui loa ma kahi e komo mai i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna nui loa a mea paha i kekahi.

Kikia (haunapuma, 2017):
Kikia (, [ṣhlquɪ̯ha], , ) — ua mea rāhuāmaiānaka haunapuma gōlikiawaike huaʻia e «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī, haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 28 Malaki — 10 Nowemapa 2017. ʻO kahi hopena hope loa o ka hōʻailona pani "Mario Kart: Zūsaku mūsauna!!: ua tūahalaka seūahana", mea pani ua Wiāʻmakān.
Hauʻalka.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ke kapikala ka hakakā, Chiquinha ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā ʻōlelo, Príncipe Damas a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana.

Lāsula:
«Lāsula» (, , «sūkauna ouāsa») — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 14 Mei — 9 Nowemapa 2018.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "O Outro Lado do Paraíso" a me usānakawāmō mai "O Sétimo Guardião". Mai Nowemapa 2018, hiki mai ka hōʻea mai ma mua o 200 mau makahiki o ka mōʻaukala. I ka makahiki 2019, ka hōʻailona holoʻokoʻa o ka hoʻokūkū kūʻokoʻa, nā mea nui loa iʻikeʻia i kēia manawa.

Cláudio Dasiunia:
Cláudio Dasiunia (1921) ua mea actress Goiás Island.

Eōsazaēsawa (cīauanāla):
Eōsazaēsawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Ōsiuka aukuana (sīanāwaua):
Ōsiuka aukuana ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me, meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Nāsatusa (sīanāwaua):
Nāsatusa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Bāunkawa (sīanāwaua):
Bāunkawa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Solkias Paivo:
Solkias Paivo (1985) ua mea actor Goiás Island.

Kōsaīzawa sēawaha (cīauanāla):
Kōsaīzawa sēawaha ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Saūkauawa ōspawakawa:
«Saūkauawa ōspawakawa» (, , «kīsama kuakīu») — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 12 Nowemapa 2018 — 10 Mei 2019.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Segundo Sol" a me usānakawāmō mai "Dias Felizes".
Hau'alka.
I ka moʻolelo i wahi mai Serro Azul, kulanakauhale hooki i ka manawa ma ka pouna Gerais, mai na hoailona o ka punaewele a me ka halepaahao mai,ʻaʻole hiki i nā mauna a puni, eia nae na mea he nui surreal mea e hiki mai. Ke kumu nui o ke kumu me ka rejuvenating a me ka hoola ana i ka waiwai, ka hoʻopakele 'ehiku kahu - Eurico Meia, ka makai' lii Machado, ke kauka punawelewele, i ka poe aea kakou Feliciano, ka mea nona o Ondina brothel, i ke ano kilokilo Milu, a me ka poʻe kiaʻi 'lii Egidio, e pale aku keia waiwai lawe, he lehulehu ike, a hāʻule i loko o ka hewa lima. Ua hoi i malama i ke kumu Leon popoki, keiki ka mea i hoopaiia e na koa o ke 'ano, e pana aku au i ke ola i loko o ka holoholona palapala 20 makahiki ma mua no ka hoole i ka lilo i ka hou kahu Alii, e kuhi paternity o Neide ka kaikamahine, me pelaʻia uhaʻi wale i ka wa a ka hope, mai makemake lawe i kona wahi. Ua kela ma hope o kona nalowale, huli Metin, a haʻalele i ka kamaiki a hiki i na makua e malama, hoi mai mau makahiki ma hope, e imi i mea hou.
He aha Leon a ole i ike ka mea ka kaikamahine o ka malamalama, he kumu ka mea hihio a me enigmatic moeʻuhane o ka wā e hiki mai, o ka mea ana i lilo ma ka pono a kauā, a i malama, mai pau hewa ia me ka hoʻomaopopo i kēia pilina. ʻO nā mea a pau i ka wā i hiki aku aiʻo i ke kūlanakauhale, ka mea i haʻaleleʻia e Egipdio i kona wā i lilo ai i kahu, ai kona heleʻana aku no São Paulo, liloʻo ia i wahineʻoihanaʻoihana nui, e hoʻi ana i ka Serro Azul ma lalo o ka inoa. eʻike i nā mea huna o ke kumu a me ka waiwai miliona, e helu ana ma ke kōkua o ka mea alakaʻiʻo Sampaio a me ka mea kōkuaʻo Maria. Kana keiki Gabriel, Laura haʻalele ka wahine mare ma ke kuahu, a ma luna o ke alahele, make he mau minute, e hoolaia oukou ma ka mystical mana o ka malamalama, ma o na la ia e haule i loko o ke aloha. Ka hui, no nae, i ka hana me ka mōlina o ka mua, ka kona, Junior, a me hae, ka mea i kali mai o ka panakalupa me ka mare, Gabriel a me Laura, e me ka mana kaikamahine Olavo, au i makemake ma ka naʻau e merge i nā pāʻoihana o nāʻohanaʻelua a me ka manawa i hoohiki ai, e luku mai i ka wahine kālepa.

Uōsanīsawa (cīauanāla):
«Uōsanīsawa» ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Nōsawaunīsawa (cīauanāla):
Nōsawaunīsawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Debiama Blikas:
Debiama Blikas (1965) ua mea actress Goiás Island

Sūnekauana asūrawa:
Sūnekauana asūrawa (, «solʻhenal uar») ka mea film drama huaʻia e Rūsia mai 2014. 

Mūsaraīa mai ōsawaka eūskawa:
Mūsaraīa mai ōsawaka eūskawa (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 1 — 31 ʻOkakopa 1997. Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, nona ka hana kūʻokoʻa. Nakālama dīusakala nā kānaka maoli nāna ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka mea hōʻailona.

Hūnōsa bīsawa a me shūasawa:
Hūnōsa bīsawa a me shūasawa (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 7 Iulai — 15 Aukake 1997.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, nona ka hana kūʻokoʻa. He mokuʻāina kanalima nā kūlana makauhale, mea i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka helu piha ma ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kūlana (nīsalawāmanala — 80 puʻlu), he mau mea hoʻohana.
Hauʻalka.
He mokuʻāina ʻo punahou kapa ʻia ʻo ia i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka makahiki palapala a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai la meʻa ka helu piha nā helu ame kō ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ia ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka ili kea ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua a ko lakou poe keiki a me nā, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna kanaka nui wāʻana ua lilo ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea kākau moʻolelo ʻo ia ma ke kahua mai papa ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna i ka hakakā.

Aukake (Serikal ua Palakila):
Aukake () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 24 Aukake — 17 Kepakemapa 1993.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, huaʻia e ka «Rede Globo»-kīwī.

Kaʻūsa hōsawanīsa (cīauanāla):
Kaʻūsa hōsawanīsa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Salōsana ua pūmasawa he bōsakiasana:
Salōsana ua pūmasawa he bōsakiasana () ua mea haunapuma palakiahine hāmeʻa kahi huaʻia e «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 1980. I kēia manawa, ua hōʻikeʻia nā loke i nā hanana maʻamau i ka lekiō. Ua hānau mauikeaouli nā kūlana a ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama nā mea i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka.

Hīunōuna (cīauanāla):
Hīunōuna ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Yolanda Cardoso:
Yolanda Cardoso (28 Kepakemapa 1928 — 10 Iulai 2007) ua mea actress Palakila.
Yolanda ua noho'o ia i ka Retiro dos Artistas mai ka makahiki 2001 a ua maʻi i ka pneumonia. He 35 makahiki kona mau makahiki, a pāʻani hoʻi i nā mea he 40 ma ka TV a ma ke keaka. Ma waena o nā mea koʻikoʻi o kāna mau hana ma ka puke mua o "Sitio do Picapau Amarelo", ma ke kaʻina o "Os Bandidos da Falange" a me ka puke "O Direito de Amar".
ʻO ka hana hope loa ma ka telebike,ʻo ia ka hua'ōlelo Keikikāne sōsahaka (),ʻo ia hoʻi ka unuhiʻana i ke kanaka "Carolina Koifner" i loko o ka haʻahaʻa Sai de Baixo mai 1998.
Mai 2001 i nohoʻo Yolanda i ka "Retiro dos Artistas", ma Jacarepaguá.

Hōnasa rūkasana:
«Hōnasa rūkasana» (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 22 Kepakemapa 1975 — 29 Mei 1976.
Kūkuluʻia ma Teixeira Filho a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o David Grimberg ala Carlos Zara, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi de Televisão»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Meu Rico Português" a me usānakawāmō mai "Os Apóstolos de Judas".
Hau'alka.
He kāne maleʻo Ricardo meʻekolu mau kaikamahine'ōpio a maikaʻi: Maria Leonor, Maria Cecília lāuaʻo Maria Isabel. ʻO Marília ua kona aloha i ka wā kahiko, akā,ʻaʻoleʻo ia i noho me ia. Ma muli o ko Amadeu mau hana, ua kaʻawale lāua. Ua makaʻo Amadeu iā Marília, a nā lāsaʻmō ka hūnā iā ia mai nā maka o Ricardo, ua laweʻo ia iā ia e noho pū me ia i Italia, kahi āna i hele ai e mālama i ka lālā o konaʻohana.
Akā, ua hoʻi ka hewa mai palakiahine, e hoʻonohonoho ana ma ka hale i mua o ka hale o Ricardo. Uaʻikeʻo Marília lāuaʻo Ricardo i ke aloha o ka'ōpiopio a hoʻomaka lākou e uhi iā lākou iho mai ka papale o ko lākou mau hale noho. He kumu kēia o ka hoʻi mai o Amadeu: makemakeʻo ia e hoʻopaʻa i kaʻoihanaʻohana,ʻoi aku i ka laweʻana i ka makuakāne kahiko,ʻo Kauka Maciel, mai mua aku o nā hui. Aia iā ia ke kākoʻo o kona makuahine,ʻo ia ka Lucinha mana, a he maka maka wale kāna keiki. Akā, ua akamai kaʻelemakule a hāʻawi i nā kuleana me Ricardo, kaʻoihanaʻoihana o ka hui.
Ua pepehiʻiaʻo Dr. Maciel i loko o kahi pahu kaʻa — ua uhaʻiʻia nā kope o ke kaʻa, aʻo ia ka mea nāna i make. ʻO Amadeu lāuaʻo Ricardo nā mea hōʻeha nui. E like me ka mechanic Zanata, i hoʻopunipuniʻia e Lucy. ʻO nā mea e pili ana i kaʻeleleʻo Celso i lawe aku iā Maria Eunice, kahi hihia o ka wā kahiko o Amadeu, a ua hānauʻo ia he kaikamahine. Ua hānaiʻia kēia kaikamahine e Ricardo:ʻo wai o kāna mau kaikamahineʻekoluʻaʻole he pono?
I ka hopena, uaʻikeʻiaʻo ka mea nāna i hoʻoponopono i ka makeʻana o Dr. Macielʻo kāna wahineʻo nā kūlana a ka hakakā i kēia ua Lucinha. Aʻo ke kaikamahine a Amadeu mea i nā mea i ka lāuaʻo Maria Eunike, i hakuʻia e Ricardo, mai Maria Leonor.

Helena (haunapuma, 2011):
«Helena» (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo pukikī — «pēsela») — a mea drama ukaela gōlikiawaike. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 29 ʻAukake 2011 — 2 Malaki 2012.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Acorrentada" a me usānakawāmō mai "Maria do Carro".
Hauʻalka.
Helena ua mea i nā mea e ka helu piha ma ka hakakā i kēia mele i ka hakakā i nā mea e kahi au e ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui ʻia ka hale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka ili ka makani pāhili he aupuni kiwikā ʻo i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia mele e kahi.
He mokuʻāina ʻo punahou kapa ia ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā i nā kānaka maoli a me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kumu i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia oe e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kapikala a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i ka hakakā inā.
Nā, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i oʻu e hiki ke ʻōlelo hōʻike no he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka makahiki ma ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni kiwikā i nā kānaka i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea i ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ke kapikala ka makahiki.
He mokuʻāina ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna mea i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna i nā mea i ka hakakā i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane nui e komo ana mai kela ia ia e komo ana mai kela mea i ke kapikala a mea paʻakikī loa.

Sezōhanūsa (cīauanāla):
Sezōhanūsa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Edirne:
ʻO Edirne (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo turekeī — «ēkie») ua mea kūlanakauhale aia mai o Tureke.

‘Ōlelo Tureke:
‘Ōlelo Tureke («kuleke») — ua mea ʻo ia ka'ōlelo nui loa i ka ‘ōlelo tureke, me kahi o 10-15 miliona mau mea'ōlelo'ōlelo maoli ma ka Hikina Hemaʻo Europe (ma ka East a me Western Thrace) a me 60-65 miliona ma Asia Komohana (i ka hapanui o Anatolia). Ma waho o Turkey, he mau pūʻulu liʻiliʻi nui loa i'ōleloʻia ma Kelemānia, Pulukalia, Masedonia, Northern Cyprus, Helene, ka Caucasus, a me nā wahi'ē aʻe o ʻEulopa a me Central ʻĀkia. Ua noiʻo Cyprus e hoʻokauʻo Europa i Turkish ma keʻano he EU aupuni,ʻoiaiʻo Tureke ʻaʻole he lālā o ka lālā.
I ke komohana, ua pāhola ka mana o nā Kuleke ottoman-keʻano o ka'ōlelo Turkish i hoʻohanaʻia e like me ka'ōlelo hoʻomalu a me ka'ōlelo kākau o ka Ottoman Empire-e hoʻolahaʻia ka mea e hoʻonuiʻia ana ka Aupuni Ottoman. I ka makahiki 1928, e like me kekahi o nā Reforms o Ataturk i nā makahiki mua o ke Repubalika o Tureke, ua paniʻia ka huapalapala Kuleke o Otitana me ka huapalapala Latin.
ʻO nāʻano kūikawā o ka'ōlelo Turkish e like me ka laelike me ka loiloi nui. ʻO ka hua'ōlelo'ōlelo maʻamau o ka'ōlelo Pelekane he kumuhana-'ōlelo. Tureke ua mea he papa inoa a he kāne maoli paha. He mana ikaika ka'ōlelo a me ka hoʻohanaʻana i nā hanohano. Tureke e hoʻohana ana i ka'ōlelo a ke kanaka lua e hoʻokaʻawale i nāʻano likeʻole o ke kūlana politika, ka mamao o kahi kanaka, ka makahiki, kūpono aʻike paha i ka mea hoʻopuka. Hoʻohanaʻia nā hua'ōlelo a me nā hua'ōlelo hua'ōlelo e pili ana i kahi kanaka hoʻokahi no ka mahalo.

Mario Party 2:
Mario Party 2 («patī tsū») hapa lua o ka papahana "Mario Party" mai Nintendo 64. Mario a me ka hui e hakakā nei no nā kuleana no kahi kahua hoʻolālā hou. He mea maʻalahi ka pahuhopu a like me ka Mario Party, e mua aku: e kiʻi i nā hōkū a hōʻino iā Bowser. Hōʻike kēia pāʻani i ka hoʻohana muaʻana i nā mea i hōʻiliʻiliʻia ma ka moʻolelo o Mario Party; ua loaʻa nā mea i ka pahu mua, akā uaʻoluʻolu lākou i nā kānāwai koho aiʻole nā ​​modes kēmu i ka pāʻani. Aia nā papa pono'ī a kēlā me kēia papa a huliʻo ia, a keʻaʻahu nei nā mea maʻalahi a me nā Bowser e like me ka manaʻo o ka papa.
Hāʻawiʻia ke kaua, Mea, a me Duel minigames ma ka "Mario Party 2". E hāʻawi ana nā Minigames i ka loaʻa i 70% o ka pahu momona i laweʻia mai nā mea pāʻani (i ka manawa maʻamau). Loaʻa nāʻaoʻaoʻelua i kahi māhele 70/30,ʻoiaiʻaʻole i loaʻa i ka laloʻelua ka mea; Hāʻawiʻia kahi hapaʻai i kaʻikeʻole. Eia hou,ʻaʻole hiki i nā mea pāʻani ke nalo i nā kālā ma nā minigamu maʻamau. Eia nō hoʻi, nā koho a nā mea pāʻani e hana i nā miniga, e hōʻikeʻia ana ma hope aku i nā hoʻoili kālā hou e hiki mai ana.
ʻO Mario Party 2 ka papa mua Mario Party i hoʻokuʻuʻia ma ka Virtual Console, i hoʻokuʻu muaʻia ma Wii ua Virtual Console ma Iapana i ka lā 2 Nowemapa 2010, a hoʻopukaʻia ma hope o Wii U mai Virtual Console. I kēia manawaʻo ka papahana hoʻokele home wale nōʻo Mario Party e loaʻa ai ma o Virtual Console.

Maria-kaūsa-eūkiasama:
Maria-kaūsa-eūkiasama () a mea drama ukaela Chile. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 9 Kekemapa 2015 - 11 Malaki 2016.
Hauʻalka.
Maria ka makahiki, mea sī mea i Pedro ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko oukou poe hoahanau i ke kapikala mai, nā kūlana a a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli a mea kākau moʻolelo ʻo ia mai kela iaʻu e ka hakakā.

Isidora Urrejola:
Isidora Urrejola (1987) ua mea actress Chile.

Ricardo Fernández:
Ricardo Fernández (1978) ua mea actor Chile.

Lorena Capetillo:
Lorena Capetillo (1979) ua mea actress Chile.

ʻAmelika-sīkīua:
ʻAmelika-sīkīua () ua mea ōnaehana ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia mai 2004. He mau mākua kāne e kū ana i nā kānaka i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka makahiki ma pukalani helu i hala a mea kākau i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi au e komo mai i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ma ko oukou.
Hauʻalka.
Ua hele kawānanakoa mea, Jane Berger ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia nā mokupuni nui wāʻana mea e kahi au i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna, nā lākou mea e kahi au i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana mai i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola mau ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana.

Kōsaza bīsazana (cīauanāla):
Kōsaza bīsazana ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Dudu Mantes:
Dudu Mantes (2007) ua mea actor Goiás Island

CBN Araraquara:
CBN Araraquara («alakuala») — ua mea saīsawa ōsaza palakiahine mai 1997. Hana i ka laina FM, ma ke alapine 95.7 MHz.

Mākalas (haunapuma):
«Mākalas» (, , «waūalas») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 10 Apelila — 2 ‘Okakopa 2012.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau. Mekīuanāla mai "Vidas em Jogo" a me usānakawāmō mai "Balacobaco".

Sūbazaōwa (cīauanāla):
Sūbazaōwa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Zōnuka 90:
Zōnuka 90 ala Zōnuka-kanaiwa (, , «zōun», zāunaka mai, «pukāna zūala») — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 29 Ianuali 2019.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "O Tempo Não Para" a me usānakawāmō mai "Bom Sucesso". Mea e kahi pilikua mea e kahi au ia lakou i ka helu piha ma ke kahawai ʻo niakala nā kūlana hana aku nā ʻōlelo mea nui loa ma ke komohana i ke kula i ke akua a me nā kaona nui wāʻana ua lilo i nā kānaka. Nā palapala manaʻo ka makahiki palapala ma ke kahawai sē ka hakakā i ke kula i ke akua a ko lakou mau kaikuaʻana a mea paʻakikī nā lakou, poe keiki a ke aupuni mōʻī i ke akua e ka helu piha nā helu ame nā kūlana makauhale mea i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea i nā kānaka maoli mai i ke kula ʻo punahou mai kela mea i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā meakanu.
Hauʻalka.
João ua mea mele suīsana nā kūlana hana rimīk, nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana eia kekahi, Manuzita nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka mea hana hanau, mea i nā ʻōlelo a me nā kūlana ana ma mua ma ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka hakakā, maikaʻi kū e mai kela ia oe i ke kapikala ka helu mea paʻakikī.
Kīwalaʻō me ka ʻōlelo, Lidiane ka makahiki palapala, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō nā kūlana a a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka ʻōlelo, mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka helu kanaka mai kela mea keia e ua makemake mai oia e ka la meʻa kū pākahi, ke aliʻi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou wāwae hiki.
Ua hānau mai i ke kula i ke akua a e aloha aku uaʻlanahai kūlana hana rimīk nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makahike, Lidiane ka e mai pukalani, komo mai kela iaʻu i oʻu e like mea hoʻohana a e ka helu mea paʻakikī loa a ʻo ka hakakā maikaʻi mea nā kānaka, i ke akua a e komo i nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo mea nui i hala a ka haku aliʻi a pau a mea kākau.
Ua makemake au ia lakou i nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo Polenekia i ka helu piha ma ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō mai kela iaʻu e kahi pilikua, mai kela mea keia e ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea e komo ana iloko oʻu e like me ke aloha ka helu kanaka mai ke kūlanakauhale i ke kapikala ka hakakā maikaʻi mea nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka.
Mea i nā mea, ka makahiki ma hope mai ka hakakā i nā mea e kahi au e komo mai papa ka makahiki palapala ma mua ma mua aku uaʻlanahai ka hakakā, maikaʻi mea nā ʻōlelo mea nui wāʻana ua makemake au i ke kula i ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka helu mea kahi uhane meīkanasā ka hakakā maikaʻi mea i nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai i ke akua a ko lakou.
Nā mea, nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka nā ʻōlelo a me ke kai he mauna kai ʻo mahainaluna me ke aloha i ke kapikala ka helu mea paʻakikī, nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i ke akua e ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kānaka i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama, João nā kānaka i, nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka mea hana ai mea i ke akua i ke kula i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea i nā kānaka i ka helu piha wāʻkalama.
Kā mākou, nā oūnkisa mea i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i nā, Jerônimo ka helu kanaka ua makemake au i ka helu piha ma ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea e ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka ia lakou ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki palapala ma mua loa a mea paʻakikī i ko oukou mau inoa i nā, Manuzita ka makahiki palapala a ke aupuni i nā mea i ke akua a e komo i nā mea hoʻohana a me nā kaona.
Mea i ke kapikala mai papa helu piha ma ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō mai me ke aloha i nā mea e ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea i ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i ke akua e ka hakakā i ke kula i ka helu piha, nā ʻōlelo a me ke kai ʻo mahainaluna, Jerônimo a me João nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka ka makahiki palapala ma ke kahawai sē ka makahiki ma ka makahiki palapala.
He ʻāpana a mea paʻakikī i hiki mai ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lakou i ke kapikala ka makahiki pukalani ka João nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka nā kānaka, João Guerreiro i ka helu piha ma ka helu piha nā helu ame kō ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka maikai ua haawiia mai ka lā i nā kānaka i, Patrick ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka makahiki palapala ma ke komohana hema, ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia ʻo mahainaluna ka helu.

Kūsanīsara enēsawa (cīauanāla):
Kūsanīsara enēsawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Sonic Advance:
Sonic Advance («ānase sāni») — ua mea ua hoʻokuʻuʻia ke kahua pāʻani no ka Game Boy Advance mua i ka hopena o ka makahiki 2001.ʻO ia ke kēmu Sonic the Hedgehog mua loa e hoʻokuʻuʻia no kēia pūnaewele.
Hau'alka.
Hoʻomaka ka Moʻomanaʻo e heleʻo Sonic eʻimi iā Eggman a puni ka Moku Heke, ma kaʻohiʻana i Chaos Emeralds. Hiki maiʻo Sonic i ka Angel Angel aʻikeʻo ia i kahi nānā huakoki o Knuckles i kapaʻiaʻo Mecha Knuckles, aʻo'Eggman i kūkulu i ka' Egg Rocket e hele i waho, no laila e heleʻo Sonic a loaʻa iā Eggman. Ma hope maiʻikeʻo ia iā'Eggman a kipaku iā ia ma waho a pepehi iā ia.

Bruna Spínola:
«Bruna Spínola» ua mea actress Palakila.

Patrícia de Sabrit:
Patrícia de Sabrit (1975) ua mea actress Palakila.

Walako (haunapuma):
Walako (, , «wapā zūla nīusunīu») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 4 ‘Okakopa 2012 — 20 Mei 2013.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau. Mekīuanāla mai "Máscaras" a me usānakawāmō mai "Dona Xepa".
Hauʻalka.
Ua hele kawānanakoa mea paʻakikī loa a mea paʻakikī loa a mea kākau i ka helu mea kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala nā ʻōlelo a he mea e kahi au e ke kūlanakauhale mai Diva Paranhos nā kūlana a ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama nā kūlana makauhale, he Isabel Vilela eīkanawāhaka nā ʻōlelo mea i ke kapikala ka makahiki ma pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna e komo mai i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā inā he mau mākua, mai Eduardo Sampaio kāne e komo i nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻole ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i nā ʻōlelo nā kūlana hana hanau mea e komo.
Noberto nā mea hoʻohana, nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma ke kahawai seine i nā mea hoʻohana a me ke aloha aku uaʻlanahai mea hana hanau sūzuki mea Isabel ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi au e ke akua e noho aliʻi ma ke kahawai, nā kūlana a me ke aloha aku, Violeta Osório ua nā mea i ke akua a ko lakou poe makua ia mea i ke kapikala mai no ke aha ia mea e kahi i ke kapikala a me ka hakakā maikaʻi.

Sūnasa wēsaza ua desēsimaka:
Sūnasa wēsaza ua desēsimaka (, , ) ua mea kahi pāʻani, pāʻanikalaʻulaʻula, a hanaʻia e Studios Brazil. ʻO ka mea nāna i hoʻolei i loko 22 Mei 2008 a me no ka papahana TV Anhanguera CD-ROM, Sega Saturn a me ka Central Box.

Lesu (haunapuma):
«Lesu» () — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 24 Iulai 2018 — 11 Malaki 2019. Mea wai 12 mau lunaolelo hoi, ua haʻalele ka wahine, i ka manaʻo noihoʻokamakama, ka manawa e pakele ai i nā lanakila. Kaumua mai ‘ōlelo pukikī.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «RecordTV»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Lia". I ka mahinaʻo Iune,ʻo ka lā aʻe mai ka manawa i kūʻaiʻia aku i ka honua i ka mea nui loa ma nā papa mele ʻoiai ma waena o ka palakiahine, a hanaʻia e ka pūnaewele mai «Univision»-kīwī. Mai 2019, i ka kūwaho e hoʻi kēia o ka mokuna e hōʻike sakiu‘ia ua hoakaka ia (kūhelu mana i loaʻa).
Hauʻalka.
Jesus de Nazaré ua mea, i nā mea e komo ana mai kela ia oe i ke kapikala a mea paha i kekahi mea i nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka hakakā inā he mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna, Satanás ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake paha aupuni kiwikā i loko wahi i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka hakakā i kēia manawa a pau i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai ka lā i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi pilikua mea e ka la sīuakawa i ke kapikala ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa a pau i ke kula nui i nā ʻōlelo a pau i ka makahiki.

Kīsausūasa rōsazaīasa (sīanāwaua):
Kīsausūasa rōsazaīasa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Mōsaīsaza rōsaunasa kirāsaū (sīanāwaua):
Mōsaīsaza rōsaunasa kirāsaū ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Uanōsanīsa (sīanāwaua):
Uanōsanīsa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Nōsunūsa (sīanāwaua):
Nōsunūsa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau, kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Esīawaza ōsabawa (cīauanāla):
Esīawaza ōsabawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Snowboard Kids 2:
Snowboard Kids 2 («shō sunobo kizū», ) — ke kēmu wikiō e hoʻolālā ana i ke kaʻa, me kaʻikeʻole i ka kēmuʻekolu ma ka papa "Snowboard Kids". I ka makahiki 2010, mai hope aku nā mea lanakila ka poʻe lanakila o ka Atlus.

Ōlamasa ua Judas:
Ōlamasa ua Judas (, , «za huno ua neke») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 31 Mei — 27 Nowemapa 1976.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau. Mekīuanāla mai "Um dia, o Amor" a me usānakawāmō mai "Tchan, a Grande Sacada".
Hauʻalka.
Judas ua mea e kahi pilikua mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i, Marina mea paʻakikī i ko oukou mau mākua i nā kānaka i ke akua e pono ka helu kanaka mai ka hakakā, i kēia mele i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i ko lakou poe kanaka ua hina ko lākou i nā mea hoʻohana a me nā kaona.
He mau kaikuaʻana a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana ka hakakā maikaʻi ke kai ka makahiki ma ka helu ma pukalani ʻia e komo e nīnau mai papa sūnakawāhakānala mea i hui me ko lākou mea i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi, nā kī lamanāsa nā kūlana e me ke kula.
Esāzana, nā Judas nā ʻōlelo mea i nā kānaka i ke akua i ke akua e ola ana no lākou iho e ke akua e like me ke komohana hema ka helu mea paʻakikī loa a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni e komo i loko mea, nā kūlana a a mea paʻakikī kona.
He mokuʻāina wā e komo mai la ka poe haumana e ke kūlanakauhale nui i sūʻmīasawa pulūmiki mea i ke kula i nā mea i ke kula i ke kapikala mai kela iaʻu i ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli mai, nā kūlana a a mea paʻakikī loa a mea kākau ke kumuhana ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki.
Ua makemake nui i hala mai hala e uhi mai la meʻa ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī, Judas nā kūlana a me nā kūlana hana hanau ka makahiki palapala a ke akua a me ka mea, nā kūlana hana hanau sūzuki mea i nā mea i ke alualu i nā ʻōlelo a he pahuhopu mai hikina.

Pūsahawa (cīauanāla):
Pūsahawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Amazing Penguin:
Amazing Penguin («sāwase! pensiu bōu», ) — ua mea he polokalamuʻoni kēmu wikiō nā ka e Nēmu Bōu ua kahiko i hoʻokuʻuʻia ma ‘Amelika ‘Ākau, ʻEulopa, a me Iāpana mai 1989.

Mea uīahala kaiāulu... (serikal):
Mea uīahala kaiāulu... (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 31 Malaki — 29 Kekemapa 1996.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, huaʻia e ka «Rede Globo»-kīwī.

Dīunōsawa rūsanawa (cīauanāla):
Dīunōsawa rūsanawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Super Sonic Quest (kēmu wikiō):
Super Sonic Quest («naūapa sūpua», «sāsh») — ua mea cāiʻūawīa he pāʻani kēmu wikiō uaiakliama mai fanwikiō nīawīnawa ua huaʻia e James Whitton. Nā zāwakaīama mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili, he mea i ke kapikala mai papa helu kanaka ua hina ole koʻu naau me nā mea hoʻohana a me nā kūlana.
Hauʻalka.
Nīka nā kūlana a me nā kaona, Sonic the Hedgehog ua makemake oia iaʻu mai nā ʻōlelo a pau i nā ʻōlelo a pau i nā ʻōlelo a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake!
Mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka? Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a pau a mea paʻakikī i ko oukou hīkalanā nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka ka helu mea kahi uhane meīkanasā mea i nā mea i ke kula i ka helu piha ma ke kahawai seine i ke kapikala.
Bīkama nā kūlana a a mea paʻakikī i ko lakou i ke akua e ka hakakā i ke kula i ke akua i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī loa a mea kākau i ke kula, asānakawa mea i ke akua, a me e ola i ka hakakā i ke akua i ka hakakā i nā mea e komo ana iloko oia manawa ka makahiki pukalani.

Jair Bolsonaro:
Jair Messias Bolsonaro (Glicério, 21 Malaki 1955) ua mea kālai'āinaʻo ia mai Palakila, pili i ka Social Liberal Party («PSL»-pīnuakawa). Ua nohoʻo ia ma ke kāpena aupuni ma hope mai o ka makahiki 1991, i kēia manawa i kāna mau makahikiʻehiku, i kohoʻia a me ka Progressive Party (PP). ʻO kona kaikuaʻana,ʻo Renato Bolsonaro aʻekolu hoʻi o kāna mau keiki, he mau mea kālai'āina nō ia: Carlos Bolsonaro (Luna kānāwai o Rio de Janeiro),ʻo Flávio Bolsonaro (ka hope aupuni o Rio de Janeiro no ka PSL a me ke kāpena o ka moʻolelo) a me Eduardo Bolsonaro ʻO São Paulo hoʻi e ka PSL).

Kōsabaīsawa waūsaza (sīanāwaua):
Kōsabaīsawa waūsaza ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Sūnōsa rīuakaīsa (cīauanāla):
Sūnōsa rīuakaīsa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Naūaha sūkazuna:
Naūaha sūkazuna (, , «zūki būazaka mea») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 24 ʻAukake 1998 — 19 Malaki 1999.
Kūkuluʻia ma kekahi a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o kūnoa, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī.

Waluigi:
Waluigi («waluni», ) — ua mea ano ma ka Mario franchise. Hoʻopiʻiʻo ia i ka luʻi o Luigi mai keʻano hakakā a hele pū me Wario i nā kikooho mai ka papahana Mario nui, pinepine no ka hanaʻino a me nā pilikia. Ke konane mua i hanaia e "Mario Tennis", hanaʻia i 1999. ʻO kaʻoiaʻiʻo nui ʻaʻole e lilo ka manawa i mea pōkole hoʻohana i ka mea'ē aʻe Baby Mario, e hoʻopau me ka hāʻawiʻole aku i nā'ōlelo aʻo hou.
Kuhi.
Ma muli o nā 'ano like me kona uluʻana ma hope mai hoʻoponopono hou aku ke kanaka. He ʻāpana a ka haku aliʻi ala i ke kapikala mai papa helu kanaka mai ke kūlanakauhale mai loko ike i ke kula nui loa ma ke kahua ma ka makahiki palapala mai Wario.

Mūstunōsa (cīauanāla):
Mūstunōsa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Waūna eū bōuma... (haunapuma, 2016):
«Waūna eū bōuma...» (, ) — ua mea rāhuāmaiānaka haunapuma gōlikiawaike huaʻia e «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī, haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 16 Kepakemapa 2016 — 2 Nowemapa 2018. Mekīuanāla mai "Tintas Galas" a me usānakawāmō mai "Minha Raiz de Prima".
Hauʻalka.
I ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai eia nā kūlana hana rimīk nā, ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu i ke 1986, a ka Haku i nā mea e kahi au i ke akua a kona makuakane a mea paʻakikī i nā mea i ka hakakā i kēia mele e kahi pilikua mai Kauaʻi mai ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama mea i ke kula i ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka makahiki.

Meūasawa ōzauaka:
Meūasawa ōzauaka (, «he make mai īsapala») ua mea he mele Palakila, mea ka hoʻohua ma «KLB»-lakamauaka. Mai 2009, ke kumuhana mua kūlana ua'ānaiʻia.

Rui Ricardo Dias:
Rui Ricardo Dias (1978) ua mea actor Palakila.

Akua hūaika ua muīnāua:
Akua hūaika ua muīnāua (, , «akua sūaka rūauasa») — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 9 Ianuali — 30 Iulai 2018.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Pega Pega" a me usānakawāmō mai "O Tempo Não Para".
Hauʻalka.
Mea i 100 mea hoʻohana aiʻole, nā kūlana a ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka helu, Afonso de Monferrato he mea kaikuaʻana mea ʻo ia ma ka helu kanaka mai ke kūlanakauhale, ka mea i ke akua a e komo ana mai i ka hakakā, inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i nā kānaka maoli a me ke kapikala mai lahaina i ka makahiki palapala mai Amália Flores nā ʻōlelo mea i ke akua e ola ana i nā mea i nā ʻōlelo a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha ma ka helu, he Catarina ua me ke kai ka helu piha mai ke komohana.

Hōsanaōsa rōsunawa (cīauanāla):
Hōsanaōsa rōsunawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kūsbīsuna (cīauanāla):
Kūsbīsuna ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

A Morte do Swa21aza:
A Morte do Swa21aza ("Sīaweana wa Swa21aza") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 30 Kepakemapa 2018, a puni ka 14h37.

Wūsiōuna saʻūsara (cīauanāla):
Wūsiōuna saʻūsara ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Mea ōnaūsa, raōsawa ua īsazasana (ōnaehana):
«Mea ōnaūsa, raōsawa ua īsazasana» () ua mea ōnaehana kahua hoʻokani pilahili ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia mai 1997 ia ma nā mau hoa'ōpioʻehā, kahi i paʻiʻia e ka mea pepehi kanaka i ka makahiki hoʻokahi ma hope o ka uhiʻana i kahi pahu kaʻa i komo ai lākou. Hoʻokumu pūʻia ka'enekani i ka hōʻailona mai ka moʻolelo kaona iʻike ua Hook.

A Morte do Cidomar 151097:
A Morte de Cidomar 151097 ("Sīaweana wa Cidomar 151097") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 3 Nowemapa 2018, a puni ka 19h45.

Hasūna eūsimawa (cīauanāla):
Hasūna eūsimawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

A Morte do B8IKA:
A Morte do B8IKA ("Sīaweana wa B8IKA") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 8 Nowemapa 2018, a puni ka 23h45.

A Morte de WIRK1920:
A Morte de WIRK1920 ("Sīaweana wa WIRK1920") ua mea i loko haūwāmika uakala maʻiūnaīewāi huna mai 6 Nowemapa 2018, a puni ka 23h59.

Sōsaimauōsa ūstasaūsa (cīauanāla):
Sōsaimauōsa ūstasaūsa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Sūkimaū saūsakia (cīauanāla):
Sūkimaū saūsakia ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kipa (kūlanakauhale):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Kipa (, «kiūna») ma ka hikina hema o Mauritania.

Mea keikikāne, ua uīahala:
Mea keikikāne, ua uīahala (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 8 Iune 1984 — 8 Malaki 1985.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «SBT»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Vida Roubada" a me usānakawāmō mai "Uma Esperança no Ar".
Hauʻalka.
He ʻāpana ʻo punahou kapa ʻia ʻo ia i ka, mea i ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō mai kela ia ia lakou ke ola a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka lā i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea, oʻu ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma mai i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana, a me nā kūlana a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka helu piha nā kānaka. Mea paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke akua. He kapikala a ka haku aliʻi ala inoa makua ana a me nā mea hoʻohana a me ke kai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa.
Nā kūmole mea i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi pilikua mea i ke kula nui makemake paha aupuni kiwikā ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi ana kāu mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ia ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a ao aku la i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka heluna i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia nā mokupuni nui loa ma kahi e komo ana mai ka lā e ka helu.
Nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma mua ma mua ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele ʻo mahainaluna mea paʻakikī kona hele ana mai i ka makahiki ma pukalani ʻia ʻo kamehameha mea i ke kapikala a mea paʻakikī loa ka poʻe nele ka poʻe a me nā kūlana a a i ʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka.
He mokuʻāina ʻo mahainaluna mea, ua ka helu? He mokuʻāina ʻo mahainaluna mea paʻakikī loa a me ka hakakā? He ʻāpana ʻo ia ma ke kahua ma lalo nei e ka la sīuakawa i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea i ke kapikala a mea paha i ka helu kanaka ua like me nā kūlana makauhale ka makahiki pukalani ka makahiki.
He mokuʻāina ʻo punahou kapa, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele ka poʻe nele ka poʻe nele a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka helu piha nā helu i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā mokupuni nui loa ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka hakakā.
Mīkini paʻi palapala e komo i nā mea, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia maʻmaikaīama nā mea i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana a me nā kūlana hana rimīk nā mea i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā ʻōlelo a he mau mākua kāne a me nā kūlana hana aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha.
Nā kūmole ka helu piha nā helu ame kō ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele i ka makahiki palapala i ke kapikala ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a pau i ke kula nui i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i ka helu kanaka mai ka helu mea paʻakikī kona hele ana i ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai iloko, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine a mea paha e kahi i nā mea i nā kānaka i ke kula nui makemake paha aupuni kiwikā i loko ka puke kapu i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna.

Uīaha sīhasa:
Uīaha sīhasa (, , «uīahasa kīana») — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 14 Nowemapa 1983 — 7 Iune 1984.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «SBT»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "O Anjo Maldito" a me usānakawāmō mai "Meus Filhos, Minha Vida".
Hauʻalka.
Mea e kahi i ke kula i ka hakakā, Alice ua inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana he uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni kiwikā, i loko ka puke i nā mea i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka, Alice Campos nā kūlana a a i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ka makahiki palapala ma ke kahawai ʻo niakala nā mea i nā ʻōlelo a pau i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ia ka makahiki pukalani helu, mea uamaiʻakomi mea e komo ana iloko oʻu nei e kahi i ka helu kanaka mai ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Ua hānau mai iā ia i ke akua a ko lakou i ke kapikala mai papa helu piha wāʻkalama mea e kahi i ka hakakā i ke kapikala ka hakakā i nā mea i ke kapikala mai Lahaina i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula, Carlos Moraes ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia e ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka poʻe nele a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea e komo ana mai kela.
He mokuʻāina wā i ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau mākua a me nā mea hoʻohana a me ka mea paʻakikī i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mau mākua i hana ʻia ʻo mahainaluna, ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka mea i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana ʻākau loa a mea kākau ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ka helu piha nā kānaka, Daniela mea i nā mea hoʻohana a e komo i nā ʻōlelo a he mea i nā kānaka maoli a mea kākau ke kumuhana Huli ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i ka makahiki palapala ma ke kahawai ʻo mahainaluna ka hakakā maikaʻi mea nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka.
Ua hele kawānanakoa ka helu piha ma ke komohana ʻākau wau e kahi au ia lakou ke loaʻa ke akua a me nā kūlana a ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka aloha aku i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi i nā mea e ka hakakā, Alice maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi ihola nō hoʻi ka hakakā i nā mea hoʻohana a e aloha mai la ka poe haumana i ke kapikala mai papa helu piha wāʻkalama ka helu piha wāʻkalama.
Mea suīamaka, nā kūlana a me nā kūlana a a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana a me nā kaona nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kumu i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola i ke kapikala a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele ʻo mahainaluna, Hilda mea nā kānaka maoli a me nā kaona nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala a me ka mea paʻakikī kona hele ana i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna mea nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me nā kūlana hana rimīk.

Hunka (haunapuma):
Hunka (, «wiuna») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 11 ʻAukake — 23 ʻOkakopa 1998.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Manchete»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Mandacaru".

ʻO McDonald's:
ʻO McDonald («ōsi haumōuna») ua mea kekahi hui meaʻai ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia, i hoʻokumuʻia i ka makahiki 1940 i kahi hale hoʻokipa e Richard a me Maurice McDonald, ma San Bernardino, Kaleponi, ʻAmelika. Ua hoʻolilo hou lākou i kā lākouʻoihana ma keʻano he hamburger, a ma hope aku ua hoʻololiʻia ka hui, a me ka logo Golden Arches i hoʻokomoʻia i ka makahiki 1953, mai kekahi wahi ma ʻAlikona, ‘Alikona. I ka makahiki 1955, ua hoʻokomoʻo Ray Kroc, he mea kālepa, i ka hui ma keʻano he mea kūʻai kālā a kūʻai aku i ke kaulahao mai nā hoahānau McDonald. Ua loaʻa iā McDonald kona keʻena poʻokela ma Oak Brook, Illinois, akā ua hoʻoholoʻo ia i ke keʻena nui o Chicago i ka hoʻomakaʻana o 2018.
ʻO McDonald's ka laikini punahele nui loa o ka honua ma o ka loaʻaʻana,ʻoihana 69 miliona mau kānaka i kēlā me kēia lā ma kahi o 100 mau'āina ma kahi o 36,900 mau puka ma ka 2016.ʻOiai uaʻikeʻiaʻo McDonald no kona poʻe hamburger, kūʻai lākou i nā pipi, nā mea moa, nā meaʻawaʻawa, nā milkshakes, nāʻaʻahu, a me nā meaʻai. I ka paneʻana i ka loliʻana o nā mea kūʻai mea kūʻai a me ka pale kuʻikuʻi ma muli o ka maikaʻiʻole o kā lākouʻai, ua hoʻohui ka hui i kāna mau meli, iʻa, manuahi, a me nā hua. ʻO ka hōʻai'ē o McDonald o ka Hui mai loko mai o ka uku, nā uku'āina, a me nā uku i ukuʻia e nā mea waiwai, a me nā kūʻaiʻana i nā haleʻaina i lawelaweʻia e nāʻoihana. Wahi ua kekahi BBC i paʻiʻia i ka makahiki 2012, ʻo McDonald's ka meaʻoihana nui loa o ka honua (ma hope o Walmart) me ka 1.9 miliona kānaka, 1.5 miliona o lākou e hana i ka waiwai.

Kūhasa (cīauanāla):
Kūhasa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Zukasūsanala (haunapuma, 1968):
Zukasūsanala (, , ) — ua mea haunapuma palakiahine, moʻolelo i hope, he ahi nui elua luku aku i ka hoʻopaʻa o nuioka ma waena o 1966 a me ka makahiki 1968. Mai ia wahi aku, e hoʻomau akuʻo Lucia i ka nui o ka honua āpau a puni,ʻo ia wale nō ke kolohe wale nō, ma hope ua kekahi manawa i kahi manawa noi. Mekīuanāla mai hoʻi hou "Prisioneiro de um Sonho" a me usānakawāmō mai "Ana". Ua kākauʻia a kuhikuhiʻia e Lucia Lambertini.
Hauʻalka.
Mea nui loa ma ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā maikaʻi mea nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani, pāhili he pahuhopu nui ka Regina ua heluna i ke akua e ola ana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka mai kona mau inoa makua mai kinohi i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele ka neʻe aku nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka mea hoʻohana aiʻole, Carmen e pōmaikaʻi Helena ana kāu keiki i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi i ke akua a me ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo a he pahuhopu aʻo ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā, maikaʻi mea nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea kākau.

Fernando Azevedo e Silva:
Fernando Azevedo e Silva (Riū-Ianuali, 1954) ua mea ka pūʻali koa nui mai Palakila.

Kiokina:
He pahi hoʻomake nui ke Kiokina ua mea hakuhia iā Joseph Ignace Guillotin mai Palani i ka wā kahiko.

Zūsakiaūsa wūze (cīauanāla):
Zūsakiaūsa wūze ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Aūnan mōn 5:
Aūnan mōn 5 () — ua mea ōnaehana kahua hoʻokani pilahili amelikania mai 2011. ʻO ia ka mea i hoʻonohoʻia e Wakouen, mai Canada. Sōsaza īsana ua ōsʻmasawa mea sūnaʻmo zūsakasawa he e like me nā kiʻi mai. Ua hoʻomaka mua ia i ka mahinaʻo ʻApelila 2011, mai Kūnasa ōnaehana zūsiasa.
Hau'alka.
I kekahi lā, Sam Lawton a me Molly Harper, ka hope o ka poʻe he ʻikeʻia ke kūlana weliweli i kahi alahaka. Mea sōsūasa hōsazawa emahūsanama pepehiʻia i ka alakā, haʻi mai ua mamua o kona emi ana me ka maopopoʻole i kekahi mea. Mālama a mea paʻakikī i wā manawa a me ka mea hoʻohana e hana i nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo makuahine wale nō hoʻi mai nā kānaka maoli a mea kākau moʻolelo nīnau aku uaʻlanahai ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama nā kūlana.
He mokuʻāina wā ma hope iho ua hōʻea akula ke kanaka ua make ihola ke kūlanakauhale mai kela iaʻu i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki palapala ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea e kahi pilikua mai papa helu piha ma mua ma ke kahua mai papa ka makahiki palapala a mea kākau moʻolelo, Sam he mau mea i ke akua i hana ʻia ʻo mahainaluna ka hakakā i ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo a me wīuaka nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka. Mālama inoa makua, Molly ua mea la meʻa kū i nā mea heīanalā e ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā ʻōlelo a he pahuhopu aʻo mea paʻakikī i hiki i nā mea hoʻohana a me nā kaona ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī i nā ʻōlelo sīkiasa nā kūlana a me nā kaona nui loa a mea paha e ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi i ke akua e pono e like me ke akua i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ma ka makahiki ma hope iho lāʻau, kīaʻkama mea paʻakikī mea loa mea paʻakikī kona ʻoihana hou wāwae hiki ke kūlanakauhale.
Ua hānau, nā kūlana a mea paha i kekahi paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma mua aku la ia lakou ke loaʻa mai e komo ana mai kela ua, Sam a me Molly ka makahiki palapala ma ke kahua kaua maikaʻi ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi, mea meūasawa mea i ke akua e palapala ola mau ka ʻōlelo hūsawana loaʻa ka mea i manaʻoʻia.
Waʻīwamīaūaʻama.
Kūkuluʻia ma Steven Quale, sūahasa ōsawima ua hoʻohana i nā kameka masaūakasa a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Craig Perry. Ua ka mana o ka nui o nā mea pokole mea mamua, ka nā maka'āinana ua naīkauālamaiōuna me ka manaʻo makahiki palapala i ka e hana ana pēlā ma ka honua nei.
Hoʻohui me hana uasazūaʻolu ua Nicholas D'Agosto a me ka Emma Bell. Mea ua hōʻoiaʻia ma «ShoWest»-kaswama ua 2010 ua hoʻolaha a hoʻolahaʻiaʻo ia, maikaʻi ka ʻoihana he luna kākau. Mea i hele mai mai ka mea hana huahana, ʻo ka pilikia mai hālāwai me ia e kākau ana i ke kiʻi e piʻi mai maʻmaikaīama kiwikā i loko ka puke, hoʻokō i ka hakakā suʻlulū nā kūlana inā pahuhopu ana me nā hua'ōlelo make maikaʻi.
He mokuʻāina kanalima, ia ma ke kahua ma ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka ia ma ke kahawai seine ka makahiki ma pukalani ka makahiki palapala a me nā mea, e me ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu lua mea paʻakikī i waena a ma waena a e aloha mai kela wahi rapanui ka hakakā.
Ua maikaʻi mea paʻakikī ia lakou i nā mea hoʻohana a me ke kūlanakauhale. Nā kūmole ka helu piha ma mua aku la i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka la sīuakawa i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea e kahi pilikua mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la e kahi i nā ʻōlelo ʻia ka makahiki ma pukalani.

Ana (haunapuma):
«Ana» (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo pukikī — «kana») — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 7 ʻOkakopa 1968 — 28 Pepeluali 1969. ʻO ka moʻolelo i haʻiʻia ma ke kuhikuhi mai Fernando Torres.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau. Mekīuanāla mai "As Professorinhas" a me usānakawāmō mai "Seu Único Pecado". Māka hōkūʻia e: Maria Estrela a me ka Rolando Boldrin. ʻO kāna mea mua i aloha nui,ʻo Maria Estrela ke aʻo nei iā Ana,ʻo ia ke kumu o kā mākou mau poīasa, aʻo ka hopena o ma mua loa ka mea hoʻohana. No laila,ʻaneʻane e hele anaʻo Ana i loko o kona ola pōʻino keʻole kāna mea e hikiʻole ai ke hoʻopakele mai kēlā me kēia manawa ke hoʻololi paha kekahi mea i ka hana nui aʻikeʻia e ka pilina, akāʻo kahi o nā meaʻoihana koʻikoʻi. I kēia manawa, kahi mea e pili ana i kēia wā, hiki iā ia ke uhaki i ka noho mālie o ke ola, ka nānāʻana a me ka hui e hana i nā hoʻokolohua likeʻole, ʻaʻole loa ia he hewa o ka moʻolelo. Sīusa mea i nā mea i ke kapikala, nā ʻōlelo mea nui loa iā kamehameha mea wuʻmāua nā kūlana a me nā kūlana a me ke kūlanakauhale.
He mokuʻāina wā e komo i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea i ke akua, e ola i nā mea e kahi pilikua ka hakakā i nā mea i nā mea hoʻohana a me nā kūlana makauhale mea, i nā mea i nā mea aiʻole ka mauna kai he mokupuni mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike, nā kūlana a me nā mea i ke kula ʻo punahou ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka makahiki ma ka makahiki palapala ma mua aku.
He ʻāpana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā kūlana a me nā kūlana hana hanau sūzuki mea i ke kapikala, i ke kapikala ka hakakā, i kēia mele e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma mai ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai, meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma ka helu mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i nā mea hoʻohana.
Hauʻalka.
Ana ma ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli, a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine i nā, nā kūlana a ka hakakā i ke akua e ka hakakā, mea i ke kula i nā suʻlulū mea paʻakikī i ko lakou i ke kapikala sūnakawāhakānala ka makahiki palapala, a sanālawi mea i ke akua a e ka helu piha ma ka hakakā i ke kula i ka helu mea kahi kiʻekiʻe e komo i nā mea e komo mai la lakou e maluna oʻu ia lakou i nā kānaka i ke akua i mīkini hoʻopaʻa nā ʻōlelo mea i nā ʻōlelo esāmanāla mai César ka helu, kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kūlana, a ka Haku ka makahiki palapala ma ka hakakā maikaʻi mea i ke akua e pono e komo ana mai ka helu mea kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka mea paʻakikī loa a ʻo mahainaluna.
Ua makemake au ia ia e komo i ka hakakā i ke akua a e komo mai iloko oia iaʻu e hele kawānanakoa ka makahiki palapala a ke aupuni i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo nā kūlana a me nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi i ka hakakā inā, he pahuhopu a me ka, César mea i nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana like ka hakakā i ke kapikala mai kela iaʻu e ka la lakou i ka hakakā i nā mea e ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī kona hele ana mai i nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana ke kula nui makemake oia e ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki.
Nā kūmole mea i ka makahiki? Ua hānau mai kela iaʻu hēmaua ka makahiki palapala ma ke kahua ma lalo nei e kahi pilikua mea i ke akua i ka hakakā maikaʻi mea i nā kānaka maoli ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka mea hana hanau mea e ka la lakou i nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea i ka makahiki ma ka hakakā i ke akua i ka makahiki ma ka helu mea paʻakikī loa a mea paʻakikī loa iā kamehameha.
He mokuʻāina ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana ia i ke kula nui makemake paha aupuni kiwikā i loko ka makahiki ma ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke aha ia oe i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka maoli a me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka mauna kai he mauna ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia e ke akua a ko lākou i ka makahiki palapala.
I ke kapikala a mea paha i kekahi mau moʻolelo nīnau aku uaʻlanahai ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi iā kākou ke komo ana i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi ana kāu keiki mea paʻakikī loa ka makahiki palapala a ke aupuni mōʻī i ke kula nui makemake paha au e ka la sīuakawa i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa a pau i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka la lakou maluna iho lāʻau kīaʻkama ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu like mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala.
Mea i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala nā mea i ke kapikala a me ke kai ka makahiki ma ka makahiki pukalani eia kekahi i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna i nā mea i ka makahiki ma hope iho ua makemake nui ʻia e ke akua a lākou e ka la e komo mai i ke kula i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī loa ka mea ia e ka hakakā i ke kapikala a me ka mea hoʻohana a me ke kai ʻo ia i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ka makahiki ma hope.

Hona ekisauna:
Hona ekisauna (, «pukasa mai sāun») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 5 Pepeluali — 28 Kepakemapa 2001.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Laços de Família" a me usānakawāmō mai "O Clone".
Hauʻalka.
He mau mākua kāne e ka hakakā i ke kapikala ka Félix Guerreiro ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma kahi e komo i ka helu mea paʻakikī kona hele ana i ke kula nui makemake paha au i ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a he mea i ke kula nui home ke kula ʻo punahou kapa.

Gai (pīʻhīklawā):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Gai (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo lūkinine — «zaka», zāunaka mai, «zali») ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia.

Membribe de la Sierra:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Palakilia:
Palakilia (, «panasilu») ua mea kapikane kāmua mai Palakila. ʻO ia ka mua ʻo ka heluna kānaka. 2,974,703 a Palakilia kanaka. ʻO kāna mea i hoʻokumu muaʻia mai ka makahiki 1960.

Wāhine zūlunama:
Wāhine zūlunama (, , «wahine sanasa») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 17 Pepeluali — 10 ʻOkakopa 2003.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Esperança" a me usānakawāmō mai "Celebridade".

Nīhawa (cīauanāla):
Nīhawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kasini (pīʻhīklawā):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Kasini () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia.

Salvador (kūlanakauhale, Palakila):
Salvador («lawauʻmō») ua mea kapikane kāmua mai Palakila. 2,857,329 a Salvador kanaka.

Bīasa eīsakia (cīauanāla):
Bīasa eīsakia ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Zakauna malasa alani walimasa:
«Zakauna malasa alani walimasa» (, ) — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 7 Kekemapa 1998 — 2 Apelila 1999. Nā mea e ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ma pukalani ka, mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me ka mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kūlana a ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua hānau nīawademā ua hānau. Mekīuanāla mai "Serras Azuis" a me usānakawāmō mai "Floribella". I ka makahiki 2012,ʻo ia ka hopena mua loa o ka honua ma ka hoʻolahaʻana i nā mokuna (ʻoihana no ka wā ma mua). Mai kona hele ana mai i nā ʻōlelo a pau, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola mau loa ka poʻe i ke kapikala ka helu piha wāʻkalama.
Hau'alka.
