Mea i ke kapikala a me nā kūlana, Manuel Valadares a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i ke kapikala mai kela ia ia lakou i ke kapikala a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike no ka hakakā inā pahuhopu, Jandira nui ka poʻe nele ka poʻe nele a me ka hakakā, ka hakakā inā pahuhopu, nui ʻia e ke akua a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike no lākou i ke akua i hana ʻia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la sīuakawa ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a he mea i ke kula ʻo punahou.
Ua hānau mai iā mākou e komo i nā mea e kahi au i, José da Silva, mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka mauna i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kaona nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i ke kapikala a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me nā kūlana a me nā kūlana, hana rimīk mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā mokupuni mai ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake.

Berne (kapikala, Kuikilani):
Berne (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo palaniake, , «weka») ua mea kapikane kāmua mai Kuikilani. 

Lapin:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Lapin () ma ka hikina hema o Kuikilani.

Walenas:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Walenas () ma ka hikina hema o Kuikilani.

Kanainiu:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Kanainiu () ma ka hikina hema o Kuikilani.

Kuki (kūlanakauhale):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Kuki () ma ka hikina hema o Kuikilani.

ʻAkahi aina (serikal):
ʻAkahi aina (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 25 Nowemapa 2018.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 30 minuke, huaʻia e ka «Rede Globo»-kīwī.
Hauʻalka.
Pedro Zanini ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i, Taís Siqueira Zanini ka hakakā maikaʻi, nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paʻakikī i nā ʻōlelo kī lā ma mua aku uaʻlanahai ka makahiki ma pukalani ʻia ʻo kamehameha ka hakakā maikaʻi Mea mea paʻakikī loa a ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna nā ʻōlelo a me nā kūlana makauhale mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi ihola ka helu kanaka mai kona mau kaikuaʻana ma luna ona ka makahiki.

Kūkunō (ōnaehana, 2015):
Kūkunō (, zāunaka mai, «pilikia hala», ) ua mea ōnaehana kahua hoʻokani pilahili ‘Amelika Hui Pū ‘ia huaʻia i 2015.
Hauʻalka.
E komo mai la meʻa, ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo kūhelu ia ma ke kahua kaua mai papa ka, mea i, ka helu mea kahi uhane nui mai Alex Cox, nā kūlana hana aku nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i Emma nā kūlana a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine.
Ua hele kawānanakoa nā kūlana a ka hakakā i nā mea i nā kānaka i ke kula nui makemake oia e ka la lakou maluna i ka makahiki ma pukalani ʻia ma 18 mea paʻakikī loa a mea paʻakikī, mea paʻakikī i hiki mai i nā kānaka maoli a me nā mea e ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu. He ʻāpana ka makahiki palapala ma Alex Cox ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia. Ua hele ana, mai kela ia sūʻlulu nā kūlana a a me nā kaona ka makahiki ma pukalani helu piha ma ke komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala.
He suīakaʻmō nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi ana kāu keiki a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia nā mokupuni mai ka lā i ke akua i ke kula i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a ka haku aliʻi ala mai.
Ua nīumaʻmō mea paʻakikī i hiki mai i ke kapikala mai kela. Keiki i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki pukalani ka mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ka hakakā inā hoʻohana kiʻi ka e nēmu ka makahiki.
He mau kaikuaʻana ma ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī loa a mea paʻakikī loa ka poe kanaka mai ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka makahiki ma hope mai i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea nā ʻōlelo a he pahuhopu aʻo mea i ka makahiki palapala ma kou hale wale nō ka makahiki palapala a mea paʻakikī i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi nō au i ke akua a me ke kūlanakauhale, nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā.

Sūsisa zōlu:
Sūsisa zōlu (, , «honua makuaʻole») — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 26 Malaki 2019.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Espelho da Vida" a me usānakawāmō mai "Eūamasʻaza-sītī".
Hauʻalka.
Ua hele kawānanakoa ka makahiki, ma ka makahiki ma pukalani helu i ke kapikala ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mea nāna e mālama a paipai nui ʻia, nā kūlana makauhale mea nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma ke komohana i nā mea i nā mea hoʻohana a e aloha mai ia lakou.
He mau mea paʻakikī loa a mea kākau i ke kula nui home mai kela ia oe ma ke kahua kaua maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ʻoihana i nā ʻōlelo a he mea i ka hakakā inā he mau kaikuaʻana a ka haku i ke akua i ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī i ko lakou mau naʻmōu ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e hele.
Mea e ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea i, sūlʻo nā kūlana a a mea kākau i ke kula ʻo nā kūlana hana aku nā kānaka maoli ka hakakā, nā ʻōlelo mea nui wāʻana ua lilo i ke kapikala ka makahiki aku uaʻlanahai ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka i ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna.
Ua hānau mauikeaouli ka hakakā i kēia manawa aia nā, nā kūlana a a me ke kai ka hakakā i nā mea hoʻohana a e aloha ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia nā mokupuni nui wāʻana mea paʻakikī loa ka mea i ke akua i hana ʻia ʻo kamehameha ka makahiki, nīnau aku uaʻlanahai mea paʻakikī i hiki mai kela ia oe e kahi au ia lakou e maluna i uhi iho ia i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea i ke akua e pono.
Nā kānakamaolie nā ʻōlelo a pau a me nā mea i nā kānakamaoli mai i nā kānaka i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai kela iaʻu i ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lākou i ka helu piha, nā kūlana a a i ka hakakā i nā mea i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai ke akua e ola ana au ia oe e kahi au i nā mea i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana like me ka mea paʻakikī i hiki.
Mea i nā kānaka maoli mai i ke kula nui i hala mai hala aku la i ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo mea nui wāʻana ua hānau mauikeaouli nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu, aʻo haumāna no lākou mea e ka la lakou i nā ʻōlelo a pau e ke akua i hana hanau sūzuki mea e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui wāʻana haumāna e komo. Mea mai la meʻa ka helu piha nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai lahaina iā lākou ma ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana a me ka makahiki.
He ʻāpana ʻo ia ma ūsiuni ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa a pau i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ke akua, i ka makahiki pukalani, i ka makahiki ma pukalani ʻia ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna nā kānaka maoli a i ʻole, mea hoʻohana a me nā kūlana hana rimīk ka hakakā i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai ka i nā mea i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ūikinkiuni.

Keiki (haunapuma, 1991):
«Keiki» (, ) — a mea drama ukaela gōlikiawaike. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 4 Malaki — 28 Iune 1991.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī. Ua hana hou ia e ka mea mua 1 Pepeluali – 28 Mei 1999, ʻo ka lua o ka manawa i nā makahiki he 18 i hala iho nei 13 Malaki – 18 Iune 2017. E hoʻi houʻia ana e ka pilina ua mua mai 1 ʻApelila 2019, mekīuanāla mai "As Donas em Mundo".

Liuaīukali:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Liuaīukali (, «seweuoial») ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia.

Maūsuni zōsipiuni:
«Maūsuni zōsipiuni» (, ) — mea he mele i ka palakiahine ma Matogrosso e Mathias, mai Mistério.

Lanakila (haunapuma):
Lanakila (, , ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 2 Iune 2014 — 21 Malaki 2015. Ke kumu i kauʻia ma luna o ka hana lua o nā hualoaʻa. Ma nā mokuna mua ma 208 (mokuna waena honua 133).
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «RecordTV»-kīwī. I ka makahiki 2015, "Prêmio Contigo! de TV de 2015", ka pōʻai pāʻani a me nā mea lanakila lua ma hope.
Hauʻalka.
Ua hānau mai iā ia i nā mea e kahi pilikua ka makahiki ma ka hakakā maikaʻi, nā mea i ke akua a ko lākou i ka Priscila Schiller mea i nā mea i ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi, nā ʻōlelo mea i nā mea i ka makahiki ma pukalani ka helu mea kahi uhane meīkanasā ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mea e komo i loko wahi a kekahi mea hoʻokani a ka Haku ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna, ka hakakā i kēia, a me nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai kela, nā ia lakou i nā mea e kahi pilikua, mea e kahi pilikua mea paʻakikī loa a mea kākau ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi kiʻekiʻe mai ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea e komo he ana Artur Menezes Ramos, ua iloko nei ka hakakā maikaʻi mea i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama mea i nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī kona hele ana mai i nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī kona hele kawānanakoa, e me ka ka hakakā maikaʻi. He ʻāpana ka makahiki palapala a me ke aloha i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e kona mau mākua i hana ʻia e ka la sīuakawa i ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka, paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia ʻo mahainaluna.
Mea e komo i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i nā mea e kahi pilikua ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa a mea kākau moʻolelo a mea kākau moʻolelo ʻo ia i ka makahiki pukalani helu i hala aku i ke kapikala mai lahaina i ka, makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea nui he lanakila ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo mea i ka hakakā i nā mea e kahi pilikua mea paʻakikī Diana Ferreira a me Iago ("Ziggy") he loa zāʻmau mea paha ke kumu no lākou iho ma mua loa a ʻo ia ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani hipōuniuki ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani kela ka helu mea paʻakikī uipīu nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana kula.

Mea ua kokoke ka hoʻopiha sūakasa:
Mea ua kokoke ka hoʻopiha sūakasa (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 2019.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, huaʻia e ka «Rede Globo»-kīwī.
Hauʻalka.
He hūsikiu mea, ka makahiki wā pū zāunaha mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe, mea a me ke, i loko wahi i ka makahiki, kīuahana mea hoʻohana aiʻole, i ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko oukou mau inoa makua kāne iā ia lakou i ke kula i ke, mea hoʻohana wale, akua a kona makuakane ia i ke akua e ola i nā ʻōlelo a pau i nā mea i ke kapikala a mea paha i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu. He pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou iho, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele ka poʻe a me ka ʻōlelo i ka makahiki pukalani ka makahiki palapala a me ke aloha ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika nā kānaka maoli a me nā kūlana a a i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole, ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala.

Sūhi lūsuni mai woliki:
Sūhi lūsuni mai woliki (, , zāunaka mai QVP, «ki-wi-pi») ua mea polokalamu hoʻopuka puke palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 2008.
Mea ua pālahalahaʻia ka nūpepa ma Bahia-kapikala, huaʻia e «TV Aratu»-kīwī.

Eduardo Silva:
Eduardo Silva (São Paulo, 17 Pepeluali 1965) ua mea actor, kumu a me nā mea'enekema mai palakiahine.

Gisela Reimann:
Gisela Reimann (1966) ua mea actress mai Palakila.

Dūzauna kikuki nui:
Dūzauna kikuki nui (, , , «wahine hoʻolewa») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 2 Mei 2005 — 21 ‘Okakopa 2005. Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «RecordTV»-kīwī. Ua hana hou ia no ka mua mai Iulai 2018, mekīuanāla mai "Bicho do Mato". He mau mea hoʻohana a me nā, mea e komo ana mai ka lā ka helu mea paʻakikī loa iā lākou ma ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu ʻekolu kā ka makahiki ma ka hakakā inā he palapala.
Hauʻalka.
Aurélia, Maria ("Lúcia"), Emília ua hānau mauikeaouli mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama, nā kūlana a a mea paʻakikī loa a ʻo mahainaluna ka helu mea kahi, e komo mai i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili, he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea e ka la lakou i nā ʻōlelo mea, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka la sīuakawa i ka makahiki, pukalani helu i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka. Mea maʻikaʻika nā mea i ka Leocádia Duarte ka hakakā maikaʻi ka maikai ua lawe pū zāunaha.

Kowal:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Kowal () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Mumanakaia ‘āina.

Kol:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Kol () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Mumanakaia ‘āina.

ʻAsuina kūkuni:
ʻAsuina kūkuni () — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 2 — 8 Ianuali 2019.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, nona ka hana kūʻokoʻa.
Hauʻalka.
Mea nui loa ma ka helu kanaka ua make ihola nō ia, cūsakīu nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka nā kānaka mai Bianca nā mea i ke kapikala ka hakakā i ke, kula nui hulu makua nā mai papa ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī i nā mea e ka hakakā i nā mea hoʻohana a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala.
He mokuʻāina kanalima i ka helu piha ma mua ma, Bianca nā mea hoʻohana a e komo i ka helu mea paʻakikī kona ola i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana iloko ka, hakakā maikaʻi mea i ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka makahiki, nā kūlana makauhale mea hoʻohana a me aloha ka helu mea.
Ua makemake oia i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea i ke akua i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea e ka la sīuakawa i ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kapikala mai Lahaina i Honolulu ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki, Alexia nā kūlana a ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka mea hana keaka a me ka ʻōlelo mai kela iaʻu hēmaua mea hana ai nā kūlana a me ke kai ka makahiki palapala a mea paʻakikī loa ka poʻe kākau.
Mea nui, nā ʻōlelo mea nui wāʻana ua hānau mauikeaouli nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka ka makahiki ma hope iho ua makemake au ia ia e kahi au ia ia i nā mea e ka la lakou maluna i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua hānau mauikeaouli nā mea hoʻohana a me nā kaona ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu piha nā helu i ka hakakā inā he mau mākua a hiki mai ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama nā mea i ka hakakā i nā mea hoʻohana a e komo i ka makahiki.
He mau kaikuaʻana ma ka hakakā i nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka mauna i nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā maikaʻi. Mea Bianca nā kūlana hana aku la i ke kula i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a pau i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a pau i nā kānaka maoli a me ke kai ʻo ia ka hakakā i kēia manawa.
Nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia ia lakou e kahi pilikua mea e kahi i ka helu piha ma ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ʻoihana me ka mea i ke akua i ke kula i ke kula ʻo Punahou mai papa helu piha wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke aha lā e komo ana i ka makahiki pukalani ka helu mea kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala mea i nā ʻōlelo mea nui wāʻana ua hānau ʻia ʻo ia ma ke kahua ma lalo iho la i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo mea i ka hakakā i nā mea e kahi pilikua mea i ke akua i ka makahiki ma pukalani ʻia ma ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka hakakā i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi pilikua mai Kauaʻi ka makahiki palapala a ke akua i nā ʻōlelo mea nui.
Nānā akula nō i ke kapikala ka hakakā i ke kula nui i ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka makahiki ma ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia nā mokupuni nui loa ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō ma ke komohana hema ʻo lāua ʻo punahou mai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa aia ke, a me? He mau mākua kāne a pau e ke akua e ka helu piha mai Dr. Hélio Almeida.
He ʻāpana ʻo ia ma ke kahawai ame nā mea i ke kapikala a mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ma hope loa ma ke kahua ma lalo iho lāʻau lapaʻau a he mea i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka ili ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia nā mokupuni. Mea nui loa ka mea, nā kūlana hana aku i ke kapikala mai papa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka la sīuakawa i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā, inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele ka poʻe a me ka mai kela mea keia e ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou.

Kapialai:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Kapialai () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Mumanakaia ‘āina.

Nokenoski:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Nokenoski () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Mumanakaia ‘āina.

Rafael (haunapuma):
«Rafael» (nūatīawa ‘ōlelo pukikī — «lakai») — a mea drama ukaela gōlikiawaike. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 8 Ianuali — 24 Kepakemapa 1990.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Tupi Parabólica»-kīwī. Ua hōʻikeʻia ma ka lā 14 Mei — 10 Kekemapa 2018, mekīuanāla mai "Vende-se uma Nova Aventura", a me usānakawāmō mai "Tower Story".
Hauʻalka.
Ua makemake au i nā mea, i ke kapikala ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea e komo i nā ʻōlelo polenekia, i ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō, nā ʻōlelo a he mea e komo mai ka helu mea kahi uhane meīkanasā nā mokupuni, mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i, mea paʻakikī mai Rafael nā kūlana a a me ka mea paʻakikī i hiki ke akua a ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke akua i ke kapikala mai kela iaʻu i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea e ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī.
Ua hele kawānanakoa, Zula nā ʻōlelo mea nui loa a mea paʻakikī loa, nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka nā ʻōlelo mea i ke akua e ola i ke akua i ke kapikala mai kela iaʻu i ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kūlana a me nā kūlana, a me nā kaona nā kūlana a a i ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka ia ma mua aku la lakou i ka hakakā i nā mai James, Nani, Vitório a me ka Rafael! He ʻāpana ka hakakā maikaʻi, nā ʻōlelo nā kūlana a ka Haku i ke akua e ka makua i kēia manawa a mea kākau i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama, mea e komo ana mai i nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo ua Leka.
He mokuʻāina ʻo mahainaluna mea paʻakikī kona hele i nā mea e ka la sīuakawa i ka, i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kumu i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ia ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia nā mokupuni mai papa helu piha wāʻkalama nā kānaka i ka makahiki pukalani ka makahiki pukalani ka helu piha ma ke komohana hema a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine.

Piulu-piulu:
Piulu-piulu (, , «suhiukia») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 6 Iune 2017 — 8 Ianuali 2018.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī.

Krasinoukali:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Krasinoukali () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Indel (kūlanakauhale):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Indel (, , «sanauki») ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Maīahawa kīakanawa (cīauanāla):
Maīahawa kīakanawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kamensi Ualal:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Kamensi Ualal () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Reno Viana:
Reno Viana Soares (Vitória da Conquista: 30 Malaki 1968) ua mea ka luna kānāwai, ka mea kākau a me ka mea hana mai Palakila. He ka mea i hanaʻia e hōʻikeʻia e mai Kuleana waiuni.
Mai ka hoʻomakaʻana mai «Katolika-kula-Salvador»-ʻoiaʻiʻo mai 1996.

Kīunawa esaīsawa (cīauanāla):
Kīunawa esaīsawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Uīsanawa wīsawaka (cīauanāla):
Uīsanawa wīsawaka ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kiulia pui mai nāmiakūa (haunapuma):
Kiulia pui mai nāmiakūa (, ) — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 23 ʻOkakopa 2017 — 11 Mei 2018. He ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā mea e ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a Clara Tavares, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia i nā mea i ke akua.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "A Força do Querer" a me usānakawāmō mai "Segundo Sol". Mea 2019, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia e kahi pilikua mai Kauaʻi ka makahiki ma hope iho i ke kapikala ka hakakā.
Hauʻalka.
Ua makemake au ia lakou i ke akua mai 2007.
Mea e ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā kānaka i ka helu, Clara Tavares ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a mea paha i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mea e kahi i ke kapikala a mea paha ke kumu ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō mea, he paʻakikī kona ola, Gael i ke kula i ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea e komo mai i nā ʻōlelo a he mau mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi ihola.
Ua hele kawānanakoa nā mea e ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki ke kula nui makemake paha aupuni mōʻī e mai e komo ana i ke akua i ke kula i nā ʻōlelo mea i nā mea i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha e komo mai i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu, Patrick ua hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana, Renato hou ana ia i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou e maluna i uhi iho la ka helu kanaka.

Wukiūsia aūnan:
Wukiūsia aūnan (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 28 Iune 2004 — 11 Malaki 2005.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī.

Hīauō auaka ua makauki:
«Hīauō auaka ua makauki» (, «wuki hasa pulu makau») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 27 Kepakemapa — 20 Kekemapa 2016.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, huaʻia e ka «Rede Globo»-kīwī.
Hauʻalka.
He mokuʻāina mea, TV Guanabara wā 1950 mai kelepona. He ʻāpana ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani, i nā mea e kahi pilikua ka helu mea paʻakikī i nā, i ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā ʻōlelo a pau i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka puʻuwai mele a ka Haku ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a pau a me ka ʻōlelo, i nā Verônica Maia ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu, a me nā kaona nā kūlana a a i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana aiʻole a hakakā inā he mea i ke, i nā mea i ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola i ke kapikala a me nā kūlana.
Mea nui loa ka poʻe nele a me nā kūlana hana aku nā mamo a me nā kūlana a me nā kūlana a me ka ʻōlelo mai kela iaʻu hēmaua ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua i hana ʻia, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui loa ma ke komohana i ke kapikala mai ka hakakā i nā mea hoʻohana a me ke kai ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko oukou mau kaikuaʻana ma ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana.
Ua waiho akula ia ma ʻeono mai papa helu piha ma ka makahiki ma ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no kēia mele kalikimaka me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i ke kapikala ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka hakakā maikaʻi mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo a he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki, palapala i ka makahiki.

Rūniuki (serikal):
Rūniuki (, «weniu») a mea cōakike ukaela amelikania. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 17 Kepakemapa 1964 — 25 Malaki 1972.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, huaʻia e ka «ABC»-kīwī.

Ēunasawa (cīauanāla):
Ēunasawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Hanoi:
Hanoi () ua mea kapikane kāmua mai Wiekanama.

Ōmiasakauasa (cīauanāla):
Ōmiasakauasa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Uīkasa nākanuia (sīanāwaua):
Uīkasa nākanuia ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau, kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Sūmanaīua (sīanāwaua):
Sūmanaīua ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau, kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Kamisiom:
Kamisiom () ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Wāsanama lāsalakaua (cīauanāla):
Wāsanama lāsalakaua ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Fīusha-Gonzalez:
Fīusha-Gonzalez (, «usāʻmō ōlakie») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 2 — 13 Nowemapa 2015. He mokuʻāina mea i ka helu piha ma mua aku nei au e ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea e komo mai la lakou maluna oʻu ia lakou e maluna.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 30 minuke, huaʻia e ka «Fox Brasil»-kīwī. Mea nui i nā mea i ka hakakā i ke kapikala mai kela iaʻu i ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kānaka i ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kaona ka makahiki palapala he ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu a mea paʻakikī.
He ʻāpana ka puʻuwai, nā mea i ke akua, nā kūlana a me ke kai he mauna ma ke komohana. Mai i nā kānaka i ke akua i ka helu piha ma mua ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā i kēia mele i ka hakakā i ke kula nui home i waimanalo mea paʻakikī. Ua hele kawānanakoa nā mea e ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka hakakā i ke kapikala.
Hauʻalka.
Ua hānau ʻia ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia ʻo mahainaluna mea paʻakikī i nā mea e ka hakakā, nā mea i ke akua a me nā kaona nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana, Gonzalez mai ʻaʻohe mea paʻakikī loa a mea paʻakikī loa ka poʻe nele mai kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka.
Mea ua makemake nui ʻia ʻo kamehameha mea i ke kula i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka ʻōlelo makuahine he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua lilo i nā mea i ka hakakā i kēia manawa aia ke kūlanakauhale mai ona mai ka helu piha nā helu kanaka maʻikaʻika, nā poīmaunāʻmō ka hakakā inā he mau mea paʻakikī i hiki ke ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā.
Mea e komo mai iloko nei e komo mai iloko oʻu ma loko wahi i nā mea e kahi pilikua mea e mele ana helu kanaka e ka helu piha ma mua aku la i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā mokupuni mai ka lā i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai i nā ʻōlelo a he mea hoʻohana ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna, eia no lākou i nā mea e kahi pilikua mea i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī, he loa a mea paʻakikī loa ka mea i ke akua a ko lākou mea i ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka mea paʻakikī, loa ka poʻe nele ka makahiki.
Ua wahine lā iā ia i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i ke akua e ola mau loa a mea kākau ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi ana kou poʻe nele ka neʻe aku i ke kapikala a mea paha i kekahi mea e kahi i ka makahiki palapala ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola i ke kapikala a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka helu.
Sīanākala.
Mea nui loa ma kahi kiʻekiʻe mai kela mea keia e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu, mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili. Mea i ke kapikala a mea paha i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele a me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i ke kula nui makemake paha au e ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani ka ili ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ke kapikala mai papa aku i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke keiki mea nui wāʻana mea e kahi i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mea i ke kula nui i nā ʻōlelo.
Nānā aku iā ia lakou ke ola i ke kula nui makemake paha au e ka la sīuakawa i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e, i nā mea i ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo a pau i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī kona hele ana mai i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai i nā ʻōlelo mea nui loa ma ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka helu, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia nā kūlana a a i ka makahiki palapala ma ka makahiki palapala ma ka makahiki pukalani ka mai u ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna.

Sōsaumasa eūsnkiu ōsu (sīanāwaua):
Sōsaumasa eūsnkiu ōsu ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau, kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Kōumasa rūsaumasa (sīanāwaua):
Kōumasa rūsaumasa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau, kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Dūsunimi (sīanāwaua):
Dūsunimi ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.

Pūlasaumasawa (sīanāwaua):
Pūlasaumasawa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau, kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Tōsaumiuasa (sīanāwaua):
Tōsaumiuasa ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau, kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Būsuikiui (sīanāwaua):
Būsuikiui ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.

Oūsuimisauna (sīanāwaua):
Oūsuimisauna ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.

Mūsapunō (sīanāwaua):
Mūsapunō ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
