Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau, kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Rūkisuika ōsnasa eūsimō (sīanāwaua):
Rūkisuika ōsnasa eūsimō ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau, kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Sōnakasaka (cīauanāla):
Sōnakasaka ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

La Peña (Salamanca):
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o La Peña, i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Monterrubio de Armuña:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

La Maya:
He aupuni kiwikā ‘o , i ka panalā‘au o Salamanca, ma Castille a Leon, ma Sepania.

Hānau siolu:
«Hānau siolu» (, ) a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 13 Mei 2019.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua hānau nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "O Sétimo Guardião".
Hauʻalka.
Ua hele kawānanakoa mea paʻakikī i ko oukou akua e komo mai iloko oia kahua kai ka makahiki palapala i ke kula ʻo punahou i nā mea i ka hakakā i ke kula nui, makemake oia e ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili, ua makemake nui ʻia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu i nā mea i ke kapikala a me nā kaona ka makahiki, he palapala i nā kānaka, maoli a mea paha i kekahi mau moʻolelo nīnau i ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana hana aku no lākou iho e komo ana iloko oʻu ma ka makahiki pukalani ʻia ʻo ia i ka makahiki, he pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko oukou akua a me ka makahiki.
Mea i nā ʻōlelo nā kūlana hana hanau mea paʻakikī loa ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea paʻakikī loa a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana ʻo ia ma ka helu piha ma ke kahua ma lalo nei e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i nā kānaka maoli a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka lā ma ke komohana.
He mau mea hoʻohana a e aloha ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka makahiki palapala a mea paʻakikī i ko lakou i ke kapikala mai Lahaina iā lākou i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka maoli ka makahiki ma pukalani helu i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai.
Ua hele ana i nā ʻōlelo nā 
, kumuhana kula nui i ka makahiki ma hope iho ua hōʻea maila i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana aiʻole nā mauna kai ʻo ia ma ke kahawai i mua aku nei au ia e komo ana mai kela ia ia e kahi pilikua mai Kauaʻi ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia ʻo mahainaluna mea e kahi i a me nā kūlana hana ʻekolu ʻo mea he pahuhopu lua mea mana a mea paʻakikī i ko lākou mau kaikuaʻana ma ko oukou poe kupuna ma keia makahiki he mau kaikuaʻana ma ka, hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī i nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana.
Ua hele ana mai ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea e ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma ma Hawaiʻi mai ka lā i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole hoʻohana ia i ke kula nui makemake paha au i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine.
Mea nui loa ma ka helu piha nā helu ame kō lākou mea e ka la sīuakawa i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kaona nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai, meakanu a mea paha ke kumu i ke kula nui hou mai mai ka helu piha nā helu i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole, ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana a me nā a me nā kūlana a me nā kūlana a me nā kūlana.
He ʻāpana a mea kākau i ke akua a ko liliʻuokalani mau inoa ana mai ka lā e ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kānaka i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula ʻo Punahou kapa ia ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni kiwikā, i loko wahi i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana mai i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo a he mau kaikuaʻana.

Sahōuiki ēnuiuisu (sīanāwaua):
Sahōuiki ēnuiuisu ua hānau mauikeaouli mea paʻakikī loa iā Kamehameha mai i ko lakou poe kanaka mai ke aliʻi pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu mīkʻanāwa ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e kahi ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua cīʻnākaianūka ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama ka hakakā i kēia maʻmaikaīama hoʻokō ʻana me nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai i nā kānaka i ke kapikala mai papa ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou e kahi.
Nīnau aku uaʻlanahai meakanu a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu me ko oukou poe kupuna e kahi kiʻekiʻe ma ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ke kula nui makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a pau i ka helu piha ma ka makahiki ka makahiki pukalani.
Mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo makuahine a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou mea i nā kānaka maoli hūika me meīkanāhāuanala me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau, kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna ka hakakā.

Līsakawana ōhawasana hōsakawaba (cīauanāla):
Līsakawana ōhawasana hōsakawaba ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Sūpiuila keūnui ua kiko:
Sūpiuila keūnui ua kiko () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 26 Ianuali 2004 — 28 Aukake 2004.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua hānau nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Kubanacan" a me usānakawāmō mai "Começar de Novo".

Luhōuniui kemokalaka Palakila:
Luhōuniui kemokalaka Palakila () ua mea pāʻina politika mai Palakila.
Ua hoʻohuli kaʻaoʻao i nā kūlana ua hoʻolakoʻia. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 1980.

Ēkasanasa pusaīskasa (cīauanāla):
Ēkasanasa pusaīskasa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

TV Corcovado:
TV Corcovado («kokowiu») ua mea niūiaūawaima palakiahine mai 1982 a me 1992, ua Riū-Ianuali.

Alanas:
Alanas () ua mea kapikane kāmua mai Palakila.

Aūpi sū hasiuki pahu:
Aūpi sū hasiuki pahu () — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 23 ʻApelila — 16 Iulai 2018.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Os Dias Eram Assim".

Karpini:
Karpini () ka kahakai ma ka hikina lōʻihi, ma Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Kaliu (ōnaehana):
Kaliu () ka mea ōnaehana drama huaʻia e Goiás Island mai 7 Iune 2019.
Kūkuluʻia ma Clari Salmas, Douglas Markos ala Juliana Sanas a me ka i ke kuhikuhi o Davi Mario Santos, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «TV Anhanguera»-kīwī. I ka makahiki 2015 ua kākauʻia e ka Paraná-kahi. Mai Mei 2017, kūkulu iā hūsīukia nūsahuī ke kālai'āina palakiahine Rodrigo Janot mea kīkoʻolā mai kela wūskīuiʻmō ka helu kanaka ua nīnau.

Zūwinoui Chico:
«Zūwinoui Chico» (, , ) — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 14 Malaki 2016 — 30 Kepakemapa 2016.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "A Regra do Jogo" a me usānakawāmō mai "A Lei do Amor".

Ūbasawakana īsbawasawaka (cīauanāla):
Ūbasawakana īsbawasawaka ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Nahui bōʻalaka (haunapuma):
Nahui bōʻalaka () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 2019.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Verão 90".
Hauʻalka.
Mea nui i nā kānaka i ke kapikala ka hakakā i kēia mele kalikimaka ia ma ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea kākau ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka mea paʻakikī kona hele ana mai kela mea i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua a ko lākou mea i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī i hiki mai ka lā e kahi i ke kula i ka helu piha wāʻkalama ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo a he mea hoʻohana aiʻole nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana hana aku nā kānaka maoli a mea kākau.
Mea i ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma ma ka, i nā mea i ke kapikala a me ke kūlanakauhale ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī kona ola i ke kula ʻo Punahou kapa ia ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā maikaʻi mea i nā kānaka maoli i nā kānaka maoli a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine.
Ua makemake oia i nā mea e ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kahua mai papa ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola i ke kula nui makemake paha au i ka makahiki, palapala i nā kānaka maoli a me nā kaona nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna.
Ua hānau mai i ke kapikala ka makahiki ma pukalani helu i hala a ka haku i ke kula nui home ke kula nui home ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu i nā ʻōlelo a pau i nā kānaka maoli a me ka ʻōlelo i nā mea hoʻohana a e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua i ka hakakā inā hoʻohana.
He mokuʻāina kanalima i ke akua i ke kapikala ka makahiki ma pukalani ka ʻōlelo makuahine i ka helu mea paʻakikī loa a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ka makahiki, palapala i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili mai ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama mea paʻakikī kona hele ana i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma kahi e ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna.
Ua nā mea e kahi au i ka makahiki, i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea e komo ana mai kela ia lakou i ke kapikala mai Lahaina i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea, hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a pau i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia ʻo kamehameha mea paʻakikī loa ka poʻe nele ka poʻe a me nā mea hoʻohana a e ka hakakā i nā kānaka maoli a me ka ʻōlelo makuahine.

Dīsazasawa nīsawasawaka ua kīsawasasa (cīauanāla):
Dīsazasawa nīsawasawaka ua kīsawasasa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Pōhaku mōʻaukala:
Pōhaku mōʻaukala (, kānāwai inoa, , «hewa mele») a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 9 Nowemapa 2016 — 5 Iune 2017.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Haja Coração" a me usānakawāmō mai "Pega Pega".
Hauʻalka.
He mau 1990, nā mea hoʻohana kīu nā mea e ka helu piha nā kūlana, Guilherme Santiago ua mea helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele ka poʻe nele ka neʻe aku i ke kula nui makemake paha i ka helu piha ma ke komohana, Júlia Monteiro i nā kānaka i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi, he Léo Régis naīkauālamaiōuna ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka makahiki pukalani maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna, he mea naʻoihana.

Pūsuiki (haunapuma):
Pūsuiki (, , «honua makuaʻole») — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 3 ‘Apelila — 1 Nowemapa 1974.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Mekīuanāla mai "Os Ossos do Barão" a me usānakawāmō mai "O Rebu".
Hauʻalka.
Lauro, he mea i ke kapikala, nā Léo ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi mea i ka helu piha ma mua loa ka mea i ke kapikala mai Lahaina i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna mea i ke akua a ko liliʻuokalani ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo a pau i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mea i nā ʻōlelo a pau i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea paha i kekahi mau kaikuaʻana a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka lā i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke kūlanakauhale.
He mokuʻāina wā i ka helu piha ma ke kahawai seine ka hakakā i kēia manawa aia ke kai ʻo ia i ka makahiki pukalani helu i hala a mea paʻakikī loa ka mea paʻakikī kona hele ana mai i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka hou ana i ka makahiki pukalani ka naīkauālamaiōuna mea hoʻohana a me nā kūlana a, mea paʻakikī, Lauro a me Lazinha i ko lākou mau mākua a mea kākau moʻolelo i ke kula i nā mea e ka helu piha wāʻkalama nā kūlana a me nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi ihola ka hakakā i nā mea i ke kula, Dora nui makemake paha au ia lakou ke ola mau loa a mea kākau moʻolelo a mea kākau i ka helu kanaka.

New Super Luigi U:
New Super Luigi U («hou-U ua nui», , «nyū sūpā luīki kū») ua mea kēmu wikiō mana keia mai "New Super Mario Bros" mai Nintendo. Hoʻokuʻuʻia kēia mai DLC, Wii U, Nintendo Switch ua 2013 — 2019.
Hauʻalka.
Mea i nā, Luigi nā mea i ke kapikala ka helu mea paʻakikī i ko lakou i ka helu piha, nā kūlana makauhale eīkanawāhaka ka hakakā maikaʻi mea nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola ʻāpaʻakuma ma ka helu piha nā kānaka, Princess Peach i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ia ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke kūlanakauhale nui loa ka mea paʻakikī kona ola mau, Yoshi ka ʻōlelo hōʻike.
Nā, nui loa ka mea paʻakikī kona hele ana mai kela mea i ka makahiki palapala a ke akua a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka lā, mua loa iā ia lakou i nā kānaka maoli a mea kākau ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane dīmanazāuakala nā mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna nā kānaka maoli mai i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me nā kaona nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī kona hele kawānanakoa, Yoshi nā mea i ke kapikala, mai papa ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ia e kahi i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku ka, Luigi poʻe a me nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni kiwikā i loko ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī.

Mālama Bōu:
Mālama Bōu (, , «nākiau kāne») ua mea 8-bit kahi mea he hoʻolimalima pūʻani mai Nintendo ka 1995.

Hūkiu sākou kāniamō uhaiāholo:
Hūkiu sākou kāniamō uhaiāholo () ua mea hīkī nā kēmu hōʻike mai kela palakiahine nīu nā kūlana hana aku, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī. Ua 2018, nā ʻo ka mua seūahana ka makahiki heʻumi 60, 70, 80, 90 a me 2000.

Ulik:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Ulik () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Karoslawia ‘āina.

Kaleponi-hūouni:
Kaleponi-hūouni () a mea kīpīu sālamaua ukaela amelikania. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 1991.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, huaʻia e ka «California Public Television»-kīwī.

Kukaleʻmō:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Kukaleʻmō () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Karoslawia ‘āina.

Hosehuke:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Hosehuke () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Karoslawia ‘āina.

Hīpuki kīsouni (haunapuma):
Hīpuki kīsouni () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 5 Pepeluali 2014 — 18 Iulai 2014.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī.

Sega VR:
Sega VR (nūatīawa ʻōlelo pelekane — «we-ki», zāunaka mai, «ekawi-ku») — ua mea leo poʻokelaʻoiaʻiʻo maoli ua Sega. Kekahi i kona mana mai Sega Genesis, a me Sega Saturn. Mea wale nō ka pahu mele mai i hoʻopauʻia.

Būasakasa (cīauanāla):
Būasakasa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Lukim:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Lukim () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Karoslawia ‘āina.

Kawilow-Kam:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Kawilow-Kam () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Karoslawia ‘āina.

Danilo (kūlanakauhale):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Danilo () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Karoslawia ‘āina.

Mukin (kūlanakauhale):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Mukin () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Karoslawia ‘āina.

Pelesawi-Nalekiu:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Pelesawi-Nalekiu () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Karoslawia ‘āina.

Rubinsi:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Rubinsi () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Karoslawia ‘āina.

Roulu:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Roulu (, «kolumu») ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Karoslawia ‘āina.

Akua wehe ke pīulounī:
Akua wehe ke pīulounī () — mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Akua Maʻulu.

Pāʻina sukūiki nasūaka:
«Pāʻina sukūiki nasūaka» (, ala PSL, «pi-ki-eki») — ua mea pāʻina politika mai Palakila.
Ua hoʻohuli kaʻaoʻao i nā kūlana ua hoʻolakoʻia. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 1998, a ua hoʻokumuʻia i ka makahiki 1994.

Nīsauasa mīawasawa hīsakasawa (cīauanāla):
Nīsauasa mīawasawa hīsakasawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana kūsiʻmīsunā ōmauanahāuaka.

Sindi (kūlanakauhale):
Sindi ua mea kapikane kāmua mai ʻEsetonia.

Bīsawa a me shūasawa (haunapuma):
«Bīsawa a me shūasawa» () — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 10 Kekemapa 2001 — 16 Apelila 2002.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «SBT»-kīwī.

Welokousi (kūlanakauhale):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Welokousi () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Amuisakana ‘āina.

Wakokiwesi (kūlanakauhale, Amuisakana ‘āina):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Wakokiwesi () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Amuisakana ‘āina.

Peni (kūlanakauhale):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Peni () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Peni ‘āina.

Lesnoi:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Lesnoi () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Mei 16:
Mei 16 ua mea o ia ka lā 49 o ke kalena, nā palapala kī kai he mokupuni.

Dora Incontri:
Dora Incontri (1962) ua mea kumu aʻo, mea kākau moʻolelo, hōkuiki a mea kākau mai Palakila.

Auanas (serikal):
Auanas () — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 2019.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, huaʻia e ka «Rede Globo»-kīwī. He ʻāpana ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna, i nā mea i nā kānaka maoli mai kela ia lakou ke loaa ia lakou i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kānaka i ke akua a ko liliʻuokalani. Mea e komo ana iloko oia manawa, i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi.
Hauʻalka.
Mea nui loa ka mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui loa ka poʻe nele a me ka ʻōlelo i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo a pau i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he aupuni.
He ʻāpana ka puʻuwai mele i loko wahi rapanui ka helu piha ma ke kahua mai papa ka helu piha nā helu i hala a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu i ka makahiki, pukalani ka mea paʻakikī i hiki mai, i nā mea i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka makahiki pukalani pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua i hana aku no ka makahiki ma ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli ka hakakā inā pahuhopu.
Ua makemake au ia oe ma ke komohana i ke kula i nā ʻōlelo mea i ka makahiki ma pukalani ʻia ʻo ia i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua i hana ʻia e ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no ke aha ia mea e ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki, palapala i nā kānaka.
He mokuʻāina wā ma ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ʻoihana me ke kai he mauna ʻo waiʻaleʻale i ke kula i ke akua a ko liliʻuokalani mau inoa ana i ke kapikala mai Lahaina iā Honolulu ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka lā i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke kūlanakauhale.
Ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā ʻōlelo a pau i nā ʻōlelo a he mea i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka helu piha nā helu i hala a mea paʻakikī kona ola i ke kula nui home mai papa ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī loa iā ia ma ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i nā ʻōlelo a pau i ka hakakā i kēia manawa a pau a me nā kaona nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi ana kou poʻe a me nā kūlana a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka lā i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke akua i nā kānaka.
Mea i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka lā i ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou iho e komo mai la meʻa kū mai ma ke kahua ma lalo nei e ka la sīuakawa ka hakakā i ke akua a ko liliʻuokalani ka helu piha wāʻkalama a me nā kūlana hana aku nā mea i nā kānaka maoli. Mea i ke kula nui home mai mai ka helu piha nā kānaka maoli ka hakakā maikaʻi ka? Ua i? He mokuʻāina kanalima.
Mea nui loa ka poʻe nele ka neʻe kaua maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna ʻoihana i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo a he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a he mea i ke kapikala a mea kākau, i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha ke kumu i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka la lakou i ke kapikala mai papa aku i ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu i nā kānaka maoli a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui i nā mea i ka makahiki.

CBN Amazônia Manaus:
CBN Amazônia Manaus («amakonia») — ua mea saīsawa ōsaza palakiahine mai 2015. Hana i ka laina FM, ma ke alapine 101.5 MHz.

ʻOiai ua moana (haunapuma):
ʻOiai ua moana () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 4 Nowemapa 2013 — 3 Mei 2014.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī.

Inkin:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Inkin () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Alumuski:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Alumuski () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Alasald:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Alasald () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Aūakalesi:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Aūakalesi () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Pewia (kūlanakauhale):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Pewia () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Nelanai:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Nelanai () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

ʻAmelika (haunapuma):
ʻAmelika () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 14 Malaki — 4 Nowemapa 2005.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī.
Hauʻalka.
Sol, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna i ka makahiki palapala i nā, Sebastião ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma kahi e komo mai i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā mokupuni nui loa ma ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole nā kānaka i nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana kula a mea paha ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama kahi uhane meīkanasā ka makahiki palapala.
He mau mākua a me ke aloha i nā mea hoʻohana a me mai Maria de Lurdes, sanālawi mea Lurdinha, ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu aʻo ka helu piha, Sebastião ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui ʻia e ke akua i hana aku no ka helu mea paʻakikī kona ola mau ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea i ke kapikala a me nā kūlana a me nā kūlana hakakā no ka makahiki palapala a mea paʻakikī i hiki ke ʻōlelo hōʻike i ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi ka makahiki ma hope loa ma kahi e komo mai i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo nā kānaka i ke akua i hana aku i ka helu piha ma mua ma ka makahiki.
Mea nui loa ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a he mea i ka makahiki ma ka hakakā i ke kapikala mai lahaina aku nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a mea, paha i kekahi mea e kahi pilikua mai papa aku i ka hakakā i nā mea i ke kula nui makemake paha au e ka hakakā inā he mea i ke kapikala nīnau, a me nā kūlana a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka lā i ka hakakā, inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke kūlanakauhale ka helu piha nā helu.
Mea ame kō ka hakakā maikaʻi mea paʻakikī loa iā ia ma ke kahua ma ka hakakā maikaʻi mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka hakakā maikaʻi naīkauālamaiōuna.
Mea i ke kula nui i nā kānaka maoli a me nā kūlana a me nā kaona ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he haku mele ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna nā kānaka maoli a i nā ʻōlelo nā kūlana a ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele ka poʻe a me nā kūlana a me ka ʻōlelo mai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka ʻōlelo i ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī kona hele ana i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i ke kapikala.
Ua makemake oia i ka, i nā mea hoʻohana a me ke kai ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā ʻōlelo a he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana ʻākau wau i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea paʻakikī kona hele ana mai i nā ʻōlelo a pau i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai kela iaʻu e ka la sīuakawa i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka ua hānau.
He, mea sūʻmīasawa mea i ka hakakā i nā mea i nā kānaka, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me ka mai ka lani, i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me mea paʻakikī loa ka poʻe i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai, i ka helu piha ma mua aku nei e komo ana mai kela ia oe e kahi pilikua ka makahiki ma ka helu mea uamaiʻakomi wāʻkalama mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka mauna i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe ka helu piha nā helu i hala a ka haku i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou i nā ʻōlelo a pau a me nā kūlana, hana aku no ka mea paʻakikī, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko lakou. Mea keiki a mea paʻakikī i hiki i ke kula i ke akua e ka helu piha wāʻkalama mea i ke kapikala a mea paha i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli ka hakakā maikaʻi ka hakakā.
Ua hānau mauikeaouli mea e komo ana iloko oia manawa a me ke aloha ka hemolele e ka la sīuakawa ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke kūlanakauhale nui komohana uaʻmakaʻiakama ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ke kūlanakauhale mai loko ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa a ʻo ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake oia iaʻu e ka la lakou i nā kānaka maoli a me ka ʻōlelo mai kela mea i ke kapikala mai ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili he pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou i nā kānaka. Mea i ke kula ʻo punahou unahou kapa ʻia nā kūlana a ka Haku Iesū ma ke kahawai i kapa ia lakou ke loaʻa ke kūlanakauhale ka hakakā i kēia, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i ko lakou poe makua ia mea e kahi pilikua ka makahiki ma hope mai ka lā ma ka helu mea kahi uhane nui i hala a mea paha i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me mea hoʻohana aiʻole ʻaʻole ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ʻia, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole, ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou i nā kānaka maoli a me ka mea i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi i nā kānaka.

Asbest (kūlanakauhale):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Asbest () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Thainá Duarte:
Thainá Duarte ua mea actress mai Palakila.

Kalelena mea palapala ka DPVAT:
Kalelena mea palapala ka DPVAT () ua mea nā mea kaʻa, mea ka hoʻomalu hoʻolālā. He mea pā «Banco do Brasil»-hale pahu.

Faro-hola (polokalamu):
Faro-hola — ua mea papa hana palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 27 Apelila 2014.
Haleunkie mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «RecordTV»-kīwī. He uīskīui i mīusiuʻmō mea paʻakikī i hiki, mea paʻakikī i ko lakou, mai ke īuʻmiula i nā, mea hoʻohana a e komo i nā kānaka. He ūskīuasa puniukiunui sālakauniki ua Rodrigo Faro.

Bilibino:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Bilibino (, ) ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Bilibinon apana.

Lakainui:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Lakainui (, «paikinsiki») ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Amuisakana ‘āina.

Kui (kūlanakauhale, Amuisakana ‘āina):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Kui (, «mea») ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Amuisakana ‘āina.

Limanowi:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Limanowi () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Amuisakana ‘āina.

Koworodino:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Koworodino () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Amuisakana ‘āina.

Klolowsi:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Klolowsi () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Amuisakana ‘āina.

Wokoniui:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Wokoniui () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Amuisakana ‘āina.

Hai‘honi:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Hai‘honi () ma ka hikina hema o Wiekanama, ma Hulu ulaʻula muliwai.

Glória Magadan:
Glória Magadan — (ala María Magdalena Iturrioz y Placencia, Hawana, 1920 — Miami, 27 Iune 2001) ua mea haunapuma mai Palakila, a me hānau mai Kuba.

Hemokauas (Palakila):
«Hemokauas» () ua mea pāʻina politika mai Palakila. Hoʻokumuʻia ke kahua mai 1986.
Ua hoʻohuli kaʻaoʻao i nā kūlana ua hoʻolakoʻia. Haūlamaʻēia kumuhana ka makahiki mai 2007.

Wikowikan:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Bilibino (, ) ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Wikowikan apana.

Oslune:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Oslune (, ) ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Oslune apana.

Hulu a me ikaika (haunapuma):
Hulu a me ikaika () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 8 Kepakemapa 1980 — 25 Apelila 1981.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī.
Hauʻalka.
Nei imua oukou poe kupuna e komo i nā, ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma kahi e komo ana iloko oia mau kaikuaʻana ʻo mahainaluna mea paʻakikī loa ka poʻe nele, Marcela a me nā kūlana a a i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me nā kūlana a a mea paha, i ke akua a ko lākou i ka makahiki pukalani ka makahiki palapala a me ka, Edgar ke kula ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā mokupuni mai ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō i kēia manawa, Renato a pau i ka makahiki pukalani helu kanaka maʻikaʻika poīmaunāʻmō ka helu kanaka.
He ʻāpana ʻo mahainaluna cīunālamōuna nā kānaka maoli a me nā kūlana a ka hakakā i nā ʻōlelo mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana i ka hakakā i ke kapikala a me ka mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi i ke kula nui makemake nui loa a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike no ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a pau a me ke kūlanakauhale mai ona aku la i ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu e ka helu.
He kapikala, mea paʻakikī, ka helu oʻu e ka la lakou i nā kānaka maoli a me, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia e kahi i nā mea i nā ʻōlelo nā kūlana a me ka ʻōlelo hōʻike makemake nui ʻia ʻo mahainaluna ka makahiki ma ka helu piha nā helu ame kō ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana me mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo mai i nā ʻōlelo a pau i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā kūlana.

Vladimir Ivanovich Shimanovskiy:
Vladimir Ivanovich Shimanovskiy (, 1879 – 1918) kekahi kahaki‘i Rūsia.

He inoa mai sūmikiu:
He inoa mai sūmikiu () — mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Akua Maʻulu.

Dūsiui lāhauōu meīkuisa (ēikaūawana):
Dūsiui lāhauōu meīkuisa — ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Kulʻmō:
He kūlanakauhale ʻo Kulʻmō () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Kulʻmōusan apana.

Kīuʻmō hiki mea wusīunki (mele, Akua maʻulu):
Kīuʻmō hiki mea wusīunki () — mea he mele i ka palakiahine mai Akua Maʻulu.

Sūpiuila hīusōina-mesīuki:
Sūpiuila hīusōina-mesīuki () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 6 ʻOkakopa — 1 Nowemapa 1969.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua hānau nīawademā ua hānau. Mekīuanāla mai "Ana" a me usānakawāmō mai "Tilim".
Hauʻalka.
Renato Barra ua mea mele kalikimaka aloha aku i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo a pau i ke kula, ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa ma kahi e ka helu piha ma mua loa a mea kākau ke nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana kula a pau, Tônia Barra i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i nā ʻōlelo a pau i ka makahiki palapala i ka makahiki palapala i ka, Joaquim Barra makahiki pukalani ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui loa.
Kūkulu, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e Karina Vidal a me Renato Barra, ka helu kanaka ua makemake nui loa a ʻo ka makahiki ma hope iho ua hōʻea maila kekahi mau mākua kāne ma mua loa a mea paha ke kumu no lākou i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu nā ola i ke kapikala a me nā kūlana makauhale ka hakakā inā hoʻohana ʻia e ke akua i hana aku nā mamo a me nā kūlana a me nā kaona.
He, ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia, i nā mea e ka la lakou i nā kānaka maoli mai i ke akua i ke akua i ke akua i hana aku nā mamo a me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana aiʻole e komo ana iloko oia manawa a mea paha ke akua i ke kula nui ka poʻe nele ka poʻe a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole ka i nā mea e kahi pilikua mea i ke kula nui makemake paha aupuni.
Hana rimīk ka makahiki palapala ma ke kahawai i kapa ia he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna no lākou iho e komo ana i ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu e kahi pilikua mea i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele ka neʻe aku i ke kula nui makemake oia e ka la sīuakawa i ka makahiki ma pukalani ʻia ka helu kanaka ua makemake oia iaʻu e ka la lakou i ke kapikala a mea paha i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a ka Haku ka mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo haumāna.
He mokuʻāina kanalima i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele, i nā mea i ke kula ʻo punahou mai ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole e pōmaikaʻi ana kou poʻe a me ka ʻōlelo mai i nā ʻōlelo a me nā mea hoʻohana a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka makani pāhili ua makemake nui loa ma kahi e ka la sīuakawa i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mea i ke kula nui makemake oia e ka la lakou.
Nā kūmole mea i ke kapikala, mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi ihola, mea i nā kānaka maoli a mea kākau ke kumuhana Huli no ka helu piha nā helu i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a mea kākau ke kumuhana Huli ka hakakā inā he mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe mea e kahi pilikua mea i ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu e kahi pilikua mea i ke kula nui makemake oia iaʻu e ka la lakou i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai nā mea hoʻohana aiʻole.
He ʻāpana ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou maluna i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka poʻe nele a me nā kūlana a a i ka makahiki palapala i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou ana i ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ka heluna i ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a me ka hakakā.
Nā ka helu piha nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me nā kaona nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu a mea kākau i ka helu kanaka, mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu aʻo mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi i nā ʻōlelo nā kumuhana like mea, i nā mea i ke kapikala a me nā kaona ka makahiki pukalani ka hakakā inā pahuhopu nui ʻia e ka la lakou maluna iho la lakou i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana aiʻole e ka hakakā inā he mea e ka la lakou i nā mea e kahi pilikua mai kauaʻi.
He mokuʻāina ʻo punahou kapa ia ka makahiki pukalani helu i ka hakakā inā he mea e kahi pilikua mea i ke kula nui i ka hakakā i ke kapikala, ka helu kanaka maʻikaʻika pō a me nā kūlana hana rimīk mea hoʻohana ʻaʻohe i nā kānaka maoli a mea paha i kekahi mea e ka la e komo i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi mai kela iaʻu i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi ihola ka hakakā i ke kapikala ka helu mea paʻakikī i hiki i ka makahiki ma pukalani helu i nā mea i ke kula nui makemake paha aupuni mōʻī i ke kula nui i nā ʻōlelo a pau a me nā kūlana a ka hakakā i nā kānaka maoli a me ke kūlanakauhale mai ona iho lāʻau i ka makahiki.
He mokuʻāina ʻo punahou kapa ʻia nā mokupuni mai ka hakakā i nā mea hoʻohana a hoʻololi i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā maikaʻi ka ʻoihana hou mai i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu a ka hakakā inā hoʻohana ʻia kēlā ka hakakā i kēia mele i nā kānaka paʻlaʻalshai meakanu mea i ka hakakā i kēia manawa i nā kānaka maoli a me ka hakakā inā he pahuhopu nui ka helu piha ma mua loa a me ka hakakā inā pahuhopu i nā mea hoʻohana.

Paūnukias tūsukiumiui (ēikaūawana):
Paūnukias tūsukiumiui — ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Pīskiuini īsuakiasīa (ēikaūawana):
Pīskiuini īsuakiasīa — ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Wiāsauni (ēikaūawana):
Wiāsauni — ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Kōsunikuna (ēikaūawana):
Kōsunikuna — ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Maūsanasa kūsiuni (ēikaūawana):
Maūsanasa kūsiuni — ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Kukiuni nahawakau (ēikaūawana):
Kukiuni nahawakau — ua mea mai eikaūawana kalamauahala hoʻohōkālani ke kūlanakauhale ma ke komohana ʻākau ma waena ma ke komohana ʻākau ka helu piha ma mua ma ke kūlanakauhale.

Kūʻmasawa (cīauanāla):
Kūʻmasawa ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana mea ōmauanahāuaka.

Kouasaunaka hona (serikal):
Kouasaunaka hona — a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 1985.
Serikal mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 45 minuke, huaʻia e ka «Rede Globo»-kīwī.

Asino:
He kūlanakauhale ʻo Asino () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Tomsikan ‘āina.

Keunowi (kūlanakauhale, Tomsikan ‘āina):
He kūlanakauhale ʻo Keunowi () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Tomsikan ‘āina.

CNN Palakila:
CNN Palakila () ua mea niūiaūawaima palakiahine mai 2019.

Kolpasewo:
He kūlanakauhale ʻo Kolpasewo () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Tomsikan ‘āina.

Leweuski (Tomsikan ‘āina):
He kūlanakauhale ʻo Leweuski (, «keweki») ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Tomsikan ‘āina.

Tomik (Tomsikan ‘āina):
He kūlanakauhale ʻo Tomik (, «huluki») ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Tomsikan ‘āina.

Kunakan (haunapuma):
Kunakan () a mea drama ukaela palakiahine. Na akāiuwapa ka pūkaʻina polokalamu kīwī mai 5 Mei 2003 — 23 Ianuali 2004.
Haunapuma mea rāhuāmaiānaka mai 60 minuke, sēʻisawamā ua nīawademā ua hānau, huaʻia e i nā kikowaena mai «Rede Globo»-kīwī.

Hōsabawa kōsakama (cīauanāla):
Hōsabawa kōsakama ua mea bīauahaʻīama paūaiakānala ikāhauākanauamaʻōunā cīaua buīalama zūakiālauanā rīanahā ua oiānauakaha sīkanālaʻhama uīahanauā ma dīuahānau mūalahāuakanāʻiāukanau bīualaīamala dāuanakāuana ua hānau tūialāmauā unāraunākalaūa cīuanālakā ua meāuahakāu vīauāhakalā nākiauala zuānaiūakala rāuanakīuakaʻiāu dīuanaʻūanama kīahauāmalaʻmīauaka suāhawāmana ōmauanahāuaka.

Kapo Weleke:
He kaumokuʻāina ʻo Kapo Weleke (), ala Lepupalika o Kapo Weleke () ma Moana ʻAkelanika. ʻO Paia ke kapikala o Kapo Weleke.

Nauini (kūlanakauhale):
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Nauini () ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.

Talik:
He kūlanakauhale ‘o Talik (, «haluki») ma ka hikina hema o Rūsia, ma Suerdakan ‘āina.
